original: They have $DEV$ Development in $PROVS$ provinces.
translation: 在$PROVS$省份已经有 $DEV$ 发展度。

original: They have $NUM|Y$ bank loan(s) that will cost $DUCATS|Y$¤ to repay.
translation: 他们有$NUM|Y$笔贷款并将要花费$DUCATS|Y$¤金币来偿还。

original: Participant
translation: 参加者

original: Attackers
translation: 进攻方

original: Defenders
translation: 防御方

original: Attacker casualties
translation: 进攻方伤亡

original: Defender casualties
translation: 防御方伤亡

original: $ADJ$ casualties
translation: $ADJ$伤亡

translation: 永载史册的胜利

original: Complete victory
translation: 完全的胜利

original: Glorious victory
translation: 光荣的胜利

original: Decisive victory
translation: 决定性的胜利

translation: 空洞的胜利

original: Major victory
translation: 主要的胜利

original: Naval victory
translation: 海军胜利

original: Pyrrhic victory
translation: 皮洛士式的胜利

original: Everlasting defeat
translation: 载入史册的惨败

original: Crushing defeat
translation: 被横扫般的失败

original: Shameful defeat
translation: 耻辱的失败

original: Decisive defeat
translation: 决定性的失败

original: Narrow defeat
translation: 局部的失败

original: Resounding defeat
translation: 重大的失败

translation: 海军失败

translation: 无条件和平

original: Victory
translation: 胜利

original: Defeat
translation: 失败

original: Draw
translation: 平局

original: Stalemate
translation: 对峙

original: Naval stalemate
translation: 海军对峙

original: Insignificant victory
translation: 无关紧要的胜利

original: Insignificant defeat
translation: 无关紧要的失败

original: \n  An AI player is not influenced by this personality.\n
translation: \nAI玩家不受此特质的影响。\n

original: An AI ruler with $PERSONALITY$ would:\n
translation: 一个有着$PERSONALITY$特质的AI统治者将会：\n

original: The AI ruler will due to $PERSONALITY$:\n
translation: 一个AI统治者基于$PERSONALITY$特质：\n

original: Be more likely to pick certain Idea Groups.
translation: 更有可能采取特定的理念组。

original: Spend more to unlock Institutions.
translation: 花费更多来解锁思潮。

original: Be more likely to join Trade Leagues.
translation: 更有可能加入贸易联盟。

original: Be less likely to join Trade Leagues.
translation: 更少可能加入贸易联盟。

original: Be more likely to join an Alliance.
translation: 更有可能加入一个同盟。

original: Be less likely to join an Alliance.
translation: 更少可能加入一个同盟。

original: Be more likely to ally heretics.
translation: 更有可能与异端国家结盟。

original: Be less likely to ally heretics.
translation: 更少可能与异端国家结盟。

original: Be more likely to ally heathens.
translation: 更有可能与异教国家结盟。

original: Be less likely to ally heathens.
translation: 更少可能与异教国家结盟。

original: Negotiate better peace terms with other AI nations.
translation: 与其他AI国家协商更有利的和平条款。

original: Be worse at negotiating peace terms with other AI nations.
translation: 与其他AI国家协商更不利的和平条款。

original: Be quicker to give up in wars.
translation: 更快在战争中屈服。

original: Be more stubborn to surrender in a war.
translation: 更固执地不愿在战争中投降。

original: Be more likely to use the Send Warning action.
translation: 更愿意使用发出警告的外交行动。

original: Be less likely to use the Send Warning action.
translation: 更不愿意使用发出警告的外交行动。

original: Other AI are more likely to help them indirectly.
translation: 其他AI更可能间接帮助他们。

original: Other AI are less likely to help them indirectly.
translation: 其他AI不太可能间接帮助他们。

original: Other AI are more likely to declare war on them.
translation: 其他AI更可能向他们宣战。

original: Other AI are less likely to declare war on them.
translation: 其他AI更少可能向他们宣战。

original: Sell you their ships for money.
translation: 将他们的船只卖出以换取金币。

original: Sell their provinces to pay for their debts.
translation: 将他们的省份卖出以支付他们的贷款。

original: Debase their currency more frequently.
translation: 更频繁地使他们的货币贬值。

original: Avoid debasing their currency at all costs.
translation: 不惜一切代价避免贬值他们的货币。

original: Want to take loans (even from human players).
translation: 愿意贷款（甚至是从人类玩家手中）。

original: Avoid taking loans at any price.
translation: 尽其所能地避免贷款。

original: Use explorers more.
translation: 更多地使用探险家。

original: Disclose their attack plans ahead of time.
translation: 提前透露他们的进攻计划。

original: Try to avoid ugly map borders.
translation: 尝试避免丑陋的地图边界形状。

original: Betray their allies without second thoughts.
translation: 毫不犹豫地背弃他们的盟友。

original: Use Excommunicate a lot more if they are the Pope.
translation: 如果他们控制了教宗的话将更多地使用绝罚的行动。

original: Desire neighboring heretic land.
translation: 觊觎毗邻的异端国家的土地。

original: Desire neighboring heathen land.
translation: 觊觎毗邻的异教国家的土地。

original: Seek to establish colonies with greater intent.
translation: 更愿意寻求建立殖民地。

original: Be more likely to marry.
translation: 更有可能结婚。

original: Be less likely to marry.
translation: 更不可能结婚。

original: Insult you at random times.
translation: 会随机地羞辱你。

original: Demand gold in peace.
translation: 在和平条约中要求金币。

original: Desire any neighboring land possible.
translation: 觊觎任何可能获得的毗邻土地。

original: Underestimate Aggressive Expansion.
translation: 不在意侵略扩张的影响。

original: Prefer to use Condottieri.
translation: 更愿意使用遣外雇佣军团。

original: At times give random commands to troops.
translation: 时不时随机任命将军到部队。

original: Want less autonomy for the oppressed.
translation: 希望给予被压迫者更少的自治度。

original: Love to raze and plunder.
translation: 喜欢焚掠和劫掠。

original: Prefer to pick on someone their own size.
translation: 更愿意选择与自己体量相当的对手。

original: Overestimate enemy strength.
translation: 高估敌人力量。

original: Underestimate enemy strength.
translation: 低估敌人力量。

original: Be more likely to start wars.
translation: 更有可能开启战争。

original: Be less likely to start wars.
translation: 更不可能开启战争。

original: Start fair wars.
translation: 更愿意开启一场公平的战争。

original: Start one sided wars.
translation: 更愿意进行一边倒的战争。

original: Be outright hostile to other religions.
translation: 彻底敌视其它宗教。

original: Be less hostile to other religions.
translation: 对其它宗教抱有更少敌意。

original: Spend more on buildings.
translation: 在建筑上花费更多。

original: Spend less on buildings.
translation: 在建筑上花费更少。

original: Send gifts more often.
translation: 更经常送出礼物。

original: Send gifts less often.
translation: 更少送出礼物。

original: Threaten War far more often.
translation: 更经常威胁开战。

original: Have special objectives when starting wars.
translation: 开战时有特定针对的目标。

original: No current institutional penalties to tech.
translation: 科技没有受到最新的思潮惩罚。

original: $NAME$ must be $RELIGION$.
translation: $NAME$必须信仰$RELIGION$。

original: $NAME$ must be controlled by $RELIGION$ country.
translation: $NAME$必须被$RELIGION$国家所控制。

original: This might be due to the $PERSONALITY|Y$ personality of $RULER$.
translation: 这可能是由于他们的$RULER$统治者的$PERSONALITY|Y$特质。

original: This might be due to their $PERSONALITY|Y$ personality.
translation: 这可能是由于他们的$PERSONALITY|Y$特质。

original: $X$ not discovered yet!
translation: $X$还没有被发现！

original: Holy site of the faith
translation: 信仰的圣地

original: Already picked this Blessing!
translation: 已经选取了这个神赐！

original: §GAll possible Blessings picked already!§!
translation: §G所有可能的神赐都已经被选取了§!

original: §RNot all Holy sites are controlled by your religion. Effects of your $NUM_LOST$ most recently chosen Blessings are disabled.§!
translation: §R并不是所有的圣地都被你的宗教所控制。你的$NUM_LOST$个最近选取的神赐的效果都不会生效§!

original: §RToo few Holy sites are controlled and converted by your religion to pick another Blessing (currently $CURR|Y$ of $MAX$).§!
translation: §R你的宗教控制和转教的圣地太少以致于不能选取另一个神赐了(已经控制了$MAX$个中的$CURR|Y$个)。§!

original: It is possible to pick another Blessing for your faith!
translation: 你可以为你的信仰选取另一个神赐！

original: View Blessings not yet picked
translation: 查看还未选取的神赐

original: §GClick to pick $NAME|Y$ to be among your favored Blessings.§!
translation: §G点击以选取$NAME|Y$作为你要采纳的神赐。§!

original: The number of Blessings you can pick corresponds to the number of Holy sites countries of your religion control and have converted.
translation: 你可以选取的神赐数量取决于你的宗教所控制和已经转教的圣地数量。

original: Blessings and Holy Sites
translation: 神赐和圣地

original: Confirm Pick Blessing
translation: 确定选取神赐

original: Do you wish to add $NAME|Y$ to be among our favored Blessings? This cannot be undone later.
translation: 你愿意将$NAME|Y$增加到你所选取的神赐中么？这个决定之后不能被撤销。

original: Holy Sites
translation: 圣地

original: Pick Blessing
translation: 选取神赐

original: Patriarchal Blessings
translation: 牧首神赐

original: Legitimize Government
translation: 合法化政府

original: Encourage Warriors of the Faith
translation: 鼓励信仰战士

original: Send Monks to Establish Monasteries
translation: 派遣僧侣建立修道院

original: Promote Territorial Rights
translation: 扩张领地权

original: Will of the Martyrs
translation: 殉道者之志

original: Take on Foreign Debt
translation: 承担外国债务

original: We will pay off their entire debt.
translation: 我们将会偿还他们的全部贷款。

original: As a Great Power, we will aid the lesser country of $COUNTRY|Y$ in their financial struggle and pay off their entire national debt of $COST|Y$¤.
translation: 作为一个列强，我们将帮助较小的国家$COUNTRY|Y$来渡过经济困难并支付他们国家$COST|Y$¤金币的所有债务。

original: Because this amounts to around $NUM_LOANS|Y$ standard size loans for them, their opinion of us will improve by $OPINION$ in total ($OPINION_PER_LOAN$ per loan up to $MAX$ at most).
translation: 由于这笔款项是数量相当于他们$NUM_LOANS|Y$笔标准贷款，他们对我们的态度总共将增加$OPINION$(每笔贷款增加$OPINION_PER_LOAN$且最大为$MAX$)。

original: Influence Nation
translation: 影响国家

original: As a Great Power, we will influence the petty country of $COUNTRY|Y$ towards our diplomatic position, altering their opinion of us by $OPINION$ for $YEARS|Y$ years. They will also receive $BONUS$ to the Monarch power category they are weakest in (currently $WEAKEST$ ) for this duration. Their trust of us changes by $TRUST$.
translation: 作为一个列强，我们将影响小国$COUNTRY|Y$使其靠近我们的外交立场，增加他们对我们的态度$OPINION$持续$YEARS|Y$年。在这段时间内他们也会收到$BONUS$点奖励增加在他们君主能力最弱的项目上（最近最弱的是$WEAKEST$ ）。他们对我们的信任改变了$TRUST$。

original: There will be a one time cost for us corresponding to $MONTHS$ months of their income, a sum presently $COST|Y$¤, to carry out this political maneuver.
translation: 这会一次性花费共计他们$MONTHS$月收入的金钱，数额是$COST|Y$¤金币，来支持这一政治行动。

original: We will influence them towards our viewpoint.
translation: 我们将影响他们使其靠近我们的立场。

original: Influenced by $LIST$: $VAL$\n
translation: 受$LIST$影响：$VAL$\n

original: Already influencing $COUNTRY$.
translation: 已经在影响$COUNTRY$。

original: Can't afford $MONTHS$ months of their income ($COST|Y$¤).
translation: 支付不起他们$MONTHS$月的收入(共计$COST|Y$¤金币)。

original: They have no debt.
translation: 他们没有债务。

original: We can't pay their entire debt of $COST|R$¤.
translation: 我们支付不起他们的所有债务共计$COST|R$¤金币。

original: They are a Great Power.
translation: 他们是一个列强。

original: Debase Currency
translation: 贬值货币

original: You can debase again earliest $DATE$, assuming your corruption is then below §Y$MAX_CORRUPTION$%§!.
translation: 我们最早可于$DATE$再次贬值货币，如果那时你的腐败度低于§Y$MAX_CORRUPTION$%§!。

original: You can't debase the currency any further because the level of corruption is above §Y$MAX_CORRUPTION$%§!.
translation: 我们不能再次贬值货币了，因为我们的腐败度高于§Y$MAX_CORRUPTION$%§!。

original: Hold §YShift§! to debase $FACTOR|Y$ times the amount, which is the maximum possible.
translation: 按住§YShift§!来贬值最大次数$FACTOR|Y$次。

original: \nIt takes $MONTHS$ months to recharge Debase Currency, and up to a maximum of $MAX_USES$ uses can be stored.
translation: \n这将花费$MONTHS$月来冷却并重新准备货币贬值，而最多$MAX_USES$次数可以被储存。

original: Debase Currency gives §Y$AMOUNT$§W¤, but increases corruption by §R$CORRUPTION$%§!.\n\nYou can debase your currency $FACTOR|Y$ more times or until reaching §R$MAX_CORRUPTION$%§! corruption.
translation: 贬值货币给予§Y$AMOUNT$§W¤金币，但增加§R$CORRUPTION$%§!腐败度。\n\n你还可以再贬值你的货币$FACTOR|Y$次或直到腐败度达到§R$MAX_CORRUPTION$%§!。

original: §YYou are losing your Great Power status.§!
translation: §Y你正在失去你的列强地位。§!

original: $COUNTRYS|Y$ power is on the decline or others have grown too strong. Either way, unless we regain our greatness before $DATE|Y$ we will no longer be considered a §YGreat Power§!.
translation: $COUNTRYS|Y$力量正在衰退或者其他国家变得太过强大。不管是哪一种情况，除非我们在$DATE|Y$之前重获我们的力量否则我们将不再被视为一个§Y列强§!。

original: You cannot cancel the construction of this building as it is being built by §Y$OTHER$§!.
translation: 你不能取消这个建筑的建设因为它是由§Y$OTHER$§!所建的。

original: Construction of a building was started
translation: 建筑的建设已经开始

original: They will build a $BUILDING|Y$ in $PROVINCE$.
translation: 他们将在$PROVINCE$建设$BUILDING|Y$。

original: to construct a building in our country
translation: 开始在我们的国家建设一个建筑

original: Construction of a building was canceled
translation: 建筑的建设已经取消

original: to cease construction of a building in our country
translation: 取消在我们的国家建设一个建筑

original: The work on building a $BUILDING|Y$ in $PROVINCE$ has stopped.
translation: 在$PROVINCE$建设$BUILDING|Y$的工作已经停止。

original: Intervene in War
translation: 干涉战争

original: We will help them out in their war against our competing Great Power(s).
translation: 我们将帮助他们与实力跟我们相当的列强进行战争。

original: Our Subject $SUBJECT|Y$ is on the enemy side.
translation: 我们的属国$SUBJECT|Y$站在敌人那一方。

original: You have a truce with $ENEMY|Y$, who is on the enemy side.
translation: 你和$ENEMY|Y$有停战条约，他们站在敌人那一方。

original: You are fighting a war together with $WARALLY|Y$, who is on the enemy side.
translation: 你和$WARALLY|Y$在同一场战争中共同作战，他们站在敌人那一方。

original: You can only Intervene if there is an imbalance of Great Powers and you are joining the weaker side.
translation: 我们只能干涉有列强参加的不平衡的战争，而我们将加入弱小的那一方。

original: There needs to be at least one Great Power on each side of the war.
translation: 需要战争两边至少各有一个列强。

original: $RECIPIENT|Y$ is not the War Leader in this War.
translation: $RECIPIENT|Y$不是这场战争的战争领袖。

original: Choose War to Intervent In:
translation: 选择要干涉的战争：

original: We can Intervene in a war if there's at least one Great Power on each side and the side we would join has fewer Great Powers.
translation: 我国可以介入两边至少各有一个列强的战争，我国将加入拥有列强比较少的那一方。

original: Join War!
translation: 加入战争！

original: Forced ally to break alliance
translation: 强迫盟友断盟

original: We must punish them for this unacceptable diplomatic breach.
translation: 我们必须为这个不可接受的外交背叛惩罚他们。

original: If they accept, both countries' opinion of us will decrease and $WITH|Y$ will get a Casus Belli on us.\nThis will also create a truce between $COUNTRY|Y$ and us, as well as lower their trust of us by $TRUSTCOST|R$. Otherwise, we will lose $PRESTIGE$ Prestige.
translation: 如果他们接受的话，双方国家对我们的态度都会减少并且$WITH|Y$将获得一个对我们的宣战理由。\n这也会在我们和$COUNTRY|Y$之间签订一个停战条约，同时降低他们对我们的信任$TRUSTCOST|R$点。如果他们不接受的话，我们将失去$PRESTIGE$点威望。

original: Break Alliance
translation: 断绝盟约

original: We will demand that $THEM|Y$ break their alliance with $WITH|Y$.
translation: 我们将要求$THEM|Y$撕毁他们与$WITH|Y$的盟约。

original: If they accept, treaties between $THEM|Y$ and $WITH|Y$ will be annulled and there will be a truce between us and §Y$THEM|Y$§! until $TRUCEDATE|Y$.\n
translation: 如果他们接受的话，$THEM|Y$和$WITH|Y$之间的条约将会被废除，而我们和§Y$THEM|Y$§!之间将有一个直到$TRUCEDATE|Y$的停战条约。\n

original: $THEM|Y$ has no allies.
translation: $THEM|Y$没有盟友。

original: $THEM|Y$ only has you as their ally.
translation: $THEM|Y$只有你作为他们的盟友。

original: §R$THEM|Y$ are a subject of $OVERLORD|Y$, and we cannot demand subjects to break their alliances.§!
translation: §R$THEM|Y$是$OVERLORD|Y$的属国，我们不能要求属国断绝他们的盟约。§!

original: §RWe cannot ask $THEM|Y$ to break alliances while they are at war with us.§!
translation: §R当他们和我们处于战争时我们不能要求$THEM|Y$断绝盟约。§!

original: We will demand that they break one of their alliances.
translation: 我们将要求他们与他们的一个盟友断盟。

original: The Great Power $ACTOR|Y$ demands that we break our Alliance with $THEM|Y$.\nThis will cause a Truce between us and $ACTOR|Y$ and annul other diplomatic treaties we have with $THEM|Y$.
translation: 列强$ACTOR|Y$要求我们背弃与$THEM|Y$的盟约。\n这将在我们和$ACTOR|Y$之间形成一个休战协议并废除我们和$THEM|Y$签订的其它协议。

original: You need positive Prestige for your threat to be taken seriously.
translation: 我们需要数值为正的威望来使你的威胁被认真考虑。

original: We have received a demand to break one of our alliances
translation: 我们已经收到命我们与我们的一个盟友断盟的要求。

original: Abandon Personal Union
translation: 放弃联合统治

original:
We will abandon our personal union with $THEM|Y$.
This will cost us $PRESTIGE$ prestige, and create a truce of $TRUCEYEARS|Y$ years between our nations.

Their opinion of us will be modified by $THEMOPINIONCHANGE$.
translation:
我们将放弃我们与$THEM|Y$的联合统治关系。
这将花费$PRESTIGE$点威望，并在这两个国家间签订一个为期$TRUCEYEARS|Y$年的停战条约。

他们对我们的态度将改变$THEMOPINIONCHANGE$。

original: Abandon your personal union with $THEM|Y$.\nThis will cost us some prestige and create a truce between our nations.
translation: 放弃你与$THEM|Y$的联合统治关系。\n这将花费我们一些威望并在我们的国家之间签订停战条约。

original: §RCannot abandon a Personal Union while at war.§!
translation: §R当处于战争中不能放弃联合统治。§!

original: Please select an Alliance to break.
translation: 请选择一个你要断绝的盟约。

original: Non-Accepted Cultures
translation: 不相容文化

original: These Cultures are Accepted in our country.
translation: 这些文化是我们国家的接受文化。

original: These Cultures are not yet considered Accepted in our country.
translation: 这些文化在我们的国家不被视为接受文化。

original: Provinces with these cultures have the following penalties:
translation: 有这些文化的省份将会有如下惩罚：

original: Build in $NAME|Y$
translation: 在$NAME|Y$建筑

original: Develop in $NAME|Y$
translation: 开发$NAME|Y$

original: Trading Cities cannot be kicked out of a Trade League.\n
translation: 贸易城市不能被踢出贸易联盟。\n

original: The first Personality is gained when coming of age.
translation: 第一个特性会在成年时获得。

original: A new Personality will be gained upon having ruled for $YEARS$ years.
translation: 一个新的特性将会在统治满$YEARS$年后获得。

original: §YPersonality gained in $YEARS$ years.§!\n
translation: §Y在$YEARS$年后获得特性。§!\n

original: §YPersonality trait will unlock at age $AGE$.
translation: §Y在$AGE$岁时解锁特性。

original: Should our current ruler pass away, $NAME|Y$ will take their place.
translation: 如果我们现在的统治者去世，$NAME|Y$将继位。

original: Should our current ruler pass away, $NAME|Y$ will take their place as a regent if our heir has not yet reached age of adulthood.
translation: 如果我们现在的统治者去世，$NAME|Y$将在我们的继承人成年之前摄政。

original: Leader Trait: $NAME|Y$
translation: 将领特质：$NAME|Y$

original: Has NOT Consort Regency.\n
translation: 没有配偶摄政。\n

original: Has Consort Regency.\n
translation: 有配偶摄政。\n

original: Doesn't have a Consort.\n
translation: 没有配偶。\n

original: Has a Consort.\n
translation: 有配偶。\n

original: Doesn't have a female Consort.\n
translation: 没有一个女性配偶。\n

original: Has a female Consort.\n
translation: 有一个女性配偶。\n

original: Has a non-foreign Consort.\n
translation: 有一个非外国的配偶。\n

original: Has a foreign Consort.\n
translation: 有一个外国的配偶。\n

original: Heir doesn't have same dynasty as Consort.\n
translation: 继承人和配偶来自不同王朝。\n

original: Heir has same dynasty as Consort.\n
translation: 继承人和配偶来自同一王朝。\n

original: Heir doesn't have same dynasty as Ruler.\n
translation: 继承人和统治者来自不同王朝。\n

original: Heir has same dynasty as Ruler\n
translation: 继承人和统治者来自同一王朝。\n

original: Consort's age is less than $AGE|Y$\n
translation: 配偶的年龄小于$AGE|Y$\n

original: Consort's age is equal to or higher than $AGE|Y$\n
translation: 配偶的年龄大于或等于$AGE|Y$\n

original: $SCOPECONSORTNAME|Y$ has NOT dynasty $DYNASTYNAME|Y$.\n
translation: $SCOPECONSORTNAME|Y$不属于$DYNASTYNAME|Y$王朝。\n

original: $SCOPECONSORTNAME|Y$ has dynasty $DYNASTYNAME|Y$.\n
translation: $SCOPECONSORTNAME|Y$来自$DYNASTYNAME|Y$王朝。\n

original: $SCOPECONSORTNAME|Y$ has NOT Dynasty $DYNASTYNAME$.\n
translation: $SCOPECONSORTNAME|Y$不属于$DYNASTYNAME$王朝。\n

original: $SCOPECONSORTNAME|Y$ has Dynasty $DYNASTYNAME$.\n
translation: $SCOPECONSORTNAME|Y$来自$DYNASTYNAME$王朝。\n

original: $SCOPECONSORTNAME|Y$ has less than $POWERVALUE|Y$ $POWERNAME$.\n
translation: $SCOPECONSORTNAME|Y$的$POWERNAME$低于$POWERVALUE|Y$。\n

original: $SCOPECONSORTNAME|Y$ has $POWERNAME$ equal to or more than $POWERVALUE|Y$.\n
translation: $SCOPECONSORTNAME|Y$的$POWERNAME$大于或等于$POWERVALUE|Y$。\n

original: $COUNTRYNAME|Y$ is NOT the Origin Country of $CONSORTNAME|Y$\n
translation: $COUNTRYNAME|Y$并不是$CONSORTNAME|Y$的母国\n

original: $COUNTRYNAME|Y$ is the Origin Country of $CONSORTNAME|Y$\n
translation: $COUNTRYNAME|Y$是$CONSORTNAME|Y$的母国\n

original: $HEIRNAME|Y$ has NOT Dynasty $DYNASTYNAME|Y$.\n
translation: $HEIRNAME|Y$不属于$DYNASTYNAME|Y$王朝。\n

original: $HEIRNAME|Y$ has Dynasty $DYNASTYNAME|Y$.\n
translation: $HEIRNAME|Y$来自$DYNASTYNAME|Y$王朝。\n

original: $MONARCH|Y$ and $CONSORT|Y$ have been married for less than $YEARS|Y$ years.\n
translation: $MONARCH|Y$和$CONSORT|Y$结婚时间少于$YEARS|Y$年。\n

original: $MONARCH|Y$ and $CONSORT|Y$ have been married for at least $YEARS|Y$ years.\n
translation: $MONARCH|Y$和$CONSORT|Y$结婚时间至少已经$YEARS|Y$年。\n

original: Pay Off Debt
translation: 偿还债务

original: $COUNTRYNAME$ does not have any loans.
translation: $COUNTRYNAME$没有任何贷款。

original: Take on debt of $COUNTRYNAME|Y$ for a total amount of $DEBTAMOUNT|Y$¤.
translation: 承担$COUNTRYNAME|Y$的债务共计$DEBTAMOUNT|Y$¤金币。

original: to pay off $DEBTSUM$¤ of our debts!
translation: 偿付了我们的债务共计$DEBTSUM$¤金币！

original: Bestow Gifts
translation: 赏赐礼物

original: We can't afford the cost of $AMOUNT|R$¤.
translation: 我们负担不起$AMOUNT|R$金币的开销。

original: Send $SUBJECT|Y$ a generous gift of $AMOUNT|Y$¤, to reduce their Liberty Desire by §G$LD$%§!.
translation: 慷慨地赏赐$SUBJECT|Y$一笔价值$AMOUNT|Y$¤的礼物，降低他们的独立倾向§G$LD$%§!。

original: to send us a gift of $GIFT$¤.
translation: 送给我们$GIFT$¤金币的礼物

original: Send Additional Troops
translation: 派遣援军

original: We don't have the required $MANPOWER|R$£icon_manpower£.
translation: 我们没有所需的$MANPOWER|R$£icon_manpower£人力。

original: They are not at war.
translation: 他们没有处于战争中。

original: Send $AMOUNT|Y$£icon_manpower£ to help $SUBJECT|Y$ in their war efforts. This would also reduce their Liberty Desire by §G$LD$%§!.
translation: 送去$AMOUNT|Y$£icon_manpower£援助$SUBJECT|Y$进行战争。这也将降低他们的独立倾向§G$LD$%§!。

original: to send us $MANPOWER$£icon_manpower£.
translation: 送给我们$MANPOWER$£icon_manpower£.

original: Demand Artifacts
translation: 要求进贡工艺品

original: Due to their negative Prestige, $SUBJECTADJECTIVE$ artifacts are of no value.
translation: 由于他们的威望为负值，$SUBJECTADJECTIVE$的工艺品并没有价值。

original: Show $SUBJECT|Y$ their place by demanding their finest artifacts. This will increase our Prestige by $PRESTIGE|Y$ on their expense. It would also increase their Liberty Desire by §R$LD$%§!.
translation: 为了让$SUBJECT|Y$认清他们的地位，我们可以要求他们进贡最精良的工艺品。因他们的损失我们提高了$PRESTIGE|Y$威望。这也将提高他们的独立倾向§R$LD$%§!。

original: to demand we concede our most precious artifacts, costing us $PRESTIGE|R$ Prestige. There is nothing we can do.
translation: 要求我们进贡我们最珍贵的工艺品，这将花费我们$PRESTIGE|R$点威望。我们无以反抗。

original: Demand Additional Tribute
translation: 要求额外进贡

original: Demand that $SUBJECT|Y$ send us an additional $TRIBUTE|Y$¤ as a token of good will. They are our §YTributary State§!, after all. This would, however, increase their Liberty Desire by §R$LD$%§!.
translation: 要求$SUBJECT|Y$额外进贡一笔$TRIBUTE|Y$¤金币作为忠心的象征。毕竟他们是我们的§Y朝贡国§!。这将提高他们的独立倾向§R$LD$%§!。

original: They don't have the required $TRIBUTE|Y$¤.
translation: 他们没有所需的$TRIBUTE|Y$¤金币。

original: that we send them an additional tribute of $TRIBUTE|Y$¤. When will they be satisfied?
translation: 我们向他们额外进贡$TRIBUTE|Y$¤金币。他们何时才会满足？

original: Force Seppuku
translation: 强迫切腹

original: Warmongering Daimyos are a shame to their clan. Death is the only honorable resort. If we force $DAIMYO|Y$ to commit Seppuku, $HISHER$ successor should see the benefits of a more peaceful path.\n\nThis would also give us $X|Y$ times their new ruler's Monarch Skills in Monarch Power.
translation: 穷兵黩武的大名是他们家族的耻辱。死亡才是唯一荣誉的出路。如果我们逼迫$DAIMYO|Y$切腹自尽，$HISHER$后继者将会见证和平之道所带来的好处。\n\n这也将给我们$X|Y$倍于其新统治者的能力的君主点数。

original: $MONARCH$ can't commit Seppuku.
translation: $MONARCH$不能选择切腹。

original: $DAIMYO$ hasn't declared a single war.
translation: $DAIMYO$没有单独宣战。

original: Return Land
translation: 归还土地

original: They hold land that is not rightfully theirs. Let us correct that.
translation: 他们握有法理上不属于他们的土地。让我们来纠正这一点。

original: Return $PROVINCE|Y$ to $TAKER|Y$. $GIVERS|Y$ Liberty Desire will increase by $LD$ and become $LD_TOTAL$.
translation: 将省份$PROVINCE|Y$归还给$TAKER|Y$。$GIVERS|Y$的独立倾向将提高$LD$至$LD_TOTAL$。

original: No eligible province to return.
translation: 没有适格的省份可以归还。

original: They returned $PROVINCE$ to $WHO$,
translation: 他们归还$PROVINCE$省份给$WHO$，

original: that we return $PROVINCE|Y$ to $WHO|Y$.
translation: 我们归还$PROVINCE|Y$省份给$WHO|Y$。

original: Contribute to Capital
translation: 贡献给首都

original: Force their highest developed province $PROVINCE|Y$ to contribute with $DEVTYPE|Y$ to $CAPITALNAME|Y$. They will lose $LOST|Y$ Development and we will gain $GAINED|Y$.
translation: 强迫他们发展度最高的省份$PROVINCE|Y$贡献$DEVTYPE|Y$发展度给$CAPITALNAME|Y$。他们将失去$LOST|Y$发展度而我们将获得$GAINED|Y$发展度。

original: Force their highest developed province to contribute with Development to $CAPITALNAME|Y$. They will lose $LOST|Y$ Development and we will gain $GAINED|Y$.
translation: 强迫他们发展度最高的省份贡献发展度给$CAPITALNAME|Y$。他们将失去$LOST|Y$发展度而我们将获得$GAINED|Y$发展度。

original: No province has at least $MINDEV$ development of the same type.
translation: 没有省份有相同类型的至少$MINDEV$点发展度。

original: $CAPITAL$ is under siege!
translation: $CAPITAL$正在被围攻！

original: $CAPITAL$ is occupied by the enemy!
translation: $CAPITAL$被敌人占领！

original: Their Clan is too small, and $NAME$, as their most developed province, needs to have at least $DEV$ development for us to be able to have them contribute to the capital.
translation: 他们的氏族太小了，而且$NAME$作为他们发展度最高的省份，需要至少$DEV$发展度以使我们能够要求他们贡献给首都。

original: to steal $AMOUNT|Y$ $DEVTYPE|Y$ from $TAKENFROM|Y$.
translation: 从$TAKENFROM|Y$处获取$AMOUNT|Y$点$DEVTYPE|Y$类型的发展度。

original: Increase
translation: 增加

original: Decrease
translation: 减少

original: Change
translation: 改变

original: $INCREASEDECREASE$ Isolationism
translation: $INCREASEDECREASE$孤立主义

original: Change their Isolationism closer to our own!
translation: 将他们的孤立主义倾向变得和我们接近。

original: They have the same Isolationism as we do.
translation: 他们和我们有着相同的孤立主义倾向。

original: Conscript General
translation: 征召陆军将领

original: Conscript $NAME|Y$ ($FIRE$/$SHOCK$/$MANUEVER$/$SIEGE$), their best General, to our own forces.
translation: 征召名为$NAME|Y$($FIRE$/$SHOCK$/$MANUEVER$/$SIEGE$)的陆军将领，亦即他们最好的将领，来为我们军队效力。

original: Conscript their best General to our own forces.
translation: 征召他们最好的陆军将领来为我们的军队效力。

original: No valid General.
translation: 没有可用的陆军将领。

original: to conscript our General $NAME|Y$ ($FIRE$/$SHOCK$/$MANUEVER$/$SIEGE$) for their armies. He no longer serves us.
translation: 征召我们的陆军将领$NAME|Y$($FIRE$/$SHOCK$/$MANUEVER$/$SIEGE$)到他们的军队。他现在不再为我们效力。

original: to let their General $NAME|Y$ ($FIRE$/$SHOCK$/$MANUEVER$/$SIEGE$) fight for us instead. He was too good to serve an inferior Clan.
translation: 让他们的陆军将领$NAME|Y$($FIRE$/$SHOCK$/$MANUEVER$/$SIEGE$)为我们而战。他太有才华而不应该埋没在一个弱小的氏族中。

original: You don't have any Daimyos.
translation: 你没有任何大名属国。

original: You don't have enough Legitimacy!
translation: 你没有足够的正统性！

original: $ACTION$ can only be used once every $YEARS$ years. You will be able to do it again in $UNTIL|Y$.
translation: $ACTION$的行动每隔$YEARS$年才能使用一次。你将在$UNTIL|Y$后能够再次使用。

original: Sword Hunt
translation: 刀狩令

original: Within our subjects lie many dissidents, particularly the Ikko-ikki and Ronin who pose a potential threat to our righteous rule over Japan. We shall call a Sword Hunt, ordering our armies across the land to seize the weapons from those who may wish to do us harm.
translation: 在我们的臣民中存在许多异见者，尤其是一向一揆和浪人对我们在日本的正统统治构成潜在威胁。我们可以进行一次刀狩，命令我们在各地的军队从可能想要反叛我们的人手中收缴武器。

original: Sankin Kotai
translation: 参勤交代

original: We shall place an obligation on our subjects to make periodic attendances to $CAPITALNAME$ while keeping key members of their court as our hostages. This will place our subjects under diplomatic strains while increasing our own influence.
translation: 我们应该给我们的属国设立一项义务，要求他们定期参觐$CAPITALNAME$并将他们家庭的重要成员留给我们作为人质。这将使我们的属国在外交上受制并增强我们的影响力。

original: Forcibly Expel Ronin
translation: 驱逐浪人

original: The Ronin are a troublesome lot. These masterless samurai roam the country, often finding new lives as bandits, thugs and vagrants. We shall take census in major cities across our subjects' lands and expel all Ronin to the countrysides, buying us favor among the Daimyo.
translation: 浪人们是麻烦制造者。这些无主人的武士在全国各地流荡，经常落草成为土匪、强盗或变成流浪者。我们将在我们属国领地上的主要城市进行人口清查，并将所有浪人赶入农村，使我们在大名中获得好名声。

original: $WHO$ loses $LEGITIMACY|R$ Legitimacy and for §Y$YEARS$ years§!:\n
translation: $WHO$失去$LEGITIMACY|R$正统性并持续§Y$YEARS$年§!：\n

original: $WHO$ gets:\n$WHAT$\n
translation: $WHO$获得：\n$WHAT$\n

original: due to its $X|Y$ Daimyos.\n
translation: 基于它名下的$X|Y$个大名。\n

original: Each Daimyo
translation: 每一个大名

original: Sankin Kotai
translation: 参勤交代

original: Sankin Kotai
translation: 参勤交代

original: Expelled Ronin
translation: 驱逐浪人

original: Ronin Expelled
translation: 浪人被驱逐

original: Sword Hunt
translation: 刀狩令

original: Sword Hunt
translation: 刀狩令

original: Ottoman Government
translation: 奥斯曼帝国政府

original: The Ottoman Government is in many ways synonymous with the royal household. The harem ensures that there will never be a lack of heirs for the Ottoman ruler.
translation: 奥斯曼帝国的政府形式在很大程度上接近于一个皇室政府。帝国后宫将确保奥斯曼的统治者永远不会缺乏继承人。

original: Liberate Alexandria
translation: 解放亚历山大

original: The Patriarchate of Alexandria and of all Africa is the largest Coptic Church in the world but its ancient seat as well as a large part of the Coptic community currently languishes under foreign ruler. We must liberate Alexandria and reinvigorate the Egyptian Coptic Community!
translation: 亚历山大和全非洲牧首区是世界上最大的科普特正教会，但它古老的座堂所在地以及大部分科普特宗正教社群在外邦统治下日渐式微。 我们必须解放亚历山大，并重振埃及的科普特正教社群！

original: Conquer Qasr Ibrim
translation: 征服伊布里姆堡

original: Though it remains the primary center of devotion for the Nubian Copts the Cathedral of Qasr Ibrim is a shadow of its former self since the decline of the states in the area. We must conquer Qasr Ibrim and re-establish the honor of the Coptic Community in Nubia!
translation: 虽然它仍然是努比亚科普特正教徒的信仰中心，但伊布里姆堡大教堂自该地区的国家衰弱后已不复往日辉煌。 我们必须征服伊布里姆堡，重建科普特正教在努比亚的荣光！

original: Liberate Cairo
translation: 解放开罗

original: Cairo is the largest Coptic city in existence and since centuries it is the residence of the Patriarch of Alexandria. We cannot allow this city to be in the hands of unbelievers. We must liberate the Coptic community of Cairo and free the Egyptian Copts.
translation: 开罗是现存最大的科普特正教城市，几个世纪以来它一直是亚历山大牧首的驻在地。我们不能让这个城市掌握在异教徒手中。我们必须解放开罗的科普特正教会和埃及的科普特正教徒。

original: The Faithful Liberated
translation: 解放信众

original: The Holy Heart of [Root.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]神圣之中心

original: Once Aksum was the heart of the ancient Aksumite Empire, a bastion of Christian power, situated at the crossroads of Africa, Arabia and the Greco-Roman world. Among the obelisks and palace ruins we have rebuilt the churches of this mighty nation of old. \n\nThe greatest of them all is the Church of Our Lady Mary of Zion. It is the place where we crown our emperors, the descendants of Menelik I, who was the son of King Solomon and the Queen of Sheba. It is here he brought the Ark of the Covenant. Every year, thousands of pilgrims come from the farthest reaches of our [Root.GovernmentName] and beyond to visit this holy place.
translation: 阿克苏姆曾经是古阿克苏姆帝国的中心，基督教力量的堡垒，坐落在非洲，阿拉伯和希腊-罗马世界的十字路口。在方尖碑和宫殿的废墟中，我们重建了这个古老的强大国度的教堂。\n\n其中最伟大的是锡安山圣玛丽亚教堂。这是我们的皇帝，亦即所罗门王和示巴女王之子孟尼利克一世之后裔加冕的地方。也正是在这里藏着他带给我们的圣约柜。每年，数以千计的朝圣者从我们[Root.GovernmentName]的最远之处甚至之外来到这里参拜圣地。

original: Praise the Lord, Aksum is ours! Once it was the heart of the ancient Aksumite Empire, a bastion of Christian power, situated at the crossroads of Africa, Arabia and the Greco-Roman world. Among the obelisks and palace ruins we will rebuild the churches of this mighty nation of old. \n\nThe greatest of them all is the Church of Our Lady Mary of Zion. It is the place where the Ethiopian Emperors were crowned, the descendants of Menelik I, who was the son of King Solomon and the Queen of Sheba. It is here he brought the Ark of the Covenant. Every year, thousands of pilgrims come to visit this holy place.
translation: 阿克苏姆曾经是古阿克苏姆帝国的中心，基督教力量的堡垒，坐落在非洲，阿拉伯和希腊-罗马世界的十字路口。在方尖碑和宫殿的废墟中，我们重建了这个古老的强大国度的教堂。\n\n其中最伟大的是锡安山圣玛丽亚教堂。这是所罗门王和示巴女王之子孟尼利克一世之后裔，埃塞俄比亚皇帝加冕的地方。也正是在这里藏着他带给我们的圣约柜。 每年都有成千上万的朝圣者来参拜这个圣地。

original: Once more Aksum will shine with God's infinite glory!
translation: 阿克苏姆会再一次与上帝的无限荣光相辉映！

original: The Holy Heart of [From.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]神圣之中心

original: The ancient city of Aksum rests safely in Coptic hands. Once it was the heart of the ancient Aksumite Empire, a bastion of Christian power, situated at the crossroads of Africa, Arabia and the Greco-Roman world. Among the obelisks and palace [From.GetName] is rebuilding the churches of this mighty nation of old.\n\nThe greatest of them all is the Church of Our Lady Mary of Zion. It is the place where the Ethiopian Emperors have been crowned, the descendants of Menelik I, who was the son of King Solomon and the Queen of Sheba. It is here he brought the Ark of the Covenant. Every year, thousands of pilgrims come to visit this holy place.
translation: 阿克苏姆古城在科普特人手中安然矗立。它曾经是古阿克苏姆帝国的中心，基督教力量的堡垒，坐落在非洲，阿拉伯和希腊-罗马世界的十字路口。在方尖碑和宫殿的废墟中，我们重建了这个古老的强大国度的教堂。\n\n其中最伟大的是锡安山圣玛丽亚教堂。这是所罗门王和示巴女王之子孟尼利克一世之后裔，埃塞俄比亚皇帝加冕的地方。也正是在这里藏着他带给我们的圣约柜。 每年都有成千上万的朝圣者来参拜这个圣地。

original: The Pearl of the Mediterranean
translation: 地中海的珍珠

original: Rejoice, the holy city of Alexandria is once more under Coptic rule! The historical seat of our sacred Church has been liberated.\n\nAlexandria is an ancient and proud city, founded by Alexander the Great. Many of humanity's brightest minds have called her their home. For many hundred years the scholars of Alexandria studied and taught at The Great Library, which was followed by the Catechetical School of Alexandria, first in the world of its kind. In the years to come we will restore the sacred halls of knowledge and produce some of the finest theologians the world has ever known.
translation: 欢庆吧，亚历山大圣城再次回归科普特正教统治！ 我们神圣教会的古老宗座所在地已经被解放了。\n\n亚历山大是一座古老而自豪的城市，由亚历山大大帝所创立。 许多人类最最聪明的头脑都将她作为家园。几百年来，亚历山大的学者在大图书馆中学习和教学，继之的是世界上首创的亚历山大教导学院。在未来的岁月里，我们将重建神圣的知识圣殿，并造就出一些世界上最好的神学家。

original: God bless Alexandria!
translation: 上帝保佑亚历山大！

original: Copts in the §YGharbia§! Area are coming out of hiding.
translation: §Y西部省§!区域的科普特正教徒得以重见天日，不再躲藏。

original: Rejoice, the holy city of Alexandria is once more under Coptic rule! The historical seat of our sacred Church has been liberated by [From.GetName].\n\nAlexandria is an ancient and proud city, founded by Alexander the Great. Many of humanity's brightest minds have called her their home. For many hundred years the scholars of Alexandria studied and taught at The Great Library, which was followed by the Catechetical School of Alexandria, first in the world of its kind. In the years to come her sacred halls of knowledge will be restored and come to produce some of the finest theologians the world has ever known.
translation: 欢庆吧，圣城亚历山大再次回归科普特正教统治！ 我们神圣教会的古老宗座所在地已经被[From.GetName]解放了。\n\n亚历山大是一座古老而自豪的城市，由亚历山大大帝所创立。 许多人类最最聪明的头脑都将她当作家园。几百年来，亚历山大的学者在大图书馆中学习和教学，继之的是世界上首创的亚历山大教导学院。在未来的岁月里，我们将重建神圣的知识圣殿，并造就出一些世界上最好的神学家。

original: The Heart of Armenia
translation: 亚美尼亚之心

original: Finally, we are free once more, and Yerevan along with our sacred Etchmiadzin Cathedral have been liberated! She is the shelter of our people, our safe haven through hard times. During our people's stateless years Etchmiadzin has remained our national and political center. Throughout centuries of war and loss we have found strength and the will to keep on fighting in her loving embrace, and now we can finally repay our mother by restoring her to her former glory.
translation: 最终，我们再次自由了，埃里温和我们神圣的埃奇米阿津主教座堂一起被解放了！她是我们人民的庇护所，是我们渡过艰苦岁月的安全屋。在我们山河破碎的岁月里，埃奇米阿津一直是我们民族和政治的中心。 在几个世纪的战争和失败中，我们在她爱的怀抱中获取了力量和意志来继续战斗，现在我们终于可以通过恢复她以前的荣耀来报答我们的母亲。

original: Yerevan along with the sacred Etchmiadzin Cathedral have been liberated! For many years she has been the national and political center of the stateless Armenian people. Throughout centuries of war and loss they have found strength and the will to keep on fighting in her loving embrace. Now we will restore her to her former glory, once more creating a safe haven for our Christian brothers and sisters of Armenia.
translation: 埃里温和我们神圣的埃奇米阿津主教座堂一起被解放了！多年来，她一直是故国不复的亚美尼亚人的民族和政治中心。在几个世纪的战争和失败之中，他们在她爱的怀抱中获取了力量和意志来继续战斗。现在我们将恢复她以前的荣耀，再次为亚美尼亚的基督教兄弟姐妹创造一个安全的避风港。

original: We will make Yerevan great again!
translation: 我们将使埃里温再次强大!

original: Yerevan has been liberated by our fellow Coptic nation [From.GetName]! In the early 4th century the sacred Etchmiadzin Cathedral was built there. For many years the cathedral has been the national and political center of the stateless Armenian people. Throughout centuries of war and loss they have found strength and the will to keep on fighting in her loving embrace. Now she will be restore her to her former glory!
translation: 埃里温已经被科普特国家[From.GetName]解放了！ 在4世纪初，神圣的埃奇米阿津主教座堂在那里被修造。多年来，大教堂一直是山河破碎的亚美尼亚人的民族和政治中心。在几个世纪的战争和失败之中，他们在她爱的怀抱中获取了力量和意志来继续战斗。 现在她将恢复她以前的荣耀！

original: The true faith grows ever stronger!
translation: 正信将会越来越强大!

original: The Cradle of Christianity
translation: 基督教的摇篮

original: The ancient city of Antioch is now part of our Holy [Root.GovernmentName]! Antioch was a center of early Christianity during the time of the Romans. The Jews converted here by the apostle Peter were the first to be called Christians. A great number of monasteries were founded here during that time. Since then, Antioch has seen many wars and known many masters. In the 13th century the city fell to the Mamluks and its entire Christian population was put to the sword. In honor of their sacrifice, we will rebuild Antioch and its monasteries, making it more glorious than ever!
translation: 安条克古城现在已经成为我们神圣的[Root.GovernmentName]的一部分！ 安条克在罗马时期是早期基督教的中心之一。 由使徒彼得在这里传教而改信的犹太人是第一批被称为基督徒的人。那时在这里建立了大量修道院。 而自那之后，安条克见证了许多战争，变换了许多主人。在十三世纪，这个城市沦陷于马穆鲁克，全部基督徒人群都被处死。为了纪念他们的牺牲，我们将重建安条克及其修道院，使其比以往任何时候都更加光荣！

original: O Lord, bless this city, in thy mercy!
translation: 哦，主啊，以你的慈爱保佑这座城市！

original: The ancient city of Antioch is now part of the [From.GetAdjective] [From.GovernmentName]! Antioch was a center of early Christianity during the time of the Romans. The Jews converted here by the apostle Peter were the first to be called Christians. A great number of monasteries were founded here during that time. Since then, Antioch has seen many wars and known many masters. In the 13th century the city fell to the Mamluks and its entire Christian population was put to the sword. In honor of their sacrifice, Antioch and its monasteries shall be rebuilt, making it more glorious than ever!
translation: 安条克古城现在是[From.Get Adjective] [From.GovernmentName]的一部分！ 安条克在罗马时期是早期基督教的中心。由使徒彼得在这里传教而改信的犹太人是第一批被称为基督徒的人。那时在这里建立了大量修道院。 而自那之后，安条克见证了许多战争，变换了许多主人。在十三世纪，这个城市沦陷于马穆鲁克，全部基督徒人群都被处死。为了纪念他们的牺牲，我们将重建安条克及其修道院，使其比以往任何时候都更加光荣！

original: By the Bank of the Nile
translation: 在尼罗河畔

original: Glory to the Lord, Qasr Ibrim is ours! For many years this great Christian city has persevered, even though surrounded by religious enemies on all sides. Perched atop a cliff by the mighty Nile, Qasr Ibrim has remained a bastion of Christianity in Lower Nubia even as the rest of the region fell into darkness. This new addition to our [Root.GovernmentName] does not only hold a religious importance, however, – it is also a center of trade and politics. With these resources in our hands [Root.GetName] will grow even stronger!
translation: 荣耀归于主，伊布里姆堡是我们所的了！多年来，尽管被各方面的宗教敌人包围，这个伟大的基督教城市却一直坚持了下来。伊布里姆堡坐落在奔腾的尼罗河上的悬崖上，而即使该地区的其余部分陷入黑暗中，它仍然是下努比亚地区的基督教堡垒。我们[Root.GovernmentName]新增的这部分不仅具有宗教上的重要意义，而且也是贸易和政治的中心。随着这些资源掌握在我们手中，[Root.GetName]将会变得更强！

original: This is the start of a glorious era!
translation: 这是一个伟大时代的开端！

original: Copts in the §YLower Nubia§! Area are coming out of hiding.
translation: §Y下努比亚§!的科普特正教徒得以重见天日，不再躲藏。

original: Glory to the Lord, Qasr Ibrim belongs to the Coptic [From.GovernmentName] of [From.GetName]! For many years this great Christian city has persevered, even though surrounded by religious enemies on all sides. Perched atop a cliff by the mighty Nile, Qasr Ibrim has remained a bastion of Christianity in Lower Nubia even as the rest of the region fell into darkness. Now [From.GetName] will utilize the city's great political and economic resources to spread the word of the one true God throughout Nubia.
translation: 荣耀归于主，伊布里姆堡是我们所的了！多年来，尽管被各方面的宗教敌人包围，这个伟大的基督教城市却一直坚持了下来。伊布里姆堡坐落在奔腾的尼罗河上的悬崖上，而即使该地区的其余部分陷入黑暗中，它仍然是下努比亚地区的基督教堡垒。 现在[From.GetName]将利用这座城市巨大的政治经济资源，在整个努比亚传播唯一真神的教诲。

original: Monastery of Saint Anthony
translation: 圣安东尼修道院

original: Deep in the Red Sea mountains, in a hidden oasis, lies one of our most sacred places – the Monastery of Saint Anthony. Built by Anthony's followers in the 4th century, this Christian monastery is one of the oldest in the world. Saint Anthony, foremost of the Desert Fathers, is known as The Father of Monks. He ventured into the desert where he spent many years as a hermit, his life dedicated to God. During the Great Persecution he went back to civilization to comfort the imprisoned, risking his life for his fellow Christians. At the end of his life he settled by the oasis where the great monastery stands today. Thousands of pilgrims follow in Anthony's footsteps each year, and now that As-Suways is under our protection we can ensure that they reach their destination safely.
translation: 红海山脉的深处，在一个隐藏的绿洲中，坐落着我们的圣地之一 ，圣安东尼修道院。由安东尼的追随者在四世纪建造，这座基督教修道院是世界上最古老的修道院之一。圣安东尼，最伟大的沙漠教父，也被称为僧侣之父。他冒险进入沙漠，在那里隐居多年，将全部生命献于神。 在大迫害期间，他回到文明世纪来安慰被监禁者，为了基督徒同伴们冒着生命危险。在他生命的尽头，他于今天伟大的修道院所坐落在的绿洲定居。每年数以千计的朝圣者都遵循安东尼的旅途和路线前来，而现在苏伊士在我们的保护下，我们可以确保他们安全到达目的地。

original: We shall learn from Saint Anthony's ways.
translation: 我们应当从圣安东尼的道路中学习。

original: Copts in the §YSharqiya§! Area are coming out of hiding.
translation: §Y东部省§!的科普特正教徒得以重见天日，不再躲藏。

original: Deep in the Red Sea mountains, in a hidden oasis, lies one of our most sacred places – the Monastery of Saint Anthony. Built by Anthony's followers in the 4th century, this Christian monastery is one of the oldest in the world. Saint Anthony, foremost of the Desert Fathers, is known as The Father of Monks. He ventured into the desert where he spent many years as a hermit, his life dedicated to God. During the Great Persecution he went back to civilization to comfort the imprisoned, risking his life for his fellow Christians. At the end of his life he settled by the oasis where the great monastery stands today. Thousands of pilgrims follow in Anthony's footsteps each year, and now that As-Suways is under [From.GetAdjective] protection they will reach their destination safely.
translation: 红海山脉的深处，在一个隐藏的绿洲中，坐落着我们的圣地之一 ，圣安东尼修道院。由安东尼的追随者在四世纪建造，这座基督教修道院是世界上最古老的修道院之一。圣安东尼，最伟大的沙漠教父，也被称为僧侣之父。他冒险进入沙漠，在那里隐居多年，将全部生命献于神。 在大迫害期间，他回到文明世纪来安慰被监禁者，为了基督徒同伴们冒着生命危险。在他生命的尽头，他于今天伟大的修道院所坐落在的绿洲定居。每年数以千计的朝圣者都遵循安东尼的旅途和路线前来，现在苏伊士省在[From.GetAdjective]的保护下，他们可以确保这些朝圣者们安全到达目的地.

original: Saint Catherine of the Wheel
translation: 圣凯瑟琳之轮

original: At the foot of the holy Mount Sinai, where Moses received the Ten Commandments, stands a monastery dedicated to Saint Catherine of Alexandria. Catherine was a devoted student and follower of Christ. When the Roman Emperor Maxentius began persecuting Christians, the brave young maiden reproached him for his cruelty. The emperor gathered fifty of his best philosophers and orators to debate with her, but wise Catherine won. Even though she was subsequently imprisoned and tortured, Maxentius failed yet again as many of his closest subjects were converted by Catherine's eloquence and piousness. In his fury, the emperor sentenced Catherine to death on a breaking wheel, but it shattered at her touch. In the end she was beheaded, although her martyrdom has helped spread the light of Christ to many godless hearts.
translation: 在摩西接受十诫的圣西奈山脚下，坐落着一座敬奉亚历山大的圣凯瑟琳的修道院。 凯瑟琳是基督教虔诚的学者和信徒。当罗马皇帝马克森提乌斯开始迫害基督徒时，这位勇敢的年轻少女责备他的残忍。皇帝聚集了他手下五十位最好的哲学家和演说家与她进行辩论，但是智慧的凯瑟琳还是赢了。尽管她后来被监禁和折磨，但是马克森提乌斯却又一次失败了，因为他最为亲信的许多臣民都被凯瑟琳的雄辩和虔诚所感化而转信。在盛怒之下，皇帝判处用磔轮将凯瑟琳处死，但是轮子在凯瑟琳的触碰下破碎了。 最后她被斩首，但她的殉难已经将基督之光传进了许多不信者的心中。

original: Saint Catherine's Monastery in Sinai is now under our protection.
translation: 西奈山的圣凯瑟琳修道院现在受到我们的保护。

original: Saint Catherine's Monastery in Sinai is now under [From.GetAdjective] protection.
translation: 西奈山的圣凯瑟琳修道院现在受到[From.GetAdjective]的保护。

original: The Patriarch of Africa
translation: 全非洲的牧首

original: Praise the Lord on this most glorious day! For centuries to come all Copts shall celebrate on this date in memory of our great victory. Finally we have freed our revered Patriarch, the Pope of Alexandria, from his gilded cage in Cairo! No longer will we have to grovel for our enemies or wait decades to have new bishops appointed. This is a most vital step on our path of restoring the Coptic Church to the greatness of old, and beyond.
translation: 在这最光荣的一天赞美主！接下来的几个世纪里，所有科普特正教徒都将在这个日子欢庆以纪念我们的伟大胜利。我们终于从开罗的镀金囚笼里解放了我们崇敬的牧首，即亚历山大教宗！ 我们再也不用屈膝于我们的敌人，或等上几十年才能有新的主教被任命。 这是我们复兴科普特正教会并重建甚至超越其旧日辉煌的道路上最为重要的一步。

original: Nothing is holding us back now!
translation: 现在没有什么能阻挡我们！

original: Copts in the §YCentral Egypt§! Area are coming out of hiding.
translation: §Y埃及中部§!的科普特正教徒得以重见天日，不再躲藏。

original: God bless the [From.GovernmentName] of [From.GetName]!
translation: 上帝保佑[From.GetName]的[From.GovernmentName] ！

original: Praise the Lord on this most glorious day! For centuries to come all Copts shall celebrate on this date in memory of the great victory. Finally our revered Patriarch, the Pope of Alexandria, has been set free from his gilded cage in Cairo by the [From.GetAdjective] [From.GovernmentName]! No longer will we have to grovel for our enemies or wait decades to have new bishops appointed. This is a most vital step on the path of restoring the Coptic Church to the greatness of old, and beyond.
translation: 在这最光荣的一天赞美主！接下来的几个世纪里，所有科普特正教徒都将在这个日子欢庆以纪念这伟大的胜利。终于，[From.GetAdjective][From.GovernmentName]从开罗的镀金囚笼里解放了我们崇敬的牧首，即亚历山大的教宗！ 我们再也不用屈膝于我们的敌人，或等上几十年才能有新的主教被任命。 这是我们复兴科普特正教会并重建甚至超越其旧日辉煌的道路上最为重要的一步。

original: The Importance of Higher Learning
translation: 高等教育的重要性

original: The monasteries of our [Root.GovernmentName] are famed as centers of learning and art. At each monastic school reside a number of religious scholars, experts within fields such as church history, exegesis of the Holy Scripture, reading, grammar, poetry, music, calligraphy and painting. The monasteries compete to attract the most learned masters and maintain them with great honor and monetary compensation. In return, the scholars pass on their knowledge to their students, which consist of potential clergymen as well as ambitious nobles. To join the Christian elite, being part of a powerful family is rarely enough – everyone who has a significant role in the running of our country has been educated at one of the most prestigious monastic schools.\n\nWe have been contacted by two of these schools and they are asking for our support. If we choose to offer our patronage, it could be beneficial for the scholarly development of the nation.
translation: 我们[Root.GovernmentName]的修道院被视为学问和艺术的中心。在每个修道院学校中，都有一些宗教学者，专长于教会历史，圣经解读，阅读，文法，诗歌，音乐，书法和绘画等领域。修道院争相吸引最有经验的大师，并以大量的荣誉和津贴来留住他们。作为回报，学者将他们的知识传给他们的学生，其中包括未来的神职人员和雄心勃勃的贵族。想成为基督教社会内的精英，生于权势之家远远不够 。每个在我们国家运作中占据重要权位的人都需要受教于最著名的几所修道院之一。\n\n我们已经与这些学校中的两所接触过，他们正要求我们予以资助。如果我们选择给予资助，可能会对国家的学术发展有好处。

original: We shall support the school which specializes in administration.
translation: 我们将资助专注于行政技能的修道院学校。

original: Invest in the monastic school with an administrative specialization.
translation: 投资专长行政的修道院学校。

original: It is best to invest in matters of diplomacy.
translation: 在外交事业方面进行投资是最好的。

original: Invest in the monastic school with a diplomatic specialization.
translation: 投资专长外交的修道院学校。

original: These institutions have enough influence – perhaps they should be supporting us?
translation: 这些机构有足够的影响力，或许应当是他们来支持我们？

original: Force the monastic schools to pay some additional tax. All for the good of the nation.
translation: 强迫这些修道院学校额外缴税。这都是为了我们的国家好。

original: Monastic School of Administration
translation: 行政专长的修道院学校

original: Our technological development is enhanced by a highly prestigious monastery school which specializes in matters of administration.
translation: 我们的科技发展在一个享有盛名的专攻行政的修道院学校的帮助下得到了提高。

original: Monastic School of Diplomacy
translation: 外交专长的修道院学校

original: Our technological development is enhanced by a highly prestigious monastery school which specializes in matters of diplomacy.
translation: 我们的科技发展在一个享有盛名的专攻外交的修道院学校的帮助下得到了提高。

original: The Birth of the Church
translation: 教会的诞生

original: Today, fifty days after Easter, we observe Pentecost. On this sacred day, many centuries ago, our Church was born. The Holy Spirit descended upon the Apostles and the other followers of Christ as tongues of fire. Thus they spoke the word of the Lord in all the world's languages and converted thousands of souls to the true faith. Hereby began a new era, the messianic age of the Kingdom of God. In memory of this great event we hold one of the Church's largest celebrations. Together we read from the Bible, sing joyous hymns and kneel in prayer.
translation: 在复活节过去五十天后的今天，我们庆祝五旬节。很多世纪前，在这个神圣的日子里，我们的教会诞生了。圣灵降临在基督的使徒和其他信徒身上，就像熊熊火舌一般。自此，他们以世界上的各种语言传述耶和华的教诲，将成千上万的灵魂转化而追随正信。就此开创了一个新时代，神的国度降临的弥赛亚时代。为了纪念这个伟大的事件，我们举行了教会最为盛大的庆典之一。我们一起吟诵圣经，高唱欢乐的赞美诗，并跪拜祷告。

original: Feast of Palm Sunday
translation: 棕枝全日的祭典

original: As Copts we celebrate Palm Sunday which is one of the Seven Major Lord's Feasts. On the seventh Sunday of the Great Lent we commemorate and relive Jesus' triumphal entry into the holy city of Jerusalem. It is on this day that He drove away the merchants and moneychangers from the Temple. The crowd who cheeringly greeted the Messiah were waving palm branches over their heads and so do we as we make our way through the church on this happy day. During the procession we chant the joyful hymns and it is truly one of our favorite times during the Church year.
translation: 作为科普特正教徒，我们庆祝棕枝全日，这是纪念主的七大祭典之一。在大斋期的第七个星期天，我们庆祝和重温耶稣得胜进入圣城耶路撒冷。正是在这一天，他从寺庙中赶走了商人和兑换商。正如当年欢呼雀跃地迎候弥赛亚的人群将棕枝挥舞过头顶一样，当我们在这个快乐的日子里通过教堂时也挥舞起棕枝。在游行过程中，我们吟诵欢快的赞美诗，这是教会年历中我们最喜欢的日子之一。

original: No expenses shall be spared on this great day!
translation: 为庆祝这样伟大的一天我们将不吝开销！

original: Spend a significant amount of resources on the feast of Pentecost.
translation: 重金举办五旬节的祭典。

original: Spend a significant amount of resources on the feast of Palm Sunday.
translation: 重金举办棕枝全日的祭典。

original: Our love of Christ is not measured in gold spent.
translation: 我们对主的爱不是用花费的金钱来衡量的。

original: Celebrate Pentecost as usual.
translation: 像往常一样庆祝五旬节。

original: Celebrate Palm Sunday as usual.
translation: 像往常一样庆祝棕枝全日。

original: Celebrating Feast of the Lord
translation: 欢庆主的祭典

original: We are celebrating one of the Seven Major Lord's Feasts. No expenses have been spared for this joyous event.
translation: 我们正在庆祝纪念主的七大祭典之一。 为欢庆这样的盛事我们将不吝开销！

original: In Search of the Soul
translation: 寻找灵魂

original: A few religious conversations here, some impressive arguments about morality of man there, and one of our most learned noblemen has decided to take up a monastic life. 'I shall follow in the footsteps of Saint Shenoute the Archimandrite – one day I might even found a monastery of my own!' he exclaims passionately.\nNot everyone would agree with the nobleman's decision, however, and even though he has already started giving away his belongings, there might still be time to talk the man out of going.
translation: 在我们国家的各处，都可见到一些宗教讨论和关于人类美德的令人印象深刻的辩论，而我们最博学的贵族之一决定步上修道院的生活之道。「我会追随大掌院者圣谢努特的足迹，而有一天我甚至可能会建立一个我自己的修道院！」他如此热情地宣布。\n不是所有人都同意这位贵族的决定，然而他已经开始散出家财了。或许我们还有时间劝他不要如此。

original: We could use that passion in some of our provinces...
translation: 我们可以将这股热情利用在造福我们的几个省份中……

original: The nobleman becomes a missionary, a sacred duty to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] beyond that of a monk.
translation: 那名贵族成了一个传教士，一个对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]负责的圣职，远超一名僧侣所负的职责。

original: Wait! We have use of scholars at court!
translation: 等等！我们的宫廷用得上学者！

original: The nobleman becomes our entrusted advisor.
translation: 那名贵族成了我们的亲信顾问。

original: He must be allowed to find God.
translation: 他必须被允许去追寻神的道路。

original: The nobleman leaves court to live out his life in solitude.
translation: 那名贵族离开了宫廷去过独居避世的生活。

original: An Enthusiastic Believer
translation: 一名狂热信徒

original: A pious nobleman has accepted the sacred duty of spreading the faith to lost souls in our realm.
translation: 一名虔诚的贵族已经承担起神圣的使命，在我们领土内向迷失的灵魂们传播信仰之道。

original: The White Monastery
translation: 白色修道院

original: The province of Quina has sent representatives to request resources and support in the restoration of a famous old monastery said to have been the home of Saint Schenoute the Archimandrite himself. The foundations of the stone walls were set over a millennium ago and the devout worshipers in the area long for nothing more than to restore the building to its former glory. 'With your aid, it will once again become a center of higher learning and scripture studies' they assure us.
translation: 奎纳省份派遣代表来要求资源和支持，以重建一个著名的古老修道院，该修道院据说是大掌院者圣谢努特的故居。修道院石墙的地基是在一千多年前打下的，而该地区虔诚的信徒最渴望的就是将建筑重建使其恢复往日的荣耀。“在你的帮助下，它将再次成为一个高等教育和圣经研究的中心。”他们向我们保证。

original: Let them have their books!
translation: 就让他们都有自己的书可读吧！

original: The monastery will be rebuilt.
translation: 修道院将被重建。

original: There is more knowledge in this world than that of the scholarly kind.
translation: 这世上有比那类学问更多更有价值的知识。

original: The representatives are sent home disappointed.
translation: 失望的代表们被送回了家。

original: Songs of the Pious
translation: 虔诚之歌

original: A new church has recently been established in the region. The hymns are a welcome addition to the land.
translation: 该地区最近新建了一个教堂。赞美诗的旋律受到了这片土地上人民的欢迎。

original: Scripture Studies
translation: 圣经研究

original: The White Monastery located in the region is renowned for its impressive library.
translation: 坐落在这个地区的白色修道院以其令人印象深刻的图书馆而闻名。

original: A New Era
translation: 新的时代

original: We have received word from [pious_province.GetName] of a group of commoners gathering in the countryside at regular intervals - it appears they are worshipers of the Lord. According to our couriers they have attempted to build a place of worship for some time now, but increased funds would likely speed the project along.
translation: 我们收到来自[pious_province.GetName]省份的消息，一群平民定期在乡间集会。他们似乎是主的信徒。据我们的信使报告，他们这一段时间以来一直试图建造一个礼拜场所，但如果我们增加资金的话，可能会加快项目进度。

original: The pious shall be rewarded! Build a church!
translation: 虔诚应该得到回报！建一座教堂！

original: A new church will be built.
translation: 一座新教堂将被建起。

original: We have more important things to tend to.
translation: 我们有更重要的事要关注。

original: The Patriarch of [cairo_province.GetName]
translation: [cairo_province.GetName]的牧首

original: The Coptic religion has long had a presence in [cairo_province.GetName]. Some of the Patriarch's followers abroad have even claimed that we are keeping Copts captive in our lands... Perhaps they need a reminder of the situation?
translation: 科普特正教长期以来存在于[cairo_province.GetName]。一些国外的牧首追随者甚至声称我们将科普特人囚禁在自己的领土上……也许他们需要有人向他们提醒一下形势？

original: Send messages reminding my neighbor of my tolerant regime.
translation: 发点消息向我们的邻国提醒一下我们的宽容统治。

original: There is a chance that §Y[ally_to_patriarch.GetName]§! will appreciate this gesture.
translation: §Y[ally_to_patriarch.GetName]§!有可能欣赏这个姿态。

original: Let's remind them who is in control of their Pope.
translation: 让我们提醒他们是谁掌握着他们的教宗。

original: There is a chance that §Y[ally_to_patriarch.GetName]§! won't appreciate this gesture.
translation: §Y[ally_to_patriarch.GetName]§!有可能不欣赏这个姿态。

original: We shouldn't get involved.
translation: 我们不该插手。

original: Home of the Patriarch
translation: 牧首的家园

original: Our neighbors in [From.GetName] have sent messages to our realm, informing us of the current status of the blessed Patriarch of [cairo_province.GetName]. According to the missive, His Holiness is very pleased with the level of religious tolerance displayed by [From.GetAdjective] rule.
translation: 我们的邻国[From.GetName]已经向我们发来信息，告诉我们在[cairo_province.GetName]的牧首的现状。根据这些消息，牧首陛下对于[From.GetAdjective]统治所表现出的宗教宽容程度非常满意。

original: Glad to hear it!
translation: 真高兴听到这些！

original: This might be the start of a beautiful friendship - both countries receive §YApproves of Diplomacy§! - opinion of one another changed by §G+25§!.
translation: 这可能是一段美丽友谊的开始，双方都获得了§Y外交赞许§!修正，彼此间的好感度改变了§G+25§!。

original: Is this some kind of joke?! They mock us!
translation: 这算是某种笑话吗？他们嘲笑我们！

original: Send an angry letter of response.
translation: 发一封愤怒的回信。

original: The Patriarch Captive
translation: 牧首之囚

original: Our neighbors in [From.GetName] have sent messages to our realm, reminding us that they hold our blessed Patriarch of [cairo_province.GetName]. While His Holiness is still alive, we can't be certain of the level of religious tolerance displayed by [From.GetAdjective] rule.
translation: 我们的邻国[From.GetName]已经向我们发来信息，提醒我们他们手里握有我们在[cairo_province.GetName]的牧首。虽然牧首陛下他还活着，但我们不能确定[From.GetAdjective]统治所表现出的宗教宽容程度。

original: This won't stand! A veiled threat is still a threat!
translation: 是可忍孰不可忍！隐含的威胁也是威胁！

original: We let them know of our sentiments.
translation: 让他们见识见识我们的脾气。

original: We shouldn't let them rile us.
translation: 不能被他们惹毛了。

original: We let it slide for now.
translation: 现在先让这事过去吧。

original: The Copts Respond
translation: 科普特正教徒的回应

original: The [From.GetAdjective] Copts are pleased by our messages of kind-hearted spirit! Perhaps our people will live harmoniously for centuries to come?
translation: [From.GetAdjective]的科普特正教徒对我们表达良善之心的信息感到高兴！也许我们的人民将在将来的几个世纪中和睦相处？

original: Let's hope so.
translation: 但愿如此。

original: This might be the start of a beautiful friendship - both countries receive §YApproves of Diplomacy§! - opinion of one another changed by §G+25§!.
translation: 这可能是一段美丽友谊的开始，双方都获得了§Y外交赞许§!修正，彼此间的看法改变了§G+25§!。

original: The paranoid [From.GetAdjective] are insulted by our messages, calling it a thinly veiled threat against their Patriarch. Their response contained an ungodly amount of curses aimed at us. Perhaps this was a mistake?
translation: 偏执的[From.GetAdjective]被我们的去信所侮辱，并称其为对他们牧首的含蓄的威胁。他们的回复带有大量对我们的亵渎性的诅咒。也许这是一个错误？

original: It's not our fault.
translation: 这不是我们的错。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] are insulted by our thinly veiled threat against their Patriarch of [cairo_province.GetName]. The response from their rulers contains a belligerent warning of touching the hair of a single Copt.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]被我们对他们在[cairo_province.GetName]的牧首含蓄的威胁所侮辱。他们统治者的回复包含着开战的警告，如果我们胆敢再触碰任何一个科普特正教徒的任何一根毛发的话。

original: We expected as much.
translation: 我们求之不得。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] have sent no messages in response to our thinly veiled threats against their Patriarch of [cairo_province.GetName]. Either they do not care about their holy site, or they are too scared of the glorious [Root.GetName] to speak against us.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]没有作出任何关于我们对他们在[cairo_province.GetName]的牧首的含蓄威胁的回应。他们要么不关心他们的圣地，要么他们太害怕荣耀的[Root.GetName]，以至于不敢对抗我们。

original: They got the message.
translation: 他们知道是什么意思。

original: Confirm Cultural Shift
translation: 确认转变文化

original: Confirm Promote Culture
translation: 确认认同文化

original: Confirm Demote Culture
translation: 确认排斥文化

original: Changing your Primary Culture to $NAME|Y$ will cost $COST|Y$£dip.\nAre you sure?
translation: 将你的主流文化转变为$NAME|Y$将花费$COST|Y$£dip£。\n你确定要这么做吗？

original: Promoting $NAME|Y$ to Accepted status will cost $COST|Y$£dip.\nAre you sure?
translation: 弘扬$NAME|Y$文化使其成为相容文化将消耗$COST|Y$£dip£。\n你确定要这么做？

original: Demoting $NAME|Y$ to Non-Accepted status will cost $COST|Y$£dip.\n§YUnrest§! in all $NAME|Y$ provinces will rise by $UNREST$ for $YEARS$ years.\nAre you sure?
translation: 将$NAME|Y$贬斥为不相容文化将花费$COST|Y$£dip£。\n在所有$NAME|Y$省份的§Y叛乱风险§!将在$YEARS$年间上升$UNREST$。\n你确定要这么做吗？

original: Allies of the Faith
translation: 信仰之盟国

original: We are proud to be Copts, followers of the true faith. While we are firm in our convictions and will never abandon Christ, being isolated from the rest of the Christian community is a weakness. We are beset by religious enemies on many fronts. The impending war is not a matter of if, it is a matter of when. Before it breaks out we should try to seek out some powerful allies. There is a mighty Christian realm far to the north, but its exact location and the distance to their lands are unknown to us. However we can fund an expedition with the goal of finding them.
translation: 我们为身为科普特正教徒，正信的追随者而感到自豪。虽然我们坚信我们的信念，永远不会放弃基督教信仰，但与基督教世界的其他部分隔绝是我们的一个弱点。我们在许多战线上被宗教敌人所困扰。即将来临的战争不是是否发生的问题，而是何时发生的问题。 在它爆发之前，我们应该试图寻找一些强大的盟友。遥远的北方有一个强大的基督教王国，但它的确切位置和与他们领地的距离是我们所未知的。我们可以资助一次试图找寻他们的探险。

original: Send a party of our best explorers, priests and diplomats!
translation: 派出一批我们最好的探险家，牧师和外交官！

original: Send an expedition to the north in search of fellow Christians. Success is not guaranteed, but we could find some sort of assistance regarding our common religious enemies.
translation: 向北派一支探险队，寻找基督徒同胞。我们无法保证成功，但是考虑到我们共同的宗教敌人，我们可能会得到一些帮助。

original: We do not need anyone else when God is on our side.
translation: 当上帝站在我们这边时，我们不需要其他人了。

original: No expedition is sent.
translation: 将不会派遣任何探险队。

original: Books or Swords
translation: 书籍还是利剑

original: A party of Coptic diplomats from our neighbor [From.GetName] have crossed into our territory. They have an unusually large number of priests among them. Our advisors suspect that they are trying to make contact with other Christians to the north. The diplomats are worryingly tight-lipped on the subject of their purpose. Perhaps it is simply a religious matter, but what if they are attempting to gather allies against us? We would be beset on multiple fronts by fanatical infidels!
translation: 一批来自我们邻国[From.GetName]的外交使团已经进入我们的领土。不寻常的是他们中有大量的牧师。我们的顾问怀疑他们正试图与北方的其他基督徒接触。外交官对他们的目的守口如瓶。也许这只是个简单的宗教事务，但是如果他们试图聚集盟友对抗我们呢？我们将被狂热的异教徒四面袭扰！

original: These are just speculations. The [From.GetAdjective] diplomats may pass.
translation: 这些都是猜测。 [From.GetAdjective] 的外交使团可以通过。

original: We cannot take the risk. Detain them.
translation: 我们不能冒这个险，扣下他们。

original: Enemy of the Faith
translation: 信仰之敌

original: News has reached us that our despicable neighbors, the [From.GovernmentName] of [From.GetName], have taken our diplomats captive! They will neither be persuaded to let our people continue on their journey or return back home. We can only hope that they change their minds. In any case, this outrageous attack on a party of peaceful envoys only confirms our suspicions. [From.GetName] is a dangerous enemy of the one true faith.
translation: 有消息说我们卑鄙的邻居[From.GetName][From.GovernmentName]已经把我们的外交官逮捕了！无法说服他们让我们的人继续旅程或者回国。 我们只能希望他们改变主意。无论如何，对一批和平使者的这种暴行只能证明我们的怀疑。 [From.GetName]是一个正信的危险敌人。

original: May God smite the infidels!
translation: 愿上帝严惩异教徒！

original: Brothers From Across the Sea
translation: 海对岸的兄弟

original: Sometimes we are reminded of how far this world extends beyond our own realms. We have been visited by a strange group of people from lands far south from here. While most of them only speak their own peculiar-sounding language, a few of them have conversed with our translators in Arabic. They claim to come from the great [sent_diplomats.GovernmentName] of [sent_diplomats.GetName] and that they seek friends among their fellow Christians. We have very little knowledge of the Christians in the south, but these [sent_diplomats.GetAdjective] men seem to be genuine believers. They speak of Christ with fervor in their voice and seem far more well-versed in the scripture than our average noble. Apparently their country is surrounded by religious enemies and they ask us to aid them in defending the true faith. While this conflict is too distant and unknown for us to get engaged directly, we could share some of our knowledge and resources with them.
translation: 有时我们也警醒在我们的国土之外世界还延伸了很远。我们已经被来自向南很远土地上的一群陌生人拜访过。虽然大多数人只会说自己听起来很特殊的语言，但其中一些人已经用阿拉伯语与我们的翻译交流了。他们声称来自[sent_diplomats.GetName]的伟大的[sent_diplomats.GovernmentName]，他们在基督徒同胞中中寻求盟友。 我们对南方的基督徒知之甚少，但这些[sent_diplomats.Get Adjective]人似乎是真正的信徒。他们充满激情地说起基督，比我们一般的贵族似乎更加精通圣经。显然他们的国家被宗教敌人包围，他们要求我们帮助他们维护真正的信仰。然而这种冲突对我们来说太遥远和未知，不便直接参与。我们可以与他们分享我们的一些知识和资源。

original: Of course we will help you, brothers. Anything for the one true God!
translation: 兄弟们，我们当然会帮助你们，一切为了真正的上帝!

original: The [From.GetAdjective] diplomats are sent home with some resources to aid them in their defense of Christianity.
translation: [From.GetAdjective] 的外交官们带着帮助他们捍卫基督教的资源被送回家了。

original: This is not our concern. We have our own wars to fight.
translation: 这不是我们该关心的，我们自己有仗要打。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] diplomats are sent home empty-handed.
translation: [From.GetAdjective] 的外交官两手空空回家了。

original: Friends in Foreign Places
translation: 外邦朋友

original: Praise the Lord, our diplomats have finally returned from their journey to the north! Not only are they with us again, safe and sound, but they also bring many interesting tomes and tales from their travels. Most come from the [From.GovernmentName] of [From.GetName], where our diplomats were very well received. While we might have hoped for more than knowledge, we are thankful for whatever God and our fellow Christians provides us with. We will make sure that their gift does not go to waste.
translation: 赞美主，我们的外交官终于从他们北方的旅程回来了！他们不仅安全，健康地和我们在一起，而且还带来了许多有趣的故事和传说。大多数来自[From.GetName]的[From.GovernmentName]，在那我们的外交官受到欢迎。虽然我们可能希望得到的不止知识，但我们感谢上帝和我们的基督徒同胞为我们提供的东西。 我们将确保他们的礼物不会被浪费。

original: Perhaps this is the start of a lasting friendship between our nations?
translation: 或许这是我们国家间一段长久友谊的开始？

original: Alone in the World
translation: 独存于世

original: After a long and arduous journey the diplomats whom we sent northwards have finally returned. They did indeed reach Christian lands in the end, yet they come back empty-handed. While many of the Christians they encountered listened, few seemed to truly care. In our isolation, we are doubly cursed – not only are we surrounded by enemies, the distance to the rest of the Christian community makes us outcasts. What happens in [Root.GetName] does not influence them and perhaps our ways are too foreign for them to relate to. It seems as if the Copts are alone in the world.
translation: 经过漫长而艰苦的旅程，我们外交官终于从北方回来了。最终他们确实到达了基督教的土地，但他们空手而归。 虽然他们遇到的许多基督徒都听到了我们的事，但看起来只有极少人真的关心。在我们孤立的情况下，我们像是被双重诅咒了——不仅是被我们的敌人所包围，离基督教世界其余部分的遥远距离也使我们被抛弃。[Root.GetName]中发生的情况不会影响他们，也许我们的道路对他们来说太生僻了。似乎科普特正教徒独存于世。

original: We cannot lose faith. God is the only ally we need.
translation: 我们不能失去信仰，上帝是我们唯一需要的盟友。

original: Captured Diplomats
translation: 被俘的外交官

original: The Pilgrims of [Root.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]的朝圣者

original: [Root.GetName] has recently seen many a lost soul seeking guidance at the monastery in the area. In fact the region is becoming quite popular for people looking for repentance and absolution in the ways of Saint Anthony - the desert caves are well suited for the life of a hermit, allowing some of the most devoted Copts to spend years in contemplative solitude. \n\nMeanwhile, the population of [Root.GetName] take great pride in this piety. Some well-placed words of encouragement could allow us to bolster their self-esteem even further...
translation: [Root.GetName]发现最近许多迷失的灵魂在该地区的修道院寻求指引。事实上，这个地区正在变得对一些以圣安东尼的方式寻求忏悔和赦免的人来说非常受欢迎。沙漠洞穴非常适合隐修士的生活，允许一些最虔诚的科普特正教徒花费多年在孤独中沉思冥想。\n\n而且，[Root.GetName]的人们对这份虔诚感到自豪。一些恰如其分、鼓舞人心的话可以使我们进一步增强他们的自尊心……

original: [Root.GetName] has recently seen many a lost soul seeking guidance at the monastery in the area. In fact the region is becoming quite popular for people looking for repentance and absolution in the ways of Saint Anthony - the surrounding wilderness is well suited for the life of a hermit, allowing some of the most devoted Copts to spend years in contemplative solitude. \n\nMeanwhile, the population of [Root.GetName] take great pride in this piety. Some well-placed words of encouragement could allow us to bolster their enthusiasm even further...
translation: [Root.GetName]发现最近许多迷失的灵魂在该地区的修道院寻求指引。事实上，这个地区正在变得对一些以圣安东尼的方式寻求忏悔和赦免的人来说非常受欢迎。沙漠洞穴非常适合隐修士的生活允许一些最虔诚的科普特人花费多年在孤独中沉思冥想。 \n\n而且，[Root.GetName]的人们对这份虔诚感到自豪。一些巧妙设置的鼓舞人心的话可以使我们进一步增强他们的自尊心……

original: Remind the people of the virtues of hard work.
translation: 提醒人们勤奋工作的美德。

original: Tell them that we must be prepared to defend our belief at any cost.
translation: 告诉他们我们必须不惜一切代价准备守卫信仰。

original: Inspired Workers
translation: 受激励的工人

original: The workers in this area are invigorated by the piety of their community.
translation: 这个地区的工人因他们教区的虔诚而受激励。

original: Inspired Soldiers
translation: 受激励的士兵

original: The soldiers in this area are invigorated by the piety of their community.
translation: 这个地区的士兵因他们教区的虔诚而受激励。

original: A Sacked Monastery
translation: 被抢掠的修道院

original: One of our provinces has sent representatives to request resources and support in the restoration of an old monastery, recently sacked in a bandit raid. The foundations of the stone walls were set generations ago and the people in the area long for nothing more than to restore the building and make it a beacon of holy worship. Any aid given to the community would potentially impress the locals.
translation: 我们的一个省份派出代表要求资源和支持，以重建一个最近在强盗袭击中被破坏的古老修道院。 修道院石墙的地基是几代人之前打下的，该地区的人民最渴望的就是是恢复建筑物并使它成为代表神圣信仰的明灯。对教区的任何援助都可能给当地人留下深刻的印象。

original: Let's send them some resources.
translation: 让我们给他们一些资源吧。

original: The monastery will be restored.
translation: 修道院将被重建。

original: They can pray in their homes.
translation: 他们可以在家里祈祷。

original: The representatives are sent home disappointed.
translation: 代表们失望地被送回家了。

original: Repaired Monastery
translation: 重建的修道院

original: A monastery which was burnt down here was swiftly rebuilt.
translation: 一个在这里烧毁的修道院被迅速重建了。

original: The Wider Christian World
translation: 更宽广的基督教世界

original: The conquest of Alexandria is a great victory not only for the Copts of Egypt. The great Italian trading cities all have a permanent presence in this great port and have been very eager to do business with us. These merchants now compete for favors from the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] who completed what the crusaders could not and through them we have been able to gain contact with a large number of other Christian states around the Eastern Mediterranean.
translation: 征服亚历山大不仅是埃及的科普特正教徒的伟大胜利。那些伟大的意大利贸易城市也将这个伟大的港口常驻，并且非常渴望与我们做生意。这些商人现在正在争取从完成了十字军无法完成之事业的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]那里获得好处。通过他们，我们已经能够与东地中海其他大多数基督教国家进行联系。

original: 'Take heed to come together often to give thanks to God and show forth his praise.'
translation: 「你们要常常聚会，感谢上帝，并赞美祂的圣名。」

original: Our maps of the Eastern Mediterranean are now more complete.
translation: 我们的东地中海地图现在更完整了。

original: In Aksum stands The Church of Our Lady Mary of Zion, which was built in the 4th century during the reign of Ezana, the first Christian ruler of the ancient Aksumite empire. According to the legends it is here the great emperor Menelik I, son of King Solomon and the Queen of Sheba, brought the Ark of the Covenant after his journey to Jerusalem.
translation: 在阿克苏姆伫立的锡安山圣母玛利亚教堂，是在公元四世纪古阿克苏姆帝国的第一个基督教统治者埃扎纳统治时期建造的。根据传说正是在这里，所罗门王的和示巴女王之子伟大的皇帝孟尼利克一世，在从耶路撒冷之旅回来后带来了圣约柜。

original: Alexandria is the historical seat of the Coptic Church even though its Patriarch, the Pope of Alexandria, resides in Cairo since the 11th century. While the Pope resided in Alexandria, his seat was Saint Mark's Cathedral, which was built in honor of Mark the Evangelist, founder of the Coptic Church. For millennia Alexandria has been a center of learning and the first catechetical school in the world was founded here.
translation: 亚历山大曾经是科普特正教会的宗座所在地，尽管自11世纪以来，科普特正教会的牧首即亚历山大教宗驻在开罗。当牧首驻在亚历山大时，他的座堂是圣马可大教堂，建来纪念科普特正教会的创始人圣马克。千年以来，亚历山大一直是基督教的研究中心，世界上第一个教会学院成立于此。

original: The Etchmiadzin Cathedral in Vagharshapat is said to have been founded by St Gregory the Illuminator and St Tiridates the Great, and despite centuries of foreign occupation it remains one of the most important holy sites of the Armenian Apostolic Church.
translation: 坐落于瓦加尔沙帕特的埃奇米阿津主教座堂据称是由启蒙者圣格里高利与亚美尼亚国王圣梯里达底三世筹建而成的 ，尽管几个世纪以来被外国占领，它仍然是亚美尼亚使徒教会最重要的圣地之一。

original: Antioch, the Cradle of Christianity, was a center of Christianity during Roman times. It became the seat of one of the five original patriarchates, along with Constantinople, Jerusalem, Alexandria and Rome. Antioch was once a bustling metropolis of half a million souls, but declined as it was ravaged during the Crusades. It fell in the 13th century as the city was razed by Muslims, and its entire Christian population was either enslaved or killed.
translation: 安条克，基督教的摇篮，是罗马时代的基督教中心。它与君士坦丁堡，耶路撒冷，亚历山大和罗马一起成为五大牧首区。安条克曾经是一个五十万人的繁华大都市，但因被十字军东征的破坏而衰落。这个城市在十三世纪被穆斯林夷为平地，所有基督教徒都被奴役或丧生。

original: The ancient city of Qasr Ibrim became a center of Christianity in the 8th century and reached its prime during the Eparchy of Nobatia. Even as the rest of Makuria became Islamic, the population of Qasr Ibrim remained Christian and has done so until this day. Perched atop a cliff overlooking the River Nile, Qasr Ibrim has become a place of great economic, political and religious importance.
translation: 伊布里姆堡古城在八世纪成为基督教中心，并在诺巴主教的管辖下达到了顶峰。即使马库里亚的其他地区都伊斯兰化，伊布里姆堡的人们仍然保持基督的信仰直到今天。由于位于俯瞰尼罗河的悬崖上，伊布里姆堡已经成为在经济，政治和宗教上具有重要性的地区。

original: As our ruler has not appointed a favorite successor a lesser son of the $DYNASTY|Y$ will be made Sultan.
translation: 由于我们的君主没有选定他最中意的继承者，$DYNASTY|Y$王朝的一个小儿子将成为苏丹。

original: The Sons of [Root.Monarch.GetName]
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]的儿子们

original: His Imperial Majesty [Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], sovereign of the house of Osman, Sultan of Sultans and Khan of Khans has a reputation as a great man and is unchallenged as a ruler.\nAs befits a man of his caliber and stature the Sultan has fathered several capable children and many who show great promise as future rulers. As both the sons themselves and our government officials are aware, however, only one can inherit and there is little in the way of consolation prizes. Our Viziers are adamant that it is now high time for [Root.Monarch.GetName] to name a favorite among the possible successors. This is unlikely to end the competition for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] favor but it will hopefully stop the worst succession struggles that might follow if our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] should meet his maker without having picked a clear successor.
translation: 尊贵的[Root.Monarch.GetName][Root.Monarch.GetTitle]陛下，奥斯曼帝国的领袖，众苏丹们的苏丹和众可汗们的可汗，被誉为一个伟人和一个无可动摇的统治者。\n与他这样的身份和能力相匹配，他也养育了许多能力出众的儿子，而其中一些人展示出了未来作为君主的能力。我们的政府官员和这些儿子都知道只有一个人能继承大统，而这里面绝没有什么温情可言。我们的维齐尔们坚持现在是时候让[Root.Monarch.GetName]在可能的继承者中间钦定一个他最为中意的人选。这未必能停止他们就[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]最中意的人选进行角逐，但有希望阻止接下来可能出现的最糟糕的王位斗争，如果我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在去见真主前没有明确钦定继位者的话这是很可能发生的。

original: His Imperial Majesty [Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], sovereign of the house of Osman, Sultan of Sultans, Khan of Khans, Qayser-i Rum, Emperor of the Three Cities of Constantinople, Adrianople and Bursa has a reputation as a great man and is unchallenged as a ruler.\nAs befits a man of his caliber and stature the Sultan has fathered several capable children and many who show great promise as future rulers. As both the sons themselves and our government officials are aware, however, only one can inherit and there is little in the way of consolation prizes. Our Viziers are adamant that it is now high time for [Root.Monarch.GetName] to name a favorite among the possible successors. This is unlikely to end the competition for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] favor but it will hopefully stop the worst succession struggles that might follow if our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] should meet his maker without having picked a clear successor.
translation: 尊贵的[Root.Monarch.GetName][Root.Monarch.GetTitle]陛下，奥斯曼帝国的领袖，众苏丹们的苏丹和众可汗们的可汗，罗马帝国的皇帝，君士坦丁堡、阿德里安堡和布尔萨三城的统治者，被誉为一个伟人和一个无可动摇的统治者。\n与他这样的身份和能力相匹配，他也养育了许多能力出众的儿子，而其中一些人展示出了未来作为君主的能力。我们的政府官员和这些儿子都知道只有一个人能继承大统，而这里面绝没有什么温情可言。我们的维齐尔们坚持现在是时候让[Root.Monarch.GetName]在可能的继承者中间钦定一个他最为中意的人选。这未必能停止他们就[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]最中意的人选进行角逐，但有希望阻止接下来可能出现的最糟糕的王位斗争，如果我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在去见真主前没有明确钦定继位者的话这是很可能发生的。

original: His Imperial Majesty [Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], sovereign of the house of Osman, Sultan of Sultans, Khan of Khans, Custodian of the Two Noble Sanctuaries, Qayser-i Rum, Emperor of the Three Cities of Constantinople, Adrianople and Bursa has a reputation as a great man and is unchallenged as a ruler.\nAs befits a man of his caliber and stature the Sultan has fathered several capable children and many who show great promise as future rulers. As both the sons themselves and our government officials are aware, however, only one can inherit and there is little in the way of consolation prizes. Our Viziers are adamant that it is now high time for [Root.Monarch.GetName] to name a favorite among the possible successors. This is unlikely to end the competition for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] favor but it will hopefully stop the worst succession struggles that might follow if our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] should meet his maker without having picked a clear successor.
translation: 尊贵的[Root.Monarch.GetName][Root.Monarch.GetTitle]陛下，奥斯曼帝国的领袖，众苏丹们的苏丹和众可汗们的可汗，两圣地的监护人，罗马帝国的皇帝，君士坦丁堡、阿德里安堡和布尔萨三城的统治者，被誉为一个伟人和无可动摇的统治者。\n与他这样的身份和能力相匹配，他也养育了许多能力出众的儿子，而其中一些人展示出了未来作为君主的能力。我们的政府官员和这些儿子都知道只有一个人能继承大统，而这里面绝没有什么温情可言。我们的维齐尔们坚持现在是时候让[Root.Monarch.GetName]在可能的继承者中间钦定一个他最为中意的人选。这未必能停止他们就[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]最为中意的人选进行角逐，但有希望阻止接下来可能出现的最糟糕的继位斗争，如果我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在去见真主前没有明确钦定继位者的话这是很可能发生的。

original: His Imperial Majesty [Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], sovereign of the house of Osman, Sultan of Sultans, Khan of Khans, Commander of the Faithful and Successor of the Prophet of the lord of the Universe, Custodian of the Two Noble Sanctuaries, Qayser-i Rum, Emperor of the Three Cities of Constantinople, Adrianople and Bursa has a reputation as a great man and is unchallenged as a ruler.\nAs befits a man of his caliber and stature the Sultan has fathered several capable children and many who show great promise as future rulers. Both the sons themselves and our government officials are acutely aware that only one can inherit and what awaits the others. Our Viziers are adamant that it is now high time for [Root.Monarch.GetName] to name a favorite among the possible successors. This is unlikely to end the competition for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] favor but it will hopefully stop the worst succession struggles that might follow if our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] should meet his maker without having picked a clear successor.
translation: 尊贵的[Root.Monarch.GetName][Root.Monarch.GetTitle]陛下，奥斯曼帝国的领袖，众苏丹们的苏丹和众可汗们的可汗，信众的指挥官，安拉先知的继承者，两圣地的监护人，罗马帝国的皇帝，君士坦丁堡、阿德里安堡和布尔萨三城的统治者，被誉为一个伟人和无可动摇的统治者。\n与他这样的身份和能力相匹配，他也养育了许多能力出众的儿子，而其中一些人展示出了未来作为君主的能力。我们的政府官员和这些儿子都知道只有一个人能继承大统而失败者将面对什么。我们的维齐尔坚持现在是时候让[Root.Monarch.GetName]在可能的继承者中间钦定一个他最为中意的人选。这未必能停止他们就[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]最为中意的人选进行角逐，但有希望阻止接下来可能出现的最为糟糕的王位斗争，如果我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在去见真主前没有明确钦定继位者的话这是很可能发生的。

original: Her Imperial Majesty [Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], sovereign of the house of Osman and Sultana of Sultans has a reputation as a great woman and is unchallenged as a ruler.\nAs befits a ruler of her caliber and stature the Sultana has mothered several capable children and many who show great promise as future rulers. Both the sons themselves and our government officials are acutely aware that only one can inherit and what awaits the others. Our Viziers are adamant that it is now high time for [Root.Monarch.GetName] to name a favorite among the possible successors. This is unlikely to end the competition for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] favor but it will hopefully stop the worst succession struggles that might follow if our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] should meet her maker without having picked a clear successor.
translation: 尊贵的[Root.Monarch.GetName][Root.Monarch.GetTitle]陛下，奥斯曼帝国的领袖，众苏丹们的苏丹娜，被誉为一个伟人和一个无可动摇的统治者。\n与她这样的身份和能力相匹配，她也养育了许多能力出众的孩子，并且其中一些人展现出君王的潜质。我们的政府官员和这些子女都知道只有一个人能继承大统而失败者将面对什么。我们的维齐尔们坚持现在是时候让[Root.Monarch.GetName]钦定一个她最为中意的继位者人选。这未必能停止他们就[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]最为中意的人选进行角逐，但有希望阻止接下来可能出现的最为糟糕的继位斗争，如果我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在去见真主前没有明确钦定继位者的话这是很可能发生的。

original: The Pious son is our favorite.
translation: 最为虔诚的儿子是我们的最佳人选。

original: The Strongest son is our favorite.
translation: 最为强大的儿子是我们的最佳人选。

original: The Studious son is our favorite.
translation: 最为好学的儿子是我们的最佳人选。

original: The Gregarious son is our favorite.
