translation: 最善于交际的儿子是我们的最佳人选。

original: The Natural Leader is our favorite.
translation: 那些天生的领导者是我们的最佳人选。

original: The Fairest son is our favorite.
translation: 最为公正的儿子是我们的最佳人选。

original: The Entrepreneurial son is our favorite.
translation: 最有商业头脑的儿子是我们的最佳人选。

original: The Inquisitive son is our favorite.
translation: 最为好奇的儿子是我们的最佳人选。

original: The Most Gifted son is our favorite.
translation: 最有天分的儿子是我们的最佳人选。

original: The Generous son is our favorite.
translation: 最为慷慨的儿子是我们的最佳人选。

original: Kiliç alayi
translation: 奥斯曼之剑

original: An Ottoman coronation ceremony is the most grand thing many will see in their lifetime and the coronation of [Root.Monarch.GetName] is no exception. As the Sword of Osman is girded upon [Root.Monarch.GetName] by the Sharif of Konya, however, our Viziers look upon [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] with some amount of dread. [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] was never the most likely of candidates and would likely never have taken the throne if a clear favorite had existed.\nSome would go as far as to say that it was [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] mediocrity that allowed [Root.Monarch.GetName] to triumph. Greater men never considered [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] a threat and others hoped to control the Empire through [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]. One thing our new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has clearly demonstrated: When the need arises [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] will not shy away from sinking a dagger in the back of those that trust [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim].
translation: 奥斯曼帝国的登基大典也许是许多人一辈子所能见到的最为宏大的场面，而[Root.Monarch.GetName]的登基典礼也不例外。由科尼亚的谢里夫给新苏丹[Root.Monarch.GetName]佩戴上奥斯曼之剑，而我们的维齐尔带着几分敬畏仰视着[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]从来都不是最有希望继承大统的那个人，而如果有明确钦定继承人的话永远也不会轮到他来继位。\n有些人私底下说道是[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]平庸使得[Root.Monarch.GetName]能够胜出。更有权力的人从来都不认为[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]是一个威胁，而另一些人希望通过[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]来掌控帝国。但至少有一件事我们的新[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]已经清楚地表明了：当有必要的时候[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]绝不会犹豫往那些信任[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]的人们背后捅上一刀。

original: Long live the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]!
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]万岁！

original: Only time can tell what kind of a ruler §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§! will be.
translation: 只有时间能告诉我们§Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!将是一个怎样的统治者！

original: Sancaga çikma
translation: 外放委任

original: Our favorite and heir, [Root.Heir.GetName], is young and still has a lot to learn about life and how to be a good ruler. Most of our Viziers feel it is our duty to uphold our dynastic tradition of appointing our sons to act as governors and rulers over small provinces. This way they can learn what it is to be a ruler. By assigning suitably powerful provinces we can also reduce the chance of a future succession struggle. [sancaga_cikma_province.GetName] has served as such a governorship at times in the past and would likely fit [Root.Heir.GetName] very well.\nOthers, including our Mother, the Valide Sultan, feel that young [Root.Heir.GetName] would benefit the most from an education within the walls of the Imperial Harem, where [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] will have constant access to good teachers and can be supervised by those who know him. This way [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] would also be far from any place [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] might develop premature political ambitions.
translation: 我们最宠爱的同时也是我们继承人的[Root.Heir.GetName]还是太年轻，因而有许多人生经验和有关如何成为优秀统治者的东西要去学习。 大多数我们的维齐尔认为我们有责任维系我们王朝的优良传统，即将我们的儿子外放委任到外地的小省份作为总督和统治者。这样他们就可以学习成为一个统治者是怎么样的。通过合理分配给他们富强的省份我们也能够降低未来发生继位斗争的可能。[sancaga_cikma_province.GetName]过去就曾经作为一个外放委任的地点而可能非常适合[Root.Heir.GetName]到那去。\n其他人，包括我们的母亲，苏丹皇太后，都感觉年轻的[Root.Heir.GetName]在帝国后宫中接受教育是最好的，因为[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]能够一直接触到好的老师而被那些了解他的人监护着。这样[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]也将远离任何可能过早激发[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]政治野心的地方。

original: Governing [sancaga_cikma_province.GetName] will do [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] a lot of good.
translation: 治理[sancaga_cikma_province.GetName]将会给[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]带来很多好处！

original: §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! will be given full control over §Y[sancaga_cikma_province.GetName]§! and if all goes well may return with improved abilities as a ruler.
translation: §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§!将会被给予对§Y[sancaga_cikma_province.GetName]§!的全面控制权，而如果一切进展顺利他将作为统治者返回并增强其能力。

original: The Imperial Harem is the perfect place for a young [Root.Heir.GetWomanMan]!
translation: 帝国后宫最适合年轻的[Root.Heir.GetWomanMan]！

original: §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! will remain in §Y[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]§! where it is safer in all respects but will not have a chance to increase [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] abilities as a ruler.
translation: §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§!将会留在§Y[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]§!，那里就各方面来说都更加安全但将不会有机会增加[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]统治者能力。

original: Heir Governor
translation: 继承人总督

original: We have given this province to our heir to rule hoping that this experience will strengthen his abilities as a ruler in the future.
translation: 我们已经将这个省份给予我们的继承人来治理并希望这种经验能增强他未来作为统治者的能力。

original: Sancaga çikma
translation: 外放委任

original: [Root.Heir.GetName] has returned from [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] time as a governor. According to [Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself] the experience has enriched [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] in more ways than one and [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] is more ready than ever to succed when God calls for our revered [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. If our favorite did learn something, that is not very apparent to us, however, and in the Harem rumors are circulating that the only way [Root.Heir.GetName] enriched himself was by lining his pocket during the local revenue collection.
translation: [Root.Heir.GetName]已经从[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]的总督生涯中回归了。据[Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself]所说这段经历在许多方面都使[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]成长，而且[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]比任何时候都准备得更充分来继位，当神召唤我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的时候。我们宠爱的儿子究竟学到了什么在我们看来并不是十分明显，但是在后宫中流言正在传播说[Root.Heir.GetName]唯一有成长的是在地方上收税时膨胀的腰包。

original: All is well then.
translation: 一切都好。

original: §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! is older, wiser, but generally the same person he was when he was sent away.
translation: §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§!更加年长，更加明智，但仍是我们当年外派送出时的那个他。

original: [Root.Heir.GetName]'s bid for the Throne
translation: [Root.Heir.GetName]将继承大统。

original: Acting as a province governor can undoubtedly teach many valuable lessons for those who will one day rule an empire. It can also give a first taste of real power. Rumors about disease spreading in the Topkapi Palace must have reached [Root.Heir.GetName] and rather than investigate or pray for our health [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] decided that this was an excellent opportunity to seize what was rightfully going to be his eventually.
translation: 身为一个省份总督行事无疑给那个有一天将统治一个帝国的人带来了许多有价值的经验。这也给予他们对真正权力的初体验。托普卡帕宫瘟疫爆发的谣言一定已经传到了[Root.Heir.GetName]耳中，而比起调查清楚这件事或是为我们的健康祈祷，[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]却决定这是一个好机会来夺取那些最终也应当属于他的东西。

original: Acting as a province governor can undoubtedly teach many valuable lessons for those who will one day rule an empire. It can also give a first taste of real power. Rumors about disease spreading in the Royal Palace must have reached [Root.Heir.GetName] and rather than investigate or pray for our health [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] decided that this was an excellent opportunity to seize what was rightfully going to be his eventually.
translation: 身为一个省份总督行事无疑给那个有一天将统治一个帝国的人带来了许多有价值的经验。这也给予他们对真正权力的初体验。皇宫爆发瘟疫的谣言一定已经传到了[Root.Heir.GetName]耳中，而比起调查清楚这件事或是为我们的健康祈祷，[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]却决定这是一个好机会来夺取那些最终也应当属于他的东西。

original: Treason!
translation: 这是背叛！

original: The years in [heir_governorship_province.GetName]
translation: 在[heir_governorship_province.GetName]的岁月

original: [Root.Heir.GetName] has returned to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] from [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] term as a governor of [heir_governorship_province.GetName]. [Root.Heir.GetSheHeCap] claims these years have taught [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] many things about what it means to be the head of a government and how our provincial system works on the local level. During [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] time away from [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] has had ample time to lead the local troops, oversee the administration and juggle the local strongmen.
translation: [Root.Heir.GetName]已经回到了[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]，结束了[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]在[heir_governorship_province.GetName]的总督时期。[Root.Heir.GetSheHeCap]宣称这些年的经历教会了[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]许多事情，主要是关于成为一个统治者意味着什么以及我们在地方省份的体系是如何工作的。在[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]离开[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的岁月里，[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]有充足的时间来领导地方部队，监管行政系统以及和地方势力打交道。

original: Excellent...
translation: 真是优秀。

original: Fear of the Silk Cord
translation: 对丝绳赐死的恐惧

original: As the practical details of succession are being handled for [Root.Monarch.GetName] news has reached us from [enthronement_or_death.GetName]. It seems one of the brothers of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] Imperial Majesty would rather go down fighting than risk the traditional procedures of a lost succession. His name has been read during the Friday prayers in [enthronement_or_death.GetName] and in short time an army has been assembled to overthrow our new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 关于继位的详细报告提交给[Root.Monarch.GetName]后，我们听到了从[enthronement_or_death.GetName]处传来的消息。看起来[Root.Monarch.GetName]陛下的一个兄弟宁愿起来抗争也不愿面对继位失败者所面临的传统风险。他的名字在[enthronement_or_death.GetName]的一次周五祷告上被颂扬，而在短时间内一支部队就被集结起来试图推翻我们的新[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。

original: Kill them. Kill them all.
translation: 杀了他们！把他们全都杀了！

original: Death of the Valide Sultan
translation: 苏丹皇太后之死

original: Ever since [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] was a young Sehzade in the Imperial Harem [Root.Monarch.GetName] has had [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] mother by [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] side. She has offered advice and protection throughout [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] career and as [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] ascended the throne she remained one of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] closest confidants and most influential advisors. Even though she was by now a very old woman the news of her death has come as a heavy blow to our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] who has now lost a good friend, and advisor and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] mother all at once.
translation: 早在[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]还是帝国后宫的一个年轻的沙赫扎德（帝国王子）时，[Root.Monarch.GetName]就已经得到[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]妈妈站在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]这一边。她为[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的事业提供建议和保护，而当[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]继位之后她依旧是[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]最亲近的亲信之一，也是最有影响力的顾问之一。尽管她已经是一个很老的妇人了，但是她去世的消息还是给[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]造成了很大打击，使其一次就失去了一个亲密的朋友、顾问以及[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]挚爱的母亲。

original: Ever since he was a young Sehzade in the Imperial Harem [Root.Monarch.GetName] has had his mother by [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] side. She has offered advice and protection throughout [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] career and as [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] ascended the throne she remained one of his closest confidants and most influential advisors. The news of her untimely death has come as a surprise and a heavy blow to our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] who has now lost a good friend, an advisor and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] mother far too soon.
translation: 早在[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]还是帝国后宫的一个年轻的沙赫扎德（帝国王子）时，[Root.Monarch.GetName]就已经得到[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]妈妈站在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]这一边。她为[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的事业提供建议和保护，而当[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]继位之后她依旧是[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]最亲近的亲信之一，也是最有影响力的顾问之一。她最终去世的消息震惊了世人并给我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]带来了很大打击，使其过早地失去了一个亲密的朋友、顾问以及[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]挚爱的母亲。

original: Ever since [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] was a young Sehzade in the Imperial Harem [Root.Monarch.GetName] has had [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] mother by [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] side. She has offered advice and protection throughout [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] career and as [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] ascended the throne she remained one of his closest confidants and most influential advisors. The news of her untimely death is a heavy blow to our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] who has now lost a good friend, an advisor and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] mother all at once.
translation: 早在[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]还是帝国后宫的一个年轻的沙赫扎德（帝国王子）时，[Root.Monarch.GetName]就已经得到[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]妈妈站在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]这一边。她为[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的事业提供建议和保护，而当[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]继位之后她依旧是[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]最亲近的亲信之一，也是最有影响力的顾问之一。她最终去世的消息给[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]带来了很大打击，使其一次就失去了一个亲密的朋友、顾问以及[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]挚爱的母亲。

original: The Empire shall mourn her for three days.
translation: 帝国将为她默哀三日。

original: We must set aside lands for a charitable foundation in her memory!
translation: 我们必须划拨一些土地用于慈善事业来纪念她！

original: Endowment in Memory of the Valide Sultan
translation: 用以纪念苏丹皇太后的捐献

original: We have set aside the revenue from a number of sources in this province to support a Mosque and soup kitchen in the memory of our Imperial Mother the Valide Sultan.
translation: 我们已经划拨出这个省份的一些收入来支持一个清真寺和施舍处来纪念我们帝国的母亲苏丹皇太后。

original: Rites of Passage
translation: 成人仪式

original: Like the Sultans of old [Root.Heir.GetName] hopes to make a name for [Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself] as a conqueror and a [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] who will lead the Empire from the horseback. As [Root.Monarch.GetName] is still in good health, and as we have not allowed our heir to actually take to the field, the realization of this dream remain an uncertainty. It has come to the point that [Root.Heir.GetName] is being ridiculed by the other Sehzade and [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] mother is imploring [Root.Monarch.GetName] to give [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] a command of [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] own.\nThis is not an unreasonable request, though one must wonder about the motives of those that try to goad our favorite to risk [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] life and limb.
translation: 就像过去的苏丹们一样，[Root.Heir.GetName]希望为[Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself]获得一个征服者的称号，被人称为在马背上领导一个帝国的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。鉴于[Root.Monarch.GetName]仍然非常健康，以及我们不会让继承人真正上战场，这个梦想的实现只得留待未知。现在[Root.Heir.GetName]被其他王子嘲笑而[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]妈妈要求[Root.Monarch.GetName]给予[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]一支[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]自己的部队。\n这并不是一个不合理的要求，然而当有人试图拿我们宠爱的继承人和[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]生命与身体来冒险时我们必须要好好考量一下他们的动机。

original: This will do [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] good.
translation: 这对[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]有好处。

original: The Harem is much safer.
translation: 还是后宫里安全得多。

original: Treachery within the Family
translation: 家庭内的背叛

original: Word has reached us that the beloved and most favored of sons, [Root.Heir.GetName], is plotting against [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] father and aims to overthrow the state. Our trusted and closest consort, the Haseki Sultan, implores us to cut off this cancer from our body and have [Root.Heir.GetName] murdered.\nThere can be no doubt that the Haseki Sultan speaks out of her own interest in this matter, [Root.Heir.GetName] is no son of hers but his replacement is very likely to be. Our own ministers also speak of [Root.Heir.GetName]'s betrayal, however, and he could pose a very real threat.
translation: 有流言传到我们这里，说最受宠爱的儿子[Root.Heir.GetName]，正在谋划反叛[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]父亲并密谋颠覆国家。我们最受信任和最亲密的配偶，哈塞基苏丹（后宫配偶之首）请求我们将我们国家躯体上的这个肿瘤给切除，并诛杀[Root.Heir.GetName]。\n毫无疑问哈赛基苏丹在这件事上如此发言只是为了自己的利益，[Root.Heir.GetName]并不是她的儿子，但替代者很有可能是。我们的大臣也就[Root.Heir.GetName]的背叛发表了看法，然而认为他构成了一个真实的威胁。

original: [Root.Heir.GetName] must die...
translation: [Root.Heir.GetName]必须死！

original: Send assassins to kill §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§!.\nIf they fail this will provoke a revolt regardless of his guilt.
translation: 派遣刺客去刺杀§Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§!。\n如果他们失败的话会立刻引起一场叛乱，不管他是否有罪。

original: Summon [Root.Heir.GetName] to defend himself.
translation: 召见[Root.Heir.GetName]来为自己辩白

original: If the rumors are true this will give §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! time to assemble a bigger army.
translation: 如果流言是真的，这会给§Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§!时间来集结一支更大的军队。

original: I will not listen to such lies!
translation: 我不会听取这些谎言的！

original: §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! falls from grace.\nIf the rumors are true this will give §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! time to assemble a bigger army.
translation: §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!得到宽恕。\n如果流言是真的，这会给§Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§!时间来集结一支更大的军队。

original: [Root.Heir.GetName] is Innocent
translation: [Root.Heir.GetName]是清白的

original: Given time to present his case [Root.Heir.GetName] has fully convinced our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] of his innocence and will remain the most favored of our heirs. This entire ordeal has strengthened his standing at court and with the public in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 在给予时间辩白后，[Root.Heir.GetName]完全说服了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]相信他的清白，并仍旧保留我们最受宠爱的继承人的位置。这整个事件强化了他在后宫以及在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]公众心中的地位。

original: I'm not one to be fooled so easily.
translation: 我不是一个那么容易被愚弄的人。

original: The Plot of [Root.Heir.GetName]
translation: [Root.Heir.GetName]的阴谋

original: The time afforded by our indecisiveness was sufficient for [Root.Heir.GetName] to be able to assemble the rebel army he had intended. As the sun sets on the seventh day after his discovery an army is marching towards [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 由于我们的优柔寡断而浪费的时间给我们带来了报应，因为[Root.Heir.GetName]能够在这段时间了集结起他计划中的叛军。在他暴露后的第七日日出后，一支军队正在向[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]进军。

original: Yes son?
translation: 你在做什么我的儿子？

original: The Fate of a Vali Ahad
translation: 储君的命运

original: The assassins we sent to kill the Vali Ahad have returned after successfully completing their mission. We shall never know if he was guilty of treason or not.
translation: 我们送去刺杀储君的刺客成功完成任务返回了。我们将永远不会知道他是否犯下了反逆的罪行。

original: A great tragedy.
translation: 一场重大的悲剧。

original: The Fate of a Vali Ahad
translation: 储君的命运

original: The assassins we sent to kill the Vali Ahad failed to perform their mission. Our former heir has fled the capital together with a group of his closest supporters and now prepares to fight for their lives.
translation: 我们送去刺杀储君的刺客失败了。我们的前继承者和他的一群最亲近的支持者逃离了首都并准备为他们的生存而战。

original: A great tragedy.
translation: 一场重大的悲剧。

original: Prince-Governor on the Frontier
translation: 在前线的王子总督

original: True to our Turkic heritage we have allowed a number of the Sehzade to serve as governors of various provinces around our empire. The current war against the infidel [enemy_neighbor_ottomans.GetAdjective] has allowed the prince-governor of [ottoman_prince_here.GetName] to really prove his worth as a military commander and a Ghazi. According to reports he has gone to great lengths to defeat the enemy troops in his area, bringing the battle to the other side of the border. The faithful are flocking to his banners and the military elite and the Ulema has begun to take note and may well end up supporting him in a future succession struggle.
translation: 归结于我们的突厥遗产和传统，我们允许一些沙赫扎德（帝国王子）在帝国各地的不同省份当总督。最近对抗异教徒[enemy_neighbor_ottomans.GetAdjective]的战争使得王子总督[ottoman_prince_here.GetName]有机会真正证明自己作为一个军事指挥官和圣战士的价值。根据报告所述，他在他的地盘上竭尽全力打败了敌人部队，将战火烧到边境的敌人那一边。信众踊跃加入他的军队，而军队精英和乌理玛学者开始注意起他并可能在将来的继位斗争中支持他。

original: True to our Turkic heritage we have allowed a number of the Sehzade to serve as governors of various provinces around our empire. The current war against the [enemy_neighbor_ottomans.GetAdjective] has allowed the prince-governor of [ottoman_prince_here.GetName] to really prove his worth as a military commander. According to reports he has gone to great lengths to defeat the enemy troops in his area, bringing the battle to the other side of the border. Recruits are flocking to his banners and the military elite has begun to take note and may well end up supporting him in a future succession struggle.
translation: 归结于我们的突厥遗产和传统，我们允许一些沙赫扎德（帝国王子）在帝国各地的不同省份当总督。最近对抗异教徒[enemy_neighbor_ottomans.GetAdjective]的战争使得王子总督[ottoman_prince_here.GetName]有机会真正证明自己作为一个军事指挥官的价值。根据报告所述他在他的地盘上竭尽全力打败了敌人部队，将战火烧到边境的敌人那一边。征召的士兵踊跃加入他的军队，而军队精英开始注意起他并可能在将来的继位斗争中支持他。

original: He's proven himself worthy to be our new favorite.
translation: 他已经证明自己值得成为我们新的钦定继承人。

original: He's proven himself a true son of Osman.
translation: 他已经证明自己是一个真正的奥斯曼的儿子。

original: The standing of §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! is decreased slightly due to his opposition growing stronger.
translation: §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§!的地位轻微衰退了，由于他的对手变得更加强大。

original: Support of the Valide Sultan
translation: 苏丹皇太后的支持

original: Our naming of [Root.Heir.GetName] as the preferred heir and Vali Ahad has been about as popular as one could expect among the other Imperial princes and their mothers. Even so [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] ascension has been far less smooth than one could have hoped for, something many would blame our Haseki Sultan, [Root.Consort.GetName] for.\nHowever, determined to stop such destructive intrigue the Valide Sultan, mother of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] Imperial Highness [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] has stepped in to protect [Root.Heir.GetName].
translation: 我们钦定[Root.Heir.GetName]为最佳继位人选，皇储在所有帝国王子和他们的母亲之间是最受欢迎的那一个。即使如此[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]继位也也比任何人想象的来得艰难，许多人将这归咎于我们的哈塞基苏丹（后宫配偶之首），[Root.Consort.GetName]。\n然而，为了阻止这种破坏性的密谋，苏丹皇太后，[Root.Monarch.GetName]陛下的母亲，亲自站出来保护[Root.Heir.GetName]。

original: Thanks Mother!
translation: 感谢母亲！

original: Conflict between [Root.Consort.GetName] and the Valide Sultan
translation: [Root.Consort.GetName]和苏丹皇太后的冲突

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s most favored Consort, the Haseki Sultan, and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] mother, the Valide Sultan, are women of great influence and ambition. Both also control a faction of their own in the Imperial Harem and while they both claim to have the best interests of [Root.Monarch.GetName] at heart a clash of wills have always been inevitable. [Root.Consort.GetName] has been maneuvering to have one of her sons take [Root.Heir.GetName]'s place as heir, but the Valide Sultan will have none of it. Both women have invested considerable prestige in the conflict by now.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]最喜欢的配偶，哈塞基苏丹（后宫配偶之首），和[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的母亲，苏丹皇太后，都是具有野心和巨大影响力的女人。她们在帝国内廷里控制着各自的派系，都宣称一心为了[Root.Monarch.GetName]的利益行事，冲突总是无法避免。[Root.Consort.GetName]正试图使自己的一个儿子取代[Root.Heir.GetName]的位置成为继承人，而苏丹皇太后却反对这一点。到目前为止两位女性都在这场冲突中形成了巨大势力。

original: Side with the Sultan's mother.
translation: 站在苏丹皇太后这一边。

original: Siding with the Valide Sultan is expected of us and will give some prestige. §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! will be outmaneuvered, however, and a new consort will take her place as Haseki Sultan.
translation: 我们被期待站在苏丹皇太后这一边，这样会得到一些威望。§Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!将会被挫败而一个新的配偶将取代她的位置成为哈赛基苏丹。

original: Side with [Root.Consort.GetName].
translation: 站在[Root.Consort.GetName]这一边。

original: By going against the advice of the Valide Sultan, §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§! will lose her support.
translation: 由于反对苏丹皇太后的意见，§Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!将会失去她的支持。

original: Avoid taking sides.
translation: 避免站队。

original: The conflict will fester and weaken the claim of our current favorite heir.
translation: 冲突将恶化，并弱化我们当前最宠爱的继承人的宣称。

original: Ambitions of the Valide Sultan
translation: 苏丹皇太后的野心

original: As many of the Sultan's before [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has a very close bond with [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] mother. As it please God the Valide Sultan is a powerful ally, friend and confidant for our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and to reflect this she has been granted a most generous allowance. Money that apart from being used for her personal needs she has been putting to use for the betterment of the state. Our mother is not content with this, however, and has asked for an even more generous arrangement that would allow her to fund ambitious building projects in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] itself.
translation: 如同[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]之前的许多苏丹一样，[Root.Monarch.GetName]与[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]母亲有非常紧密的关系。蒙神的护佑，苏丹皇太后对我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]来说是一个强有力的盟友，也是一个朋友和一个知己，为了彰显这一点，她被赐予了许多最为慷慨的优待。她的金钱除了个人开支之外，还被她用于增进国家的福祉。然而我们的母亲却仍然不满足与此，并要求更加慷慨的安排，即允许她在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]当地投资大型的建设项目。

original: Anything for you.
translation: 悉听尊便。

original: She's doing great work but needs to know her limitations.
translation: 她正在干大事，但她必须知道自己的界限所在。

original: Architectural Funding from the Valide Sultan
translation: 苏丹皇太后的建设基金

original: The Valide Sultan has taken a special interest in the growth of this city as a metropolis worthy of our empire.
translation: 苏丹皇太后对这座城市的发展非常感兴趣，要将它打造成配得上帝国之名的大都会。

original: Influential Haseki Sultan
translation: 有影响力的哈赛基苏丹

original: [Root.Owner.Consort.GetName] has not only caught the heart of the [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] she is also a dynamic woman in her own right. Her constant work to strengthen [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName]'s realm is a boon both to [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHim] and [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHis] subjects.\nRecently a number of charitable projects funded by [Root.Owner.Consort.GetName] in [Root.GetName] and its surroundings has made the entire area blossom.
translation: [Root.Owner.Consort.GetName]不仅仅抓住了[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]的心，她对为自己掌控权利之事也十分热衷。 她为了强化[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName]的领地所做出的持续不断的努力给[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHim]和[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHis]的臣民都带来了好处。\n最近在[Root.GetName]和周边地区，由[Root.Owner.Consort.GetName]资助的慈善事业使整个地区繁荣起来。

original: Such a great woman.
translation: 一个如此伟大的女人。

original: Charitable work of The Haseki Sultan
translation: 哈赛基苏丹的慈善事业

original: The Haseki Sultan has spent a great deal on charitably projects in this region. Aqueducts, Mosques and Hospitals are being built and the poor are fed. The entire area is prospering as a result.
translation: 哈塞基苏丹（后宫配偶之首）在该地区的慈善项目上斥资巨甚。水渠，寺庙和医院逐渐建立，穷人得到救济。于是整个地区都日益繁荣。

original: [Root.Consort.GetName] Challenged
translation: [Root.Consort.GetName]被挑战

original: The Haseki Sultan is not only the favorite consort of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], she is also the mistress of the Imperial Harem and the most powerful woman in the Empire bar the Sultan Mother. Attaining and holding this position is the dream of every consort in the harem.\nIt should therefore come as no surprise that an ambitious and young woman has caught the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s eye...
translation: 哈塞基苏丹（后宫配偶之首）不仅仅是[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]唯一的挚爱，她同时也是帝国内廷的女主人和在苏丹皇太后以下帝国最具有权势的女人。获得并维持这个位置是内廷每一位配偶的梦想。\n因此一个野心勃勃而年轻的女人试图引起[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的瞩目这种事情并不令人惊讶……

original: We could never abandon [Root.Consort.GetName].
translation: 我们永远不能抛弃[Root.Consort.GetName]。

original: It's time dear.
translation: 是时候了亲爱的。

original: Competition for the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]
translation: 争夺[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的宠幸

original: As [Root.Monarch.GetName] has yet to name a favorite among his consorts every one of them is maneuvering to take their rightful place alongside the Sultan. The Imperial Harem is rife with intrigue and right now making a well informed choice for the position of Haseki Sultan, one of the highest honors imaginable in the empire would seem all but impossible. Luckily [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s mother has a firm grip on the politics of the Harem and has presented [Root.Monarch.GetName] with a consort she feels would be a good candidate.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]已经在他的配偶中指定了挚爱的那一位，而每个配偶都正在耍手段争抢苏丹身边的权位。帝国的后宫充斥着阴谋诡计，使得挑选出一位哈赛基苏丹（后宫配偶之首），亦即她们所能想象的最高荣誉显得几乎不可能实现。幸运的是[Root.Monarch.GetName]的母亲对后宫有着严格的掌控，并给[Root.Monarch.GetName]推荐了一个配偶，苏丹皇太后认为她能胜任。

original: Excellent!
translation: 棒极了！

original: I will make my own choices, mother...
translation: 我会做出自己的选择，母亲……

original: Let us keep our options open.
translation: 让我们保持自己的选择权。

original: [Root.GetName] and the Royal Princes
translation: [Root.GetName]和王子们

original: As is customary some of our provinces are governed by imperial princes so that they may learn what it is to be rulers one day. It is also understood that these provinces can serve as their base of power when the time comes to see to the succession. That struggle itself often gives ample opportunity to sort out the bad eggs.\nSometimes, however, the process can be even more hasty. It seems one of our Prince-Governor's has managed to actively destroy the resources under his control. If nothing is done soon revenue will be permanently reduced. Unfortunately, however, the Royal Prince, while not our favorite does have support from some influential groups in [Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName], if we are to withdraw his assignment there will be some backlash.
translation: 按照惯例我们的一些省份是由帝国王子们治理的，这样他们终有一天会学会如何做一名统治者。我们也明白这些省份会成为他们权势的根据地，尤其是继位的时刻到来之时。继位斗争本身也能创造很多机会来分辨出其中哪些是坏蛋。\n有时候这一过程会更加严酷。似乎我们的一位王子总督破坏了他治下的资源，如果不做些什么的话，会减少相当长时间的税收。不幸的是这个王子，虽然不是我们最宠爱的继承人，却在[Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]有一定影响力的一些团体支持，如果我们撤回对他的任命可能会引起一些反弹。

original: Replace him immediately
translation: 立即换掉他。

original: Find an excuse to call him back eventually.
translation: 还是找个借口把他召回来。

original: To Play the King
translation: 扮演国王的游戏

original: As the age of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] advances [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] sons grow impatient. Unfounded rumors are regularly circulating of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] failing health and the various factions of the court are aligning with the many would-be heirs among [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] sons. For one the distance in the supposed line of succession was enough to risk the uncertainty of the rumor mill. In [revolter_prince.GetName] one of [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s sons has taken up arms against [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim].
translation: 随着[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]年龄的增长[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]儿子们变得不耐烦了。经常有不知来源的关于[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]健康堪忧的流言四处传播，而宫廷内的各个派系都和[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]儿子们中可能成为继承者的家伙结盟。对于其中的人来说继承顺位表上的顺序足以使他甘冒流言不确定性的风险。[revolter_prince.GetName]，[Root.Monarch.GetName]儿子中的一个，就已经拿起武器反叛[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]。

original: Kill them all.
translation: 把他们全都杀了！

original: [Root.GetName] Prospers
translation: [Root.GetName]繁荣

original: The administration of [Root.GetName] was recently turned over to be administrated by one of our imperial princes. What we had not expected is that he would be able to do so much so quickly. The local economy is prospering and the urban centers are attracting more merchants and artisans to settle in them. Revenue seems to have been permanently improved.\nSome would consider this an auspicious sign, perhaps we should elevate this son to be our new favorite?
translation: [Root.GetName]的管理机构最近反而被我们的一个帝国王子管理了。我们没有预料到的是他能这么快地做到这么多事。地方经济正在繁荣增长而城市中心正吸引更多商人和艺术家来此地居住。税收看起来长久地增加了。\n一些人将此视为吉兆，也许我们应当将其提升为我们最宠爱的继承人？

original: This is just the man we're looking for.
translation: 他正是我们要找的那个人。

original: Let's not get ahead of ourselves.
translation: 别高兴得太早了。

original: This Prince's success lessens our favorite heir's claim to rule.
translation: 这个王子的成功降低了我们最宠爱的继承人继位的宣称。

original: Yemoja
translation: 叶玛亚

original: Yemoja, the Mother of Waters, is a powerful Orisha among the Yoruba people. We call upon her for the protection of women, for journeys at sea, and for good harvests.
translation: 叶玛亚，万水之母，约鲁巴人的奥里莎，司掌庇佑女性、航海和丰收。

original: Roog
translation: 罗格

original: Roog, the Creator, is the name and force of divinity for the Serer people. Through sacrifice to the ancestral spirits called Pangool we acknowledge the sanctity of our lives.
translation: 罗格，创世之神，塞雷尔人的神明。通过对先祖之灵潘古尔的献祭，我们知悉生命的神圣。

original: Nyame
translation: 尼阿美

original: Nyame, the Sky God, created the first humans, according to the Ashanti people. Nyame's children are Abosom, lesser gods and ancestors known to assist us humans on Earth - together we are one.
translation: 尼阿美，天空之神，据阿散蒂人的传说，其创造了第一个人类。他的孩子们叫阿波森，是半神和祖灵，以帮助地上的人类闻名——只要和睦共处，我们就是一体。

original: Cwezi
translation: 契韦齐

original: We cherish the traditions of the old Kitara empire. By keeping well with the spirits of nature and by cherishing our Kitara ancestors and the lineages that keep their shrines protected we can be sure to keep divine favor.
translation: 我们珍视古老的基塔拉帝国的传统。只要与自然的意志和谐相处，珍视基塔拉先祖和保卫圣地的家族，就一定能获得神的青睐。

original: Mlira
translation: 姆里拉

original: Through Oracles we can communicate with our dead ancestors and the spirits of nature. This way we can be sure that we honor those that came before us and acquire help to handle the hostile environment that surrounds us.
translation: 我们能通过神谕同我们已故的先祖和自然之灵进行交流。只有这样，我们才能敬畏那些比我们更早来到这片土地上的先驱者，并在危险环绕的大自然中获得帮助。

original: Mwari
translation: 姆瓦里

original: We honor the great god of Mwari who created this world from nothing and who makes mountains tremble when he speaks. Mwari is the only true god and his oracle and voice on this earth is our ruler.
translation: 我们崇拜神明姆瓦里，他从虚无中创造了这个世界，他说话时山摇地动。他是唯一真神，他的神谕指引着我们前进。

original: Enkai
translation: 恩凯

original: We follow Enkai, the Man in the Sky, who sent us his herd and made us the rightful owner of all the cattle in the world. As the ruler of the heavens he is also the one who blesses us with rain, or withholds it in his fury.
translation: 我们追随恩凯，天上之人，他送给我们牧群，并让我们成为世上所有牲畜的所有者。他是上天之主，雷霆雨露皆是恩赐。

original: Waaq
translation: 瓦坎

original: The great Waaq is the God of the Sky, supreme and all-powerful ruler of the Universe. His followers pray for peace and harmony, believing that balance in the world is vital to avoid disasters and misfortune.
translation: 伟大的天神瓦坎，宇宙至高无上的统治者。他的追随者为和平与和谐祈祷，相信平衡是避免世间灾难和不幸的关键。

original: Zanahary
translation: 扎卡里

original: Zanahary the Creator has a dual nature; both male and female, Light and Dark, Heaven and Earth. The Ancestors are the most important members of the community, as they stand in direct contact with the divine, while the living are merely a temporary extension.
translation: 创世者扎卡里是两面的神灵，雌雄同身，光暗同体，天地同形。祖灵是部落最重要的成员，因为亡者直接与神联接，而生命只是一种暂时的状态。

original: Christianity
translation: 基督教

original: We follow the ways of the god that put Jesus Christ on this earth to die for our sins.
translation: 我们遵循上帝的引导，耶稣基督因我们的罪而死。

original: Islam
translation: 伊斯兰教

original: We follow the ways of the great god revealed to the world by his prophet Mohammed.
translation: 我们遵循先知穆罕默德向世人展示的真主之道。

original: Buddhadharma
translation: 佛教

original: We follow the way of the great teacher Gautama Buddha who walked this earth many centuries ago. Through him we have learned about the four noble truths, of rebirth and the nature of this world.
translation: 我们追寻许多世纪前行走于世的伟大导师释伽牟尼的脚步。通过他我们明晓轮回、四谛和世界的本质。

original: Sanatana Dharma
translation: 恒法

original: We follow the ancient ways of the Hindu gods. From them we have learned about reincarnation and about how to efficiently organize society through castes.
translation: 我们遵循远古印度教神明的道路，从他们身上我们学到的什么是轮回转世，及如何通过种姓制度高效地组织社会。

original: Teotl
translation: 泰奥特尔

original: We have been taught the mystical ways of the Teotl gods from across the sea. Through sacrifices and carefully observing the skies we can influence life on this earth and avoid the end of civilization as we know it.
translation: 我们学会了海洋另一端的泰奥特尔神的道路。通过献祭和占星术，我们能够影响地球上的生命，避免文明的终结。

original: Freyja
translation: 芙蕾亚

original: We follow the beautiful lady Freyja, goddess of love, war and magic. Through her gift of seid magic we shall achieve glorious conquest!
translation: 我们追随美丽的女神芙蕾亚， 司掌爱、战争与魔法的女神。通过她恩赐的魔法，我们将实现伟大的征服！

original: Mazdayasna
translation: 祆教

original: We follow the teachings of the prophet Zoroaster and honor Ahura Mazda the wise. As please the gods we will forever keep the holy fires burning.
translation: 我们追随先知琐罗亚斯德，尊敬智者阿胡拉·马兹达。众神保佑圣火永远不灭。

original: Haymanot
translation: 海马诺特派

original: We believe in the One God and that we are the children of Abraham. Over the centuries we lost our ties to our Jewish roots, but we are now embracing their traditions once again.
translation: 我们信奉唯一的真神，我们是亚伯拉罕的儿女。几个世纪以来，我们失去了与犹太血统的羁绊，但我们现在再次拥抱犹太传统。

original: Embracing a Cult
translation: 接受新崇拜

original: By choosing to embrace this cult we are accepting its traditions and agree to follow the demands this places upon our ruler.
translation: 选择新崇拜意味着我们接受该教派的传统，并同意其教义凌驾于统治者之上。

original: No Cult Selected
translation: 未选择崇拜

original: No Current Cult
translation: 暂无崇拜

original: Your religion allows you to select which cult to follow. Each cult will come with its own effects and last until your monarch changes.
translation: 你的信仰允许你选择追随崇拜的流派，每个崇拜都有独特的效果，并持续到君主轮替。

original: Select Cult
translation: 选择崇拜

original: Pick $CULTNAME$
translation: 信奉$CULTNAME$

original: Is following $CULTNAME|Y$
translation: 正在信奉$CULTNAME|Y$

original: Is NOT following $CULTNAME|Y$
translation: 不再信奉$CULTNAME|Y$

original: Has unlocked $CULTNAME|Y$
translation: 已解锁$CULTNAME|Y$

original: Has NOT unlocked $CULTNAME|Y$
translation: 未解锁$CULTNAME|Y$

original: Change Cult to $CULTNAME|Y$
translation: 将崇拜转变成$CULTNAME|Y$

original: Unlock Cult $CULTNAME|Y$
translation: 解锁崇拜$CULTNAME|Y$

original: The Elders of Yoruba
translation: 约鲁巴人的长老

original: Our warriors have been intrigued by the people of this region and their deep spirituality - the elders here speak of inner balance, respecting the Earth, and to seek transcendence. A key element in their belief seems to be in the Orishas, which are spirits or manifestations of something akin to divinity, ever present in the daily life of their followers. There is also speak of 'Atunwa', reincarnation within the family, and the ceremonies surrounding the stages of life are held in high reverence.\n\nSome of the lost souls in our armies have begun to meditate and seek comfort in one of the most revered Orisha - 'Yemoja', the Mother of Waters.
translation: 我们的战士被这个地区的人们和他们深层的灵性所吸引——这里的长老谈到内心的平衡，尊重土地，寻求超越。他们的信仰的核心似乎被称为奥里莎，是某种接近神的东西的精神或现象，总是出现在信仰者的日常生活中。也有“转生”的说法，是一种在家族内的轮回，围绕生命各个阶段的仪式充满了敬畏感。\n\n我们的军队中一些迷失了灵魂的人已经开始思考并向一个最受尊敬的奥里莎——水的母亲叶玛亚寻求安慰。

original: Interesting.
translation: 真有趣。

original: The Watchful Pangool
translation: 监察者潘古尔

original: We have come across a people who worship the heavenly god of 'Roog', the Master of the World. They say Roog is the beginning and the end of all things, so sacred that the followers are not even permitted to craft images depicting the omnipresent god. Nor do they speak directly to this Creator in their prayers, or when asking for divine favor. Instead they turn their efforts to ancient spirits called the Pangool, the mediators between worlds. Some of these Pangool are said to be the spirits of a person's ancestors and to be accepted by them when one dies is what allows one to pass into 'Jaaniiw', the nocturnal realm and sacred dwelling of the soul. \n\nSome of our warriors are fascinated by the myths of these people - to make sure they won't end up as lost wanderers between realms they have turned to, as local tradition begs, leaving offerings at the feet of tall trees in honor of the Pangool.
translation: 我们遇到了一个民族，他们崇拜天神——世界的主人“罗格”。他们说，“罗格”是一切的开端，也是一切的终结；“罗格”是如此的神圣，信徒们甚至不被允许用画像描绘这位无所不在的神灵。他们也不在祷告中直接对造物主倾诉衷肠，更不祈求神的眷顾。然而，他们在一种古老的精神中寄托自我，其名曰：潘古尔——世界仲裁者。信徒们认为，部分“潘古尔”是祖先的灵魂升华而来，被他们接纳的亡者将会进入“贾里维”——夜之结界和灵魂的神圣居所。\n\n我们的一些战士着迷于这些人的神话——为了确保他们最终不会成为迷失灵魂的羔羊，他们改变了自己的信仰，按当地风俗在巨树脚下摆上祭品祭祀“潘古尔”。

original: Fascinating!
translation: 真令人着迷!

original: The Children of the Architect
translation: 造物主之子

original: ‘If I call one, I call all', a worshiper can be overheard. They are often found praying by the rivers and streams of the area, the believers in Nyame, the Sky Father. They believe in the soul of animals and plants, in 'Abosom', lesser spirits encircling our plane of existence, and they communicate with their ancestors through ornate ritual.\n\nMost of all, this society appears to consist of a people of strong community. When recounting the deeds of their ancestors they sometimes speak of themselves as one - some of our scholars attribute this oddity to mistranslation, while others argue that these followers see themselves as something larger than one, as part of a common spirit, especially within one's own family. ‘They are like a two-headed crocodile, with one stomach - they do not fight one another for food', our advisors suggest.
translation: 「我是一，也是万」，信徒们会无意被他人听到这样说。尼阿美的信徒经常在河流和溪流边向天父祈祷，他们笃信动植物拥有灵魂，也笃信低等神明“阿波森”在我们所存在的维度中无处不在，并通过华丽的仪式与祖先交流。\n\n最重要的是，他们的社会似乎是由一群拥有坚定集体意识的人组成的。当他们述说祖先的事迹时，有时会说他们是一个整体——我们的一些学者把这种古怪的行为误译了；而另一些人则认为，这些人认为自己大于一，是一个精神共同体的一部分，而且这种观念在他们的家庭中尤其突出。我们的顾问这么说：「它们就像是一条共享同一个胃的双头鳄鱼——不为食物而争斗」。

original: Intriguing.
translation: 真有趣。

original: The Future of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的未来

original: In preparation of battles to come, the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] recently went to see [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] Babalawo. The father of mysteries possesses wisdom of the Orunmila and any insight into the destiny of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 'Ori', is always welcome. The diviner left [Root.Monarch.GetName] confused however, as [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] was told that [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] heir [Root.Heir.GetName] somehow will bring [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] a premature death. A battle? Poison? An accident? \n\n'Which will it be?' the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] demanded to know, but the signs were not clear - dealing with the matter is now a choice of the utmost delicacy.
translation: 为了即将到来的战斗做准备，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 最近求见了 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 芭芭拉沃。 掌握神秘的祭司拥有神明的智慧和洞察[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的命运——亦即[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] “奥里”——的能力，因此总是受欢迎的。然而预言使 [Root.Monarch.GetName] 感到困惑， [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] 被告知 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 继承人 [Root.Heir.GetName] 在某种程度上会使[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 过早的死亡。一场战斗？毒药？或是一场意外事故？\n\n“那会是什么？” [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 想要知道真相，但是预言却模糊不清—— 处理这件事实在不得不小心谨慎。

original: In preparation of battles to come, the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] recently went to see [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] seer. The mysterious elder possesses great wisdom and any insight into the destiny of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is always welcome. The diviner left [Root.Monarch.GetName] confused however, as [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] was told that [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] heir [Root.Heir.GetName] somehow will bring [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] a premature death. A battle? Poison? An accident? \n\n'Which will it be?' the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] demanded to know, but the signs were not clear - dealing with the matter is now a choice of utmost delicacy.
translation: 为了即将到来的战斗做准备， [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 最近求见了 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 先知。这位神秘的长者拥有伟大的智慧和洞察[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]命运的能力。预知总是受欢迎的。然而预言使 [Root.Monarch.GetName] 感到困惑， [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]被告知 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]继承人[Root.Heir.GetName] 在某种程度上会使[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 过早的死亡。一场战斗？毒药？或是一场意外事故？\n\n“那会是什么？” [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 想要知道真相，但是预言却模糊不清—— 处理这件事实在不得不小心谨慎。

original: Have the heir taken care of.
translation: 处理继承人。

original: Warriors will be impressed by this decisiveness.
translation: 战士们对这个果断的决定印象深刻。

original: [Root.Heir.GetName] is but a child. This is nonsense.
translation: [Root.Heir.GetName] 只不过是个孩子。这是胡说。

original: People will be unimpressed by the indifference displayed by their ruler.
translation: 人民对其统治者的漠不关心不以为然。

original: Have the heir [Root.Heir.GetName] taken care of.
translation: 处理掉继承人 [Root.Heir.GetName] 。

original: This is nonsense.
translation: 这是无稽之谈。

original: The Road from [nonchalant_neighbor.Capital.GetCapitalName]
translation: 通向[nonchalant_neighbor.Capital.GetCapitalName]的道路

original: A cousin of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has passed away. The letter sent to us describes how a bandit ambush fell upon the entourage of the traveling statesmen and how they were all forced off a cliff on their way home from a visit in [nonchalant_neighbor.Capital.GetCapitalName], in our neighboring nation of [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName]. The few possessions that could be retrieved have been sent to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName], but the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] is distraught by the death of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] favorite relative. To make matters worse, the letter from [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName] says nothing about whether a proper funeral ceremony has been considered or not.\n\nDo they wish us ill with this Oku igbe, a bush death, for the kin of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]?
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的一个表姐已经去世。寄给我们的信里描述了一伙强盗是如何在路边伏击旅行中的这位官员的情形，以及她是如何在访问我们邻国[nonchalant_neighbor.GetName]的首都，[nonchalant_neighbor.Capital.GetCapitalName]的途中被迫跳下悬崖的。可以找到的少数财产已被送到 [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]， 但是 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 对[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 最喜欢的亲戚死亡感到抓狂。 更糟的是，这封来自 [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName] 的信没有提及是否举行了适当的葬礼仪式。\n\n难道他们希望我们因为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的亲戚突如其来的死亡而感到不悦？

original: A cousin of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has passed away. The letter sent to us describes how a bandit ambush fell upon the entourage of the traveling statesmen and how they were all forced off a cliff on their way home from a visit in [nonchalant_neighbor.Capital.GetCapitalName], in our neighboring nation of [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName]. The few possessions that could be retrieved have been sent to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName], but the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] is distraught by the death of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] favorite relative. To make matters worse, the letter from [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName] says nothing about whether a proper funeral ceremony has been considered or not.\n\nThe dear cousin will soon be reborn, either into the visible or the invisible world, but the thought of the good woman not receiving the correct funeral rites torments the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] who is left alone, pondering [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] mortality.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的一个表姐已经去世。寄给我们的信里描述了一伙强盗是如何在路边伏击旅行中的这位官员的情形，以及她是如何在访问我们邻国[nonchalant_neighbor.GetName]的首都，[nonchalant_neighbor.Capital.GetCapitalName]的途中被迫跳下悬崖的。可以找到的少数财产已被送到 [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]， 但是 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 对[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]最喜欢的亲戚死亡感到抓狂。更糟的是，这封来自 [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName] 的信没有提及是否举行了适当的葬礼仪式。\n\n这位亲爱的表亲很快就会重生，无论是进入可见的还是不可见的世界。然而，好女人不能举行适当的葬礼仪式的念头折磨着[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] ，他被遗留下来思考[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 必死的命运。

original: A cousin of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has passed away. The letter sent to us describes how a bandit ambush fell upon the entourage of the traveling statesmen and how they were all forced off a cliff on their way home from a visit in [nonchalant_neighbor.Capital.GetCapitalName], in our neighboring nation of [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName]. The few possessions that could be retrieved have been sent to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName], but the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] is distraught by the death of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] favorite relative. To make matters worse, the letter from [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName] says nothing about whether a proper funeral ceremony has been considered or not.\n\nThe dear cousin, having passed through from the veil of the living, is closer to Nyame now. Yet the thought of the good woman not receiving the correct funeral rites torments the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的一个表姐已经去世。寄给我们的信里描述了一伙强盗是如何在路边伏击旅行中的这位官员的情形，以及她是如何在访问我们邻国[nonchalant_neighbor.GetName]的首都，[nonchalant_neighbor.Capital.GetCapitalName]的途中被迫跳下悬崖的。可以找到的少数财产已被送到 [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]， 但是 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 对[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 最喜欢的亲戚的死亡感到抓狂。更糟的是，这封来自 [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName] 的信没有提及是否举行了适当的葬礼仪式。\n\n亲爱的表姐已经从生命的迷雾中穿过，现在更接近了尼阿美 。然而，好女人不能举行适当的葬礼仪式的思想折磨着[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 。

original: We must retrieve the body and see to the rites.
translation: 我们必须迎回尸体并举行葬礼。

original: We send our thanks, hire men to venture into [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName], and pay for the ceremonies required ourselves. May [Root.GetCult] give the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] strength.
translation: 我们表示感谢，雇人冒险前往[nonchalant_neighbor.GetName]，为我们要求举行的仪式付钱。也许 [Root.GetCult] 给了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 力量。

original: This mockery of our faith will not stand.
translation: 这种对我们信仰的嘲弄是不可忍受的。

original: The rulers of [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName] will receive an angry letter.
translation: [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName] 的统治者将收到一封充满愤怒的信。

original: These are tough times for all of us.
translation: 对我们所有人来说，这都是艰难的时刻。

original: We let it go. [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName] will receive a letter with our thanks for informing us of the events.
translation: 放下这件事吧。 [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName] 将收到一封信，为其通知我们而致谢。

original: The Anger of the [From.Monarch.GetTitle]
translation: [From.Monarch.GetTitle]的怒火

original: We have received a belligerent letter from our neighboring nation of [From.GetName], apparently in response to some of our diplomats informing the [From.Monarch.GetTitle] of a tragic bandit attack involving [From.GetAdjective] statesmen. It would seem that one of the victims of the calamity was a relative of the [From.Monarch.GetTitle] and [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] is outraged that the information relayed neglected any mention of the sacred rites to be issued for [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] kin.\n\nThe worship of [From.GetCult] requires more than our ambassadors assumed.
translation: 我们收到了邻国[From.GetName]的谴责文书，显然是回应我们的一些外交官已经提醒[From.Monarch.GetTitle]的一场涉及[From.GetAdjective] 官员的不幸的强盗袭击。看来这场灾难的受害者之一是[From.Monarch.GetTitle] 的亲戚，并且 [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] 控诉，我们的去信中未提及应为[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]亲戚举行的神圣葬礼。\n\n[From.GetCult] 崇拜的要求超出我们的使节所预想的。

original: Our neighbors in [From.GetName] have sent us a hostile warning in response to some information we relayed to them recently regarding a bandit attack on some [From.GetAdjective] statesmen. The root of the ill feelings appears to stem from something about funeral rites not being properly performed, or possibly the retrieval of the bodies not being seen to? It's hard to tell from the messy jumble of insults that makes up the letter. The worship of [From.GetCult] is apparently rather complicated...?
translation: 我们的邻国[From.GetName]对我们发出了一个充满敌意的警告，回应我们告诉他们的最近有强盗袭击一些[From.GetAdjective] 官员的消息 。 这种负面情绪的根源似乎源于葬礼仪式没有适当地举行，或者可能是没有找到消失的尸体？很难分辨是什么乱七八糟的侮辱构成了这封信。[From.GetCult] 的崇拜显然相当复杂……

original: It is of no concern to us.
translation: 我们不关心这个。

original: Fellow children of [From.GetCult] or not, we can't be bothered with every small thing in this world.
translation: 无论我们是否是[From.GetCult] 之子，我们都不能为这个世界上的每一件小事而烦恼。

original: It is of no concern to us.
translation: 我们不关心这个。

original: The children of [From.GetCult] aren't that different from us, but we cannot cater to their every whim.
translation: [From.GetCult] 之子们与我们没什么不同，但我们不能迎合他们的每一个念头。

original: There's no pleasing some people.
translation: 这可能会使一些人不开心。

original: The Pool Becomes a River
translation: 化池为河

original:
[Root.Monarch.GetName] has been more at peace since the funeral of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] cousin was seen to. The ceremony was even attended by diplomats from [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName]. Relieved by the knowledge that [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] relative is safe in the arms of the Goddess Yemoja, the songs still echo in the mind of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].

‘But when you see a Kob antelope on the way to the farm,
When you see the Kob antelope on the way to the river –
Leave your arrows in the quiver,
And let the dead depart in peace.'
translation:
自从亲眼目睹[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]表亲的葬礼以来，[Root.Monarch.GetName] 感觉比以往更平静了。 [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName]的外交官甚至参加了葬礼仪式。在得知[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]亲戚已经安全地回归女神叶玛亚的怀抱后，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]得到了宽慰，然而葬礼的哀乐仍然在他的脑海中回荡。

「当你看到水羚去向旷野
当你看到水羚去向河流
把你的箭放在箭袋里
让死者归于宁静」

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been more at peace since the funeral of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] cousin was seen to. The ceremony was even attended by diplomats from [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName] and the knowledge that the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s relative has moved safely onto the next stage of her journey to the shadow world brings the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] great comfort.\n\n‘You will be remembered for generations, my friend', [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] says, before turning to smile at the Sky God.
translation: 自从亲眼目睹[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]表亲的葬礼以来，[Root.Monarch.GetName]感觉比以往更平静了。[nonchalant_neighbor.GetName]的外交官甚至参加了葬礼仪式。在得知[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]亲戚已经安全地走向他在冥界的下一段人生旅程后，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]得到了宽慰。\n\n「你将被世世代代铭记，我的朋友。」，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] 说，随后向天空之神微笑。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been more at peace since the funeral of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] cousin was seen to. The elaborate ceremony was even attended by diplomats from [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName]. The knowledge that the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s relative received all the rituals required to maintain balance with the spirits has brought the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] great comfort.\n\nIn the evening a light breeze runs through [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s chambers, making [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] smile - the Sky God has many ways of making their presence known. 'Then we are still together', [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] says, before drifting off to sleep.
translation: 自从亲眼目睹[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]表亲的葬礼以来，[Root.Monarch.GetName] 觉比以往更平静了。 [nonchalant_neighbor.GetName]的外交官甚至参加了葬礼仪式。在得知[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的亲戚接受了所有使精神保持平衡所必需的仪式后，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]得到了极大的宽慰。\n\n傍晚微风穿过 [Root.Monarch.GetName]的卧室，使[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]微笑——天空之神有许多方式来使他们的存在被世人得知。“今后我们仍然同在”， [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] 在入睡前说。

original: Blessed be the departed.
translation: 愿逝者安息。

original: All owned Fetishist provinces get '§YSerenity of Faith§!' for five years, giving the following effects:\nMorale of Armies: §G+15.0%§!\nRecruitment Time: §G-20.0%§!
translation: 所有拜物教信仰的省份五年内获得「§Y信仰的宁静§!」，获得以下效果：\n军队士气： §G+15.0%§!\n招募时间： §G-20.0%§!

original: The Sons of Nyame
translation: 尼阿美之子

original: The people of [tormented_province.GetName] find themselves in a state of confusion after one of their most valued members of society has fallen ill. Confined to her bed, one influential village elder has not stirred from slumber in over a week. Our advisors suggest that we encourage the locals to prayer, but to whom should the lost souls be turning to? On the one hand we have Tano, the river god and son of Nyame, said to race to your side against Death in the final hours of your life. On the other hand, Anansi the Trickster could perhaps be convinced to lend his aid as well, in exchange for something valuable?
translation: [tormented_province.GetName]的人民发现，在他们一位最重要的的社会成员病后，他们处于一种混乱的状态。一位影响巨大的村庄长老已经卧病在床超过一个星期了。我们的顾问建议我们鼓励当地人祈祷，但是那些迷失的灵魂应该向谁求助呢？一方面，尼阿美之子——河神塔诺，据说可以在你生命的最后时刻与死亡对抗；另一方面，似乎可以说服诡道者阿纳西赐予这位长者援助，但需要高价值的东西来交换。

original: They should turn to Tano, the river deity.
translation: 他们应该求助河神塔诺。

original: There is no guarantee that praying will have any effect.\n
translation: 不能保证祈祷会有任何效果。\n

original: They should turn to Anansi the Trickster.
translation: 他们应该求助诡道者阿纳西。

original: The people might at least feel better from having performed all the sacrifices they could.\n
translation: 人民可能至少感觉好一些，因为他们已经尽可能地献上祭品了。\n

original: The Slithering Pangool
translation: 蛇行的潘古尔

original: A rumor from [heathen_province.GetName] tells of a giant snake moving into a tree, right in the middle of a village square. While the locals were alarmed at first, the animal has made no attempt to hurt anyone, and has instead gained some social status among the inhabitants, who have begun calling it by pet names... Finally, a wise woman from the area has declared the snake sacred, saying the creature is for certain a spirit taken serpent form, which has encouraged people to bring it sacrifice and food.
translation: [heathen_province.GetName]的流言说在村子广场的正中央有一条巨蛇在树上移动。当地人起初很惊慌，但它并没有试图伤害任何人，反而在居民中获得了一些社会地位，他们已经开始用宠物的名字来称呼它……最后，一位来自该地区的聪慧的女人宣称这条蛇是神圣的，她说这只动物肯定是一条以蛇为形态的神灵，鼓励人们给它带去祭祀和食物。

original: The Pangool is here to aid us.
translation: 潘古尔是来帮助我们的。

original: Ok.
translation: 好的。

original: Ok.
translation: 好的。

original: The Will of Tano
translation: 塔诺的意志

original: A village elder has recovered miraculously from what seemed like a fatal illness. The event has reinvigorated warriors in the province.
translation: 一个村里的老人从致命的疾病中奇迹般地康复了。这件事让这个省份的战士又振作了起来。

original: The Whim of Anansi
translation: 阿纳西的心血来潮

original: A village elder recovered miraculously from what seemed like a fatal illness. The event has reinvigorated workers in the province.
translation: 一个村里的老人从致命的疾病中奇迹般地康复了。这件事让这个省份的工人又振作了起来。

original: Serenity of Faith
translation: 信仰的宁静

original: The ruler of this land is a strong believer, inspiring their people to greatness.
translation: 这片土地的统治者是坚定的信徒，激励他们的人民走向伟大。

original: Decisive Ruler
translation: 果断的统治者

original: The people are impressed by their ruler's devotion to the traditional beliefs.
translation: 统治者对传统信仰的忠诚给人民留下了深刻的印象。

original: Nonchalant Ruler
translation: 漠不关心的统治者

original: The people are unimpressed by their ruler's disinterest towards the traditional beliefs.
translation: 统治者对传统信仰的漠不关心没能给人民留下深刻的印象。

original: Presence of the Ancestors
translation: 祖先显灵

original: The people here have witnessed what they interpret to be a sign from the Pangool.
translation: 这里的人们亲眼目睹了据他们所说的潘古尔的神迹

original: The Cwezi Heroes of Kitara
translation: 基塔拉的契韦齐英雄

original: There was a time when the Cwezi ruled these lands, as their Empire, Kitara, encompassed all that is known to men. In our travels we have come across an increasing number of peoples that claim to be the heirs of Kitara cherishing these heroes of old. The spirits still exist in the world around us, in nature and in our minds and some can communicate with the Cwezi through oracles and diviners. In their lands we have come across groups of wandering priestesses who have the power to channel these spirits and through them disease, infertility and misfortune can be mitigated. There are those who devote their entire lives to these lost ancestors and their sanctuaries. All worldly authority must flow from ties to the past and no one can be fit to rule without a direct link to the Cwezi spirits.
translation: 曾几何时契韦齐人统治着这片土地，他们的帝国基塔拉，完成了所有人所能知的事业。在我们的旅途中，我们遇到了越来越多自称是基塔拉的继承人，怀有这些古代英雄的遗产。在这个世界上仍有许多神灵存在于我们周围，存在于大自然中和我们的心灵之中。而其中一些神灵可以通过神谕和占卜者与契韦齐人进行交流。在他们的土地上我们遇到有能力与神灵沟通的一群流浪女祭司。她们中有些人把一生都奉献给逝去的先祖和她们的圣所。所有世俗的权威都应遵循来自过去的引导，而没有与契韦齐人的神灵相联的人不适合来领导人民。

original: Interesting.
translation: 有趣。

original: The Cult of Mlira
translation: 姆里拉崇拜

original: We have come across a people that venerate and worship their own ancestors as gods. Through powerful oracles they can constantly keep in touch with their predecessors and by ensuring their graves and shrines are in good order they can be ensured the ancestors themselves have the power to carry on protecting them.
translation: 我们遇到一群人，他们将自己的祖先当做神来尊敬和崇拜。虽然通过强大的神谕，他保持与他们的祖先交流，但只有维护他们祖先的坟墓和祭所保持良好状态，他们的祖先才有力量来保护他们。

original: I want to learn more...
translation: 我想了解更多...

original: The Supreme Creator
translation: 至高的造物主

original: 'Once there was nothing, then Mwari created the world and brought man out of a hole in the ground. Mwari created the mountains and Mwari can make them tremble with his voice. Mwari lit the fires known to men and Mwari causes the rain to fall. Mwari is the father and the mother of humankind and will guard us in adversity.'\nWe have come across an increasing number of followers of Mwari recently. They all have in common that they refuse to acknowledge any other spiritual power than their one god and while they speak freely and gladly of his existence they guard the secrets of the cult itself carefully.
translation: 「世上本无一物，姆瓦里创造了这个世界，把人从地上的洞中带出来。姆瓦里创造了山，他的声音可以让山颤抖。姆瓦里造出了火和雨。姆瓦里是人类的父母，会在逆境中保护我们。」\n我们最近发现了越来越多的姆瓦里的追随者。他们都拒绝承认除他们唯一的神之外有任何其他的神力。虽然他们畅所欲言，高兴祂的存在，但是他们也小心地守护着这个宗教自身的秘密。

original: Nyadenga - Musikavanahu - Muvambapasi
translation: 天堂、造人者与造物者

original: The Voice of our Ancestors
translation: 我们先祖的声音

original: The Royal Oracle has come bearing good news. After completing the grand ceremonial dance required to contact our most revered ancestors to consult them about the coming year it seems we are in for a bright future. Details are hard to come by through the shroud of death but this can only mean good things.
translation: 王家先知带来了好消息。在为了联系我们最尊敬的祖先，向他们咨询来年的情况而举行的盛大的礼仪舞蹈完成后，兆示的结果似乎预示着我们光明的未来。透过亡者的帷幕很难为我们提供更多细节，但这只可能意味着好事。

original: We shall undoubtedly reap the rewards for years to come.
translation: 未来的岁月里，我们无疑会收获回报。

original: This proves our close ties to those that came before us.
translation: 这证明了我们与逝者有着紧密的联系。

original: Ancestral Support
translation: 祖先的支持

original: A series of favorable omens are helping keep things calm in our realm. Our close ties with our ancestors have allowed our society to remain stable and thriving.
translation: 一系列祥兆有助于保持国内的平稳。我们与祖先的紧密联系使我们的社会保持稳定和繁荣。

original: Caring for Those That Came Before Us
translation: 照料先逝之人

original: The care of our ancestral shrines remains a constant challenge to our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. It has been suggested that the best way to handle this would be to appoint one of our most loyal ministers to be the permanent care-taker of the shrines, with an associated budget. As long as our finances could support it this would have few drawbacks, at least as long as we have someone we can trust to do it...
translation: 照料先祖的圣坛对我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]来说仍然是一个持续的挑战。有人建议，最好的办法是任命我们最忠诚的大臣成为圣坛的长期照看者，并给出一笔相关的预算。只要我们的财政能够支持，这将没有什么阻碍，只要我们有一个可以信任的人去做这份工作…

original: I know just the right person for this!
translation: 我正知道一个合适的人选！

original: I wouldn't trust anyone but myself.
translation: 除了我自己，我不会相信任何人。

original: Caretaker of the Ancestral Shrines
translation: 先祖圣坛的照料者

original: We have employed a group of permanent bureaucrats to oversee the care of our ancestral shrines. These officials are primarily in charge of the day-to-day affairs of keeping the shrines themselves but to a certain extent they are also expected by some to speak for our ancestors.
translation: 我们长期雇用了一群官僚来照料我们祖先的圣坛。这些官员主要负责维护圣坛本身的日常事务，但在某种程度上，也有一些人希望他们成为我们的祖先的代言人。

original: Ruler Questioned
translation: 被质疑的统治者

original: Appointing someone to be the head of our ancestral shrines has generally been a successful move. The shrines themselves are in good order and our official has also become so closely associated with these spirits that he has been able to create a new set of ceremonies for their worship, in close cooperation with the oracles. Indeed he is now expected to speak for them himself in some regards.\nHowever, it seems our care-taker has started to value his loyalty to the ancestors above that to his [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. He has lately been lobbying for an increase in the budget to keep our holy shrines. It is hard to see a reason to go against the ancestors on this but it is unfortunate that someone feels he can speak for them against us...
translation: 指定一个人成为管理我们祖先的圣坛的负责人总体上看起来是个正确的选择。圣坛本身被维护得很好，我们的官员也和祖灵紧密地联系在一起，他创造了一套新的和神谕密切相关的仪式来表达其崇拜。自然，有人希望他能在某些方面成为我们祖先的代言人。\n然而，似乎我们的圣坛照料者已经把他对祖先的忠诚置于对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的忠诚之上。他最近一直在游说以增加维持圣坛的预算。很难找出什么理由在这个问题上站到祖先的对立面，但不幸的是，有人觉得他能为其说话以反对我们…

original: Agree to increase the shrine budget.
translation: 同意增加神社预算。

original: It's time we take the power over our ancestors back!
translation: 该是我们把祖先的力量还给我们的时候了！

original: Favor of $RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$
translation: 崇奉 $RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$

original: Sometimes the deeds performed in a lifetime are of such caliber that everyone can see what awaits. Diviners agree that $RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$ was of such high caliber that [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is an insufficient title and that we should rather speak of a god or deity. Our people speak of $RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$ with veneration and have already begun to worship their lost [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and those who channel this spirit.
translation: 有时候，一个人一生中所达成的事业是如此的卓越，以至于每个人都知晓其伟业与前程。占卜者们认为 $RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$ 做出了如此卓越的成就以至于[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 都是个不足够荣耀的头衔，我们应该称其为神灵或神祇。我们的人民说起$RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$ 时带着崇敬，并且已经开始崇拜他们的逝去的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，以及那些能连通这个灵魂的人。

original: Praise be $RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$!
translation: 赞美 $RANDOM_OLD_MONARCH$！

original: Mwari, the one god
translation: 姆瓦里，唯一的神

original: While we have accepted the nature of Mwari as our sole creator and the origin of all power it seems not all of our subjects are as convinced of his greatness. In [Root.GetName] widespread veneration of their own ancient local spirits has become too sincere for the sensibilities of our priests.
translation: 虽然我们接受了姆瓦里为我们的唯一创造者和所有力量的来源，但似乎不是我们所有的臣民都相信他的伟大。[Root.GetName]对自己当地古代神灵的普遍崇敬已经触及我们祭司敏感的神经。

original: We must show them the way.
translation: 我们必须给他们指出正确的方向。

original: We can be a bit lenient for now.
translation: 我们现在可以稍微宽容一点了。

original: He is the owner of the land!
translation: 他是这块土地的主人！

original: Religious Leniency
translation: 宗教宽容

original: We have chosen to be pragmatic and allowed some deviation from the state religion in this province.
translation: 我们选择了务实的态度，允许这个省稍稍偏离国教。

original: Enforced Mwari Orthodoxy
translation: 强制推行姆瓦里正统信仰

original: By acting in force against any who would challenge Mwari's position as the one good we have imposed a strict rule and control over this province.
translation: 对任何挑战姆瓦里唯一的神的地位的人采取强力行动，我们对这个省实行了严格的管理和控制。

original: Forced Conversion of Heathens
translation: 强迫异教徒改教

original: We have embarked on a project of conversions in this province to make the unbelievers see the true light of Mwari's greatness.
translation: 我们已经开始着手让这个省份的人改教，让这些不信神者看到姆瓦里的真正的伟大之光。

original: Mwari and the Mhondoro Spirits
translation: 姆瓦里和姆虹多罗神灵

original: While Mwari is the creator of all, and the origin of all power he has a number of subordinate spirits that help him control the world. Similarly a great ruler must rely on subordinate chiefs to run the day-to-day business of the various villages of the realm. As long as we lead a life in accordance with the will of Mwari we can also be sure of the support of the Mhondoro spirits. It therefore comes as no surprise that the diviners of [Root.GetName] have reprimanded the local chiefs and strengthened our hold on the region.
translation: 姆瓦里是一切的造物主，是一切力量的来源，但他也有很多下属的神灵，帮助他控制世界。同样地，一个伟大的统治者必须依靠他的下属来管理领地内各个村庄的日常事务。只要我们秉承姆瓦里的意志生活，我们也一定能得到姆虹多罗诸神灵的支持。 因此，[Root.GetName]的占卜者斥责了地方酋长而加强了我们对该地区的控制也就不足为奇了。

original: He is the owner of the skies!
translation: 他是上天之主！

original: Wrath of Mwari
translation: 姆瓦里的愤怒

original: In the recent upheaval in [wrath_of_mwari.GetName] local chiefs under our command have seen fit to punish captured enemy leaders by execution. In doing so, however, they did not consult the diviners of Mwari and have broken a number of his rules. While it is clear to most that these men acted without our official sanction the fact that neither we nor the spirits of Mwari could control them has created a widespread unrest. Especially as locals are claiming that Mwari himself has spoken to show his great dissatisfaction with the way things have transpired.
translation: 在最近于[wrath_of_mwari.GetName]发生的动乱中，地方酋长在我们的命令下已经接受用处决的方式来惩处被俘的敌军领导人。但是在这样行动时，他们没有征询姆瓦里的占卜者们，打破了他的一些规矩。由于民众清楚这些人是没有在官方准许下行动，而我们和姆瓦里神灵无法控制这些人的事实已经引发了广泛的动荡。尤其是本地人宣称，姆瓦里亲口表明祂对事情进展的方式极度不满。

original: We will try to do better.
translation: 我们会尽力做得更好。

original: The faith of [Root.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]的信仰

original: The local chief of [Root.GetName] is loudly protesting the policies of our [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] as he claims we are ignoring the voice of Mwari and his deputies. The chief on the other hand claims to have had a close liaison with the local diviners and their Mhondoro spirit. As unlikely as it sounds others have begun to join him in protest and it seems but a matter of time before an open revolt is upon us.
translation: [Root.GetName]的地方酋长大声抗议我们[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]的政策。他声称我们无视姆瓦里和他的代言人的声音。另一方面，地方酋长声称他与当地的占卜者和姆虹多罗诸神灵有紧密联系。虽然听起来不太可能，但其他人也开始加入他的抗议，看起来他公开反叛只是时间问题。

original: We will have to show them the error of their ways.
translation: 我们必须让他们知道错误。

original: Royal Fires
translation: 皇家圣火

original: A realm such as ours relies on a certain amount of delegation. Fortunately our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is an excellent judge of character and we also have Mwari and his deputies to help us select and control our realm.\nEven so it is customary for the various chiefs of the realm to come to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] to report and make a show of their loyalty once per year. In a grand ceremony the chiefs are expected to relight their royal fires and bring them back to their province as a sign of their ties to us and to Mwari. It is therefore with great irritation that we note that some of our chiefs this year have neglected to come, instead sending feeble excuses about distance.
translation: 像我们这样的国家依赖一定程度的委任进行统治。幸运的是我们的 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]是优秀的法官，并且我们有姆瓦里神和他的代言人愿意帮我们控制我们的王国。\n即便如此，王国的酋长们也要按惯例每年一次来到[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]述职并表现他们的忠诚。在一个盛大的仪式里，酋长们希望重新点燃他们的皇家之火，并将其带回他们的省份，做为他们联结于我们的标志。我们注意到，今年我们的一些酋长没有来，取而代之的是关于路途遥远的借口，这使我们非常恼怒。

original: We can afford to let them opt out.
translation: 我们支付得起他们前来的路费。

original: If we allow this, more will follow.
translation: 如果我们这样做，将会有更多的酋长前来追随。

original: Decay of Authority
translation: 权力衰退

original: We have turned a blind eye to distant chiefs not traveling to our capital to renew their pledge to serve and renew their royal fires.
translation: 我们对那些不到我们首都重新宣誓和点燃皇家圣火的远方酋长视而不见。

original: Forced Centralization
translation: 强制集权

original: We have forced all cheifs in the realm to adhere to the traditional rules of chiefdom, to travel to our capital regularly to reignite the royal fires of Mwari.
translation: 我们强制国内所有酋长坚持酋邦的传统规则，惯常地到我们的首都重燃姆瓦里皇家之火。

original: Plight of [Root.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]的困境

original: Our people in [Root.GetName] are concerned that the Cwezi spirits are upset with their conduct in the area. According to popular belief there's been a sharp decline in the number of pregnancies and an increase in birth complications which is being attributed to the recent neglect of a minor shrine in [Root.GetCapitalName].
translation: 我们在[Root.GetName]的人民担心契韦齐神灵对他们在该地的行为感到愤慨。据群众所信，怀孕人数的急剧下降和出生并发症的增加，是由于最近忽视了在[Root.GetCapitalName]的一个圣所。

original: There is nothing we can do.
translation: 我们什么也做不了。

original: We must enlist the help of the Cwezi priestesses.
translation: 我们必须争取契韦齐女祭司的帮助。

original: By empowering the Cwezi priestesses and enlisting them to consult with the spirits and perform the ritual of initiation on local women we stand a good chance to avert a local disaster.
translation: 通过授权契韦齐女祭司与神灵协商，并为当地妇女举行繁衍仪式，我们有机会避免地方上的灾难。

original: We must offer [Root.Owner.Consort.GetName] to the Cwezi Spirit.
translation: 我们必须将[Root.Owner.Consort.GetName]献给契韦齐神灵

original: As the spouse of the Cwezi Spirit [Root.Owner.Consort.GetName] will be able to act on our behalf and stop this. She will, however, be unable to serve as the queen of our country ever after.
translation: 作为契韦齐神灵的配偶，[Root.Owner.Consort.GetName]将能够为我们行动并停止灾难。然而，她以后再也不能当我们国家的王后了。

original: Support of the Spirits
translation: 祖灵护佑

original: The Cwezi ancestors have answered our pleas for help and it is widely accepted that the area around [Root.GetName] no longer suffers from the horrible infertility curse that once afflicted it.
translation: 契韦齐的先祖回应了我们对庇佑的恳求。我们已经通过大量的消息源得到了确认，[Root.GetName]周围的区域已经不再遭受一度肆虐的可怕不育诅咒。

original: We have successfully averted the pending disaster in [Root.GetName].
translation: 我们已成功地避免了在[Root.GetName]发生的灾难。

original: Spiritual Abandonment
translation: 被祖灵所弃

original: The Cwezi spirits remain unimpressed by our efforts to enlist their help against the horrible fertility plague that has hit [Root.GetName]. Our people are fleeing the area hoping to avoid the horrible curse that according to the widespread belief would make them unable to bear children.
translation: 我们祈求契韦齐的祖灵相助以对抗肆虐[Root.GetName]的孕产瘟疫，但却始终未能得到任何回应。我们的人民正在逃离这一地区，希望能够躲避这个可怕的诅咒——大家都相信这个诅咒会使人无法生育。

original: We have been tried and found wanting.
translation: 我们作出了尝试，但神灵并不满意。

original: Declining Fertility
translation: 生育率下降

original: A marked decline in births in this area indicates that the spirits are upset with us. As a result a large number of our inhabitants here are moving on to other parts of the country hoping to avoid their anger.
translation: 这一地区的出生率显著下滑了，这表明祖灵对我们感到不满。因此，这里的许多居民都搬到了国内的其他地方，希望借此躲避祖灵的迁怒。

original: Itinerant Sorceress
translation: 流浪的女巫

original: A group of priestesses led by a powerful sorceress has arrived in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] seeking our hospitality. Through the secret ways of spirit possession they can parlay directly with the great Cwezi spirits of old. Refusing their request for hospitality is not really an option - the kind of support we give to this group will likely influence the kind of support we can expect for our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 在一名强大女巫的率领下，一群女祭司抵达了[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]并寻求我们的款待。通过神秘的灵附法术，她们能够与强大的契韦齐古灵同调。拒绝招待她们可不是什么好主意——我们给予这个女巫团体什么样的款待，会影响我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]将得到的帮助。

original: We can only offer meager accommodations but expect little in return.
translation: 我们只能提供简陋的膳宿，也不求太多回报。

original: Let us remind our people of our close ties to Kitara.
translation: 我们要提醒民众，我们与基塔拉有着紧密的联系。

original: Offer healing and consolation to all those who need it in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]为所有需要的人提供治疗和慰藉。

original: Bad Omen
translation: 不好的预兆

original: The diviners of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] are having visions of impending destruction. They assure us that the Cwezi spirits of old Kitara will do what they can to protect us but we can be sure that dire times are ahead.
translation: [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的占卜者看到了正在迫近的灭顶之灾。他们向我们保证，古老基塔拉的契韦齐祖灵会尽其所能保护我们，但我们也要明白苦难的时日已近在眼前。

original: Dark words...
translation: 黑暗的话语……

original: The diviners will stand between us and the heroes of old.
translation: 占卜者会成为我们和古老英灵间的联系。

original: Spirit Shrine
translation: 祖灵圣坛

original: The representative of one of the largest shrines in our country has sought an audience with our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] asking us to fund an extension and acquire more priests for the Cwezi spirit that resides there. According to the custodian this shrine, while not neglected, is not fit to house our great ancestors and they have let us know that we cannot expect great things as long as we don't do something about this.\nThis would be a worrying thing in itself but it also seems a local demagogue has latched on to this. With [Root.Monarch.GetName] being so vilified by local clergy it's hard not to suspect the two of cooperating.
translation: 我国最大圣坛之一的代表希望觐见[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，请求我们资助扩建工程，并雇用更多的祭司以侍奉居住在那里的契韦齐祖灵。据圣坛的主事说，这里虽然得到了一些重视，但还不够格供奉我们的伟大祖先。他们告知我们，如果不进行一些改善的话，就不要指望这座圣坛能起到什么作用。\n这件事本身很值得担忧，一些当地的煽动者更是添油加醋，借题发挥。鉴于[Root.Monarch.GetName]遭到了那些神职人员的如此中伤，很难再期待双方能进行什么合作。

original: We will give the priestess free hands.
translation: 我们将授予女祭司自由处理此事的权力。

original: I refuse to be manipulated!
translation: 我拒绝被操纵！

original: Shrine with Privileges
translation: 拥有特权的圣坛

original: We have granted a significant number of privileges to the influential Spirit Shrine in this province.
translation: 我们将大量的特权授予了这个省份内一个有影响力的祖灵圣坛。

original: Local Demagogue
translation: 蛊惑民心的本地政客

original: A local Demagogue is trying to incite the population of this province against us.
translation: 一名当地政客正试图煽动本省人民反对我们。

original: The People of Enkai
translation: 恩凯的子民

original: We have come across a tribe who fervently worships a deity whom they call 'Enkai', the Man in the Sky. They seem to place a tremendous importance on cattle and every man counts his wealth in cows, bulls and calves. One cowherd we met told us about the legend of Enkai and the gift he sent to their people. \n\nThe story goes that Enkai was once a human and that his herd contained all the cattle in the world. When the sky was torn from the earth, he sent his herd back down to his people along a bark rope. A tribe of jealous hunters who coveted the meat cut the rope and now the cattle is the only remaining link to Enkai. These people claim to be Enkai's chosen ones and thus all the cattle under the skies belong to them.
translation: 我们遇到了一个部落，他们狂热地崇拜一位神明，称其为恩凯，意即“天上之人”。他们似乎极其重视牛，每个人都用母牛、公牛和牛犊作为单位来计算自己的财富。我们见到了一名牧牛人，他给我们讲了关于恩凯和他的恩赐物的传说。\n\n故事中说恩凯曾是一个人类，他牧养了世上所有的牛。当天空与大地被剥离开时，他顺着一根树皮绳把牛群赶回了他的族人那里。一队贪婪的猎人垂涎这群牛，于是割断了绳子。现在牛是恩凯与世间仅存的联系了。这些人自称为被恩凯选中的子民，因此普天之下所有的牛都归他们所有。

original: We will seek out more knowledge of Enkai and his blessings.
translation: 我们会探求更多关于恩凯和他的恩赐的知识。

original: God of the Sky
translation: 天神

original: Lately we have encountered people who fervently worship 'Waaq', whom they claim to be the supreme and all-powerful ruler of the Universe. If their words are to be believed, he created the world and resides in the Heavens from where he watches over us all. Mankind is subject to his will and must always worship and fear him. \n\nThe follows of Waaq pray for peace and harmony above all other things. They believe that the world balances atop the horns of a great bull. Standing in front of him, tied to a pole, is a cow. The equilibrium of the Universe is tied to the love between the bull and the cow. Should she turn away from him, the bull would become anxious and thus the world would shift. This could lead to all manners of disasters on Earth. However as long as we pray and offer gifts to the great Waaq, we shall be safe. At least that is what these people claim.
translation: 最近我们遇到了一群狂热地崇拜“瓦坎”的人。他们称“瓦坎”是至高无上的，全能的宇宙之主。据那些人所说，他创造了世界，然后居住在天上，并从那里俯视着我们所有的人。人类受制于他的意志，必须始终崇拜和敬畏他。\n\n“瓦坎”的信徒们祈祷和平与和谐高于一切其他的事物。他们相信世界在一头巨大公牛的角上保持着平衡。而在公牛的面前，一头母牛被绑在一根柱子上，宇宙的平衡就维系于公牛母牛间的爱情之上。如果母牛离公牛而去，他就会变得焦虑，世界也会因此而不稳。这可能导致各种灾难降临人间。不过只要我们向伟大的瓦坎祈祷并献上贡品，我们就是安全的。至少这些人是这样声称的。

original: Teach us more about the mighty Waaq.
translation: 教导我们更多关于强大的瓦坎的事。

original: The Divided God
translation: 一分为二的神明

original: As we expand our horizons and encounter new communities we learn of other deities and ways of life. Recently words have reached us of the god 'Zanahary'. He is the Creator of the Universe, split in two - he is both male and female, Light and Dark, Heaven and Earth. The heavenly Zanahary breathes life into the clay bodies shaped by the earthly Zanahary, thus creating humans. When the two sides of Zanahary argue, the breath is withdrawn from the body, resulting in mortality and death.\n\nThe followers of Zanahary do not seem to be all that worried by this, however. They tell us that life is only a temporary state and that the dead are the most important members of the community. The ancestors, or 'razana', are described as gods on earth and act as a mediator between the living and Zanahary.
translation: 当我们拓展所知的世界，与新的部族不期而遇时，也知晓了其他的神灵和生活方式。最近我们听说了神明“扎卡里”。他是宇宙的创造者，是位一体两面的神灵——既是男的也是女的，既是光明也是黑暗，既在天上也在地上。天上的扎卡里把生命之气吹入地上的扎卡里所塑的泥人身体里，从而创造了人类。当两个扎卡里争执时，生命之气从人体内被抽出，导致人的死亡。\n\n但是，扎卡里的追随者似乎并不怎么担心这个。他们告诉我们，生命只是一个暂时的状态，死者才是部族中最重要的成员。祖先，或称“拉扎那”，被视作人间的神灵，是介于生者和扎卡里之间的中间形态。

original: Intriguing! We must learn more about Zanahary and the razana.
translation: 引人入胜！我们必须了解更多关于扎卡里和拉扎那的事。

original: Praying for Rain
translation: 祈雨

original: The wet season is approaching and we have received words from the province of [rain_province.GetName], asking for our assistance. Working the lands is essential to the local economy of [rain_province.GetName], as well as that of surrounding areas, however, they have not been blessed with sufficient rainfall during the last few years. Surely the farmers are already praying to Waaq for a fertile fields and a bountiful harvest, however, the local Wadaad priests believe an organized celebration would prove more effective. They are stressing how vital this year's harvest will be for the future prosperity of the region.
translation: 雨季将至，我们收到了来自[rain_province.GetName]的求助。土地耕作对于[rain_province.GetName]及其周边地区的经济至关重要，但过去几年，那里并未得到充沛雨水的垂青。当然，农民们已经向瓦坎祈祷以求获得肥沃的土地和丰饶的收获，但是当地的瓦达教士相信有组织的庆祝活动更有效。他们强调今年的收成对该地区未来的繁荣至关重要。

original: The wet season is approaching and we have received words from the province of [rain_province.GetName], asking for our assistance. Working the lands is essential to the local economy of [rain_province.GetName] as well as that of surrounding areas, but during the last few years, they have not been blessed with sufficient rainfall. Surely the farmers are already praying to Yemoja, the goddess of fertility, for a bountiful harvest. However, the local elders believe an organized celebration would prove more effective. They are stressing how vital this year's harvest will be for the future prosperity of the region.
translation: 雨季将至，我们收到了来自[rain_province.GetName]的求助。土地耕作对于[rain_province.GetName]及其周边地区的经济至关重要，但过去几年，那里并未得到充沛雨水的垂青。当然，农民们已经向叶玛亚即丰饶女神祈祷以求获得丰收，但是当地的长老们相信有组织的庆祝活动更有效。他们强调今年的收成对该地区未来的繁荣至关重要。

original: We shall help organize a great celebration in Waaq's honor.
translation: 我们应帮忙组织一场以瓦坎之名举办的盛大庆典。

original: Assist the priests of [rain_province.GetName]. A drought would have a significant negative impact on the productivity in the area while good rains would help it prosper. However there are no guarantees that Waaq will listen.
translation: 帮助[rain_province.GetName]的教士。一场旱灾将对该地区的生产力产生严重的负面影响，而好的降雨将有助于它的繁荣。不过，没人能保证瓦坎会听我们的。

original: We shall organize a great celebration in honor of the Lady of the Rain.
