translation: 我们应以雨之女神之名组织一场盛大的庆典。

original: Assist the elders of [rain_province.GetName]. A drought would have a significant negative impact on the productivity in the area while good rains would help it prosper. However there are no guarantees that Yemoja will listen.
translation: 帮助[rain_province.GetName]的长老。一场干旱将对该地区的生产力产生重大的负面影响，而好的降雨将有助于它的繁荣。不过，没人能保证叶玛亚会听我们的。

original: If those godless farmers starve they only have themselves to blame!
translation: 如果那些不信神的农夫挨了饿，那只能怪他们自己！

original: Do not assist the priests of [rain_province.GetName], risking another year of insufficient rains. A drought would have a significant negative impact on the productivity in the area.
translation: 不要帮助[rain_province.GetName]的教士，即使这可能会导致下一年降雨不足。干旱将对该地区的生产力产生严重的负面影响。

original: The Year of Great Rains
translation: 大雨之年

original: Merciful Waaq be praised, our prayers have been answered! The rain is falling steadily over [rain_province.GetName] and the surrounding area. It seems as if our efforts have paid off. It has been many years since the people of the area received this amount of precipitation and still there is no end in sight. Heavy clouds, pregnant with Waaq's blessings, cover the sky from horizon to horizon. The people are celebrating the Barwaqoo, or God's Rain, and preparing for the harvest of a lifetime.
translation: 歌颂仁慈的瓦坎，我们的祈祷灵验了！[rain_province.GetName]和周边地区正在持续降雨，看来我们的努力已得到回报。这个地区的人民已经很多年没有见到过这么多的降水了，但大雨看起来依旧没有停止的意思。厚厚的云层满怀着瓦坎的祝福，从地平线的这头覆盖到了另一头。人们都在庆祝巴瓦库，即上帝的雨，并期冀着永远的丰收。

original: Merciful Waaq be praised! The rain is falling steadily over [rain_province.GetName] and the surrounding area. It seems as if the farmers' prayers were sufficient, despite what the priests said. It has been many years since they have received this amount of precipitation and still there is no end in sight. Heavy clouds, pregnant with Waaq's blessings, cover the sky from horizon to horizon. The people are celebrating the Barwaqoo, or God's Rain, and preparing for the harvest of a lifetime.
translation: 歌颂仁慈的瓦坎！[rain_province.GetName]和周边地区正在持续降雨。不管教士们怎么说，总之，看起来是农民们的祈祷起了作用。这个地区的人民已经很多年没有见到过这么多的降水了，但大雨看起来依旧没有停止的意思。厚厚的云层满怀着瓦坎的祝福，从地平线的这头覆盖到了另一头。人们都在庆祝巴瓦库，即上帝的雨，并期冀着永远的丰收。

original: Merciful Lady be praised, our prayers have been answered! The rain is falling steadily over [rain_province.GetName] and the surrounding area. It seems as if our efforts have paid off. It has been many years since the people of the area have received this amount of precipitation and still there is no end in sight. Heavy clouds, pregnant with Yemoja's blessings, cover the sky from horizon to horizon. The people are celebrating the Lady's rain and preparing for the harvest of a lifetime.
translation: 歌颂仁慈的女神，我们的祈祷灵验了！[rain_province.GetName]和周边地区正在持续降雨，看来我们的努力已得到回报。这个地区的人民已经很多年没有见到过这么多的降水了，但大雨看起来依旧没有停止的意思。厚厚的云层满怀着叶玛亚的祝福，从地平线的这头覆盖到了另一头。人们都在庆祝女神的雨，并期冀着永远的丰收。

original: Merciful Lady be praised! The rain is falling steadily over [rain_province.GetName] and the surrounding area. It seems as if the farmers' prayers were sufficient, despite what the elders said. It has been many years since they have received this amount of precipitation and still there is no end in sight. Heavy clouds, pregnant with Yemoja's blessings, cover the sky from horizon to horizon. The people are celebrating the Lady's rain and preparing for the harvest of a lifetime.
translation: 歌颂仁慈的女神！[rain_province.GetName]和周边地区正在持续降雨。不管长老们怎么说，总之，看起来是农民们的祈祷起了作用。这个地区的人民已经很多年没有见到过这么多的降水了，但大雨看起来依旧没有停止的意思。厚厚的云层满怀着叶玛亚的祝福，从地平线的这头覆盖到了地平线另一头。人们都在庆祝女神的雨，并期冀着永远的丰收。

original: We give thanks to the Sky Father for our prosperity!
translation: 感谢天父赐予我们的繁盛！

original: We give thanks to the Lady of the Rain for our prosperity!
translation: 感谢雨之女神赐予我们的繁盛！

original: The Indifference of God
translation: 神明的冷漠

original: We tried our hardest, yet sometimes that is not enough. Our prayers have fallen on deaf ears and our offerings have been rejected. While the rains in [rain_province.GetName] and the surrounding area have been disappointing during the last few years, at least there was some rain. Now there is nothing. The sun glares down on us from a pale, clear sky, scorching the earth and everything brave enough to grow. The people of [rain_province.GetName] have some lean years ahead...
translation: 我们尽了最大的努力，但有时这是不够的。神明无视我们的祈祷，拒绝了我们的祭品。[rain_province.GetName]及周边地区在过去几年里的降雨固然令人失望，但至少还是有一些雨水的。然而现在却什么都没有了。天空苍白晴朗，阳光灼烧着地面以及所有勇敢成长的作物。[rain_province.GetName]的人们接下来几年会不好过……

original: It seems as if the people of [rain_province.GetName] did not manage to appease Waaq. It does not matter if their prayers were not heartfelt or their offerings poor – we will all have to pay for their failure. While the rains in [rain_province.GetName] and the surrounding area have been disappointing during the last few years, at least there was some rain. Now there is nothing. The sun glares down on us from a pale, clear sky, scorching the earth and everything brave enough to grow. The people of [rain_province.GetName] have some lean years ahead...
translation: 看起来[rain_province.GetName]的人们没有使瓦坎满足。无论是祈祷不够真诚还是祭品不够多，现在都不重要了——我们所有人都要为他们的失败而负责。[rain_province.GetName]及周边地区在过去几年里的降雨固然令人失望，但至少还是有一些雨水的。然而现在却什么也没有了。天空苍白晴朗，阳光灼烧着地面以及所有勇敢成长的作物。[rain_province.GetName]的人们接下来几年会不好过……

original: We tried our hardest, yet sometimes that is not enough. Our prayers have fallen on deaf ears and our offerings have been rejected. While the rains in [rain_province.GetName] and the surrounding area have been disappointing during the last few years, at least there was some rain. Now there is nothing. The sun glares down on us from a pale, clear sky, scorching the earth and everything brave enough to grow. The people of [rain_province.GetName] have some lean years ahead...
translation: 我们尽了最大的努力，但有时这是不够的。神明无视我们的祈祷，拒绝了我们的祭品。[rain_province.GetName]及周边地区在过去几年里的降雨固然令人失望，但至少还是有一些雨水的。然而现在却什么都没有了。天空苍白晴朗，阳光灼烧着地面以及所有勇敢成长的作物。[rain_province.GetName]的人们接下来几年会不好过……

original: It seems as if the people of [rain_province.GetName] did not manage to appease Yemoja. It does not matter if their prayers were not heartfelt or their offerings poor – we will all have to pay for their failure. While the rains in [rain_province.GetName] and the surrounding area have been disappointing during the last few years, at least there was rain. Now there is nothing. The sun glares down on us from a pale, clear sky, scorching the earth and everything brave enough to grow. The people of [rain_province.GetName] have some lean years ahead...
translation: 看起来[rain_province.GetName]的人们没有使叶玛亚满足。无论是祈祷不够真诚还是祭品不够多，现在都不重要了——我们所有人都要为他们的失败而负责。[rain_province.GetName]及周边地区在过去几年里的降雨固然令人失望，但至少还是有一些雨水的。然而现在却什么也没有了。天空苍白晴朗，阳光灼烧着地面以及所有勇敢成长的作物。[rain_province.GetName]的人们接下来几年会不好过……

original: Waaq can be a harsh master.
translation: 瓦坎是位严厉的上主。

original: The Mother of Waters can be a harsh mistress.
translation: 水之母是位严厉的上主。

original: Rains of Fertility
translation: 丰收之雨

original: Plentiful rain has resulted in one of the most bountiful harvests in living memory. The area will be prosperous for years to come.
translation: 丰沛的雨水是人们关于最美妙的丰收的生活记忆之一。今后几年这个地区会很繁荣。

original: Barren Lands
translation: 荒芜之地

original: After having suffered a period of severe drought the fields of these lands have been left dry and barren.
translation: 在经历了一段严重干旱的时期之后，这些土地的田地已经干涸贫瘠。

original: Ancestral Tomb
translation: 祖茔

original: The ancestral lands of our ruler are located in this province. The great tombs are of significant religious importance to our nation.
translation: 我们统治者的先祖故土位于这个省份，在此营建祖茔对我们的国家有重要作用。

original: Grand Ancestral Tomb
translation: 巨大祖茔

original: The ancestral lands of our ruler are located in this province. The newly restored tombs are among the nation's most impressive buildings and are of great religious importance to our people.
translation: 我们统治者的祖地就在这个省份，在此修一个的巨大的祖坟对我们的国家有极其重要作用。

original: Crumbling Ancestral Tomb
translation: 祖坟崩摧

original: The ancestral lands of our ruler are located in this province. The once-grand tombs have shamefully been left to deteriorate.
translation: 我们统治者的先祖故土位于这个省份，但最近祖坟却发生了崩塌。谁料昔日繁华，今朝变作泥土。

original: The Next Generation
translation: 下一世代

original: The time has come for another age-set of boys to undergo the rite of 'Emuratare', finally becoming men and warriors. With adulthood comes the responsibility of protecting our people and territory. For ten years they will reside together in the 'Emanyatta', a warrior village, during which they live to serve the nation.\n\nWith this influx to our country's army we also have the opportunity of shaping a new generation of warriors. What should the focus of their education be?
translation: 是时候了，男孩将进行割礼，最终成为真正的男人。他们成年了，同时承担起保护我们的人民和领土的责任。在接下来的十年中，他们将一起住在村塞里，那是一个战士村庄，并在那里为国家服务。\n\n他们将不断进入我国的军队，这同时也是塑造新一代战士的机会。他们的教育重点应该是什么？

original: They shall fight like lions, bold and ferocious!
translation: 他们将像勇猛如狮！

original: We will teach them discipline and how to work together, like a colony of ants!
translation: 他们将团结如蚁！

original: Bold Warriors
translation: 勇敢的战士

original: The current age-set of warriors have been trained to be bold and ferocious like lions.
translation: 这一代的武士已经被训练得犹如勇猛的狮子。

original: Disciplined Warriors
translation: 纪律严明的战士

original: The current age-set of warriors have been trained to be disciplined and tenacious like army ants.
translation: 这一代的武士已经被训练得纪律严明，犹如团结的蚂蚁。

original: The Wrath of Enkai
translation: 恩凯之怒

original: Most of the time, Enkai is a benevolent and just god. We call him 'Enkai Naibor', God is Black, as he makes dark clouds heavy with rain. However, when we look up at the sky today, this not what we see. Instead the sky is red and dry. During times like these we give him another name 'Enkai Nanyokie', God is Red.\n\nThe drought has struck our people hard. It is getting increasingly hard to find water in some areas and there is barely anything left to eat for our herds. The situation has gotten especially troublesome in the area surrounding the [drought_province.GetName] province. A local 'oloiboni', a spiritual leader, has suggested that every cattle owner should sacrifice eight bulls to appease the great Enkai. While we believe him to be right, forcing such a decree would certainly upset our people.
translation: 大多数时候，恩凯是仁义的神。我们叫他“恩凯·奈孛”——黑色之神，因为他制造乌云。然而，当我们仰望天空的时候，这不是我们看到的。相反，天空是红色和干燥的。在这样的时代，我们给他一个名字“恩凯·纳约克”——红色之神。\n\n干旱摧垮了我们的努力。在一些地区，越来越难找到水，我们的牧群几乎没有什么可吃的了。形势变得尤其麻烦，在[drought_province.GetName]周边地区，一个当地的“典礼司仪”，我们灵性的领导者，建议每个牛主人应该牺牲八头公牛来安抚恩凯。虽然我们相信他是对的，但强制执行这样的法令肯定会使我们的人民感到不安。

original: If we do not sacrifice the cattle, they will perish from the drought anyway.
translation: 如果我们不献祭这些牲畜，它们仍旧会在干旱中死去。

original: Order the people of [drought_province.GetName] and the surrounding area to sacrifice a portion of their cattle in an attempt to stop the drought and bring forth rain. There are no guarantees that Enkai will be appeased, however.
translation: 命令[drought_province.GetName]和周边地的人区献祭他们一部分的牛，来了阻止干旱带来的雨。然而，恩凯不一定会满意。

original: This is too much to ask. Our people have suffered enough.
translation: 够了，我们的人民已经忍受了足够的痛苦。

original: Do not order the sacrifice, risking Enkai's continued wrath.
translation: 就算冒着继续惹怒恩凯的风险，也不要命令人们献祭牲畜。

original: God Is Black
translation: 黑色之神

original: All praise Enkai Naibor, our benevolent Lord! Yet again the skies are dark with heavy clouds! It has not rained for many days, but even so, everything is different. That which was dry and red is now wet and green. No longer will our children thirst or our cattle starve. We are truly blessed.
translation: 赞美恩凯·奈孛，我们的仁慈的主！天空又乌云密布，乌云密布！已经好几天没下雨了，但现在一切都不一样了。那又干又红的土地，现在又湿又绿。我们的孩子不再渴了，我们的牲口也不饿了。我们被神眷顾。

original: We can always put our trust in Enkai.
translation: 我们可以一直信任恩凯。

original: God Is Red
translation: 红色之神

original: We shed the blood of thousands of bulls upon the scorched earth, and yet we have not had a drop of rain. The skies are as crimson as the ground, heaven and earth mirroring Enkai Nanyokie's anger. By listening to the oloiboni of [drought_province.GetName] we made the situation even worse. The blood and meat we left for the scavengers could have saved many lives, lives which have now been snuffed out under a relentless sun.
translation: 我们在烧焦的土地上洒下了成千上万头公牛的血，然而我们还没有下过一滴雨。天空和地面一样的深红色，天地显示着恩凯·纳约克的愤怒。我们听信了[drought_province.GetName]的“典礼司仪”的话，而情况变得更糟了。那些我们献祭掉的牲畜本可以救跟多如今在干旱中挣扎的人。

original: May Enkai be merciful!
translation: 望恩凯仁慈！

original: The drought in [drought_province.GetName] and the surrounding area continues, despite the sacrifice.
translation: 尽管举行了大型的祭祀，[drought_province.GetName]及周边的干旱在持续。

original: God Is Black
translation: 神的怜悯

original: Enkai Naibor has filled the clouds with rain, which in turn has brought prosperity back to the province.
translation: 恩凯使乌云里充满雨水,即将为这个省份带来繁荣兴旺.

original: God Is Red
translation: 神的惩罚

original: Enkai Nanyokie is withholding rain from his followers, leaving this province dry and barren. People and cattle alike are perishing under a scorching sun.
translation: 恩凯拒绝为信徒们降雨,让这个省份在干旱和贫瘠中自生自灭.人畜在炎炎烈日下都难逃厄运.

original: Forced Sacrifice
translation: 强迫献祭

original: The people of this province have been forced to sacrifice a portion of their herds. Cattle are their most valued resource and they are not at all happy about this, no matter the outcome.
translation: 家畜作为当地人民最珍贵的资源,一部分却被强制上交用来献祭.不论结局怎样,这样的做法让人民一点都不愉快.

original: Land of the Ancestors
translation: 先祖的土地

original: For the great Zanahary a man's lifetime is over in the blink of an eye. The dead, however, are eternal. Our revered ancestors act as intermediaries between God and the living. We must seek their council and keep them happy in order for our community to thrive.\n\nTo commune with them, we must visit the 'tanindrazana', the land of the ancestors. While our own dwellings are usually humble, the dead reside in great burial tombs. One day we shall join them, but for now our biggest responsibility is to serve our ancestors by maintaining their homes and doing their bidding.
translation: 对于伟大的扎卡里来说一个人的一生在一眨眼间就结束了。然而死亡却是永恒的。我们尊敬的祖先则是在神与生灵之间充当中介。我们必须寻求他们的建议并愉悦他们以使我们的部族能够生存下去。\n\n为了和他们沟通，我们必须参访“塔尼拉查拿”，亦即先祖的土地。虽然我们自己的住宅通常都很简陋，但死者却居住在很大的墓地中。总有一天我们会加入他们的行列，但现在我们最大的职责就是服务于我们的祖先，维护他们的住所，满足他们的要求。

original: We shall protect the ancestors' lands until the very last breath.
translation: 我们将护卫先祖的土地直到最后一息。

original: The ancestral lands of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§! are located in the [ancestral_lands.GetName] province.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!的先祖之地位于[ancestral_lands.GetName]。

original: Dead and Forgotten
translation: 死亡与遗忘

original: Once we worshiped those who came before us, but now we have chosen a new path. While the great tombs we built in the ancestors' honor still remains, they no longer hold the same importance for our people. Their keepers have left to fulfill other duties and one day nothing shall remain but bones and ruins. Now our ancestor's final rest begins.
translation: 曾经我们崇拜那些先我们而去的人们，但现在我们选择了一条新的道路。尽管我们为了荣耀先祖所建的巨大墓地依然屹立，但对于我们的人民来说已经不再具有那么重要的意义了。它们的护卫已经被派去做其它任务，而总有一天陵寝除了骨头和废墟以外什么都不会剩下。现在我们先祖的最终长眠开始了。

original: It is time for a new era! Long live [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]!
translation: 新的时代到来了！[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]万岁！

original: Because [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§! has chosen another cult for our nation, the ancestral lands in [ancestral_lands.GetName] have now lost their importance.
translation: 因为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!已经为我们的国家选择了新的信仰，在[ancestral_lands.GetName]的先祖之地现在失去了重要性。

original: The Infinite Silence
translation: 永恒的沉默

original: We have always been able to turn to the razana, our ancestors, for guidance and counsel, but now there is nothing but silence. The ancestral lands of our nation's elite, including the great [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] mausoleum, have been lost. Words have reached us of plundered tombs and desecrated remains. We are cut off from the ancestors and thus from the great Zanahary. Where shall we turn now? Who shall lead the way? There are many who doubt whether [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] should rule our nation if [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] failed to protect that which is most holy.
translation: 我们曾经一直向我们的先祖寻求建议和指导，但现在除了沉默什么都没有。我们国家瑰奇的先祖之地，包括伟大的[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]王陵，都已经不复存在了。我们听到了掠夺陵墓和亵渎遗迹的消息。我们切断了和先祖的联系也切断了与扎卡里神的联系。我们应该转向何方？谁来领导我们前行？有许多人质疑，如果[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]没能捍卫最为神圣的东西的话，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]是否有资格来领导我们国家，。

original: lost, CA
translation: 失去，神明在上

original: This is a dark day for [Root.GetName].
translation: 这对[Root.GetName]来说是黑暗的一天。

original: The [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] ancestral tomb has been lost and many are concerned about [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!'s ability to rule.
translation: [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]先祖的坟墓不复存在而许多人开始担忧[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!的统治能力。

original: A New Beginning
translation: 一个新的开始

original: Since the day we lost our most sacred ancestral lands our country has been weakened. With the ascent of our new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], however, the time has come to close this wound for good. [Root.Monarch.GetName] is the leader of a new generation and as it steps forward we may turn our eyes towards a bright future. [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] has the power to appoint a new tanindrazana and build a great tomb where [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] predecessor can rest.
translation: 自从我们失去我们最神圣的先祖之地那一天起我们的国家就变得虚弱。但随着我们的新[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]登基之后，治愈这个伤口的时候到来了。[Root.Monarch.GetName]是新世代的领导者而我们终于可以将目光投向一个更光辉的未来。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]有权指定一块新的先祖之地并建造一个伟大的陵寝以使得[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]先祖可以居住。

original: Rebuild? for CA cult
translation: 重建？为了我们的信仰

original: From this day we shall bury our dead in [ancestral_lands.GetName].
translation: 自今天起我们将死者埋葬在[ancestral_lands.GetName]。

original: A piece of land in the [ancestral_lands.GetName] province is dedicated to the ancestors and a tomb is built for the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family.
translation: 在[ancestral_lands.GetName]省份的一片土地被划拨出来用作祖茔，而给[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族的一个陵墓也被建立起来。

original: We cannot afford to build another monument for priests and corpses.
translation: 我们负担不起为祭司和遗体另建一座纪念陵寝的开支。

original: Although it upsets many, no new tomb is built for the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family.
translation: 尽管这会令许多人失望，但并不会有属于[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族的陵墓被建造。

original: Palace of the Dead
translation: 死者之宫殿

original: One of our nation's holiest places is the tanindrazana of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName], located in the [ancestral_lands.GetName] province. Some of our most respected and influential ancestors reside here in the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family mausoleum. While the tomb is still one of the most impressive monuments in the country, maintaining such a sizable building is quite an undertaking and the state of the tomb has begun to deteriorate. If we do not spend more on its upkeep, it would be an affront to the ancestors.
translation: 我们国家最为神圣的地方之一是[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]的先祖之地，坐落在[ancestral_lands.GetName]。一些我们最为尊敬和最有权势的先人安息在[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族的陵寝里。尽管陵墓仍然是我们国家最令人瞩目的纪念所，维持规模这样巨大的建筑仍然是一项艰苦的事业，而陵墓的状况开始恶化。如果我们不能花更多钱在维护费上，将造成对先祖的冒犯。

original: Other desc
translation: 其它决议

original: We shall restore the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] tomb to its former glory!
translation: 我们将修葺[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]陵寝并将其恢复到往日的荣光！

original: Take the opportunity to make some improvements to the ancestral tomb in [ancestral_lands.GetName] while the repairs are carried out.
translation: 利用此次机会给位于[ancestral_lands.GetName]的先祖陵寝做一些改良，同时修复工作也将进行。

original: Put aside resources for the most necessary repairs.
translation: 好铁用在刀刃上。

original: The ancestral tomb in [ancestral_lands.GetName] will be maintained but no improvements will be made.
translation: 位于[ancestral_lands.GetName]的先祖陵寝将被修缮但不会进行改良。

original: The needs of the living are more pressing than those of the dead!
translation: 活人的需求比死人的需求要更先得到满足！

original: Save the resources for something else while the ancestral tomb in [ancestral_lands.GetName] deteriorates.
translation: 省下资源另作他用而位于[ancestral_lands.GetName]的先祖陵寝状况恶化。

original: Contentment of the Ancestors
translation: 先祖的满足

original: The ancestors have been most pleased with the improvements made to the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family tomb fifteen years ago. While the splendor has diminished somewhat over time, they will surely remember our reverence, even though it no longer impresses the living.
translation: 先祖们一定对十五年前修缮改良[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族陵墓的举动感到愉悦。虽然随着时间推移其辉煌灿烂有所削减，但他们肯定记得我们的崇敬，尽管其现在对于活着的人来说不再那么令人印象深刻。

original: May the ancestors watch over us for many years to come.
translation: 愿先祖们在接下来的许多年也能一直关照我们。

original: The [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family tomb in [ancestral_lands.GetName] is no longer considered to be grand.
translation: 位于[ancestral_lands.GetName]的[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族陵墓不再被认为是宏伟的。

original: The Day the Earth Shook
translation: 地动山摇之日

original: News has reached us from the [earthquake_province.GetName] province concerning a terrible tragedy. The ground there shook and shifted, erasing several villages and claiming many lives. As followers of Waaq, we believe in harmony and balance above all other things. Our world rests upon the horns of the great bull, which stands opposite to his love, the cow. Disaster besets our world when she turns away from him, as the world shifts atop his horns. Harmony must be restored! The question is how...?
translation: 从[earthquake_province.GetName]传来了一个简直是糟糕悲剧的消息。地面开始震摇移动，夷平了几座村庄并带走了许多生命。作为瓦坎神的信徒，我们相信万事万物都应当保持和谐与平衡。我们的世界坐落在一只巨牛的角上，这角与祂的爱人母牛相抵。当母牛对祂转身时灾难就降临到我们世界，而我们的世界随着祂的角飘移。和谐必须重现！但问题是怎么做...？

original: The foul infidels of [earthquake_infidel.GetName] are to blame!
translation: 这应当归结于在[earthquake_infidel.GetName]的污秽的异教徒！

original: Claim that the [earthquake_infidel.GovernmentName] of [earthquake_infidel.GetName] is responsible for the earthquake, giving us a reason to attack them.
translation: 宣布[earthquake_infidel.GetName]的[earthquake_infidel.GovernmentName]应当为这次地震负责，这给我们一个理由来攻击他们。

original: Like poison in the nation's veins, the non-believers among us are at fault.
translation: 就像国家躯体中的毒素一样，我们当中的那些不信者应当承担错误。

original: Blame anyone who isn't a follower of [Root.GetCult], turning the faithful against them.
translation: 指责不是[Root.GetCult]信徒的那些家伙，煽动信徒反对他们。

original: We shall work together in order to rebuild [earthquake_province.GetName].
translation: 我们应当合作以重建[earthquake_province.GetName]。

original: Collect resources from all over the realm to finance building projects in [earthquake_province.GetName].
translation: 在全国范围内集中资源来提供在[earthquake_province.GetName]的重建工程所需。

original: [Root.GetCult] is displeased with our ways. We must repent.
translation: [Root.GetCult]不满意我们选择的道路。我们必须悔改。

original: Do not take advantage of the situation, but instead attempt to please [Root.GetCult] through honest devotion.
translation: 不利用这种状况来搞事，但通过诚挚的奉献来取悦[Root.GetCult]。

original: Hit by Earthquake
translation: 被地震袭击

original: The earthquake which hit this province claimed a heavy price, not only in repair costs, but also in human lives.
translation: 袭击这个省份的地震造成了严重的损失，不只表现在建筑损毁和修复花费上，而且也表现在人命损失上。

original: Insulted by Accusation
translation: 被非难所侮辱

original: Devout Ruler
translation: 虔诚的统治者

original: The ruler of our nation is a devout follower of the true faith, always trying to do right by the higher powers.
translation: 我们国家的统治者是正统信仰的忠实信徒，一直在神的权能下尝试去做正确的事。

original: Persecuting Infidels
translation: 迫害异教徒

original: The followers of the true faith in our nation have little love to spare for the infidels among us.
translation: 我们国家中正统信仰的追随者对我们之中的异教徒不抱有太多怜悯。

original: Rebuilding Efforts
translation: 重建工作

original: After this province was hit by a disaster it has received monetary aid in order to speed up repairs and rebuilding.
translation: 在这个省份被灾害袭击后已经收到了资金援助以加速修复和重建工作。

original: Son of God
translation: 神之子

original: Strangers have recently encountered us, bearing with them the word of 'Christ', whom they claim to be the Son of God. They say he descended from the Heavens and walked among us, teaching about love and forgiveness. In the end, he died on a cross for our sins, only to resurrect and ascend to the Heavens. They say that one day the Savior will come back to Earth to grant his followers eternal life and establish the final Kingdom of God.
translation: 陌生的人最近拜访了我们，嘴边挂着“基督”这个词，据他们所说是神的儿子。他们说基督从天而降来到我们之中，教会我们爱与宽恕。最后，他因我们的罪孽死在十字架上，并且复活而回到天上。他们说总有一天救赎者将会回到地面并赐予他的信徒以永恒的生命，并建立最后的神之国度。

original: Eternal life, you say? Tell us more.
translation: 你是说永恒的生命？告诉我更多。

original: The Oneness of God
translation: 唯有真主

original: We have met people who devote their lives to worship the one true god they call 'Allah'. They live by the decree given to them by their prophets, the greatest of which went by the name Muhammad. We have been told that to be a true servant of God, one must adhere to the Five Pillars; faith, prayer, charity, fasting and pilgrimage to 'Mecca'. They have shared with us a scripture, the 'Qur'an' which apparently holds the final, unaltered revelation of God.
translation: 我们必须会见那些将自己的生命奉献给唯一真神的人，他们称他们的真神为“安拉”。他们遵照先知们给他们的指示生活，而其中最伟大的先知名为穆罕默德。我们被告知要真正成为真主的仆人，一个人就必须遵循五功：证信、礼拜、斋戒、天课和（向麦加）朝觐。 他们向我们分享了一本名为古兰的手稿，里面记载了真主最终的和永恒不变的启示。

original: We will have a closer look at this.
translation: 我们将进一步研究这东西。

original: Four Noble Truths
translation: 四圣谛

original: We have met a sage, dressed most humbly, who claims to be a monk following the teachings of the 'Buddha'. When we asked what this meant, he proceeded to tell us about a man who reached enlightenment. He later became known as the Buddha and he shared his wisdom of the Four Noble Truths with his disciples. They reveal how we as humans crave and cling to that which is impermanent, keeping us unsatisfied and trapped in an endless cycle of rebirth, but also how to reach liberation and enlightenment by following the Noble Eightfold Path.
translation: 我们遇到了一位衣衫褴褛的贤者，他说自己是一个遵从「佛陀」教诲的僧人。当我们问起谁是佛陀时，他向我们娓娓道来了这位悟道者的故事。这位名为「佛陀」的悟道者向他的信徒分享了四圣谛（苦、集、灭、道）的教诲。它们揭示了正是人类对速朽之物的欲望和执念，才使得我们不得满足，并被困在六道轮回中。但它们也指明了我们也可以通过遵循八大正道修得涅槃，从而得以从轮回中解脱。

original: Interesting. Do tell us more.
translation: 有趣。请务必多讲一点。

original: The Eternal Way
translation: 永恒之道

original: We have stumbled upon believers of Sanatana Dharma, or the eternal way. They value a virtuous and moral life, stability, and freedom from ignorance. It seems they worship not one but several gods to aid them in their journey to betterment, mentioning names like Shiva the Destroyer, and Vishnu the Preserver. They urge our people to consider our actions in this life, and through 'karma', the spiritual cause and effect, we can seek to be worthy of a better life after this one. The highest goal of all is to end the cycle of birth and rebirth...
translation: 我们偶遇了“萨纳坦·达尔玛”，永恒之道的信徒。他们重视稳定，良善和道德的生活与知识。他们似乎不止信仰一名神祇，而是由多位神引导他们。他们也提到了诸如毁灭之神湿婆和维护之神毗湿奴的名字。他们提醒我们注意现世自己的行为，因为「业力」可以让我们有一个更好的来世。而生生世世轮回的最终目标便是要破除六道轮回，让自己从中解脱。

original: This sounds worth investigating.
translation: 这个体系值得深究。

original: The Might of the Sun
translation: 太阳之力

original: The people across the sea are intriguing. At first it was just their golden symbols and elaborate pyramids inspiring awe in our warriors, but recently even some of our prominent members of society have begun exploring the faith underlying this mystical life. So far, we have found a pantheon of gods, and ritual in all things - we have heard stories such as that of the New Fire ceremony, or Xiuhmolpilli, where following weeks of bodily abstinence, blood-ritual, and even a vow of silence, a man is sacrificed atop of an old fire mountain, thus beginning a new cycle of their 52-year calendar.\n\nFrom what we understand, much of their worldview is based on staving off the end of the world, an idea proving reasonable among some of our warriors.
translation: 大海对面的住民令人费解。一开始仅仅是他们金色纹章和精巧金字塔吸引着我们的战士，但最近一些我们的上流社会人士也都开始尝试在这种神秘信仰指引下的生活之道了。到目前为止，我们已经发现了他们的神灵，以及献祭仪式。我们已经听闻了许多和献祭有关的故事，例如新火典礼：经过几周的禁欲，血祭，甚至约誓沉默， 他们通过将一个人献祭在个火堆之上来开启下一个长达52年的历法循环。\n\n从我们已经理解的部分来看，他们的目标是推迟不可避免的世界末日，这个观点在我们的一些战士中引起了共鸣。

original: To face death is part of living.
translation: 直面死亡也是生命的一部分。

original: Lady of the Slain
translation: 杀戮女神

original: We have encountered a woman who claims to be a representative of the 'seidkonur', an order of shamanistic seeresses. She tells us they follow the goddess 'Freyja', the patroness of love, magic and war. She rides to battle in a chariot pulled by two cats, dressed in an enchanted falcon feather cloak, and among the fallen warriors she chooses half to reside in her realm 'Fólkvangr'. She promises that if we swear our fealty to Freyja, the seid magic will be ours, to be used for good or evil...
translation: 我们遇见了一个自称是“渥尔娃女巫”代表的女人。这是一个由萨满女司祭组成的教团。她告诉我们她们信奉女神弗蕾亚；她是爱情、战争与魔法的护佑者。她身穿附魔的猎鹰羽毛斗篷，带领她精挑细选，居住于她王国“弗尔克范格”的复生战士，乘坐由两只猫拉动的战车进入战场。那个女司祭承诺如果我们向芙蕾亚女神宣誓效忠的话，我们就会拥有她们的魔法，不论我们是将其用在好事还是坏事上...

original: A most intriguing promise.
translation: 令人着迷的前景。

original: The Laws of Igziabeher
translation: 万物之主的律法

original: Some moons ago, words reached us of a people who call themselves 'Israelites' and claim to be the chosen people of Igziabeher, the One God. We have reached out and spoken with some of them since.\n\nThey have told us how, through the prophet Muse, they have received Igziabeher's laws. They are written in the 'Orit', their holy scripture, of which they have gifted us a copy. In return for following these laws the Israelites are under His protection. They are awaiting the arrival of King Messiay who shall rule the Kingdom of God and usher in an age of eternal peace and freedom. There will be no more death and those who have previously passed on will be resurrected by Igziabeher. Anyone who has followed God's laws will live forever in happiness while the sinners shall be punished and executed.
translation: 几个月以前，我们遇到了一群自称「以色列人」的家伙，他们宣称自己是「伊格兹亚贝哈」，唯一真神的选民。 这期间我们已经同他们接触并和他们中的一些人谈过话。\n\n他们告诉我们他们是如何通过先知穆斯得知神的律法。它们被写在「欧瑞特」，他们的圣典上，他们还送给我们一份圣典的抄本。作为遵循这些律法的回报，他们这些「以色列人」得到祂的护佑。他们在等待弥赛亚王的降临，他将统治神之国并创造一个永远和平和自由的时代。那时将不会再有死亡，而先前的死者也将会由神复活。遵循神的律法的人将幸福地永生，而那些罪人将会被惩罚和处决。

original: Eternal life, they say? We will have someone study the Orit, very closely...
translation: 他们提到了永生？我们应该找些人好好研究下这个圣典，要非常仔细地研究...

original: The Eternal Fire
translation: 永恒之火

original: A group of travelers have arrived in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] demanding an audience with [Root.Monarch.GetName]. With them they bring a fire that must not be extinguished, and which they claim to have kept alive for months as they journeyed from far-away lands to seek our protection. They follow the great prophet Zoroaster and we have been led to understand their original home was lost centuries ago. Since then they survive in communities around the Indian Ocean where they keep practicing their ancient ways.\nThe strangers seem eager to share their knowledge about how the world is in a constant struggle between order and chaos, Ahura Mazda and Angra Mainyu but do not seem to expect us to take it to heart. They do ask to be allowed to set up a temple for their fire in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] and promise that while they are few they will be able to enrich our society, much like sugar poured in milk can make the entire drink more sweet and soothing.
translation: 一群抵达[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的旅行者要求与[Root.Monarch.GetName]会面。他们自称携带着一束绝对不能被熄灭的火种，从远方启程，跋涉数月后来寻求我们的保护。他们追随伟大的先知琐罗亚斯德，经过相处后我们逐渐开始明白他们的故乡已经沦陷了几个世纪了。失去故乡后他们在印度洋周边的聚落继续追随自己的古老信仰。\n这些陌生人急切地想要分享他们的知识，这些知识讲述世界如何处在秩序和混沌之间永不停息的斗争中，亦即阿胡拉.马兹达和安格拉·曼纽的斗争；但他们又似乎并不期望我们认真对待这些知识。他们确实要求准许在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]建立一座祆祠来供奉他们的火焰，并承诺就像倒进牛奶的糖可以使整个饮料更加香甜可口一样，尽管他们的人数不多，但也会给我们的社会带来贡献。

original: Humata, Hukhta, Huvarshta.
translation: 思无邪，言无毒，行无恶。

original: A Rite of Fertility
translation: 繁衍仪式

original: The 'Wotan', chief-shaman of the seidkonur seeresses, have approached us concerning [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s lack of children. While we have mainly been worried about the line of succession, the Wotan is also worried about [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] devotion to Freyja. She suggests a fertility rite in which the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will lie with one of the seidkonur. If Freyja is presented with sufficient respect and sacrifices, the Wotan is convinced that such a union will produce a strong and blessed child.
translation: 作为“渥尔娃女巫”教团的大萨满，“沃坦”对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]无后表示了担忧。虽然我们主要是关心继承顺位的问题，但作为芙蕾雅的萨满，沃坦更担心[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]虔诚。她建议[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]和教团中的一位女巫举行一场繁衍仪式。如果向芙蕾亚献上足够的尊崇和祭品，沃坦相信这个结合将会诞生出一个强壮而受祝福的孩子。

original: The 'Wotan', chief-shaman of the seidkonur seeresses, have approached us concerning [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s lack of children. While we have mainly been worried about the line of succession, the Wotan is also worried about [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] devotion to Freyja. She suggests a fertility rite in which the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will lie with a 'seidmadur', one of the rare male seid practitioners. If Freyja is presented with sufficient respect and sacrifices, the Wotan is convinced that such a union will produce a strong and blessed child.
translation: 作为“渥尔娃女巫”教团的大萨满，“沃坦”对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]无后表示了担忧。虽然我们主要是关心继承顺位的问题，但作为芙蕾雅的萨满，沃坦更担心[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]虔诚。她建议[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]和教团中罕有的一位男巫举行一场繁衍仪式。如果向芙蕾亚献上足够的尊崇和祭品，沃坦相信这个结合将会诞生出一个强壮而受祝福的孩子。

original: It cannot hurt. At least the seidkonur will be pleased.
translation: 试试无妨，至少女巫团会感到高兴。

original: Arrange an impressive fertility rite with the hopes of producing an heir. While the Wotan certainly seems convinced, the Gods are known to be fickle and there are no guarantees. A failed rite could even harm the honor of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!.
translation: 安排一场令人印象深刻的繁衍仪式，希望其能产下一个继承人。尽管沃坦看起来坚信不疑，但善变无常的神可不会做出任何保证。一场失败的仪式甚至可能伤害到[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!的名誉。

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] does not need divine intervention to produce an heir!
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]不需要神的干预来产下继承人！

original: Do not go through with the Wotan's idea.
translation: 不采纳沃坦的主意。

original: Displeased Wotan
translation: 失望的沃坦

original: We did not agree to the Wotan's suggestion, which earned us the disapproval of her and the rest of the seidkonur.
translation: 我们不同意沃坦大人的建议，她与教团的其余人对我们的决定不甚满意。

original: The Lady's Blessing
translation: 女神的护佑

original: Praised be Freyja, most beautiful lady of love and fertility! Our mighty and pious [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has fathered not one, but two children! The seidkona from the fertility rite has given birth to a couple of strong and healthy twin daughters. As Freyja herself is a mother of two girls, this has been interpreted as a sign of divine approval. In Freyja's honor the infants have been named Hnoss and Gersemi after her daughters. The Wotan ensures us that either girl will make a fine ruler one day.
translation: 赞美芙蕾亚，司掌爱与繁衍的至高女神！我们孔武有力而虔诚的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]成为了不只一个，而是两个孩子的父亲！来自教团的女巫生下了一对强壮而健康的双胞胎女儿。鉴于芙蕾亚本身就是两个女儿的母亲，这被视为神佑的象征。为了荣耀芙蕾亚女神，这两个孩子以她女儿的名字被命名为赫诺丝和格尔塞蜜。沃坦向我们保证其中一个女孩一定会在未来成为优秀的统治者。

original: Praised be Freyja, most beautiful lady of love and fertility! Our vibrant and pious [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] is the mother of not one, but two children! Nine months after the fertility rite she gave birth to a couple of strong and healthy twin daughters. As Freyja herself is a mother of two girls, this has been interpreted as a sign of divine approval. In Freyja's honor the infants have been named Hnoss and Gersemi after her daughters. The Wotan ensures us that either girl will make a fine ruler one day.
translation: 赞美芙蕾亚，司掌爱与繁衍的至高女神！我们充满活力而虔诚的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]成为了不只一个，而是两个孩子的母亲！在繁衍仪式九个月后她产下了一对强壮而健康的双胞胎女儿。鉴于芙蕾亚本身就是两个女儿的母亲，这被视为神佑的象征。为了荣耀芙蕾亚女神，这两个孩子以她女儿的名字被命名为赫诺丝和格尔塞蜜。沃坦向我们保证其中一个女孩一定会在未来成为优秀的统治者。

original: Beautiful Hnoss will lead our people!
translation: 美丽的赫诺丝将会领导我们的人民！

original: The strong little Gersemi will rule [Root.GetName]!
translation: 强壮的小格尔塞蜜将会统治[Root.GetName]！

original: A Withheld Blessing
translation: 女神拒绝护佑

original: It has been months since the fertility rite and the seidkona whom [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] lay with shows no sign of being with child. Despite the impressive sacrifice in Freyja's honor, she did not grant the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] her blessing. People are whispering about the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s lacking manhood and the uncertain future of our nation...
translation: 自从繁衍仪式后已经过去了几个月，但和[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]结合的女巫并没有要生产的征兆。尽管我们为了荣耀芙蕾亚献上了丰盛的祭祀，但她并没有为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]降下神佑。人们一边窃窃私语说[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]缺乏男子气概，一边忧虑我们国家不明朗的未来...

original: It has been months since the fertility rite and [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] shows no sign of being with child. Despite the impressive sacrifice in Freyja's honor, she did not grant the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] her blessing. People are whispering about the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s barren womb and the uncertain future of our nation...
translation: 自从繁衍仪式后已经过去了几个月，但[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]并没有要生产的征兆。尽管我们为了荣耀芙蕾亚献上了丰盛的祭祀，但她并没有为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]降下神佑。人们一边窃窃私语说[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]子宫贫瘠，一边忧虑我们国家不明朗的未来...

original: Freyja, why have you forsaken us?
translation: 芙蕾亚，你为什么背弃我们？

original: The Power of Magic
translation: 魔法的力量

original: The chief-shaman of the seidkonur seeresses has approached us in this time of strife. She tells us that a well-woven spell, with Freyja's blessing, might be beneficial for us in the war against the [freyja_enemy.GetAdjective] infidels. While Freya's seidkonur certainly are powerful, our advisors also warn us that magic is a fickle thing and spells have been known to backfire...
translation: “渥尔娃女巫”教团的大萨满在这个多事之秋觐见我们。她告诉我们一个被芙蕾亚赐福的精妙咒文可以在对抗[freyja_enemy.GetAdjective]异教徒的战争中帮助我们。尽管芙蕾亚的女巫确有神力，但我们的顾问也警告我们魔法是靠不住的，而咒文可能会适得其反...

original: Protect our brave warriors! May they never fall in battle.
translation: 保护我们勇敢的战士！愿他们在战斗中永不陨落。

original: Ask the seidkonur to weave a spell for success in war, at your own risk...
translation: 要求女巫们吟唱咒文来确保战争胜利，而风险由你自己来承担...

original: a positive outcome.
translation: 积极的结果。

original: a negative outcome.
translation: 消极的结果。

original: Bonds of friendship are mightier than any blade.
translation: 友谊的羁绊比任何刀剑都更有力量。

original: Ask the seidkonur to weave a spell for diplomatic success, at your own risk...
translation: 要求女巫们吟唱咒文来确保外交上的成功，而风险由你自己来承担...

original: We are not yet desperate enough to meddle with fate's weave.
translation: 我们还没有绝望到要去干预命运的安排。

original: Decline the Wotan's offer.
translation: 拒绝沃坦的提议。

original: Warriors of Freyja
translation: 芙蕾亚的战士

original: Lately our brave warriors have been performing above expectation, as if guided by a higher power. It seems as if the spell the seidkonur wove did turn out successful, after all.
translation: 仿佛他们被更高的力量所指引似的，这之后我们勇敢的战士表现得超乎想象。看起来女巫们的咒文确实取得了成功。

original: All glory to Freyja, fiercest of all goddesses!
translation: 所有荣耀归于芙蕾亚，所有女神中最为英勇的那一位！

original: Freyja's Chosen
translation: 芙蕾亚的选民

original: The nation's warriors are performing above expectation. Some say they are blessed by Freyja.
translation: 这个国家的战士表现得超乎想象。有人说他们被芙蕾亚女神所保佑。

original: The Greed of Freyja
translation: 芙蕾亚的贪婪

original: Lately we have been misfortunate in battle. Several great warriors have fallen even though we had the odds stacked in our favor. Many are pointing fingers at the seidkonur, blaming our misfortune on their spell. They believe that Freyja was angered by our demands and decided to claim more brave champions to her realm 'Fólkvangr', but the seeresses insist that they are not to blame.
translation: 这之后我们在战斗中遭遇了挫折。尽管我们占有优势，但还是有几个最伟大的战士在战斗中陨落了。许多人指责女巫们的教团，责怪是她们的咒语给我们带来了不幸。他们坚信是我们的要求激怒了芙蕾亚，使她索取更多的勇士到她的国度“弗尔克范格”，但女巫们坚称她们不应被责备。

original: Freyja can be a harsh mistress.
translation: 芙蕾亚也有严厉的一面。

original: Greed of Freyja
translation: 芙蕾亚的贪婪

original: The nation's warriors are performing below expectation. As they fall in battle, some say Freyja is claiming our best champions for herself.
translation: 我国的战士表现得低于预期。随着他们在战斗中陨落，一些人声称芙蕾亚攫取了我们最好的战士为她自己服务。

original: Goddess of Love
translation: 爱之女神

original: Lately our diplomats seem to be doing everything right. They keep impressing everyone they meet with their fine manners, extensive knowledge and witty conversation. We should take advantage of our fortune to build stronger relationships with future allies. It seems as if the spell the seidkonur wove did turn out successful, after all.
translation: 这之后我们的外交官做任何事似乎都顺风顺水。他们良好的礼仪、渊博的知识和机智的言语给每一个人都留下了深刻的印象。我们必须利用这份幸运来与我们未来的盟友建立起更强大的关系。看起来似乎女巫们的咒文最终还是成功了。

original: No one can dislike those who are blessed by Freyja.
translation: 大家都喜欢被芙蕾亚祝福的人。

original: Beloved Diplomats
translation: 受欢迎的外交官

original: Our diplomats are welcome at almost every court, where their manners, knowledge and friendliness are much appreciated.
translation: 我们的外交官在几乎每一个宫廷中都受到了欢迎，他们的礼仪、智识和友善受到了普遍的赞赏。

original: Unintended Insults
translation: 无心的触怒

original: Lately our diplomats have made one mistake after the other. Usually they are well-mannered and poised, yet many of their latest engagements have ended disastrously. By sheer luck, they have not offended anyone too important so far, although we should be careful. Many are pointing fingers at the seidkonur, blaming our misfortune on their spell. They believe that Freyja was displeased that we would rather talk than fight our way through war, but the seeresses insist that they are not to blame.
translation: 这之后我们的外交官一个接着一个地犯错误。通常情况下他们都是很有礼貌和准备充分的，但他们最近的许多工作却以灾难收场。但谢天谢地，他们还没有冒犯到任何重要人物，即便如此我们仍然应当小心。许多人指责女巫教团，责怪她们的咒文带来了不幸。他们相信是因为我们偏好外交胜利而非武力胜利以致触怒了芙蕾雅，但女巫们坚称她们不应当被责怪。

original: Scorned Diplomats
translation: 被鄙夷的外交官

original: Our diplomats have an unfortunate knack of making tactless mistakes in delicate situations. They no longer get invites to important events like they used to.
translation: 我们的外交官十分不幸地擅长在微妙的场合犯下严重的错误。他们不再像以往那样收到参与重要活动的邀请。

original: The Fourth Path
translation: 八大正道

original: The wise Buddha taught us to follow the Noble Eightfold Path in order to be released from the eternal cycle of death and rebirth. The Fourth Path, 'Samyag Karman' or Right Action, says that we must not perform sensual misconduct, take that which is not ours, injure or kill. In many ways, Samyag Karman has made our nation stable and prosperous, but it does have its disadvantages. As not to displease the Buddha, monks in the [no_killing_province.GetName] province have been encouraging our subjects not to join the army. At first their influence was negligible, however, over time the word has spread and we are starting to feel the consequences.
translation: 明智的佛祖教诲我们遵循八正道的戒律，使自己从永恒的轮回循环中脱离出来。其中的第四条戒律，“正业”，要求我们不邪淫，不偷窃，不伤害，不杀生。在很大程度上，“正业”的原则使我们的国家变得稳定和繁荣，但它也有着自身的缺点。为了避免触怒佛祖，在[no_killing_province.GetName]省份的和尚鼓励我们的臣民不要加入军队。起初他们的影响力很有限，但随着时间的推移这个观点扩散开来，现在我们开始感觉到不利的后果了。

original: Staying true to the Noble Path is an honorable endeavor.
translation: 坚守正道是一个光荣的事业。

original: Allow the men who want to follow the Noble Path to stay out of the army.
translation: 允许那些愿意追随正道的人们不参加军队。

original: Their duty to our nation is greater than that to the Buddha!
translation: 他们对祖国的责任比对佛祖的责任更加重要！

original: Force the deserters to join the army. They, along with their kin, will probably put up some resistance.
translation: 强迫这些逃兵参加军队。他们和他们的亲属可能会做一些抵抗。

original: Doing No Harm
translation: 不杀生

original: Some of the able-bodied men of this province refuse to join the army because of religious convictions – at least so they claim.
translation: 这个省份的部分壮丁由于宗教信仰而拒绝参军—至少他们是这么宣称的。

original: Forced Conscription
translation: 强迫征兵

original: Some men in this province are forced to join the army, despite their religious convictions.
translation: 虽然这个省份的部分壮丁有信仰禁忌，但是他们还是被强征入军。

original: The Spirit of Generosity
translation: 慷慨之心

original: In order to grow as human beings and approach spiritual liberation, we must earn merit. According to the teachings of the Buddha, we do so through good deeds, acts and thoughts, and the accumulation of merit will carry over to our coming incarnations. The utmost sign of a good heart is the willing transfer of merit to others. This proves that we do not only perform good deeds, acts and thoughts for our own benefit, but for that of everyone else as well.\n\nOur great ruler, [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName], has arranged a great ceremony at the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family shrine. At the end [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] will pass on the merit which [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] gathered during the ritual. Whom shall [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] dedicate it to?
translation: 若要生而为人并追求灵魂的解放，我们必须积累功德。根据佛祖的教诲，我们可以通过善举、善行和善思来积累功德，并将这些功德带往来世。而良善之心的最大表现是将功德让与他人。这表明我们行善不仅仅是为了自己的利益，也是为了其他人而这么做。\n\n我们伟大的统治者，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]，在[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]的族祠中安排了一场盛大的仪式。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]将把[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]积累的功德在祭典的末尾转让出去。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]应当将这些功德献给谁？

original: Selfless Ruler
translation: 无私的统治者

original: During a great ceremony our ruler selflessly dedicated merit to all sentient life.
translation: 在一场盛大的典礼中，我们的统治者无私地将功德奉献给所有生灵。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] ancestors, in order to ease their suffering in the next life.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]先祖，以缓解他们在来生的苦难。

original: Everyone will be reminded about [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!'s great ancestry.
translation: 所有人都会记得[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!的伟大祖先。

original: All sentient beings, for the greater good.
translation: 所有生灵，但为上善之道。

original: Everyone will be moved by [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!'s humble and generous nature.
translation: 所有人都被[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!的谦逊和慷慨的天性打动。

original: Returning to the Flock
translation: 游子归家

original: Over a thousand years ago, the Israelites were exiled from the Promised Land and since then the children of Abraham have been spread across the world with no real realm to call their own. Over time, our traditions and practices have changed and diverged. We ourselves only recently found our way back to Igziabeher and are now fiercely protective of our own emerging Haymanot identity. \n\nA big tribe of wanderers have recently arrived in the [Root.GetName] province. While they also claim to be the descendants of Abraham, and many of their customs mirror our own, there are certain differences. When they pray, they do so to 'Yahweh' and the scripture they carry is named the 'Torah'. They have requested to settle here under our protection. While many of them are skilled craftsmen and wise scholars, resources which would without doubt benefit our nation, our advisors warn us about the friction which is certain to appear between these newcomers and our current subjects...
translation: 一千多年以前，以色列人从应许之地被流放，从那时起，无家可归的亚伯拉罕子民散布世界各地。随着时间推移，我们的传统和习俗也在演化和变迁。我们仅仅在最近才尊奉真神“伊格兹亚贝哈”之道路，并且尽力保护我们新的海马诺特派信仰。\n\n一个流亡者的大部落最近来到了[Root.GetName]省。虽然这群同我们习俗相似的人也宣称自己是亚伯拉罕的后裔，，但他们也和我们有很多不同的地方。当他们祈祷的时候，他们向“耶和华”祈祷，而他们的圣典被称为“妥拉”。他们要求在我们的庇护下定居于此。鉴于他们中许多人是熟练的手艺人和智慧的学者，我们国家肯定能从这些资源中获益，但我们的顾问警告说这些新来的人和我们的臣民将来一定会起冲突...

original: Of course our brothers and sisters shall stay!
translation: 我们的兄弟姐妹当然应该留下！

original: A large number of Jewish immigrants settle in the [Root.GetName] province.
translation: 大量犹太人移民在[Root.GetName]省定居下来。

original: They are not like us, not true followers of Igziabeher.
translation: 他们和我们不同，不是真正的伊格兹亚贝哈信徒。

original: The Jewish immigrants are exiled.
translation: 犹太人移民被驱逐。

original: Jewish Immigrants
translation: 犹太人移民

original: This province has recently had a large influx of Jewish immigrants.
translation: 这个省份最近涌入了大量犹太移民。

original: Demand of the Jews
translation: 犹太人的要求

original: While they were certainly grateful at first, the Jewish population of [Root.GetName] has been growing increasingly discontent. The friction between them and the Haymanot subjects has caused us many sleepless nights. The Jews have also begun to complain about the lack of influence that they have in the nation's affairs, now that they have become a part of it. They demand that one of their leaders, the guild master Isaiah, shall be given a seat on the council of advisors. While it would surely satisfy the Jews, we would also weaken our religious authority and anger our more fanatical subjects.
translation: 虽然他们一开始非常感激，但随着时间流逝，[Root.GetName]的犹太人越来越不满了。他们和海马诺特派信徒的冲突已经使我们数夜不得安宁。尽管他们已经成为这个国家的一部分，犹太人也开始抱怨他们在国家事务中缺乏话语权。他们要求将他们的领袖之一，公会的会长以赛亚，聘请为顾问。虽然这会让犹太人满意，但同时也会削弱我们的宗教权威，激怒部分狂热信徒。

original: We shall happily accept Isaiah's wise counsel.
translation: 我们应该高兴地接受以赛亚的明智建议。

original: Have we not given you enough? Ungrateful leeches...
translation: 我们给你们的还不够多么？这些不知感激的吸血鬼...

original: Blasphemous Advisor
translation: 渎神的顾问

original: The fervent followers of Igziabeher are concerned about one of our advisors and the impact he will have on our traditions and customs.
translation: 伊格兹亚贝哈的狂热信徒担心我们的一个顾问会给我们的传统和习俗带来不利的影响。

original: Dissatisfied Jews
translation: 不满的犹太人

original: The local Jewish population is discontent with the lack of influence they have regarding the running of our nation.
translation: 当地的犹太人对他们在国家治理中缺乏话语权感到不满。

original: Desecration of the Sanbat
translation: 亵渎安息日戒律

original: On the Seventh Day after Igziabeher had created the world, He rested. In His honor, we keep the seventh day of the week holy. During the Sanbat, from sundown the day previous until the stars emerge, we do not work, write or cook. We even do not light any fires. Desecrating the Sanbat is a crime against God's laws. \n\nWord has gotten out that one of our most trusted advisors, [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName], often works during Sanbat. While some of the more extreme protesters demand that [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe] be stoned to death for [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis] sinful ways, we do not want to set a dangerous precedent. After all, [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] is not the only one at court to violate the Sanbat, even though [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe] is the most regular and least discreet culprit. Simply firing [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHim] would surely appease the majority, although [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis] experience would make it a great loss...
translation: 在伊格兹亚贝哈创造世界七日后，祂休息了。为了纪念这一举动，我们将一周的第七日视为神圣的一天。从安息日前一天的日落到安息日夜晚之间，我们不工作，不书写，不烹煮。我们甚至不生火。亵渎安息日是打破神之律法的犯罪。 \n\n但有消息说我们最为信任的顾问[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]经常在安息日里工作。尽管有些极端的抗议者要求乱石砸死[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe]以惩罚[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis]罪行，可是我们并不想树立一个危险的先例。因为虽然[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe]是最经常和最不谨慎的破戒者，但[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]并不是宫廷中唯一一个违反安息日戒律的人。直接把[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHim]烧死确实能取悦大众，但失去[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis]帮助对我们来说也是一大损失...

original: We cannot allow such a poor moral character to represent our government.
translation: 我们不能容许这样一个道德低下的人来代表我们的政府。

original: [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] is too important to our [Root.GovernmentName]. [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHeCap] will stay.
translation: [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]对我们[Root.GovernmentName]来说太重要了。[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHeCap]会留下来。

original: The Nature of God
translation: 神的本质

original: Our veneration of the Christian God has generally brought us much closer to the [christian_neighbor.GetAdjective] but there's always a slight feeling that we are talking past each other rather than about the same things when it comes to matters of theology. This was even further highlighted today when during a joint ceremony of state our ambassador in [christian_neighbor.GetName] got into a heated argument about the nature of the Holy Trinity. The [christian_neighbor.GetAdjective] quite clearly take offense at the way the Father, the Son and the Holy Ghost are worshipped in our lands.
translation: 我们对基督教的信奉使我们与[christian_neighbor.GetAdjective]更加亲密了，但讨论神学理论时我们总感觉我们在各执一词而不是在观点一致。这在今天双方的联合庆典上更加明显地凸显了出来，我们在[christian_neighbor.GetName]的大使陷入了对圣三位一体本质的激烈争论。[christian_neighbor.GetAdjective]明显被我们敬奉圣父、圣子和圣灵的方式冒犯了。

original: Something must have been lost in translation?
translation: 是不是大使的翻译词不达意？

original: Apologize and attempt to mend the disagreement.
translation: 道歉并尝试弥合分歧。

original: The Greater Christian Community
translation: 更大的基督教世界

original: To the greater Christian World our veneration of their God must seem like a miracle. While they may take issue with some of our interpretations there seems to be a general relief that the word of God can be spread among the pagans. Wherever they go our diplomats seem to be greeted with open arms.
translation: 从更广阔的基督教世界来看，我们对主的信奉堪称奇迹。虽然他们对我们的一些宗教诠释仍然抱有疑问，但我们证明了对神的普世信仰是可以在原始社会中传播的。我们的外交官无论走到哪里都会受到热情的欢迎。

original: Kyrie Eleison
translation: 主啊，怜悯我

original: Relations with all Christian countries improved by §G50§!.
translation: 与所有基督教国家的关系改善了§G50§!。

original: Christian Mission in [Root.GetName]
translation: 在[Root.GetName]传播基督福音

original: By opening our arms to the Christian God we have also attracted a number of his disciples. A constant trickle of merchants, priests, monks and adventurers is now, among other things, helping spread the word of God in our lands.\nA group of missionaries from [christian_missionary_origin.GetName] now wishes to settle in [Root.GetName].
translation: 在我们投向主的怀抱后，我们也吸引了他的一些信徒。现在商人、牧师、僧侣和冒险家不断涌入我们的国家，帮助我们传播神的教诲。\n一群来自[christian_missionary_origin.GetName]的传教士现在希望定居在[Root.GetName]。

original: What harm could come from welcoming men of God?
translation: 接纳这些神的信徒能有什么坏处呢？

original: We must maintain control over the faithful ourselves.
translation: 我们必须把信众控制在我们自己手中。

original: By refusing the missionaries we will avoid foreign Christian sects spreading in our lands but we will anger their country of origin.
translation: 通过拒绝这些传教士入境，我们能够避免外来基督教派传入我国；但这也会得罪这些传教士的母国。

original: Christian Unorthodoxy
translation: 基督教非正统学说

original: Christian Brotherhood
translation: 基督教兄弟情谊

original: Christian Mission
translation: 基督教传教

original: We have allowed missionaries to settle in this province. In return for being allowed to spread their faith they are actively working to improve the local infrastructure to support the community here.
translation: 我们允许传教士定居在这个省份。作为许可他们传教的回报，他们也积极地通过改善当地的基础设施来服务当地社区。

original: A Far-Away Traveler
translation: 来自远方的旅行者

original: A learned Qadi, well schooled in Islamic jurisprudence has seen fit to grace our country with his visit. It seems he is traveling through the Islamic world to bring order and structure to the legal system and observe the various ways in which the life and words of the prophet are thought. While it is a great honor for such a man to visit [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] it would perhaps be even more beneficial if we could convince him to stay...
translation: 一个在伊斯兰教法上有着很深造诣的“卡迪”，即伊斯兰教法学者，认为是时候亲自造访我们国家了。看起来他曾遍历整个伊斯兰世界，组织和修正当地的法律体系，察考各地对先知言行的不同理解。这样一位人物到访[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]将是莫大的荣耀，如果我们能劝说他留下来的话就更好了...

original: Let us offer him a generous appanage.
translation: 让我们为他加官进爵。

original: What a great day.
translation: 多么伟大的一天。

original: Shirazi Merchants
translation: 设拉子商人团

original: A group of Shirazi Merchants from the East have established themselves in [Root.GetName] hoping to bring new goods to the port cities from which they come. While the Shirazi claim to originate from a few families that once where the first Muslims to settle the African coast their Islam is one that generously intermixes rituals and magical ceremonies. In [Root.GetName] they feel at home and the local population has taken no issue with them.
translation: 一群设拉子商人从东方来到了[Root.GetName]，他们希望能给他们抵达的港口城市带来家乡货物。这些设拉子人号称自己是最早定居于非洲海岸的几个穆斯林家族的后代，因此他们的伊斯兰信仰融合了一些奇妙的外来仪式与神奇的庆典。在[Root.GetName]他们感觉就像是在家一样，而当地人对他们也没有什么意见。

original: Great.
translation: 棒极了。

original: Religious Tensions in [Root.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]的宗教对峙

original: Our adoption of Islam as our new religion has generally been quite frictionless. At least in the areas where Muslims are still not a majority. In [Root.GetName], however, the new religion has a great number of practitioners, some who feel our theology is a bit on the liberal side. A recent influx of converts from the less religiously orthodox part of the country has created notable tensions. In order to control his subjects our local representative has brought even more recent converts as soldiers which has only inflamed the situation further. It seems but a matter of time before violence erupts...
translation: 我们改信伊斯兰的举动已经引发了许多冲突，至少在穆斯林仍然不占多数的地方是这样的。尽管在[Root.GetName]新的信仰有许多的追随者，但一些人认为我们的神学信条有点过于放任自由了。我们国家最近一波改信少数派正统信仰的浪潮已经引发了相当的紧张局面。为了控制住他的领民，我们地方上的官员将甚至更多新改信的信徒招进了军队，这只会进一步激化局势。似乎暴力场面的出现也只不过是时间问题了……

original: Replace the governor immediately.
translation: 立即撤换那名官员。

original: We must use force to calm the situation.
translation: 我们必须动用武力来平定局势。

original: Spread of Islam
translation: 伊斯兰的传播

original: [muslim_missionary_origin.GetAdjective] missionaries have become an increasingly common sight in [Root.GetName] and their message has struck home well with the province population. It has currently gone so far that it is unclear if the province can be said to adhere to the traditions of their ancestors anymore. For better or worse [Root.GetName] is now a truly Islamic area.
translation: [muslim_missionary_origin.GetAdjective]的传教士已经成为[Root.GetName]的一个越来越常见的景象，而他们传递的信息也很好地被当地人民所接受。这种变化已经进行到了很深的程度以至于我们不能明确地说这个省份的人民是否还遵循着他们祖先的传统。不论是好是坏，[Root.GetName]现在是一个真正意义上的伊斯兰地区。

original: God is great.
translation: 真主至上。

original: Respected Qadi
translation: 受人尊敬的卡迪

original: A learned legal scholar and judge has settled in our realm.
translation: 一个博学的教法学者和教法官定居在我们的领地内。

original: Shirazi Merchant Community
translation: 设拉子商人社区

original: A group of Muslim traders have settled down in our province.
translation: 一群穆斯林商人定居在我们的省份。

original: Zoroastrian Migration
translation: 祆教移民

original: Word has spread among the various exiled Zoroastrian communities of our veneration of the Mazdayasna faith. The fire temples of [Root.GetCapitalName] have attracted particular fame, and now great numbers of Zoroastrians have begun to arrive in the area to start a new life in what they hope will be a more hospitable land.\nWhile some find it disconcerting that the province is so quickly losing touch with the traditions of our ancestors the steady stream of scholars, merchants and other valuable men and women will certainly help the area grow.
translation: 我们信奉祆教的消息在一些流浪的祆教社群内传开了。[Root.GetCapitalName]的祆祠已经小有名气，现在大量的祆教徒开始抵达这个地区，希望在这个更友善的土地上开启新的生活。\n虽然一些人担心这个地区的人们正在迅速丧失他们祖先留下来的传统，但源源不断的学者、商人和其他有价值的人们确实能帮助该地区发展。

original: We must welcome our brothers and sisters from afar!
translation: 有朋自远方来，不亦乐乎！

original: We must safeguard our traditions!
translation: 我们必须捍卫我们的传统。

original: Zoroastrian Migration
translation: 祆教移民

original: Members of the Zoroastrian diaspora have come to settle in this province, vowing to help our local administration in any way they can in exchange for our protection.
translation: 祆教的流民来到这个省份定居，发誓要尽可能帮助我们在当地的治理，以换取我们的庇护。

original: [Root.GetName] Fire Extinguished
translation: [Root.GetName]圣火熄灭

original: Over time an increasing number of fire temples have been consecrated using the original fire that was brought to us by the followers of Zoroaster. As the faith becomes more common, however, it has also managed to anger some of our more traditionally oriented of our subjects. A fire temple consecrated quite close to the shrine of one of the more venerated ancestors in [Root.GetName] has led to open hostility between the followers of the old ways and the 'Magi' from the east. The traditionalists have stormed into the temple and extinguished the holy fire.
translation: 随着时间的推移，越来越多祆祠开始供奉祆教徒传来的原始圣火。这一信仰变得越来越普及，因此我们一些偏向传统的臣民开始感到愤怒。在[Root.GetName]，一座祆祠十分靠近一座当地先祖的神庙，这导致了传统信仰追随者和东方来的“法师”互相的公开敌视。我们听说传统信仰追随者突然涌进了神庙并熄灭了圣火。

original: Yatha ahu vairyo.
translation: 阿塔·阿胡·瓦伊里尤。（祆教术语，阿胡那·法里耶篇祷文开篇词）

original: Religious Tensions
translation: 宗教局势紧张

original: Tensions are running high between adherents to the new Mazdayasna cult and the followers of our older traditions.
translation: 传统信仰和新的祆教信仰的追随者之间的紧张局势正在加剧。

original: §YCreate Trading City§!
translation: §Y创建贸易城市§!

original: \nOnly the leader of a Trade League can create a Trading City.
translation: \n只有贸易联盟的领导者才可以创建贸易城市。

original: \nYour Trade League can only have one Trading City in the same Trade Node.
translation: \n你的贸易联盟在同一个贸易节点只能有一个贸易城市。

original: \nYou cannot give away your capital province to a Trading City.
translation: \n你不能将你的首都转为一个贸易城市。

original: \nYou cannot lead a Trade League because:\n
translation: \n因为如下原因你不能领导一个贸易联盟：\n

original: Trading City
translation: 贸易城市

original:
A governmental form where the nation is governed as a republic with a heavy reliance on trade and commerce.
Trading Cities can only be created by the leader of a Trade League.
If a Trading City grows to more than one province, the government form will change to §YMerchant Republic§!.
translation:
一种共和制的政府形式，国家极度依赖贸易和商业。
贸易城市只能由贸易联盟的领导者创建。
如果一个贸易城市发展到超过一个省份，政府形式会转变为§Y商业共和国§!。

original: The Council of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]
translation: [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的会议

original: Our elders worry that peace and good fortune has made recent generations of our community deteriorate - they say our warriors have grown soft and the minds of our scholars dull. 'This is not what Teotl worship should look like', they argue. To placate these learned members of our society we could arrange for a building be built, to house scholars and diviners to map the stars. We could also perform a blood sacrifice, in the name of the Sun God.
translation: 我们的长老担心和平与好运会使得我们社会的年轻一代退化了，他们说，我们的战士变得软弱而我们学者的头脑变得愚钝，“这不是神（Teotl，纳瓦特尔语意为神）的信徒应有的样子。”为了安抚我们社会上的这些博学人士，我们可以安排修建一座建筑来安置我们的学者和预言家，让他们记录群星的轨迹。我们也可以以太阳神的名义进行一次血祭。

original: Build an observatory.
translation: 建造一座天文台。

original: If the venture proves successful a mighty pyramid could grant us sublime knowledge for generations.
translation: 如果我们的投资获得成功，我们就可以给后代留下珍贵的知识的宝库。

original: Trust in the power of sacrifice.
translation: 相信献祭的力量。

original: If the sacrifice goes according to plan our ruler will be renowned for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] devotion.
translation: 如果献祭按计划进行，我们的统治者将因[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]虔诚奉献而闻名。

original: Gazing at the Stars
translation: 观星

original: Using a combination of highly skilled engineers and the latest architectural innovation our workers have erected a beautiful pyramid. The door of the building faces east perfectly - each morning the Sun God gives us his light in thanks for the effort we put into the magnificent temple.
translation: 起用我们最经验丰富的工程师，结合最新的建筑学创新，我们的工人成功建造了一座漂亮的天文塔。这座建筑的门朝向正东——每天早晨太阳神就是从那里赐予我们光明，而为了感谢祂的恩赐我们建造了这个伟大的建筑。

original: Perfect!
translation: 完美！

original: The Blood of a [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]之血

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] of our magnificent [Root.GovernmentName] stepped up to the altar with fierce determination. The setting sun glinted in the obsidian blade [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] held and the chanting of the priests intensified. As [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] made a deft cut down the length of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] arm, the crowd cheered. The blood still dripping from [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] nodded solemnly to the elders seated in the audience. One of them smiled as a queue of eager warriors began to form to the altar.
translation: 我们伟大[Root.GovernmentName]的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]充满决心地走上了祭坛。 夕阳的余光闪烁在[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]握着的黑曜石刀刃上，而祭司的吟诵也加快了。随着[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]麻利地在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]手臂上切出一道口子，人群开始欢呼。血不断从[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]身上流下，而[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]庄严地向坐在观礼席上的长老们点头致意。他们之中的一位微笑起来，而一群急切的战士开始涌向祭坛。

original: For the Sun!
translation: 赞美太阳！

original: The Architecture of Failure
translation: 失败的建筑

original: Bad weather and poor management has led workers to lay down their tools and give up the construction of an observatory. Instead they are complaining of having too long put up with unjust wages and working conditions - some have even taken to torching the allotted site of construction. The disgruntled members of the elder council shake their heads.
translation: 糟糕的天气和失败的管理使得我们的工人放下了工具，放弃了天文台的建设。他们反而开始抱怨起长期忍受不公正的报酬和糟糕的工作条件，其中一些人甚至开始焚毁建筑。长老会议的成员不满地摇着头。

original: Typical!
translation: 败事有余！

original: Under the Scrutiny of the Ancestors
translation: 在先祖的审视下

original:
The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] nervously stepped up to the altar. The blade quivered in [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] hand while the crowd held their breath. Closing [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] eyes [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] then pressed the dagger into [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] skin... 

The cut [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] placed must've gone deep because the blood that flowed onto the stone floor quickly painted it red as it dripped down the steps. The liquid glistened in the embers of twilight and the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] just had time to hear the priests replace their chant with gasps before [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] passed out.

When [Root.Monarch.GetName] awoke again, [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] was not quite the same.
translation:
[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]紧张地走上祭坛。匕首在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]手中抖动，而人群屏息凝神。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]闭上[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]眼睛，接着把匕首压进[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]皮肤里... 

[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]的伤口一定刺得很深，因为流到石面地板上的血很快就将其染红了，并流下了台阶。血液在夕阳的余晖下闪闪发光，而[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]晕过去之前只有时间听到祭司停止吟诵而发出惊讶的喘息。

当[Root.Monarch.GetName]再次醒来时，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]和以前已经不大一样了。

original: How embarrassing!
translation: 真是尴尬！

original: Golden Idols
translation: 黄金神像

original: A fine craftsman of golden jewelry has gained some renown in our lands. His popularity has allowed him to expand his workshop substantially and he has already taken several apprentices under his wing. Our nobility is especially intrigued by his specialization in delicate golden idols - representing various gods and kept for divine protection, they come in the form of snakes, eagles, and jaguars. Unsurprising, it has become the highest fashion to keep these totems close, preferably as a pendant around one's neck.
translation: 一个优秀的金饰工匠在我们的领地里已经小有名气，以至于他能够大规模扩大自己的工坊并招揽几个学徒到他的麾下。我们的贵族对他制作黄金神像的技巧十分感兴趣，他制作的神像有蛇、鹰和美洲虎，分别代表着不同的神明，为拥有者带来神圣的护佑。顺理成章的，贴身佩带这样的饰品开始成为最流行的风尚，最好是将其挂在脖子上作为吊坠。

original: How charming!
translation: 云鬓花颜金步摇。

original: The Unity of Blood
translation: 血之联结

original:
This morning [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] received a missive from one of the elders in [worried_province.GetName], assuring us of the benefits of a grand sacrifice to the Cloud Serpent.

There is no denying that the weather these past months have been unusually dry, particularly in [worried_province.GetName]. The people there worry about their crops while the local elders are voicing their opinion more loudly each day - their diviners have been predicting this for months, they say, questioning the nonchalance and lack of faith of the villagers. There is a strange air of elitism brewing among the elders as some scoff at the anxious farmers now seeking their council.

Looking over the missive again, the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is puzzled. Perhaps an elaborate ceremony is precisely what is needed to stabilize the region?
translation:
今天早晨[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]从[worried_province.GetName]的长老那里收到了一个信件，向我们诉说给云蛇神举办一场献祭能带来的好处。

过去几个月的天气变得异常干燥，尤其是在[worried_province.GetName]，这点无法否认。当地人民十分担忧他们的庄稼收成，而当地长老却认为此事另有他因。长老们表示他们的预言家已经预见此事数月了，并且指责当地村民的冷漠和缺乏信仰才是此事的罪魁祸首。似乎有一种奇怪的精英主义风气在当地长老之间蔓延，听说他们都已经开始嘲讽前来禀报难情的焦虑农民了。

反复看了看这封信件，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]感到了迷惑。或许一场精致的祭典正是稳定当地局势所需要的？

original: Order an extravagant ceremony of blood!
translation: 安排一场奢华的血之祭典！

original: We have more important things going on.
translation: 有更重要的事情要做。

original: Under a Cold Moon
translation: 冷月之下

original: The moon hung ominously in the sky above the crowd, the faces of the priests lit red by light from their torches. The air was silent, save for the shuffling of feet, leading up to the altar - a dozen men were being led, or dragged, towards the center stage of the ceremony. [worried_province.GetName] has rarely seen such ritual and it was clear that this would have an impact on the crowd, young and old, nervously watching. After having spent a month in silence, the high priest finally called out pleadingly to the gods as an unfortunate villager was held down on the altar. His heart, along with those of the other sacrifices, was about to be cut out of his body, 'set free' to join the spirits.
translation: 月亮不祥地悬挂在人群之上，祭司的脸被火把映照得通红，人们拖着步伐小心翼翼地走向祭坛，无人愿意打破这安静的气息。十二个人，或是被拖着，或是带着，来到了祭祀仪式的中心。[worried_province.GetName]的人们很少目睹过这样的仪式，毫无疑问，这必然会给在观看的人群带来强烈的冲击。不论年轻人和老人，都在紧张地观望。在一个月的缄默后，大祭司终于开始向神祈求。一个不幸的村民被拖到祭坛上，他将会和其他的牺牲者一样，被剜去心脏，从而迎来“解放”，加入到众灵之间。

original: We should do this again sometime.
translation: 我们之后还要再做这件事情。

original: This is our way of life.
translation: 这就是我们的生存之道。

original: A Wasted Effort
translation: 无用之功

original: It was a dark and cloudy evening when the people of [worried_province.GetName], as ordered by their elders, had gathered to stand witness to the grand sacrifice. 'This will save [worried_province.GetName],' the high priest proclaimed. 'It will stop the draught, but it hardly seems necessary anymore', people muttered, some glancing at the sky. Were those rain clouds? \nThe intended gifts to the Cloud Serpent shrieked and wept in protest as they were dragged to the stage of the ceremony. The tension lay heavy and one elder shifted his weight nervously.\nSuddenly the sky cracked with thunder and rain began to pour down on the scene. The crowd broke into chaos as screaming and shouting filled the air - some villagers were struggling to rescue their loved ones from being sacrificed in vain! The ceremonial knife, risen in terrified defense by the high priest, came slashing down in panic at people as the venerated elders attempted to flee the stage.
translation: 月黑风高夜，群云缭绕，[worried_province.GetName]的民众被他们的长老唤来，一起见证这场盛大的祭祀。“这将拯救[worried_province.GetName]，”大祭司喊道。“一劳永逸地停止干旱！”人群躁动着，一些人抬头仰望天空。但是雨云在哪里？ \n准备献祭给云蛇的祭品尖叫哭喊，无助地抗议着，他们已经被强行拖到祭典的台座上。此时气氛开始变得凝重起来，一位长老紧张地转过头，回避着最后这残忍的一幕。\n就在此时，天空被闪电劈开，祭典现场顿时下起倾盆大雨，人群陷入了混乱，尖叫和呐喊响彻天空。一些村民尝试去援救他们的至亲，避免他们死于这场已毫无意义的献祭，大祭司惊慌失措地举起祭典所用的小刀，向人群挥舞乱砍，而那些德高望重的长老们拼命地想逃离祭祀台。

original: Terrible news!
translation: 糟糕的消息！

original: Distrust of the Elders
translation: 对长老们的不信任

original: The elders here have made some very inaccurate prophecies.
translation: 这里的长老们做了一些十分不准确的预言。

original: Blessed Rains
translation: 神佑之雨

original: People here perform ritual human sacrifice after each harvest.
translation: 当地的人们在每次丰收后都举行人祭。

original: A Blessed Guru
translation: 受祝福的宗教宗师

original: We have heard accounts of a lowborn man, possessing a calming presence and a way with words, while he also appears wise in the ways of philosophy. His fellow men treat him with the utmost respect, as if he was of the Brahmin caste. A curiosity, the man shuns earthly possessions and never asks for more than the opportunity to preach his insight to others - in fact he has become something of a local attraction as people seek his aid in all sorts of matters, ranging between those of the heart to those of agriculture or civic duty. Some of the nobility argue that he'll start charging money for his advice any day now, while others see him as clearly meant for something other than spending the remainder of his life meditating in the local temple.
translation: 我们已经听说了一个出身低下的人，他喜怒不形于色，言辞富有哲理。他的追随者以最大的敬意侍奉他，仿佛他是出身于婆罗门种姓一样。令人好奇的是，这个人摒弃了世俗的财产，并且从不要求比维持他讲道所需以外更多的财物——事实上他已经成为了当地的招牌，人们向他寻求有关各种事物的建议和帮助。范围从那些心灵的事务到农业和公民义务的事项无所不包。一些贵族认为他随时可能就自己的建议开始收费，但另一些人认为，比起在当地神庙度过余生，他还能发挥更大的作用和意义。

original: Make him our entrusted advisor.
translation: 让他来当我们信赖的顾问吧。

original: He should remain in his village temple.
translation: 他应该留在他的村庄神庙中。

original: Sacred Writing
translation: 圣文

original: [dharmic_neighbor.GetName] have sent us a furious letter, informing us of a troublesome [Root.GetAdjective] monk selling books within their borders, while passing them off as sacred texts. Not only is it obviously counterfeit material, but the writing also contains several errors in regards to the Hindu worldview, and the authorities in [dharmic_neighbor.GetName] are accusing us of trying to instigate religious riots in their streets. There is the argument that the monk was simply trying to explore his own philosophy, but considering the popularity of the writings in [dharmic_neighbor.GetName], it is reasonable to assume that this monk is indeed a charlatan using our faith to make money...\n\nThe damage already done, all we can do is send troops to find and escort the monk out of the country of [dharmic_neighbor.GetName].
translation: [dharmic_neighbor.GetName]向我们送来了一封信，行文中明显能感到他们的恼怒。信中说一个惹人讨厌的[Root.GetAdjective]僧侣在他们的境内贩卖书本，并将其作为圣文来传播。他的这些材料不仅仅是伪造的，还包含了一些背离印度教世界观的观点。[dharmic_neighbor.GetName]当局指责我们妄图在他们的国内引发宗教骚乱，也有人争辩这个僧侣仅仅是在探索他自己的哲学观点。但考虑到它们在[dharmic_neighbor.GetName]的流行程度，也有理由认为这个僧侣确实是信仰投机者……\n\n损害已经造成，我们现在能做的就是派部队找到这个僧侣并带他离开[dharmic_neighbor.GetName]。

original: So it is.
translation: 只好这样。

original: Imitators of our Faith
translation: 歪嘴和尚

original: Selfless Guru
translation: 无私的大师

original: An old man is currently residing in a village outside our capital, humbly receiving visitors and offering advice to people from the whole nation.
translation: 一个老人最近居住在我们都城外的村庄中，谦逊地接待客人，并为来自全国各地的来访者提供建议。

original: In Honor of the Sun God
translation: 为了太阳神的荣耀！

original: The people here have embraced a strong culture of ritual human sacrifice.
translation: 这里的民众狂热地奉行着一种人祭仪式。

original: Rioting Workers
translation: 工人暴动

original: This community is plagued by malcontent and disharmony.
translation: 这个社区被不满和不和睦所扰。

original: Observatory
translation: 天文台

original: A center of divination and astronomy, this province is home to a pyramid with an excellent view of the stars.
translation: 作为一个占卜和天文学的中心，这个省份里有着一座观星塔和一个杰出的观星者。

original: Warrior of the Sun
translation: 太阳战士

original: This ruler has displayed great dedication to the gods in a willing self-sacrifice of blood.
translation: 这位统治者在一场仪式中献祭了自己的血，展现了自己对众神的虔诚。

original: Artisan of Gold
translation: 金饰工匠

original: A famous goldsmith and master of totems resides here.
translation: 一个著名的金匠和图腾大师居住在这里。

original: Create a new Trading City
translation: 创建一个新的贸易城市

original: Do you wish create a new Trading City, giving it §Y$PROVINCE$§! as their capital?
translation: 你是否希望创建一个贸易城市，让§Y$PROVINCE$§!成为他们的首都？

original: The Girondists
translation: 吉伦特派

original: Girondist Influence
translation: 吉伦特派的影响

original: Rather than let the Revolution spiral out of control internally the Girondists want to focus on spreading it beyond our borders. They believe in an active foreign policy and in ending the counter-revolutionary regimes on the continent.
translation: 与其让革命的漩涡在国内失去控制，吉伦特派更愿意将这场风暴传播出我们的疆界。他们秉持积极的外交政策并打算在欧洲大陆上终结反革命势力的统治。

original: Encourage the Girondists
translation: 鼓励吉伦特派

original: The Imperials
translation: 帝国派

original: Imperial Influence
translation: 帝国派的影响

original: The Imperials wish to bring the revolution under control and to centralize authority again. They claim to respect the will of the people but they are abhorred by the excesses and terror that uncontrolled popular opinion can bring. If the Imperials manage to seize control they will eventually try to create a Revolutionary Empire.
translation: 帝国派希望革命受到控制并再次将权力收归中央。他们宣称尊重人民的意愿，但也害怕失控的民意可能带来的僭越和恐怖。如果由帝国派来掌控政权，他们最终将尝试建立一个革命帝国。

original: Encourage the Imperials
translation: 鼓励帝国派

original: The Jacobins
translation: 雅各宾派

original: Jacobin Influence
translation: 雅各宾派的影响

original: The Jacobins are the staunchest supporter of the popular revolution. They believe that we must forcefully do away with the old ruling classes and seize their property. This faction has the support of the masses in our capital and will not shy away from inciting them into violence for the good of the Revolution.
translation: 雅各宾派是大众革命的最坚定的支持者。他们相信必须暴力摧毁旧有的统治阶级并没收他们的财产。这个派系拥有我们首都民众的支持，为了革命事业，他们会毫不犹豫地发动民众进行暴动。

original: Encourage the Jacobins
translation: 鼓励雅各宾派

original: An Offer of Marriage
translation: 求婚

original: It is with some consternation that the mighty families of the realm have watched [Root.Monarch.GetName] letting the years pass [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] by without finding someone to marry. These feelings have now turned into open dismay as despite the realm lacking a clear line of succession our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] appears to have no plans to find a spouse nor is [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] showing much interest the proposals sent to [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim].\nIt has now reached the point where the court is expecting the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to accept one of the offers on the table. Continued failure to secure the succession puts the entire realm at risk. Luckily one of the oldest and most prestigious [origin_of_queens_family.GetName] families in the [Root.GovernmentName] has offered us the hand of one of their daughters, along with a generous dowry.
translation: 已经好几年了，[Root.Monarch.GetName]还是没有找到合适的结婚对象，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]的这种情况引起了国家里一些大家族的注意。这种不好的情况现在已经变成了公开的焦虑，尽管并没有明确的继承人，但 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]似乎没有结婚的计划，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]看起来也不对别人介绍给[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]的人有什么兴趣。\n现在我们迫切想让[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]接受一个提议，否则继承权的缺失最终会使整个国家陷入危险的境地。幸运的是，在[Root.GovernmentName]中最古老和最负盛名的[origin_of_queens_family.GetName]家族为我们介绍了他们的一个女儿，同时他们还愿意送出许多的嫁妆。

original: Ruling a great [Root.GovernmentName] can be busy work and [Root.Monarch.GetName] has never shied away from that challenge. As the years go by, however, it has become increasingly clear that our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is not devoting the expected time and effort to find a new consort. While it is reasonable to expect a certain period of mourning that time is now long past.\nIt is high time [Root.Monarch.GetName] takes a new spouse. Luckily, when you are a [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] the high ranking families of the realm are eager to lend a helping hand.
translation: 去统治一个伟大的[Root.GovernmentName]需要远胜于常人的付出，但[Root.Monarch.GetName]从来都不畏惧挑战。岁月飞梭，我们越来越清楚地认识到我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]并没有花费足够的时间和精力去寻找新妻子。虽然哀悼亡妻是人之常情，但现在已经过去很久了。\n是时候让[Root.Monarch.GetName]迎娶一个新的妻子了。幸运的是，作为这个国家的 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，当你有难时，国内那些最有权势的家族都愿意热情地伸出援手。

original: The stability of a hereditary realm rests on having a clear succession. Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] remains an unmarried [Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan] despite having reached a marriageable age without a clear heir. Some of the finest families in our [Root.GovernmentName] would be overjoyed to help us in this matter and would likely be ready to pay an astronomical dowry for the privilege.
translation: 一个世袭王国的稳定在于拥有明确的继承人。尽管已经到了适婚年龄，我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]仍然是个未婚的[Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]，我们还没有明确的继承人。[Root.GovernmentName]中一些最有权势的家族很乐意在这件事上提供帮助，为了光宗耀祖，他们还愿意支付一笔天文数字般昂贵的彩礼。

original: To have a member of your family be the foremost consort of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is a great honor and one all the influential families of [Root.GetName] covets. In the hopes of securing a lasting alliance leading [origin_of_queens_family.GetName] landholders has sent an offer, and an astronomic dowry, asking that [Root.Monarch.GetName] take their daughters hand in marriage.
translation: 每一个在[Root.GetName]稍有影响力的家族都会想让家室中的一员成为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的第一配偶，这会为他们带来莫大的荣誉。[origin_of_queens_family.GetName]的地主们想要促成一宗长久的政治联盟，于是他们送来了一纸婚约和一份极为昂贵的彩礼，希望[Root.Monarch.GetName]迎娶他们的女儿。

original: Accept the offer.
translation: 接受这个提议。

original: By accepting this offer it is understood that the family of our new spouse can expect certain favors in the future.
translation: 通过接受这份婚姻，显然我们新配偶的家族将在未来获得一些好处。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] must save [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] for a better offer.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]必须为[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]挑选一份更好的婚约。

original: Seat of Strong Aristocrats
translation: 属于强大贵族的席位
