original: This is the seat of the family of our royal Spouse. Their close ties with our ruler have afforded them a number of local privileges that cannot be easily undone while the union lasts.
translation: 这是我们王妃家族的所在地。他们与我们的统治者的紧密联系为他们提供了许多地方上的特权，而这些特权在联盟持续的时候是无法轻易消除的。

original: The House of [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]
translation: [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]家族

original: With the union of [Root.Monarch.GetName] and [Root.Consort.GetName] we have gained not only a spouse but also a new ally in the realm. The [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] is an old and influential family and their seat in [origin_of_queens_family.GetName] is a jewel of the [Root.GovernmentName].\nOf course friendship has to go both ways and [Root.Consort.GetName] will be expected to speak for [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] kin while our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will be expected consider such advice very carefully.
translation: 在[Root.Monarch.GetName]与[Root.Consort.GetName]的结合之下，我们不仅解决了婚姻大事，还在国内得到了一个强大的盟友。[Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]是一个古老且有影响力的家族，他们的封地[origin_of_queens_family.GetName]是[Root.GovernmentName]里的一颗桂冠。\n当然，友谊是双向的，[Root.Consort.GetName]定然会替[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的亲族说话，而我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]也应当慎重地考虑这些建议。

original: To everlasting friendship!
translation: 友谊地久天长！

original: [origin_of_queens_family.GetName] is the seat of the family of our [Root.Consort.GetTitle]. This province will be less likely to revolt but will be granted privileges making it harder to tax or convert.
translation: [origin_of_queens_family.GetName]是我们[Root.Consort.GetTitle]的家族封地。这个省份不大可能会叛乱，但是它也会拥有一些特权，这意味着征税和转变省份的活动将更难以进行。

original: Great Expectations
translation: 前程似锦

original: A political marriage is as much a union as it is a contract of mutual support. The [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] family expects that the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will heed the advice of the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] and actively look after their (and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]) interests.
translation: 一场政治联姻就像一份互助的合同一样，[Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]家族十分期待我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]会采纳[Root.Consort.GetTitle]的建议，并积极地维护他们的（自然还有[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]自己的）利益。

original: Anything for our dear [Root.Consort.GetTitle].
translation: 一切为了你，亲爱的[Root.Consort.GetTitle]。

original: The [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] family will remember that we came to their help.
translation: [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]家族将会谨记我们的帮助。

original: The Crown will fund development of the [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] lands.
translation: 王室将会致力于提高[Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]土地的发展度。

original: The Crown will pay off some of the [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] debt.
translation: 王室将会帮助[Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]偿还一些债务。

original: The Crown will further the interests of the [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] faction in the realm.
translation: 王室将会帮助[Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]的派系在国内发展壮大。

original: The Crown will help get rid of an uncooperative advisor.
translation: 王室将会帮忙摆脱一名不合作的顾问。

original: Officers from the [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] family will be favored for promotion regardless of merit.
translation: 无论政绩如何，[Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]家族中的官员都将更容易晋升。

original: Officers from the [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] family will be favored for promotion regardless of merit.
translation: 无论政绩如何，[Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]家族中的官员都将更容易晋升。

original: We will promote [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] interest when creating new legislation.
translation: 当我们起草新的法律时，我们将会考虑[Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]的利益。

original: Sorry, no special favors.
translation: 对不起，不会有特权的。

original: This will result in lessened cooperation of the [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] on the local level and they will also hold it against us in the future.
translation: 这将导致我们与[Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]的合作无法进行，未来他们也可能在地方层面上反对我们。

original: Marital Bliss
translation: 婚姻美满

original: [Root.Consort.GetHerHisCap] majesty the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] is of course a constant companion and good advisor in [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] own right. However apart from that role our [Root.Consort.GetTitle] is also a representative of the crown to the [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] house and vice versa. At times this is not an arrangement without benefits.\nToday [Root.Consort.GetName] seems very pleased to announce that [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] family has decided to show its support for the throne and for the union of [Root.Monarch.GetName] and [Root.Consort.GetName].
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle]陛下的的确确是一个善于出谋划策的好伴侣，这是理所当然的。但是除了这个角色之外，我们的 [Root.Consort.GetTitle]同时也代表了王室对[Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]家族的态度，反之亦然。有时这种安排还是能带来一些好处的。\n今天[Root.Consort.GetName]十分高兴地宣布，[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]家族已经决定对君主的统治以及[Root.Monarch.GetName]和[Root.Consort.GetName]之间的结合表示支持。

original: May this union bring benefits to us both.
translation: 但愿这一联结能使我们双方互惠互利。

original: The [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] family will consider us to be in their debt.
translation: [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]现在会认为我们欠他们人情。

original: The [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] family will help develop the realm infrastructure.
translation: [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]家族将会协助建设国家的基础设施。

original: The [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] family will contribute money to the royal treasury.
translation: [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]家族将资助我们的国库。

original: The [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] is offering to provide a gifted councilor for the royal council.
translation: [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]向枢密院推荐了一名天赋异禀的顾问。

original: The [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] is offering to provide a gifted councilor for the royal council.
translation: [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]向枢密院推荐了一名天赋异禀的顾问。

original: The [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] is offering to support the throne against discontent factions in the realm.
translation: [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]支持君主的统治，协助对抗国内不满的派系。

original: The [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] is offering to provide a gifted councilor for the royal council.
translation: [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]向枢密院推荐了一名天赋异禀的顾问。

original: We must avoid indebting ourselves to the [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] family.
translation: 我们不能欠[Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]家族的人情。

original: By refusing help we avoid increasing expectations of reciprocity from the family of our spouse.
translation: 通过拒绝配偶家族的协助，我们成功避免了他们对王室更多的期望。

original: Family First?
translation: 家庭优先？

original: When [Root.Monarch.GetName] was first made the Royal consort the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]s were excited. Now that [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] is the Royal Regent of the realm they are ecstatic. [Root.Monarch.GetName] is now one of, if not the, most powerful [Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan] in the realm and the family has made it very clear to us that they expect to be treated in accordance to [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] position.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]刚刚成为君主的配偶时，[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族已十分喜悦。而今 [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]成为了国家的摄政，他们更是欣喜若狂。[Root.Monarch.GetName]现在是这个国家里数一数二强大的[Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]，而[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]家族现在已经把事情摆明了：他们希望得到一个更合适的地位……

original: What kind of [Root.Monarch.GetDaughterSon] would [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] be if [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] did not help?
translation: 如果[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]不伸出援手，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]算是个什么样的[Root.Monarch.GetDaughterSon]呀？

original: The [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] will remember that we came to their help.
translation: [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族将会谨记我们的帮助。

original: The Crown will fund development of the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] lands.
translation: 王室将会致力于提高[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]土地的发展度。

original: The Crown will pay off some of the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] debt.
translation: 王室将会帮助[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]偿还一些债务。

original: The Crown will further the interests of the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] faction in the realm.
translation: 王室将会帮助[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]的派系在国内发展壮大。

original: The Crown will help get rid of an uncooperative advisor.
translation: 王室将会协助摆脱一名不合作的顾问。

original: Officers from the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family will be favored for promotion regardless of merit.
translation: 无论政绩如何，[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族中的官员都将更容易晋升。

original: Officers from the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family will be favored for promotion regardless of merit.
translation: 无论政绩如何，[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族中的官员都将更容易晋升。

original: We will promote [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] interest when creating new legislation.
translation: 当我们起草新的法律时，我们将会考虑[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]的利益。

original: We could never allow [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] to missuse [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] Office.
translation: 我们绝不允许[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]耽搁[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]办公。

original: The family of our regent will take this very badly.
translation: 我们摄政的家族将会对此非常反感。

original: To Love and Be Loved
translation: 爱与被爱

original: A royal marriage is rarely a matter of love. Rather, it is a diplomatic opportunity which is not to be wasted. It is also of great importance that the future consort is of suitable status and it is advantageous if she or he is a foreigner, so as not to disturb the balance of internal politics. \n\nHowever, even a [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] can become lovestruck. Then all such matters seem to melt away - from [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] point of view, at least. A local from the [consort_home.GetName] province has caught [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s eye. [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] appears to be happier than ever, entirely and endlessly enamoured. While our nobles and advisors are less than pleased, the union between [Root.Monarch.GetName] and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] beloved has strong support among the commoners of the realm.
translation: 王室联姻鲜能见证真正的爱情，毕竟这是一个不容错过的外交机会。首先配偶必须门当户对，其次，为了不扰乱国内的政治平衡，他或她最好得来自国外。\n\n但是，即使是[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]也会坠入爱河。这些事宜在爱情面前显得暗淡无光，至少[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]观点是如此。一个[consort_home.GetName]的当地人让[Root.Monarch.GetName] 魂不守舍。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]完完全全地陷入了对那个人的爱慕当中，无法自拔，我们似乎还没见他如此快乐过。尽管我们的贵族和大臣对此颇有微词，然而[Root.Monarch.GetName]与[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]心上人这一对至爱的结合得到了国内普通老百姓强有力的支持。

original: Let the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] have [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] heart's desire.
translation: 让[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]顺从[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]内心的渴望。

original: Marrying a lowborn? Totally out of the question!
translation: 和一个出身卑贱的人结婚？不可能！

original: Consort of the People
translation: 亲民配偶

original: Our ruler's consort is loved by the commoners, which eases the otherwise strenuous friction between the elite and their subjects.
translation: 我们统治者的另一半受人民爱戴，缓和了上层集团和臣民之间的尖锐矛盾。

original: Home of Consort
translation: 配偶的家乡

original: Our ruler married a lowborn from this province, which is a source of great joy and pride for the local commoners.
translation: 我们的统治者迎娶了一个来自该省的平民，当地群众展现出无与伦比的喜悦与自豪。

original: Nobles Displeased With Consort
translation: 贵族对统治者配偶不满！

original: The nobles are less than pleased with their ruler's choice of consort.
translation: 贵族们非常不满于统治者对配偶的选择。

original: Family Ties
translation: 家庭关系

original: For the past couple of days we have been entertaining a guest from the royal court of [origin_country_of_consort.GetName], the once home of the [Root.Consort.GetTitle]. After a full week of hunting, feasting and gossiping with the family, [Root.Consort.GetName]'s sister is finally preparing to return to [origin_country_of_consort.Capital.GetCapitalName]. She assures us that she has had a wonderful time and that the royal family simply must come to visit [origin_country_of_consort.Capital.GetCapitalName] soon. With delight in her voice she says that she'll make certain to inform everybody back home about how the young heir to the [Root.GovernmentName] of [Root.GetName] is the spitting image of her dear [Root.Consort.GetSisterBrother] [Root.Consort.GetName].
translation: 在过去的几天里，我们一直在招待一位客人，她来自[origin_country_of_consort.GetName]的王室，[Root.Consort.GetTitle]曾经的家。她与我们的家庭成员一同打猎、飨宴、谈天说地，共度了美好的一周。现在，[Root.Consort.GetName]的妹妹终于要准备回到[origin_country_of_consort.Capital.GetCapitalName]了。她告诉我们她这周玩的很尽兴，也热情地邀请我们的王室成员去[origin_country_of_consort.Capital.GetCapitalName]作客。她洋溢着高兴的神情，表示一定要向家族里的每一个人夸耀一番[Root.GetName][Root.GovernmentName]未来的领袖，“和我亲爱的[Root.Consort.GetSisterBrother][Root.Consort.GetName]简直是一个模子里雕出来的！”

original: For the past couple of days we have been entertaining a guest from the royal court of [origin_country_of_consort.GetName], the once home of the [Root.Consort.GetTitle]. After a full week of hunting, feasting and gossiping with the family, [Root.Consort.GetName]'s cousin is finally preparing to return to [origin_country_of_consort.Capital.GetCapitalName]. She assures us that she has had a wonderful time and it is with a deep bow of gratitude that she says she'll make certain to inform everybody back home about how kind the great [Root.GovernmentName] of [Root.Country.GetName] has been to her, and continues to be to her beloved cousin.
translation: 在过去的几天里，我们一直在招待一位客人，她来自[origin_country_of_consort.GetName]的王室，[Root.Consort.GetTitle]曾经的家。她与我们的家庭成员一同打猎、飨宴、谈天说地，共度了美好的一周。现在，[Root.Consort.GetName]的表妹终于要准备回到[origin_country_of_consort.Capital.GetCapitalName]了。她告诉我们她这周玩的很尽兴，并深深地向我们鞠了一躬，“我一定要向家乡的每一个人称赞[Root.Country.GetName][Root.GovernmentName]热情的待客之道！”“不要忘了，我一直都会是你心爱的表妹。”

original: This is what kin means.
translation: 亲人就是要这样。

original: The royal family in §Y[origin_country_of_consort.GetName]§! will learn of the pleasantries exchanged.
translation: §Y[origin_country_of_consort.GetName]§! 的王室将会了解到这场愉快的会晤。

original: We Are Kin
translation: 我们是亲人

original: The Royal Heretic
translation: 王室异端

original: The people of [Root.Country.GetName] were pleased when [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] announced [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] marriage to [Root.Consort.GetName]. At the time little was said about [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] origin or [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] upbringing in [origin_country_of_consort.Capital.GetCapitalName] - to most common folk in [Root.Country.GetName] royals are a breed of their own and they care little for such details. However, rumors bringing these issues to light have recently begun to spread... Some say that the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] has refused to let go of [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] old [origin_country_of_consort.Religion.GetName] faith - while the people may have understood the need for a marriage with foreigners they are less likely to do so when it comes to being ruled by a heretic.
translation: 当[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]宣布与[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis][Root.Consort.GetName]结为夫妻的消息传来，[Root.Country.GetName]的人民欢欣雀跃。在那会儿没几个人对[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的出身和[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]在[origin_country_of_consort.Capital.GetCapitalName]成长的经历产生怀疑——对于大多数[Root.Country.GetName]的普通百姓来说，王室成员的生平也与自己无关，自然也没必要去操劳那些琐事。然而，最近流传的一些流言蜚语让人们开始讨论这些话题了……一些人说[Root.Consort.GetTitle]并不愿放弃[Root.Consort.GetHerHis][origin_country_of_consort.Religion.GetName]信仰——虽然百姓或许能理解为什么我们要与外国人通婚，但是他们并不愿意被异端统治。

original: How dare they?
translation: 他们好大的胆子！

original: The [Root.Consort.GetTitle] is beyond reproach - the commoners will get over these rumors in time.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle]是无可非议的——流言终将随着时间从人民的记忆里消逝。

original: [Root.Consort.GetName] is more trouble than [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] is worth.
translation: 和[Root.Consort.GetName]的婚姻简直就是一桩赔本生意。

original: Attempt to divorce the [Root.Consort.GetTitle]. The royal family in §Y[origin_country_of_consort.GetName]§! will learn of this.
translation: 试图与[Root.Consort.GetTitle]离婚。§Y[origin_country_of_consort.GetName]§! 的王室会知道此事的。

original: Heretic Royalty
translation: 王室中的异端

original: The people are upset about the presumed heretic beliefs of the royal consort.
translation: 人们对君主配偶可能的异端信仰感到不满。

original: Matters of State
translation: 国家事务

original: The people of our great [Root.GovernmentName] are well aware of our dispute with [origin_country_of_consort.GetName]. Considering that this is also the homeland of our [Root.Consort.GetTitle] it is no wonder that [Root.Consort.GetName] has been met with increasing animosity. For all they know [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] could be harboring loyalties towards the old country, or worse - [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] could be a spy! And is it not a funny coincidence, the nobles argue, that the great [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has become so dependent on the advice of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] spouse?\n\nOur military advisor $ARMY_ORGANISER$$ARMY_REFORMER$$COMMANDANT$$GRAND_CAPTAIN$$MASTER_RECRUITER$$MILITARY_ENGINEER$$QUARTERMASTER$ has gone so far as to threaten to leave court if the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] does not distance [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] from the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] and [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] untrustworthy whispers.
translation: 我伟大[Root.GovernmentName]的人民对我国与[origin_country_of_consort.GetName]的争端有着充分的认识。而那正是我们敬爱的[Root.Consort.GetTitle]的家乡，因此对[Root.Consort.GetName]的与日俱增的敌意也就不足为奇了。据他们所知[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]可能怀有对故国的忠诚，甚至还可能在为[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]的母国从事间谍活动！更可怕的是，我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]越来越对[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]枕边人言听计从，这难道只是一个有趣的巧合吗？贵族们争辩道。\n\n现在，我们的军事顾问$ARMY_ORGANISER$$ARMY_REFORMER$$COMMANDANT$$GRAND_CAPTAIN$$MASTER_RECRUITER$$MILITARY_ENGINEER$$QUARTERMASTER$竟不惜以卸去宫中职务为要挟，直言不讳地要求[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]不要轻信[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的谗言并与[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]的[Root.Consort.GetTitle]保持距离。

original: The [Root.Consort.GetTitle] needs our support.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle]需要我们的支持。

original: §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! has our trust - who cares about a lowly advisor?
translation: 我们当然信任§Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! ——谁会在乎一个无足轻重的顾问？

original: Some distance wouldn't hurt.
translation: 保持些距离也无妨。

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will prohibit [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] spouse from uttering a single word in matters of state.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]将会禁止[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]配偶在国家的任何事务上发表言论。

original: Some Love Lost
translation: 零落的爱

original: After pressure from nobles and advisors, our ruler has chosen to openly doubt the trustworthiness of their consort.
translation: 在贵族和顾问的压力下，我们的统治者决定公开质疑其配偶的可信度。

original: The Skills of the [Root.Consort.GetTitle]
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle]的才华

original: Ever since [Root.Consort.GetName] arrived at court [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] has taken a great interest in the administrative affairs of [Root.GetName]. It has reached a point where the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] has become something of an authority on matters relating staff and running the castle, trusted not only by the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] but by the nobility in general. Rarely has the [Root.GovernmentName] seen such efficiency.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetName]来到宫廷后不久就对[Root.GetName]的行政事务表现出了浓厚的兴趣。[Root.Consort.GetTitle]很快就成为了管理人员和经营城堡的权威，不仅是[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]，大多数贵族也对[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]十分放心，毕竟做事如此高效的人在我们[Root.GovernmentName]并不多见。

original: Anybody who has had any sort verbal interaction with [Root.Consort.GetName] can attest to the fact that [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] has a way with words. Whether [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] was schooled to become a diplomat or not, dealing with foreign ministers and delicate matters of the court appears to be something the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] is well suited for - it would seem [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] mere presence has a calming effect on people.
translation: 任何和[Root.Consort.GetName]有过言语交流的人都能证明[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]确实在言辞方面很有一套。就算没有接受过外交官训练，与各国外长的往来以及宫廷中的微妙事务似乎也非常适合[Root.Consort.GetTitle]——只要[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]在场，什么样的气氛都能变得十分平静愉快，这似乎就是[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]天分。

original: [Root.Consort.GetName] is becoming well-known for [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] interest in the military. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] is often seen walking with our generals, engaged in deep conversation, and [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] has even begun attending the council of war. At first it seemed that the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] was simply curious and wanted to learn about military strategy, but recently [Root.Consort.GetName] has moved on to offering [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] own advice - advice which people listen to. It is clear that the [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan] is suited for these matters.
translation: 大家都知道[Root.Consort.GetName]对军事有着浓厚的兴趣。 经常有人看到[Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]和我们的将军密切交流，不仅如此，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]甚至还会参加军事会议。一开始我们以为[Root.Consort.GetTitle]只是对军务很好奇，想借机了解一些军事策略。但最近我们发现[Root.Consort.GetName]常常提出[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]军事见解，且良策屡出。很明显，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]是个很适合做这类事的[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]。

original: Even before [Root.Consort.GetName] married into the highest ranks of nobility that [Root.GetName] has to offer, the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] was known to be a multi-faceted [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan], often impressing many a guest with [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] scholarly intellect and wit, while also displaying an impressive knowledge of military strategy. Perhaps this is why [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] was chosen as the royal spouse? Regardless, since [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] arrival at court, the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] has continued to make an outstanding impression on noble and commoner alike.
translation: 早在[Root.Consort.GetName]嫁入宫中成为[Root.GetName]最为尊贵的[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]之前，我们的[Root.Consort.GetTitle]就因其才华闻名天下了。[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]博学多识与聪慧机敏时常给客人留下深刻印象，而[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]兵法见识也令人啧啧称奇。也许这就是我们选择了[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]的原因吧。无论如何，[Root.Consort.GetTitle]嫁入宫中后，贵族和百姓仍对其刮目相看。

original: [Root.Consort.GetName] is a blessing.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetName]是上天的赐福。

original: The world needs more people like [Root.Consort.GetName].
translation: 这个世界需要更多像[Root.Consort.GetName] 一样的人。

original: We always have use for strategists.
translation: 战略专家当然是多多益善啦。

original: Such an asset, this [Root.Consort.GetName].
translation: [Root.Consort.GetName]就像是我们珍贵的宝物。

original: In the Head of [Root.Consort.GetName]
translation: [Root.Consort.GetName]的思绪

original: The [Root.Consort.GetTitle] has been pacing the palace lately, [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] head hung low, only stopping sometimes to longingly gaze out the window. Life is quite different here, compared to [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] old country of [origin_country_of_consort.GetName], a nation some call our enemy nowadays. Where does that leave [Root.Consort.GetName], as a traitor to at least one side of it? [Root.Consort.GetName] shakes [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] head - such thoughts help no one, [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] place is here, in [Root.GetName], by the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].\n\nWhen doubt besets [Root.Consort.GetHerHim] [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] tends to seek out the young [Root.Heir.GetName], as the innocent laughter and calm eyes of [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] [Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon] usually brings a smile to [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] face. Today, however, not even this helps. Perhaps it's the weather?
translation: 近来[Root.Consort.GetTitle]常常在皇宫里不安地彷徨着，[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]心情忧郁不愿抬头，只是偶尔伫立着凝视窗外。故国[origin_country_of_consort.GetName]的生活和这儿的大为不同，然而[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]家乡已是今日之敌。[Root.Consort.GetName]无论站在哪边都意味着背叛，这到底该怎么办才好？[Root.Consort.GetName]摇了摇头，沉醉在这些思绪里并没有什么用，[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]家就在这里，就在[Root.GetName]陪伴着[Root.Consort.GetHerHis][Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。\n\n每当愁思纠缠着[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]便会想看看年轻的[Root.Heir.GetName]，[Root.Consort.GetHerHis][Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon]那纯真的欢笑和平静的双眸总是能为[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]脸上带来几分欣慰的微笑。但是今天就连这点慰藉都无济于事了，或许只是天气不好吧……

original:
The [Root.Consort.GetTitle] has been pacing the palace lately, [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] head hung low, only stopping sometimes to longingly gaze out the window. Life is quite different here, compared to [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] old country of [origin_country_of_consort.GetName], a nation some call our enemy. Where does that leave [Root.Consort.GetName], as a traitor to at least one side of it? In spite of some effort, [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] accent still gives [Root.Consort.GetHerHim] away, constantly reminding people of [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] roots - will [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] ever truly be one of them? 

[Root.Consort.GetName] shakes [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] head. Such thoughts help no one, [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] place is here, in [Root.GetName], by the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. However, the knowledge that the royal couple has yet to produce an heir is not alleviating any stress either...

Having spent yet another quiet meal in [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] company it is obvious even to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] that [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] spouse is a bit overwhelmed, either with boredom, with restlessness, or maybe by something more melancholic in nature.
translation:
近来[Root.Consort.GetTitle]常常在皇宫里不安地彷徨着，[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]心情忧郁不愿抬头，只是偶尔伫立着凝视窗外。故国[origin_country_of_consort.GetName]的生活和这儿的大为不同，然而[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]祖国是我们的敌人。[Root.Consort.GetName]无论站在哪边都意味着背叛，这到底该怎么办才好？尽管费了好些心思来掩饰[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]异国口音，不经意间的暴露仍然不断地提醒着人们[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]根在哪。那[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]真的能成为他们的同胞吗？ 

[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]摇了摇头，沉醉在这些思绪里并没有什么用，[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]家就在这里，就在[Root.GetName]陪伴着[Root.Consort.GetHerHis][Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。然而雪上加霜的是，这对夫妻至今还没有一个继承人。

[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]爱人陪伴下又共享了一顿沉默的晚餐，但就是[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]本人也能看得出[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]爱人被愁思缠绕着，说不出那是乏味，是烦躁，还是什么更为阴郁的想法……

original: We have to do something about this.
translation: 我们必须为此做点什么。

original: Arrange a feast be held in the name of the [Root.Consort.GetTitle]. This ought to make people happy and [Root.Consort.GetName] feel more at home.
translation: 以[Root.Consort.GetTitle]的名义安排一场盛大的宴会。这应该会取悦人们，并让[Root.Consort.GetName]感受家庭的温情。

original: Being [Root.Consort.GetTitle] can be demanding sometimes.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle]有时要求真是高。

original: Best [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] get used to it.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetSheHe]最好已经习惯了。

original: Life of the Party
translation: 宴会人生

original: In addition to gaining some renown for being a delight to be around, the royal consort has become a symbol of the social elite - wherever they go the nobility follows, eager to be the one to make the consort smile.
translation: 王室的配偶不仅以在社交场上广受欢迎而博取盛名，还成为了名流的象征——贵族们亦步亦趋，不惜千金搏其一笑。

original: Royal Efficiency
translation: 统治效率

original: The royal consort has made it their mission to optimize the running of this country.
translation: 王室的配偶将优化国家的治理视为其使命

original: Royal Mediator
translation: 王室调解人

original: The royal consort is a comfort to be around, soothing the nerves of any agitated negotiator and inspiring others.
translation: 王室配偶对旁人有种宽慰的力量，能使激愤者平静，使悲观者前行。

original: Expanded War Council
translation: 扩大的战争委员会

original: The royal consort is usually present during the council of war, adding their knowledge to the nation's militaristic efforts.
translation: 王室配偶常出席战争委员会并将其学识运用到国防建设工作中。

original: Times of Need
translation: 有需之时

original: The dynasty of our noble [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName], is certainly a powerful one. Through [Root.Monarch.GetName] they rule our nation and will do so for many years to come. However even the great are sometimes in need of help. Thankfully the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family has tied strong bonds to other great powers, such as the [marriage_partner.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] house led by no other than [marriage_partner.Monarch.GetName], [marriage_partner.Monarch.GetTitle] of [marriage_partner.GetName]. [marriage_partner.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] gracious [marriage_partner.Consort.GetWifeHusband] [marriage_partner.Consort.GetName] is a [marriage_partner.Consort.GetDaughterSon] of our own royal house and an invaluable contact. Perhaps we shall ask [marriage_partner.Consort.GetHerHim] if [marriage_partner.Consort.GetSheHe] can influence [marriage_partner.Consort.GetHerHis] [marriage_partner.Monarch.GetWifeHusband] to lend us a hand?
translation: 我高贵的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]治下的[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]王朝的强大是毋庸置疑的，这一家族已通过[Root.Monarch.GetName]执掌国家多年并将在可见的未来延续他们的统治。不过，即使是最强大的人也有需要帮助的时刻。幸运的是，[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族与其他强大的势力建立了牢固的羁绊，比如由[marriage_partner.GetName]的[marriage_partner.Monarch.GetTitle]，无以伦比的[marriage_partner.Monarch.GetName]领导的[marriage_partner.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族。[marriage_partner.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]亲切的[marriage_partner.Consort.GetWifeHusband][marriage_partner.Consort.GetName]是我们王室的[marriage_partner.Consort.GetDaughterSon]以及无价的纽带。也许我们可以问[marriage_partner.Consort.GetHerHim]是否能说服[marriage_partner.Consort.GetHerHis][marriage_partner.Monarch.GetWifeHusband]向我们伸出援手？

original: Our coffers are getting worryingly light.
translation: 我们的财政状况令人担忧。

original: Send a letter to [marriage_partner.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[marriage_partner.Consort.GetName]§! of [marriage_partner.GetName], asking [marriage_partner.Consort.GetHerHis] for money.
translation: 写信给[marriage_partner.GetName]的[marriage_partner.Consort.GetTitle]§Y[marriage_partner.Consort.GetName]§!，向[marriage_partner.Consort.GetHerHis]请求资金援助。

original: We do need some help managing our administration.
translation: 我们在行政管理上确实需要帮助。

original: Send a letter to [marriage_partner.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[marriage_partner.Consort.GetName]§! of [marriage_partner.GetName], asking [marriage_partner.Consort.GetHerHis] for administrative aid.
translation: 写信给[marriage_partner.GetName]的[marriage_partner.Consort.GetTitle]§Y[marriage_partner.Consort.GetName]§!，向[marriage_partner.Consort.GetHerHis]请求行政援助。

original: Our diplomats could surely learn from those of [marriage_partner.GetName].
translation: 我们的外交官当然可以向他们在[marriage_partner.GetName]那的同僚学习。

original: Send a letter to [marriage_partner.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[marriage_partner.Consort.GetName]§! of [marriage_partner.GetName], asking [marriage_partner.Consort.GetHerHis] for diplomatic aid.
translation: 写信给[marriage_partner.GetName]的[marriage_partner.Consort.GetTitle]§Y[marriage_partner.Consort.GetName]§!，向[marriage_partner.Consort.GetHerHis]请求外交援助。

original: Perhaps we can borrow one of [marriage_partner.Monarch.GetTitle] [marriage_partner.Monarch.GetName]'s generals?
translation: 也许我们可以向[marriage_partner.Monarch.GetTitle][marriage_partner.Monarch.GetName]借一个将军？

original: Send a letter to [marriage_partner.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[marriage_partner.Consort.GetName]§! of [marriage_partner.GetName], asking [marriage_partner.Consort.GetHerHis] for military aid.
translation: 写信给[marriage_partner.GetName]的[marriage_partner.Consort.GetTitle]§Y[marriage_partner.Consort.GetName]§!，向[marriage_partner.Consort.GetHerHis]请求军事援助。

original: We are in need of more men for our army.
translation: 我们的军队需要更多的人。

original: Send a letter to [marriage_partner.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[marriage_partner.Consort.GetName]§! of [marriage_partner.GetName], asking [marriage_partner.Consort.GetHerHis] for manpower.
translation: 写信给[marriage_partner.GetName]的[marriage_partner.Consort.GetTitle]§Y[marriage_partner.Consort.GetName]§!，向[marriage_partner.Consort.GetHerHis]请求人力支援。

original: We do not need any help from [marriage_partner.GetName] or house [marriage_partner.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]!
translation: 我们不需要[marriage_partner.GetName]或是[marriage_partner.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族的任何帮助！

original: Friends in Need
translation: 患难之交

original: The [Root.Consort.GetTitle] of our illustrious [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], [Root.Consort.GetName], recently brought us a request from [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] family, house [From.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] of [From.GetName]. Apparently [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] is in dire need of money and has asked us, '[From.Monarch.GetHerHis] most trusted friends', if we can contribute in any way. [From.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] letter is filled with compliments on our great economy.
