Apparently [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has been facing some serious issues concerning the training of [From.GetName]'s soldiers and [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] has asked us, '[From.Monarch.GetHerHis] most trusted friends', if we can help in any way. [From.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] letter is filled with compliments on our fine army and brilliant generals.
translation: 最近，我们英明[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的[Root.Consort.GetTitle]，[Root.Consort.GetName]，给我们带来了一条来自[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]家中，[From.GetName]的[From.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族的请求。显然，[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]在训练[From.GetName]士兵时遇到一些严重的问题，所以[From.Monarch.GetSheHe]请求我们，「[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]最信任的朋友」，向他们提供任意形式的援助。[From.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]的信件中充满了对我们雄壮的军队和杰出的将领的赞美。

original: The [Root.Consort.GetTitle] of our illustrious [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], [Root.Consort.GetName], recently brought us a request from [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] family, house [From.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] of [From.GetName]. Apparently [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has been troubled with a severe lack of manpower for [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] army and [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] has asked us, ‘[From.Monarch.GetHerHis] most trusted friends', if we can help in any way. [From.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] letter is filled with compliments on our brave soldiers and thriving population.
translation: 最近，我们英明[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的[Root.Consort.GetTitle]，[Root.Consort.GetName]，给我们带来了一条来自[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]家中，[From.GetName]的[From.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族的请求。显然，[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]正苦恼于[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]军队面临的巨大的人力缺口，所以[From.Monarch.GetSheHe]请求我们，「[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]最信任的朋友」，向他们提供任意形式的援助。[From.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]信件中充满了对我们勇猛的士兵和兴旺的人丁的赞美。

original: We can surely spare some coin for our [From.GetAdjective] friends.
translation: 我们可以为我们的[From.GetAdjective]朋友们省出一笔钱。

original: We will send some of our best administrators to help them.
translation: 我们会派一些优秀的公务员去帮助他们。

original: A couple of our most talented diplomats will be sent to aid them.
translation: 我们将派出我们最有才华的外交官去帮助他们。

original: One of our best generals will be sent to teach them about our methods.
translation: 我们将派出一名最好的将军去指导他们军事技法。

original: Some able-bodied men shall be sent to [From.GetName] in their time of need.
translation: 我们将派一些壮丁来支援[From.GetName]。

original: And what would we get in return? No, never!
translation: 从中我们又能得到什么回报呢？不，我们拒绝！

original: A Helping Hand
translation: 伸出援手

original: Finally we have heard back from dearest [From.Consort.GetName] regarding our request for [From.Consort.GetHerHis] [From.Monarch.GetWifeHusband]. The most noble [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has decided to grant it! The reply returned with coffers of gold to fill our emptying treasury. A letter of thanks shall be sent immediately to the generous [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]. Long may [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] reign!
translation: 最终我们从亲爱的[From.Consort.GetName]处得知了[From.Consort.GetHerHis][From.Monarch.GetWifeHusband]对我们请求的回复。无比高贵的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]已经答应了我们的请求！这一回复伴随着的是足以填满我们亏空的国库的金币。我们毫无疑问应当立马向慷慨的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]致以一封感谢函。愿[From.Monarch.GetSheHe]国运长久！

original: Finally we have heard back from dearest [From.Consort.GetName] regarding our request for [From.Consort.GetHerHis] [From.Monarch.GetWifeHusband]. The most noble [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has decided to grant it! The reply was carried back by some of [From.GetName]'s finest administrators, who are here to advise us on matters of running our country. A letter of thanks shall be sent immediately to the generous [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]. Long may [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] reign!
translation: 最终我们从亲爱的[From.Consort.GetName]处得知了[From.Consort.GetHerHis][From.Monarch.GetWifeHusband]对我们请求的回复。无比高贵的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]已经答应了我们的请求！这一回复由[From.GetName]的一群最优秀的公务员所带来，他们将为我们的行政事务提供宝贵的建议。我们毫无疑问应当立马向慷慨的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]致以一封感谢函。愿[From.Monarch.GetSheHe]国运长久！

original: Finally we have heard back from dearest [From.Consort.GetName] regarding our request for [From.Consort.GetHerHis] [From.Monarch.GetWifeHusband]. The most noble [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has decided to grant it! The reply was carried back by some of [From.GetName]'s finest diplomats, who are here to teach our own representatives. A letter of thanks shall be sent immediately to the generous [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]. Long may [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] reign!
translation: 最终我们从亲爱的[From.Consort.GetName]处得知了[From.Consort.GetHerHis][From.Monarch.GetWifeHusband]对我们请求的回复。无比高贵的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]已经答应了我们的请求！这一回复由[From.GetName]的一群最优秀的外交官所带来，他们将对我们的外交代表进行培训。我们毫无疑问应当立马向慷慨的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]致以一封感谢函。愿[From.Monarch.GetSheHe]国运长久！

original: Finally we have heard back from dearest [From.Consort.GetName] regarding our request for [From.Consort.GetHerHis] [From.Monarch.GetWifeHusband]. The most noble [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has decided to grant it! The reply was carried back by one of [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] finest generals, who is here to teach our own officers about how military training is conducted in [From.GetName]. A letter of thanks shall be sent immediately to the generous [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]. Long may [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] reign!
translation: 最终我们从亲爱的[From.Consort.GetName]处得知了[From.Consort.GetHerHis][From.Monarch.GetWifeHusband]对我们请求的回复。无比高贵的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]已经答应了我们的请求！这一回复由[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]一位最优秀的将军所带回，他将指导我们的军官建立[From.GetName]式的军事训练制度。我们毫无疑问应当立马向慷慨的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]致以一封感谢函。愿[From.Monarch.GetSheHe]国运长久！

original: Finally we have heard back from dearest [From.Consort.GetName] regarding our request for [From.Consort.GetHerHis] [From.Monarch.GetWifeHusband]. The most noble [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has decided to grant it! The reply was sent back to us together with a fine troop of [From.GetAdjective] recruits. A letter of thanks shall be sent immediately to the generous [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]. Long may [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] reign!
translation: 最终我们从亲爱的[From.Consort.GetName]处得知了[From.Consort.GetHerHis][From.Monarch.GetWifeHusband]对我们请求的回复。无比高贵的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]已经答应了我们的请求！他的回复已经与一队[From.GetAdjective]的新兵一同到达。我们毫无疑问应当立马向慷慨的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]致以一封感谢函。愿[From.Monarch.GetSheHe]国运长久！

original: We always knew we had a friend in [From.GetName].
translation: 我们就知道[From.GetName]有我们的朋友。

original: Broken Promises
translation: 被打破的承诺

original: When we married our [From.Consort.GetName] to the [From.GetAdjective] [From.Monarch.GetTitle], we thought a strong bond had been formed between our countries. While we would never dishonor our part in this deal, apparently [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] hold no such qualms. [From.Consort.GetName]'s letter of response reached us today. Not only did [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] refuse our request, [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] also had the nerve to reproach us for our ‘outrageous demands'!
translation: 当我们的[From.Consort.GetName]与[From.GetAdjective]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle]联姻的时候，我们认为两国之间已经形成了牢固的联盟。我们绝不会容许自己在这件事情上蒙羞，但[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]显然并没有这种荣誉感。今天我们收到了[From.Consort.GetName]的回信。[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]不仅回绝了我们的要求，居然还厚颜无耻地指责我们「要求过分」！

original: This offense will not be forgotten.
translation: 我们绝不会忘记这次冒犯。

original: In the Heart of [Root.Consort.GetName]
translation: 在[Root.Consort.GetName]的心中

original: The [Root.Consort.GetTitle] made not one, but several friends during the feast arranged in [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] name. In spite of it being many months ago, the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] has maintained these connections with little effort, and with the aid of one noble[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan] in particular [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] has enjoyed learning everything there is to know about courtly life in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] - there are so many parties, hunts, and feasts to attend!\nThe people of [Root.GetName] really are not that bad, [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] thinks, looking out the window of the palace. Lately [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] smiles at the landscape outside, realizing that even though [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] will always treasure [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] time in the old country, [Root.Consort.GetName] has found a new home.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle]并非孤身一人，而是和几个朋友以[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的名义参加了宴会。尽管这是几个月前的事了,但[Root.Consort.GetTitle]很轻松就维持了这些关系，并且在一个贵族[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]的帮助下， [Root.Consort.GetSheHe]开始享受学习[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的宫廷生活的方方面面的过程—— 有那么多的聚会，狩猎和宴会要参加！\n[Root.GetName]的人民其实并没有那么糟糕，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]凝望着宫殿的窗外想到。一会儿， [Root.Consort.GetSheHe]面对着美丽的风景笑了笑,意识到即使 [Root.Consort.GetSheHe]再无法割舍[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]故国时光，[Root.Consort.GetName]还是找到了一个新家.

original: May [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] carry it in [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] heart forever.
translation: 愿[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]永远将它放在[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]心中。

original: Grateful for Aid
translation: 对援助表示感谢

original: Denied Aid
translation: 拒绝援助

original: Outrageous Demands
translation: 无理的要求

original: A Royal Influence
translation: 王室的影响

original: With the marriage between [Root.Monarch.GetName] and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] [Root.Consort.GetWifeHusband] [Root.Consort.GetName] the people of [Root.GetName] are experiencing an increased fondness for all things [origin_country_of_consort.GetAdjective]. While some cultural exchange was to be expected, particularly considering the popularity of the [Root.Consort.GetTitle], it is with alarm that our administrative advisor [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] reports that a religious shift has been taking place in one of our provinces. It would seem that the influence of our [origin_country_of_consort.GetAdjective] [Root.Consort.GetTitle] trickles down even into our subjects' way of worship, as the words of the [origin_country_of_consort.Religion.GetName] believers have converted a surprising amount of people...\n\nWhen confronted about it, [Root.Consort.GetName] shrugs, arguing that [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] has long since converted to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith and the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] should know that. 'I had nothing to do with this', [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] pleads.
translation: 在[Root.Monarch.GetName]与[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis][Root.Consort.GetWifeHusband][Root.Consort.GetName]的婚礼之后，[Root.GetName]的人民越来越有喜爱一切有关[origin_country_of_consort.GetAdjective]的事。虽然文化交流并不意外，[Root.Consort.GetTitle]又如此受欢迎，但我们的行政顾问[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]报告说，我们一个省份的宗教信仰发生了转变。这种影响似乎是由于来自[origin_country_of_consort.GetAdjective]的[Root.Consort.GetTitle]，甚至渗透到了臣民的敬拜礼仪中，就像[origin_country_of_consort.Religion.GetName]的信徒所说的一样，他们已经使很多人转信……\n\n当面对这一问题时，[Root.Consort.GetName]耸耸肩，争辩说[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]早皈依[Root.Religion.GetName]的信仰了，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]应该知道这点。「我和这些事并没有任何关系」，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]辩称到。

original: [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] must publicly denounce [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] old faith!
translation: [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]必须公开谴责[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]旧信仰！

original: So be it.
translation: 顺其自然。

original: Angered Believers
translation: 被激怒的信徒

original: The royal consort has publicly denounced the religious rift in this area, hoping to change the mind of the people.
translation: 王室配偶公开谴责这一地区的宗教异端，希望以此来改变人们的想法。

original: The Ambitions of a [Root.Consort.GetTitle]
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle]的野心

original: It is no news that [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] has no fond feelings for the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s heir, [Root.Heir.GetName] [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName]. Ever since [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] arrived at court the friction between the two has been obvious and it has only gotten worse since the birth of the [Root.Consort.GetTitle]'s first child. Of course [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] would much rather see [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] own progeny on the throne. For quite some time now [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] has silently been pulling the strings to make it happen, convincing - or bribing - the right people and grooming [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] eldest at the best of [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] abilities. However, it was not until yesterday [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] confronted our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and demanded that it was time for a new heir to be appointed.
translation: 显而易见，[Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName]对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的继承人[Root.Heir.GetName] [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName]完全没有好感. 自从[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]来到宫廷后， 两人总是争锋相对， 特别是当[Root.Consort.GetTitle]的第一个孩子出世后，情况就变得更加糟糕.[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]当然希望看到[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]自己的后代继承王位. 在相当长的时间里[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]一直为实现野心在暗中操控，去威逼利诱有用的人，去包装[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的长子地位，[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]尽了全力. 但是就在昨天[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]质问我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]并要求是时候任命一个新的继承人了.

original: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName]'s eldest is a legitimate choice, there is no doubt about it.
translation: 毫无疑问，[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]的长子是个合适的人选。

original: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!'s eldest child becomes the heir of [Root.GetName].
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!的长子成为了[Root.GetName]的继承人.

original: How dare [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] question [Root.Heir.GetName]'s claim to the throne?
translation: [Root.Consort.GetSheHe]怎么敢质疑[Root.Heir.GetName]的继承权？

original: §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName] remains as the heir of [Root.GetName].
translation: §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName]依旧是[Root.GetName]的继承人.

original: Playing Favorites
translation: 最喜欢的孩子

original: They say that a parent's love for their child is without limits, but it is obvious that some loves are more limitless than others. While [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] is certainly fond of [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] eldest, [Root.Heir.GetName] [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName], everyone knows that [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] sister has the bigger place in [Root.Consort.GetName]'s heart. The [Root.Consort.GetTitle] dotes on her and has made sure that she has had the very best education. Now [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] is trying to make [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] favorite daughter the new heir of [Root.GetName].
translation: 有人说父母对孩子的爱是无限的，但是明显的是有些爱比其他的更胜一筹。尽管[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]肯定很喜欢[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的长子，[Root.Heir.GetName] [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName]，人人都知道[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]的姐姐在[Root.Consort.GetName]的心中更受偏爱。[Root.Consort.GetTitle]宠爱她并确保她接受了最好的教育。现在[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]想要让[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]最喜欢的女儿成为[Root.GetName]的新继承人。

original: They say that a parent's love for their child is without limits, but it is obvious that some loves are more limitless than others. While [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] is certainly fond of [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] eldest, [Root.Heir.GetName] [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName], everyone knows that [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] brother has the bigger place in [Root.Consort.GetName]'s heart. The [Root.Consort.GetTitle] dotes on him and has made sure that he has had the very best education. Now [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] is trying to make [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] favorite son the new heir of [Root.GetName].
translation: 有人说父母对孩子的爱是无限的，但是明显的是有些爱比其他的更胜一筹。尽管[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]肯定很喜欢[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的长子，[Root.Heir.GetName] [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName]，人人都知道[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]的哥哥在[Root.Consort.GetName]的心中更受偏爱。[Root.Consort.GetTitle]宠爱他并确保他接受了最好的教育。现在[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]想要让[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]最喜欢的儿子成为[Root.GetName]的新继承人。

original: It's not a bad idea. [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName]'s favorite is exceptionally clever.
translation: 这主意不错。[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]最喜欢的就是绝顶聪明的人。

original: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName]'s favorite child becomes the heir of [Root.GetName].
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]最喜欢的孩子成为了[Root.GetName]的继承人。

original: Perhaps a seat on the council would be a suitable alternative?
translation: 也许内阁的席位将是一个合适的选择？

original: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!'s favorite child becomes an advisor to [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!最喜欢的孩子成为了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!的顾问。

original: An Empty Crib
translation: 空床

original: It has been several years since the marriage between [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] and [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] took place, and yet they have not been blessed with a child. People are starting to get worried about the country's future as there is no heir to the throne. There have been vicious rumors going around regarding infertility, both on [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s and the [Root.Consort.GetTitle]'s account. We should do something about the situation, not only to secure the future of [Root.GetName], but also to protect the honor of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]与[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]的婚礼已经举行了很多年了，但是他们仍然没有子嗣。由于没有王位继承人，人们开始担心国家的未来。有关不孕症的谣言到处流传，传言[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]和[Root.Consort.GetTitle]都有问题。我们必须采取行动来应对这一局势，不仅为了确保[Root.GetName]的未来，也是为了维护我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的名誉。

original: It is obviously [Root.Consort.GetName]'s fault. The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] needs another [Root.Consort.GetTitle].
translation: 这很明显是[Root.Consort.GetName]的错。[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]需要换一个 [Root.Consort.GetTitle]。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has a distant cousin who might be a decent option.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]有一个远房表亲，也许是不错的选择。

original: A distant cousin of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§! becomes the heir of [Root.GetName].
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!的一位远房表亲成为了 [Root.GetName]的继承人。

original: We must be patient. It will happen, eventually.
translation: 我们一定要有耐心，一定能怀上孩子的

original: Give [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! another chance, even though it will do nothing to end the rumors.
translation: 再多给[Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! 些时间，虽然这并不能终结流言.

original: Like [Root.Consort.GetMotherFather], like [Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon]
translation: 龙生龙，凤生凤

original: During the years, our noble [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] has impressed us time and time again with [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] excellent knowledge and skill. [Root.Consort.GetHerHisCap] grasp on military tactics surpass that of many high-ranking officers in our army and [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] swordsmanship would make her a formidable foe on the battlefield. [Root.Consort.GetName] is clearly an educated [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan] and [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] interest in learning has sown a seed in [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] [Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon] [Root.Heir.GetName]. The apple does not fall far from the tree, indeed.
translation: 在这些年里，高贵的[Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]一次又一次的给我们留下了深刻的印象，特别是[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]卓越的知识和技能。[Root.Consort.GetHerHisCap]掌握的军事手段比我们军队中许多高级军官都要高超，[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的剑术在战场上将会使敌人闻风丧胆. [Root.Consort.GetName]显然是受过教育的精英，[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]和[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]对学习的兴趣与天赋在[Root.Consort.GetHerHis][Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon] [Root.Heir.GetName]的心中播下了种子.真是龙生龙，凤生凤.

original: During the years, our noble [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] has impressed us time and time again with [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] excellent knowledge and skill. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] has a great insight into the running of our nation and [Root.Consort.GetSheHe]'s quicker with numbers than any of our bookkeepers. [Root.Consort.GetName] is clearly an educated [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan] and [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] interest in learning has sown a seed in [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] [Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon] [Root.Heir.GetName]. The apple does not fall far from the tree, indeed.
translation: 在这些年里，高贵的[Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]一次又一次的给我们留下了深刻的印象，特别是[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]卓越的知识和技能. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]对治国理政深有洞见，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]的算数比我们的任何会计员都快. [Root.Consort.GetName]显然是受过教育的精英， [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]与[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]对学习的兴趣与天赋在[Root.Consort.GetHerHis][Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon] [Root.Heir.GetName]中播下了种子. 真是龙生龙，凤生凤.

original: During the years, our noble [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] has impressed us time and time again with [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] excellent knowledge and skill. In addition to possessing plenty of charisma and fine manners, [Root.Consort.GetSheHe]'s well-versed in the history and politics of every foreign power of note. [Root.Consort.GetName] is clearly an educated [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan] and [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] interest in learning has sown a seed in [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] [Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon] [Root.Heir.GetName]. The apple does not fall far from the tree, indeed.
translation: 在这些年里，高贵的[Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]一次又一次的给我们留下了深刻的印象，特别是[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]卓越的知识和技能. 除了拥有强大的魅力和良好的礼仪之外，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]对每一个外国势力的历史和政治都了如指掌. [Root.Consort.GetName]显然是受过教育的精英，[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]与[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]对学习的兴趣与天赋在[Root.Consort.GetHerHis][Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon] [Root.Heir.GetName]中播下了种子. 真是龙生龙，凤生凤.

original: [Root.Consort.GetName] will instruct [Root.Heir.GetName] on every administrative aspect of our nation's running.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetName]将会教导[Root.Heir.GetName]关于治国理政的方方面面.

original: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] spends some of [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] time educating §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName] on the subject of administration.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]耗费[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的精力来教导 §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName]关于行政方面的知识.

original: [Root.Consort.GetName] shall teach [Root.Heir.GetName] the finer points of politics.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetName]应该教会[Root.Heir.GetName]关于政治的精妙之处.

original: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] spends some of [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] time educating §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName] on the subject of diplomacy.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]耗费[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的精力来教育 §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName]关于外交方面的知识.

original: With [Root.Consort.GetName]'s help, [Root.Heir.GetName] will become a great general.
translation: 在[Root.Consort.GetName]的教导下，[Root.Heir.GetName]将会成为一个出色的将领.

original: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] spends some of [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] time educating §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName] on the subject of military.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]耗费[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的精力来教育 §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName]关于军事的知识.

original: The [Root.Consort.GetTitle] has better things to do than educating [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] [Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon]!
translation: 比起教育[Root.Consort.GetHerHis][Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon]，[Root.Consort.GetTitle]有更重要的事要做!

original: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName] is forbidden to teach §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName].
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! [Root.Consort.Dynasty.GetName]禁止教育§Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName].

original: Angered Nobles
translation: 愤怒的贵族

original: A powerful noble house in this province is outraged by the ruler divorcing the consort from their family.
translation: 在这个省份中，一个强大的贵族被统治者与其家族成员的离婚所激怒了.

original: Offended by Divorce
translation: 提出离婚

original: The primary consort, §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!, is set aside and a new primary consort is chosen among [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!'s other spouses.
translation: §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!被打入冷宫后，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!在其他的配偶中重新选择了一个。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§! divorces [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!与[Root.Consort.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!离婚了。

original: Papal Authority
translation: 教宗的权威

original: As devout Catholics, the only way to end a marriage is to request a special dispensation from the Pope, [PAP.Monarch.GetName]. Under normal circumstances, [PAP.Monarch.GetSheHe] would be very unlikely to grant such a request, however, if we can leverage some of our influence over [PAP.GetName], the Pope might have no option but to say yes.
translation: 作为虔诚的天主教徒，结束一段婚姻的唯一途径是得到教宗[PAP.Monarch.GetName]的特殊许可。在通常情况下，[PAP.Monarch.GetName]几乎不可能授予这项特权，但是，如果我们能够对[PAP.Monarch.GetName]施压，他可能别无选择只能同意这项请求。

original: As devout Catholics, the only way to end a marriage is to request a special dispensation from the Pope, [PAP.Monarch.GetName]. It is almost unheard of that [PAP.Monarch.GetSheHe] would grant such a request. If we only had some influence with [PAP.GetName], perhaps we could have leveraged it to change [PAP.Monarch.GetHerHis] mind, but it turns out that we are without power in this situation.
translation: 作为虔诚的天主教徒，结束一段婚姻的唯一途径便是得到教宗[PAP.Monarch.GetName]的特殊许可。[PAP.Monarch.GetName]几乎没听说过教宗会同意这样的请求。如果我们拥有更多的影响力，或许能够有机会使[PAP.Monarch.GetName]改变他的想法，但是事实证明，此时我们能力不足。

original: At least we can give it a try.
translation: 至少我们可以尝试一下

original: Expend §R25§! Papal Influence. It is not likely enough to sway [PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[PAP.Monarch.GetName]§!.
translation: 花费 §R25§! 教廷影响力。并不足以动摇[PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[PAP.Monarch.GetName]§!.

original: Inform the emissary of the importance of his mission.
translation: 告知使者这项任务的重要性

original: Expend §R50§! Papal Influence. It is as likely that this will convince [PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[PAP.Monarch.GetName]§! as that it won't.
translation: 花费 §R50§! 教廷影响力。我们有一半的可能性说服[PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[PAP.Monarch.GetName]§!

original: Spare no expenses! Our envoy shall be most impressive.
translation: 不惜一切代价！我们的使节必须是最引人注目的

original: Expend §R75§! Papal Influence. It is likely that this will sway [PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] [PAP.Monarch.GetName].
translation: 花费 §R75§! 教廷影响力。这将很有可能说服 [PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] [PAP.Monarch.GetName]。

original: Pull every string and call in every favor. The Pope will not deny us this!
translation: 竭尽我们所能。让教宗[PAP.Monarch.GetName]不会否决我们的请求！

original: Expend §R100§! Papal Influence. [PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[PAP.Monarch.GetName]§! is as good as guaranteed to be convinced.
translation: 花费 §R100§! 教廷影响力. [PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[PAP.Monarch.GetName]§!一定能够被说服。

original: Perhaps our influence is better used for other things.
translation: 或许我们的教廷影响力可以用于其他方面。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§! remains married to [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§! 保持婚姻和 [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!.

original: This is most embarrassing...
translation: 这就很尴尬了……

original: The Sanctity of Marriage
translation: 婚姻的圣洁

original: The Father has taught us that marriage, the union between a man and a woman, is holy. Once they have made their promise before God, nothing can break the link between them but death. However, life is sometimes more complicated that what can be read in the Bible. [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] of [From.GetName] is requesting an annulment of the marriage between [From.Monarch.GetHerHim] and [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] [From.Consort.GetWifeHusband], [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName]. Normally, we would not consider granting such a request under these circumstances, however, [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] does hold some influence over us.
translation: 神父告诉我们，婚姻，一个男人和一个女人的结合，是神圣不可侵犯的。一旦他们对上帝许下了诺言，就应该至死不渝。然而，生活有时比圣经的故事复杂得多。 [From.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]请求废除[From.Monarch.GetHerHim]和[From.Monarch.GetHerHis] [From.Consort.GetWifeHusband]—— [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName]之间的婚姻。通常，我们不会考虑这种情况下的请求，但是，[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]对我们的影响力不容小觑。

original: [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] will have [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] annulment.
translation: [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]将会获得[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]婚姻废除证明

original: God's law cannot be broken, not even by a [From.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 上帝的旨意不能被打破，即使是对于一位[From.Monarch.GetTitle]。

original: As [From.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[From.Monarch.GetName]§! has leveraged some of [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] influence over us, it will cost us §R13§! Devotion to refuse [From.Monarch.GetHerHim].
translation: 由于[From.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[From.Monarch.GetName]§! 对我们施加了一些 [From.Monarch.GetHerHis]影响力，这将花费我们 §R13§! 奉献度来拒绝[From.Monarch.GetHerHim]。

original: As [From.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[From.Monarch.GetName]§! has leveraged some of [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] influence over us, it will cost us §R25§! Devotion to refuse [From.Monarch.GetHerHim].
translation: 由于[From.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[From.Monarch.GetName]§! 对我们施加了一些[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]影响力，这将花费我们 §R25§! 奉献度来拒绝[From.Monarch.GetHerHim]。

original: As [From.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[From.Monarch.GetName]§! has leveraged some of [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] influence over us, it will cost us §R38§! Devotion to refuse [From.Monarch.GetHerHim].
translation: 由于[From.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[From.Monarch.GetName]§! 对我们施加了一些[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]影响力，这将花费我们 §R38§! 奉献度来拒绝[From.Monarch.GetHerHim]。

original: As [From.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[From.Monarch.GetName]§! has leveraged some of [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] influence over us, it will cost us §R50§! Devotion to refuse [From.Monarch.GetHerHim].
translation: 由于[From.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[From.Monarch.GetName]§! 对我们施加了一些[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]影响力，这将花费我们 §R50§! 奉献度来拒绝[From.Monarch.GetHerHim]。

original: A Special Dispensation
translation: 一项特许

original: Praise the Lord! We have received [PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] [PAP.Monarch.GetName]'s reply and our request for an annulment has been granted! Now we are free to end the marriage between our great [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], [Root.Monarch.GetName], and his consort [Root.Consort.GetName].
translation: 赞美主！我们收到了[PAP.Monarch.GetTitle][PAP.Monarch.GetName]的回复，我们对婚姻废除的申请被通过了！现在我们可以废除伟大的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName] 和他的配偶[Root.Consort.GetName]之间的婚姻了。

original: Not a day too early!
translation: 事不宜迟！

original: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§! divorces [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§! 与 [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!离婚了。

original: Perhaps we acted rashly. [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] can stay for now.
translation: 或许我们太心急了。 [Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]目前可以留下。

original: The marriage between [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§! and [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! remains.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§! 和[Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! 的婚姻保持。

original: The Sanctity of Marriage
translation: 婚姻的圣洁

original: We have received [PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] [PAP.Monarch.GetName]'s reply and sadly [PAP.Monarch.GetSheHe] has refused our request. There will be no annulment of the marriage between our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], [Root.Monarch.GetName], and his consort [Root.Consort.GetName].
translation: 我们收到了[PAP.Monarch.GetTitle][PAP.Monarch.GetName]的回复，很遗憾，[PAP.Monarch.GetSheHe]拒绝了我们的请求。[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，[Root.Monarch.GetName]和他的配偶[Root.Consort.GetName] 之间的婚姻将不会被废除。

original: The Gravest of Insults
translation: 奇耻大辱

original: Those filthy, lowly rats! How dare they insult us so! News have reached us that the marriage between the vile [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] and [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] [From.Consort.GetWifeHusband], our very own [From.Consort.GetName], has ended. [From.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] has thrown [From.Consort.GetHerHim] aside, discarded [From.Consort.GetHerHim] like a used plaything. The shame of [From.Consort.GetName] as well as that of the whole [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family is great indeed.
translation: 那些肮脏下流的小人！他们怎么敢这样侮辱我们！我们收到了卑鄙的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]和[From.Monarch.GetHerHis][From.Consort.GetWifeHusband]——我们的[From.Consort.GetName]之间的婚姻结束的消息。[From.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]把[From.Consort.GetHerHim]扔到一边，像一个玩具一样把[From.Consort.GetHerHim]随意丢弃。[From.Consort.GetName]和整个[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族都蒙受了耻辱。

original: This insult will not go unanswered!
translation: 我们不会对这些羞辱充耳不闻！

original: [From.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[From.Monarch.GetName]§! of [From.GetName] has divorced [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!.
translation: [From.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle] §Y[From.Monarch.GetName]§! 与[Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! 离婚。

original: A Decade of Marriage
translation: 十年婚姻

original: When [Root.Consort.GetName] married into the royal house of [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] there were those who were skeptical towards the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] inviting a young [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan] from [origin_of_consort.GetName], a foreigner, to join the ruling family. However, time flies and it has now been over ten years since the union took place. While not everybody adores the [Root.Consort.GetTitle], most have come to respect [Root.Consort.GetHerHim] as one of their own - it is highly unlikely that the wedding anniversary of the elevated couple could have gone by unnoticed, and a number of congratulatory letters, as well as gifts of varying splendor, have already been sent to the palace.
translation: 当[Root.Consort.GetName]嫁到[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]皇室时，有些人对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]邀请一位来自 [origin_of_consort.GetName]的年轻[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]，一个外国人，来加入到统治家族，持怀疑态度。然而，时光飞逝，这个联盟已经维持了超过十年时间。尽管不是所有人都喜欢[Root.Consort.GetTitle]，但大多数人仍然要像对待自己人一样面对[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]。这对尊贵的夫妇的婚姻纪念日必然会引发关注，许多祝贺信和琳琅满目的礼品已经送到了宫中。

original: When [Root.Consort.GetName] married into the royal house of [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] there were those who were skeptical towards [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] origin. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] was a young [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan] from [origin_of_consort.GetName], a nobody in the eyes of many, suddenly invited to rule the great nation of [Root.GetName]. However, time flies and it has now been over ten years since the union took place. While it's not all who adore the [Root.Consort.GetTitle], most have come to respect [Root.Consort.GetHerHim] as one of their own - it is very unlikely that the wedding anniversary of the elevated couple could have gone by unnoticed, and so [Root.Monarch.GetName] and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] [Root.Consort.GetName] humbly accept all congratulatory letters, as well as gifts of varying splendor, brought to them.
translation: 当[Root.Consort.GetName]嫁到[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]皇室时，有些人对[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的家乡抱有疑问。[Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]是一个来自[origin_of_consort.GetName]的年轻[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]，许多人眼中的无名小卒，突然被邀请来统治伟大的[Root.GetName]。然而，时光飞逝，这个联盟已经维持了超过十年时间。尽管不是所有人都喜欢[Root.Consort.GetTitle]，大多数人仍然要像对待自己人一样面对[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]。这对尊贵的夫妇的婚姻纪念日必然会引发关注，因此[Root.Monarch.GetName]和[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis][Root.Consort.GetName]谦虚地接受了送到宫中的许多祝贺信和琳琅满目的礼品。

original: When [Root.Consort.GetName] married into the royal house of [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] there were those who were skeptical towards [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] origin. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] was a young [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan] from a small town, a nobody in the eyes of many, suddenly invited to rule the great nation of [Root.GetName]. However, time flies and it has now been over ten years since the union took place. While it's not all who adore the [Root.Consort.GetTitle], most have come to respect [Root.Consort.GetHerHim] as one of their own - it is very unlikely that the wedding anniversary of the elevated couple could have gone by unnoticed, and so [Root.Monarch.GetName] and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] [Root.Consort.GetName] graciously accept all congratulatory letters, as well as gifts of varying splendor, brought to them.
translation: 当[Root.Consort.GetName]嫁到[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]皇室时，有些人对[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的家乡抱有疑问。[Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]是一个来自一个小城镇的年轻[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]，许多人眼中的无名小卒，突然被邀请来统治伟大的[Root.GetName]。然而，时光飞逝，这个联盟已经维持了超过十年时间。尽管不是所有人都喜欢[Root.Consort.GetTitle]，大多数人仍然像对待自己人一样面对[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]。这对尊贵的夫妇的婚姻纪念日必然会引发关注，因此[Root.Monarch.GetName]和[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis][Root.Consort.GetName]和善地接受了送到宫中的许多祝贺信和琳琅满目的礼品。

original: When [Root.Consort.GetName] married into the royal house of [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] there were those who were skeptical. However, the young [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan] gained the confidence of the common people, almost effortlessly, and [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] grew well into the role as one of the ruling class of [Root.GetName]. It has now been over ten years since the union took place. Even the ones who do not adore the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] have come to respect [Root.Consort.GetHerHim] as one of their own - the wedding anniversary of the elevated couple could has been highly anticipated. It is smiling gently at nobles and commoners alike that the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] [Root.Consort.GetName] graciously accept gifts of varying splendor.
translation: 当[Root.Consort.GetName]嫁到[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]皇室时，有些人对此持怀疑态度。然而，这位年轻的[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]几乎毫不费力的获得了普通人民的信任，并且[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]迅速成长为[Root.GetName]统治家族的一员。这个联盟已经维持了超过十年时间。即使那些不喜欢[Root.Consort.GetTitle]的人也像对待自己人一样面对[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]。这对尊贵的夫妇的婚姻纪念日本应当提前预知。对贵族和平民均保持着优雅的微笑，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]和[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis][Root.Consort.GetName]和善地接受了琳琅满目的礼品。

original: When [Root.Consort.GetName] married into the royal house of [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] there were those who were skeptical. However, the young [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan] impressed all with [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] genuine and graceful way with people and the nobility of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] are constantly finding new ways to show their adoration of [Root.Consort.GetTitle]. It is not surprising that the wedding anniversary of the elevated couple has been highly anticipated - somehow the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] has even managed to personally thank each nobleman and woman for the gifts brought to them for the occasion.
translation: 当[Root.Consort.GetName]嫁到[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]皇室时，有些人对此持怀疑态度。然而，这位年轻的[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]通过[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]真诚和友善打动了所有人，[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的贵族不断寻找新的方法来表达他们对[Root.Consort.GetTitle]的喜爱。高层夫妇隆重的婚姻纪念日被提前预知一点也不奇怪——[Root.Consort.GetTitle]不知采取了怎样的方式竟然对每一位送来礼物的贵族和妇女都表达了感谢之情。

original: Such a happy occasion!
translation: 如此快乐的时刻！

original: We receive plenty of gifts for the royal anniversary.
translation: 我们收到了许多皇室纪念日的礼物。

original: A Joyous Occasion
translation: 欢乐的时刻

original: The annual celebration of the royal union between [Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] and [Root.Consort.GetName] has taken place. It's difficult to imagine that [Root.GetName] had it any other way - that there was a time when the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] was growing up in [origin_of_consort.GetName], far away from our [Root.Monarch.GetName], who spent [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] days in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] alone. It all seems so natural now. How time flies! It has now been over two decades since [Root.Consort.GetName] married the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], and even though they are not children anymore, it is with some glee that they accept gifts in honor of their wedding anniversary.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName][Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]和[Root.Consort.GetName]的结婚纪念日成功举办。很难想象 [Root.GetName] 会通过别的方式来举行——曾经，[Root.Consort.GetTitle]在[origin_of_consort.GetName]长大，那里距离[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]——我们的[Root.Monarch.GetName]幼年独自度过[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]日子的地方十分遥远。这些在现在看来都再正常不过了。时光飞逝！自从[Root.Consort.GetName]嫁给[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]已经过去了超过二十年，即使他们不再是孩子了，他们仍然兴奋地接受了他们婚礼纪念日的礼物。

original: It's been over two decades since [Root.Consort.GetName] married the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], and even though they are not children anymore, it is with some glee that they accept gifts in honor of their wedding anniversary. Nobility and commoners alike, particularly from [origin_of_consort.GetName], the once home of the [Root.Consort.GetTitle], are jubilant to attend the celebrations for a chance to catch a glimpse of the royal couple. How time flies!
translation: 自从[Root.Consort.GetName]嫁给[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]已经过去了超过二十年，即使他们不再是孩子了，他们仍然兴奋地接受了他们婚礼纪念日的礼物。无论是贵族和平民，尤其是来自 [origin_of_consort.GetName]——[Root.Consort.GetTitle]家乡的人，都对能够有机会看到这对皇家夫妇一眼感到兴奋不已。时间过得真快啊！

original: How time flies! It has been over two decades since [Root.Consort.GetName] married the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], and even though they are not children anymore, it is with some glee that they accept gifts in honor of their wedding anniversary. Nobility and commoners alike, all attend the celebrations for a chance to catch a glimpse of the royal couple.
translation: 时光飞逝！自从[Root.Consort.GetName]嫁给[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]已经过去了超过二十年，即使他们不再是孩子了，他们仍然兴奋地接受了他们婚礼纪念日的礼物。贵族和平民都对能够有机会看到这对皇家夫妇一眼感到兴奋不已。

original: How time flies! It's been over two decades since [Root.Consort.GetName] married the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], and even though they are not children anymore, it is with some glee that they accept gifts in honor of their wedding anniversary. While the nobility are present, the commoners in particular are jubilant to attend the celebrations for a chance to catch a glimpse of their beloved [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName].
translation: 时光飞逝！自从[Root.Consort.GetName]嫁给[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]已经过去了超过二十年，即使他们不再是孩子了，他们仍然兴奋地接受了他们婚礼纪念日的礼物。即使有贵族在现场，平民尤其对能够有机会看到深受他们喜爱的[Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName]一眼感到兴奋不已。

original: How time flies! It's been over two decades since [Root.Consort.GetName] married the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], and even though they are not children anymore, it is with some glee that they accept gifts in honor of their wedding anniversary. Even though commoners are dutifully present for the celebrations, the nobility in particular climb over each other in jubilance for a chance to catch a glimpse of their [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName].
translation: 时光飞逝！自从[Root.Consort.GetName]嫁给[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]已经过去了超过二十年，即使他们不再是孩子了，他们仍然兴奋地接受了他们婚礼纪念日的礼物。除了忠于皇室的平民出现在庆典现场，贵族们同样人山人海，对能够有机会看到深受他们喜爱的[Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName]一眼感到兴奋不已。

original: May they have many years together yet.
translation: 愿他们白头偕老，永结同心。

original: We receive plenty of gifts for the royal anniversary.
translation: 我们收到了许多皇室纪念日的礼物。

original: The Diplomatic Approach of [Root.Consort.GetName]
translation: [Root.Consort.GetName]的外交手段

original: While growing up in [origin_of_consort.GetName], [Root.Consort.GetName] enjoyed studying people. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] often made a game out of trying to predict the actions of the people around [Root.Consort.GetHerHim], finding it not only fun, but as the years went by, an increasingly useful habit to keep. Thankfully, moving to the royal court of [Root.GetName] has not caused [Root.Consort.GetName] to abandon her knack for intrigue. If anything [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] has gotten a lot of practice - during some of our recent negotiations with foreign diplomats these skills have actually proven most valuable to the council.
translation: 当初生活在[origin_of_consort.GetName]时，[Root.Consort.GetName]就喜欢研究不同的人。[Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]经常喜欢玩一种游戏——预测[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]身边的人的行为。随着时间的流逝，这么做不仅有趣，而且逐渐成长为了一种爱好。谢天谢地，进入[Root.GetName]的皇室宫廷并没有剥夺[Root.Consort.GetName]好奇心带来的技能。 [Root.Consort.GetSheHe]在最近与外国人的谈判中，这种技能得到了不断练习，而且这些技能被证明是对政府大有价值的。

original: While growing up in [origin_of_consort.GetName], [Root.Consort.GetName] enjoyed learning of the world. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] was always asking questions and often pondered ways to make life easier for people, or how to make any given task more effective. Better yet, how to convince somebody else that [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] way of organizing an assignment was the right one. Thankfully, moving to the royal court of [Root.GetName] has not caused [Root.Consort.GetName] to abandon [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] dreams of commanding people. If anything [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] has gotten a lot of practice - during some of our recent negotiations with foreign diplomats [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] ideas have received some very positive feedback.
translation: 当初生活在[origin_of_consort.GetName]时，[Root.Consort.GetName]就喜欢研究这个世界。[Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]善于提问，并且经常为身边的人思索一些减少工作难度，或者使工作更有效率的方法。更擅长的是，使别人相信[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]安排工作的的方法是正确的选择。谢天谢地，进入[Root.GetName]的皇室宫廷并没有使 [Root.Consort.GetName] 放弃 [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] 指挥他人的梦想。在我们最近与外国人的谈判中， [Root.Consort.GetSheHe]已经得到了不断练习——[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的想法在实践中得到了积极的反馈。

original: Growing up in [origin_of_consort.GetName], [Root.Consort.GetName] enjoyed spending time with others. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] was an unusually calm child, finely attuned to the feelings of [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] friends, or even anyone [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] encountered. This almost sixth sense when interacting with people has not only made [Root.Consort.GetName] a highly regarded and sought after dinner guest, since [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] arrival in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] - it has also translated into other affairs of the state. During a recent meeting with foreign diplomats it is said that the irreproachable negotiation tactics of the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] were the highlight of the event!
translation: 当初生活在[origin_of_consort.GetName]时，[Root.Consort.GetName]就喜欢与他人一起相处。[Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] 大部分时间是一个沉稳的孩子，能够很好的协调[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]朋友们之间的关系，甚至包括[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]偶然遇到的人。这种几乎是第六感的与人互动的能力不仅使[Root.Consort.GetName]成为晚宴上一位受欢迎的客人，而且自从[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]来到[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]后，在其他国家大事上也起到了作用。在近期与外国外交官的会面中，他们认为[Root.Consort.GetTitle]无懈可击的外交手段是这些活动中的亮点之一！

original: While growing up, [Root.Consort.GetName] enjoyed studying people. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] often made a game out of trying to predict the actions of the people around [Root.Consort.GetHerHim], finding it not only fun, but as the years went by, an increasingly useful habit to keep. Thankfully, moving to the royal court of [Root.GetName] has not caused [Root.Consort.GetName] to abandon her knack for intrigue. If anything [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] has gotten a lot of practice - during some of our recent negotiations with foreign diplomats these skills have actually proven most valuable to the council.
translation: 在幼年成长时期，[Root.Consort.GetName]喜欢研究不同的人。[Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]经常喜欢玩一种游戏——尝试去预测[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]身边的人的行为，并且随着时间流逝，不仅发现这么做有趣，而且逐渐成长为了一种爱好。谢天谢地，进入[Root.GetName]的皇室宫廷并没有剥夺[Root.Consort.GetName]好奇心带来的技能。在我们最近与外国人的谈判中[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]已经得到了不断练习，这些技能被证明是对议会大有价值的。

original: While growing up, [Root.Consort.GetName] enjoyed learning of the world. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] was always asking questions and often pondered ways to make life easier for people, or how to make any given task more effective. Better yet, how to convince somebody else that [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] way of organizing an assignment was the right one. Thankfully, moving to the royal court of [Root.GetName] has not caused [Root.Consort.GetName] to abandon [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] dreams of commanding people. If anything [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] has gotten a lot of practice - during some of our recent negotiations with foreign diplomats [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] ideas have received some very positive feedback.
translation: 在幼年成长时期，[Root.Consort.GetName]就喜欢研究这个世界。[Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]善于提问，并且经常为身边的人思索一些减少工作难度，或者使工作更有效率的方法。更擅长的是，使别人相信[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]安排工作的方法是正确的选择。谢天谢地，进入[Root.GetName]的皇室宫廷并没有使[Root.Consort.GetName]放弃[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]指挥他人的梦想。在我们最近与外国人的谈判中[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]已经得到了不断练习的话，[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]的想法在实践中得到了积极的反馈。

original: While growing up, [Root.Consort.GetName] enjoyed spending time with others. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] was an unusually calm child, finely attuned to the feelings of [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] friends, or even anyone [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] encountered. This almost sixth sense when interacting with people has not only made [Root.Consort.GetName] a highly regarded and sought after dinner guest, since [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] arrival in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] - it has also translated into other affairs of the state. During a recent meeting with foreign diplomats it is said that the irreproachable negotiation tactics of the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] were the highlight of the event!
translation: 在幼年成长时期，[Root.Consort.GetName]就喜欢与他人一起相处。 [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]大部分时间是一个沉稳的孩子，能够很好的协调[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]朋友们之间的关系，甚至包括[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]偶然遇到的人。这种几乎是第六感的与人互动的能力不仅使[Root.Consort.GetName]成为晚宴上一位受欢迎的客人，而且自从[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]来到[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]后在其他国家大事上都起到了作用。在近期与外国外交官的会面中，他们认为[Root.Consort.GetTitle]无懈可击的外交手段是这些活动中的亮点之一！

original: Excellent.
translation: 太棒了。

original: The Administrative Ideas of [Root.Consort.GetName]
translation: [Root.Consort.GetName]的行政理念

original: Combined with a strong moral compass, [Root.Consort.GetName] has always had a sense for order. Decisions made by [Root.Consort.GetHerHim] are trusted decisions - be it about political issues or during friendly conversation, the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] speaks [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] mind eloquently, something that awarded [Root.Consort.GetHerHim] some admiration even during [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] early days in [origin_of_consort.GetName]. Most importantly however, the words of the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] carry a truthfulness to them, a matter making even the most stubborn members of court heed any advice offered from [Root.Consort.GetHerHim].
translation: 受强烈的道德感指引，[Root.Consort.GetName]崇尚秩序。[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]做出的决定是值得信任的。不管是政治事务还是朋友之间的谈话，[Root.Consort.GetTitle]都能够雄辩地表达出[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]想法，这多少使[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]赢得了别人的一些崇敬，即使在[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]在[origin_of_consort.GetName]的早期岁月里也是这样。然而更重要的是，[Root.Consort.GetTitle]的话有很强的置信力，使得即使是最顽固的宫廷成员也会听从[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]的建议。

original: The royal [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] possesses an innate curiosity in regards to the way [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] views the world. Understanding what makes people tick, or how a system comes together, is a topic often discussed around the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] and it is said that the interest began early, during [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] childhood in [origin_of_consort.GetName]. These musings can keep [Root.Consort.GetHerHim] up late in the evenings, studying the texts of scholars, old or contemporary, or even making certain that [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] own ideas are jotted down for future benefit of the [Root.GovernmentName].
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]殿下，就[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]看待世界的方式而言，其总是抱持有天生的好奇心。[Root.Consort.GetTitle]经常会探讨有关人们是如何生活的，或者一个系统是如何运行的话题。据说这个兴趣是在[origin_of_consort.GetName]时[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]童年时代就拥有的。这些思考使[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]废寝忘食的研习古今学者们的著作，甚至也会匆匆记下[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]自己的想法，以便其用于[Root.GovernmentName]的未来福祉。

original: It might have something to do with [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] upbringing in [origin_of_consort.GetName], or perhaps it is simply [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] personality... Regardless, the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] is one of the most devout subjects in all of [Root.GetName]. [Root.Consort.GetHerHisCap] unwavering belief through times of hardship brings hope to our people during even the darkest of days. After each public appearance [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] makes, we find that the people of our great [Root.GovernmentName] tend to display a renewed energy, on their faces as well as in their daily tasks.
translation: 这可能和[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]在[origin_of_consort.GetName]的成长经历有关，亦或者只是[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]个人特质……无论如何，[Root.Consort.GetTitle]是整个[Root.GetName]中最虔诚的人。[Root.Consort.GetHerHisCap]无可动摇的信仰给处于最黑暗时期的人们带来希望。每当[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]在公众场合出现后，我们都会发现我们伟大[Root.GovernmentName]的人民显得重焕容光，并且在日常劳作中精力充沛。

original: Combined with a strong moral compass, [Root.Consort.GetName] has always had a sense for order. Decisions made by [Root.Consort.GetHerHim] are trusted decisions - be it about political issues or during friendly conversation, the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] speaks [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] mind eloquently. Most importantly [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] words carry a truthfulness to them, a fact making even the most stubborn members of court heed any advice offered from [Root.Consort.GetHerHim].
translation: 受强烈的道德感指引，[Root.Consort.GetName]崇尚秩序。[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]做出的决定是值得信任的。不管是政治事务还是朋友之间的谈话，[Root.Consort.GetTitle]都能够雄辩地表达出[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]想法。然而更重要的是，[Root.Consort.GetTitle] 的话有很强的置信力，使得即使是最顽固的宫廷成员也会听从[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]的建议。

original: The royal [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] possesses an innate curiosity in regards to the way [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] views the world. Understanding what makes people tick, or how a system comes together, is a topic often discussed around the [Root.Consort.GetTitle]. Such musings can keep [Root.Consort.GetHerHim] up late in the evenings, studying the texts of scholars, old or contemporary, or indeed making sure [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] own ideas are jotted down for future benefit of the [Root.GovernmentName].
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]殿下，就[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]看待世界的方式而言，其总是抱持有天生的好奇心。[Root.Consort.GetTitle]经常会探讨有关人们是如何生活的，或者一个系统是如何运行的话题。这些思考使[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]废寝忘食的研习古今学者们的著作，甚至也会匆匆记下[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]自己的想法，以便其用于[Root.GovernmentName]的未来福祉。
