[Root.Consort.GetHerHisCap] unwavering belief through times of hardship brings hope to our people during even the darkest of days. After each public appearance [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] makes, we find that the people of our great [Root.GovernmentName] tend to display a renewed energy, on their faces as well as in their daily tasks.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle]是整个[Root.GetName]中最虔诚的人。[Root.Consort.GetHerHisCap]无可动摇的信仰给处于最黑暗时期的人们带来希望。每当[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]在公众场合出现后，我们都会发现我们伟大[Root.GovernmentName]的人民显得重焕容光，并且在日常劳作中精力充沛。

original: Excellent.
translation: 好极了。

original: The Military Ideas of [Root.Consort.GetName]
translation: [Root.Consort.GetName]的军事理念

original: The [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] is proving to be a fearless [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]. Often seen studying the technique of the soldiers during their training, sometimes [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] even approaches the practice grounds [Root.Consort.GetHerselfHimself]... While some were initially hesitant to engage the royal [Root.Consort.GetTitle] in melee, others were curious about the skills [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] brought with [Root.Consort.GetHerHim] from [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] life in [origin_of_consort.GetName]. Even though it was a surprise to some people, [Root.Consort.GetName]'s reputation for handling [Root.Consort.GetHerselfHimself] in a fight is not an unwarranted one. In addition, the presence of the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] seems to have an encouraging effect on the troops.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]显得是一个无所畏惧的[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]。[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]经常被别人看见在士兵训练时学习他们的战斗技巧，有时[Root.Consort.GetHerselfHimself]甚至会亲自前往训练场……虽然一些人最初对[Root.Consort.GetTitle]殿下加入战斗训练感到疑虑，另一些人则很好奇[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]通过[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]在[Root.Consort.GetHerHis][origin_of_consort.GetName]生活经历而带来的战斗技巧。尽管这对一些人来说是一件令人惊讶的事，但[Root.Consort.GetName]在战斗中控制自己的能力是毋庸置疑的。此外，[Root.Consort.GetTitle]的出现似乎提振了军队士气。

original: Throughout [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] life, spanning back to [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] time in [origin_of_consort.GetName], [Root.Consort.GetName] has developed a good grasp on military strategy, enabling [Root.Consort.GetHerHim] to participate in many discussions on the topic. [Root.Consort.GetHerHisCap] senses are clearly governed by reason, while [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] ideas often concern the troops as a whole, and how to best care for the men themselves, for the human being behind the warrior's mask. This has led to our generals often holding the thoughts of the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] in high regard.
translation: 纵观[Root.Consort.GetName]一生，在[origin_of_consort.GetName]生活时，[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]已然对军事战略有极佳的掌握。[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]能够参与诸多关于此类话题的商讨，而[Root.Consort.GetHerHisCap]判断显然是十分理智的。在[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]思想中，往往将部队视为一个整体，并关注于如何最好地照顾「人」，即这些战士身份背后的「人」本身。这让我们的将领们经常高度重视[Root.Consort.GetTitle]的思想。

original: The [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] is proving to be a fearless [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]. Often seen studying the technique of the soldiers during their training, sometimes [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] even approaches the practice grounds [Root.Consort.GetHerselfHimself]... While some were initially hesitant to engage the royal [Root.Consort.GetTitle] in melee, others were curious. Even though it was a surprise to some people, [Root.Consort.GetName]'s reputation for handling [Root.Consort.GetHerselfHimself] in a fight is not an unwarranted one. In addition, the presence of the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] seems to have an encouraging effect on the troops.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]显得是一个无所畏惧的[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]。[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]经常被别人看见在士兵训练时学习他们的战斗技巧，有时[Root.Consort.GetHerselfHimself]甚至会亲自前往训练场……虽然一些人最初对[Root.Consort.GetTitle]殿下加入战斗训练感到疑虑，但另一些人对此感到好奇。尽管这对一些人来说是一件令人惊讶的事，但[Root.Consort.GetName]在战斗中控制自己的能力是毋庸置疑的。此外，[Root.Consort.GetTitle]的出现似乎提振了军队士气。

original: Throughout [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] life, [Root.Consort.GetName] has developed a good grasp on military strategy, enabling [Root.Consort.GetHerHim] to participate in many discussions on the topic. [Root.Consort.GetHerHisCap] senses are clearly governed by reason, while [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] ideas often concern the troops as a whole, and how to best care for the men, for the human being behind the warrior's mask. [Root.Consort.GetHerHisCap] thoughts are often held in high regard by our generals.
translation: 纵观[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]一生，[Root.Consort.GetName]对军事战略有极佳的掌握，能够参与诸多关于此类话题的商讨。[Root.Consort.GetHerHisCap]判断显然是十分理智的，而[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]思想往往将部队视为一个整体，以及如何最好地照顾“人”，亦即这些具有战士身份背后的“人”本身。这导致我们的将领们经常高度重视[Root.Consort.GetTitle]的思想。

original: Excellent.
translation: 好极了。

original: A Shared Interest
translation: 共同的兴趣

original: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] is known for possessing a mind for organization. Making sure that people as well as the administration of [Root.GetName] adhere to the law, while also updating and adjusting the system to fit the times we live in, is of great interest to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. Imagine [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] joy, upon realizing that [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] [Root.Consort.GetWifeHusband] share many of these ideas!\n'A conversation with you, dear [Root.Consort.GetName], is as stimulating as any council meeting!', [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] exclaims to the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] one afternoon. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] responds with a smile, also much enjoying bonding with [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] [Root.Monarch.GetWifeHusband] over these matters.
translation: 众所周知，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]拥有组织者的头脑，能够确保[Root.GetName]的人民和行政部门遵纪守法，同时不断更新和调整制度以适应我们所生活的时代，并符合[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的利益。 想象一下，当得知[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis][Root.Consort.GetWifeHusband]在这方面有着许多共同的看法之后，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]喜悦之情是如何高涨啊！\n“亲爱的[Root.Consort.GetName]，与你谈话，像参加任何一个内阁会议一样令人兴奋！”，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]有一天下午向[Root.Consort.GetTitle]感叹道。 [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]微笑回应着，也欣喜于和[Root.Consort.GetHerHis] [Root.Monarch.GetWifeHusband]的三观契合。

original: It's no secret that both [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] and the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] have a way with words, and thus with people. They can both make a stranger feel perfectly at ease in their presence, and somehow always manage to be the one making the closing argument in a discussion. Although perhaps not entirely equal in charm, and using different personal strengths, they have grown to enjoy attending social events together, often seen smiling smugly at one another from a distance. What is for certain is that the [Root.GovernmentName] is better off since their union.
translation: 众所周知，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]和[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]都深谙语言艺术。可以让一个陌生人在他们面前感到自在，并且总是能使争执缓和为交流。 虽然他们的气质也许并不完全相同，且有着各自的人格魅力，但他们已经可以一起享受参加社交活动的乐趣，经常能从远处看到对彼此的微笑。 可以肯定的是，[Root.GovernmentName]自从他们结合以来就变得更好了。

original: The first time [Root.Consort.GetName] watched [Root.Monarch.GetName] sparring with [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] soldiers in training, [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] was impressed. It's not every noble[Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan] that would enjoy the manual labor of actually learning how to wield a weapon of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] own. 'But [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] is not any [Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]', [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] thought before approaching [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] [Root.Monarch.GetWifeHusband] to compliment [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] skills. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] even mustered the courage to ask [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] opinion on the current military situation of the [Root.GovernmentName]. Intrigued by this mutual interest in the military aspects of [Root.GetName], the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has gained a lot of new ideas for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] army.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetName]在第一次看到[Root.Monarch.GetName]与[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]士兵对抗训练时，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]便被触动了。苦修挥舞[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]刀枪并不是一般的贵族[Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]所喜爱的。 “但是[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]并不是普通的[Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]”，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]这样想，之后就走近[Root.Consort.GetHerHis][Root.Monarch]身边称赞[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的武艺。 [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]甚至敢于询问[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]关于[Root.GovernmentName]的军事现状的看法。由于对[Root.GetName]军队的共同兴趣，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]从配偶处获得了许多关于[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]军队的新主意。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] is known for possessing a mind for organization. Making sure that people as well as the administration of [Root.GetName] adhere to the law, while also updating and adjusting the system to fit the times we live in, is of great interest to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. Imagine [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] joy, upon realizing that [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] [Root.Consort.GetWifeHusband] share many of these ideas!\n‘A conversation with you, dear [Root.Consort.GetName], is as stimulating as any council meeting!', [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] exclaims to the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] one afternoon. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] responds with a smile, also much enjoying bonding with [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] [Root.Monarch.GetWifeHusband] over these matters.
translation: 众所周知，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]拥有组织者的头脑，能够确保[Root.GetName]的人民和行政部门遵纪守法，同时不断更新和调整制度以适应我们所生活的时代，并符合[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的利益。想象一下，在得知[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis][Root.Consort.GetWifeHusband]在这方面有着许多共同看法之后，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]喜悦之情是如何高涨啊！\n「亲爱的[Root.Consort.GetName]，与你谈话，像参加任何一个内阁会议一样令人兴奋！」，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]有一天下午向[Root.Consort.GetTitle]感叹道。 [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]微笑回应着，也欣喜于和[Root.Consort.GetHerHis] [Root.Monarch.GetWifeHusband]的三观契合。

original: It's no secret that both [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] and the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] have a way with words, and thus with people. They can both make a stranger feel perfectly at ease in their presence, and somehow always manage to be the one making the closing argument in a discussion. Although perhaps not entirely equal in charm, and using different personal strengths, they have grown to enjoy attending social events together, often seen smiling smugly at one another from a distance. What is for certain is that the [Root.GovernmentName] is better off since their union.
translation: 众所周知，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]和[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]都深谙语言艺术。可以让一个陌生人在他们面前感到自在，并且总是能使争执缓和为交流。 虽然他们的气质也许并不完全相同，且有着各自的人格魅力，但他们已经可以一起享受参加社交活动的乐趣，经常能从远处看到对彼此的微笑。 可以肯定的是，[Root.GovernmentName]自从他们结合以来就变得更好了。

original: The first time [Root.Consort.GetName] watched [Root.Monarch.GetName] sparring with [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] soldiers in training, [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] was impressed. It's not every noble[Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan] that would enjoy the manual labor of actually learning how to wield a weapon of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] own. 'But [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] is not any [Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]', [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] thought before approaching [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] [Root.Monarch.GetWifeHusband] to compliment [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] skills. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] even mustered the courage to ask [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] opinion on the current military situation of the [Root.GovernmentName]. Intrigued by this mutual interest in the military aspects of [Root.GetName], the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has gained a lot of new ideas for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] army.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetName]在第一次看到[Root.Monarch.GetName]与[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]士兵对抗训练时，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]便被触动了。苦修挥舞[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]刀枪并不是一般的贵族[Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]所喜爱的。 “但是[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]并不是普通的[Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]”，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]这样想，之后就走近[Root.Consort.GetHerHis][Root.Monarch]身边称赞[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的武艺。 [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]甚至敢于询问[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]关于[Root.GovernmentName]的军事现状的看法。由于对[Root.GetName]军队的共同兴趣，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]从配偶处获得了许多关于[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]军队的新主意。

original: Those two make a great match.
translation: 真是一对相配的佳侣。

original: Sharing Faults
translation: 共同缺点

original: Although our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] hasn't been the sharpest tool when it comes to managing the finances of [Root.GetName], it is with interest that people have been watching the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] [Root.Consort.GetWifeHusband] together - they seem to get along well, often overheard discussing frivolities and joking about how to spend the country's treasury in order to annoy people the most. ‘Just let them have cake!', [Root.Consort.GetName] says, smiling wickedly.
translation: 虽然我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]在管理[Root.GetName]的财务方面的能力并不是最好的，但人们一直在关注 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]和[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis][Root.Consort.GetWifeHusband]夫妻二人。他们似乎相处得很好，经常能偷听到他们在讨论无聊的事情和开玩笑说如何挥霍国库才能最大限度的惹恼人民。「只要让他们有蛋糕！」，[Root.Consort.GetName]微笑着说。

original: Some say [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] is a crude [Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]. While [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] certainly has [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] good sides as well, a way with words is not something our ruler is known for. However, observing the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] with [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] [Root.Consort.GetWifeHusband] in attendance, it seems that the couple has found common ground in this diplomatic shortcoming. There appears to be a mutual feeling of affection growing between the royals, born of their shared awkwardness.
translation: 有人说[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]是一个粗鲁的[Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]。 虽然[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]当然也有[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]好的一面，但我们的统治者并不以善于言谈著称。 然而，在[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 携[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis][Root.Consort.GetWifeHusband]出席会议时的表现中看来，似乎这对夫妇在这个外交上的缺点中找到了共同点。 王室夫妇之间似乎因为一个共同的缺点产生了相互爱慕的感情。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] never enjoyed being coaxed into physical training as a child. Still anxious whenever someone approaches [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] with an expectation of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] showing any sort of combat prowess, [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] was delighted to find that [Root.Consort.GetName] appears equally nervous around weapons and talk of bloodshed. Together they have bonded over the finer things in life, leaving the dreary conversations concerning warfare and military strategy to other more interested parties.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]从来不喜欢被当做孩子哄骗进行身体训练。 不论何时只要有人参见[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]，希望[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]秀一下任何形式的战斗能力时，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]都会感到焦虑。但他很高兴地发现[Root.Consort.GetName]在武器和流血的谈话中看起来同样紧张。他们因生活中其它更美好的事物而连系在一起，将关于战争和军事战略的沉闷的对话留给其他更有兴趣的各方。

original: Those two go well together.
translation: 这两个人相处得很好。

original: Affectionate Royal Couple
translation: 深爱彼此的王室夫妇

original: The mutual affection often displayed by our royal couple is bolstering the people's confidence in our rulers.
translation: 我们王室夫妇之间频繁的深情流露正在加强人民对我们统治者的信心。

original: Remembering the Consort
translation: 追念配偶

original: After more than ten years of marriage, [Root.Monarch.GetName] is at a loss without [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] spouse. Many days [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] is found staring idly into the thin air, only to have [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] advisors snap [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] back to reality, their expressions anxious. They all agree that it is time something was done to see the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] through this difficult time.
translation: 经历了十几年的婚姻，[Root.Monarch.GetName]在没有[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]配偶的情况下始终怅然若失。许多日子里[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]都只能望着空气发呆，只得由[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]顾问把[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]摇醒到现实，而顾问们的表情十分焦急。 他们同意，现在是时候做些事情让[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]渡过这个困难时期了。

original: After decades of marriage, [Root.Monarch.GetName] is at a loss without [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] spouse. Many days [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] is found staring idly into the thin air, only to have [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] advisors snap [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] back to reality, their expressions anxious. They all agree that it is time something was done to see the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] through this difficult time.
translation: 经历了数十年的婚姻，[Root.Monarch.GetName]在没有[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]配偶的情况下始终怅然若失。许多日子里[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]都只能望着空气发呆，只得由[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]顾问把[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]摇醒到现实，而顾问们的表情十分焦急。 他们同意，现在是时候做些事情让[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]渡过这个困难时期了。

original: After such a long time of marriage, [Root.Monarch.GetName] is at a loss without [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] dear spouse. Many days [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] is found staring idly into the thin air, only to have [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] advisors snap [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] back to reality, their expressions anxious. They all agree that it is time something was done to see the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] through this difficult time.
translation: 经历了如此长久的婚姻，[Root.Monarch.GetName]在没有[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]爱人的情况下始终怅然若失。许多日子里[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]都只能望着空气发呆，只得由[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]顾问把[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]摇醒到现实，而顾问们的表情十分焦急。 他们同意，现在是时候做些事情让[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]渡过这个困难时期了。

original: Hire a sculptor. We shall raise a statue in memory of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] spouse.
translation: 聘请雕塑家。 我们将为缅怀[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]另一半而雕刻一尊雕像。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] should focus on [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] administrative work.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]应该专注于[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]行政工作。

original: Let [Root.Monarch.GetName] seek the distraction of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] diplomatic duty.
translation: 让[Root.Monarch.GetName]在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]外交工作中寻找消遣。

original: Have [Root.Monarch.GetName] spend more time at the war table.
translation: 让[Root.Monarch.GetName]在战争桌前花更多的时间。

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will get through this on [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] own.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]将会自己渡过这个难关的。

original: Commemorative Statue
translation: 纪念雕像

original: A beautiful statue depicting the departed royal consort is located here.
translation: 一座描绘了已逝的王室配偶的美丽雕像位于这里。

original: Attention to Detail
translation: 注重细节

original: Our ruler is currently spending a lot of time by their desk, carefully overseeing every detail of the administrative matters of the realm.
translation: 我们的统治者目前花费了大量的时间办公，仔细地审视了领地内行政事务的每一个细节。

original: Focused Listener
translation: 专注的聆听者

original: Our ruler is currently making an impressive effort to get the most out of each and every diplomatic interaction that comes their way.
translation: 我们的统治者目前正在做出令人印象深刻的努力，尽可能发挥每一个他所能利用的外交联结的影响力。

original: Dedicated Strategist
translation: 专业战略家

original: Our ruler is currently spending most of their waking time in council, contemplating and discussing the elaborate strategy and complex tactics of war.
translation: 我们的统治者最近将大部分他醒着的时间花在了内阁会议中，思虑和讨论缜密的战略和复杂的战术。

original: Overworked Administrator
translation: 劳累过度的行政家

original: In an attempt to distract themselves from their grief, our ruler has buried themselves in work - it has not had the desired effect.
translation: 为了转移自己的悲伤，我们的统治者全身心投入到工作中，但这并没有得到预期的效果。

original: Overworked Diplomat
translation: 劳累过度的外交家

original: In an attempt to distract themselves from their grief, our ruler has buried themselves in work - it has not had the desired effect.
translation: 为了转移自己的悲伤，我们的统治者全身心投入到工作中，但这并没有得到预期的效果。

original: Overworked Commander
translation: 劳累过度的指挥官

original: In an attempt to distract themselves from their grief, our ruler has buried themselves in work - it has not had the desired effect.
translation: 为了转移自己的悲伤，我们的统治者全身心投入到工作中，但这并没有得到预期的效果。

original: The Success of the Succession
translation: 成功继位

original: Since the death of [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] spouse, the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] has been growing increasingly comfortable in [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] seat, as both guardian of the young heir as well as royal regent of [Root.GetName]. To the general public, it is clear that the situation is temporary and simply a political necessity while everyone awaits the crowning of little [Root.Heir.GetName] [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName]. Meanwhile, there are rumors of other characters, said to partake in clandestine meetings where they discuss, in their eyes, the honest potential of the young heir... 'Putting that drooling imbecile on the throne would be a threat to the entire realm', one conspirator mutters. ‘The [Root.Consort.GetTitle] is certainly a capable [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan], and a much better option', another argues.\n\nAlthough certainly aware of these cunning forces, the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetHerselfHimself] has yet to take a stand on this highly sensitive issue.
translation: 由于[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]伴侣的死亡，[Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName]作为年轻继承人的监护人以及[Root.GetName]的皇家摄政在[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]位置上坐得越发地稳固。对于公众而言，这种情况显然是暂时的，只是出于政治上的必要性，在此期间每个人都期待着[Root.Heir.GetName][Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName]的加冕。与此同时，也有一些其他人的传言，据说他们参加了一场秘密会议，讨论在他们眼中年轻继承人真实的潜力......「把这个流着口水的白痴放在王座上将是对整个国家的威胁」，一个共谋者低声说。“[Root.Consort.GetTitle]显然是一个有能力的[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]，而且是一个更好的选择”，另一些人认为。\n\n虽然[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetHerselfHimself] 知道这些阴谋力量的存在，但[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetHerselfHimself]仍未对这个非常敏感的问题表明立场。

original: These are interesting times...
translation: 真是有趣的时代……

original: The [Root.Consort.GetTitle] will contemplate these ideas with her closest council.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle]将与她最亲近的顾问一起考虑这些想法。

original: How treasonous! We'll have no more of these ideas.
translation: 大逆不道！我们不能再有有这种想法了。

original: The instigators will not be encouraged.
translation: 不鼓励这些唆使者。

original: A Shift in Power
translation: 权力转移

original: Utilizing advice from [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] closest advisors and not without putting [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] own charm to the test, the [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] has cleverly manipulated a good amount of members of the court into agreement: [Root.Heir.GetName] [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName], the royal heir and next in line to the throne, is a feeble-minded fool, unworthy of [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] legacy. However, there is one simple solution to the problem...\nDuring yet another extravagant feast thrown in order to appeal to the nobility in charge, [Root.Consort.GetName] and [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] lackeys has managed to spread the idea of keeping the young [Root.Heir.GetName] locked away in [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] quarters - some isolation would allow the [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName] child to focus on [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] education, it is argued. That the young heir might also fade from the public eye is unfortunate for [Root.Heir.GetName], but ultimately a bonus for [Root.GetName]...
translation: 通过听从[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]最亲近的顾问的建议，而不是冒险使用[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]个人魅力，[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]巧妙地操纵大量的议员们达成共识：[Root.Heir.GetName][Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName]，皇室继承人和王位的第一顺位继承人，是一个愚钝的傻瓜，配不上[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]应享有的遗产。然而，这个问题有一个简单的解决方案……\n在另一场为了吸引当权贵族而召开的盛大宴会中，[Root.Consort.GetName]和[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]走狗成功传达了将年轻的[Root.Heir.GetName]囚禁于[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]房间中的想法——据其所称，一些隔离措施将使[Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName]家族的孩子专注于[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]教育。对于[Root.Heir.GetName]而言，年轻的继承人在公众眼中淡去也许是不幸的，但最终将是有利于[Root.GetName]的……

original: Make it happen.
translation: 就这样做。

original: Actually, maybe the young [Root.Heir.GetName] deserves a chance after all.
translation: 实际上，应该给予这位年轻的[Root.Heir.GetName]一次机会。

original: Devious Ruler
translation: 狡猾的统治者

original: This ruler came into power during highly unusual circumstances.
translation: 这个统治者是在非正常的情况下上台的。

original: A [Root.Consort.GetTitle] of the People
translation: 亲民的[Root.Consort.GetTitle]

original: It has become clear to us that [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] is a [Root.Consort.GetWomanMan] with a heart of gold. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] always does [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] best to please [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] [Root.Monarch.GetWifeHusband], [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] and treats [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] friends with unparalleled kindness. During a recent trip to the [poor_province.GetName] province [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] saw the suffering of its poorest peasants with [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] own eyes. Ever since, [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] has been drafting a plan to help [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] most destitute subjects. In order to make these ideas into reality, however, [Root.Consort.GetName] needs some funds from the nation's treasury.
translation: 显然[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName] 是一个十分有爱心的[Root.Consort.GetWomanMan]。[Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]总是竭尽全力使[Root.Consort.GetHerHis][Root.Monarch.GetWifeHusband][Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]感到满意，并无比热心地对待[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]朋友。在最近一次去[poor_province.GetName]省份的旅行中，[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]亲眼见到了[poor_province.GetName]最穷苦的农民的悲惨遭遇。从那以后，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]起草了一份计划来帮助[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]最贫穷的臣民。然而，为了使这些想法成为现实，[Root.Consort.GetName]需要国家财政的一些资助。

original: The people are ours to look after. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] has our support.
translation: 我们理应照顾人民。[Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]将获得我们的支持。

original: We have more important matters to deal with.
translation: 我们有更重要的事要处理。

original: Two of a Kind
translation: 天生一对

original: Our [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] has impressed many men and women at court with [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] sharp wit and extensive knowledge of the natural world. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] has long been a collector of tomes on botany and chemistry, and [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] corresponds with several of our generation's brightest minds. Currently one of these scientists are visiting our court as per our [Root.Consort.GetTitle]'s invitation. They can be found discussing all sorts of new theories far into the wee hours of the night. [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] has asked us to make the scientist an offer, claiming that she would make a much better advisor than the [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle] [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] we currently employ.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]因为[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]敏捷才思和广泛的自然知识给宫廷中许多人留下了深刻印象。[Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]长期以来一直是植物学和化学大部头典籍的收藏家，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]可以与我们几代人内最聪明的人物相提并论。目前其中一位科学家正在应[Root.Consort.GetTitle]的邀请访问我们的宫廷。他们每天都在讨论各种新理论直到深夜。[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]希望我们为这个科学家提供一个职位，声称她将成为一个比目前我们雇佣的[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle][Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]更好的顾问。

original: Most [Root.Consort.GetTitle]s accept their limited power and devote their lives to various pastimes and their family, but not [Root.Consort.GetName]. [Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap] is genuinely interested in all the ins and outs of governmental matters. Over the years [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] has befriended many great thinkers, politicians and diplomats. Among them is one of our most well-known statesmen, with whom [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] has spent a lot of time with as of late. Now [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] has asked us to make the statesman an offer, claiming that he would make a much better advisor than the [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetTitle] [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetName] we currently employ.
translation: 大多数的[Root.Consort.GetTitle]都接受其受限的权力并投身于各种消遣和他们的家庭中，但[Root.Consort.GetName]却不是这样。[Root.Consort.GetSheHeCap]真正感兴趣的是政府事务的来龙去脉。多年来，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]结识了许多伟大的思想家，政治家和外交官。其中的一位是我们最为著名的政治家，而[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]最近花了很多时间来结交。现在[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]要求我们为这位政治家提供一份职务，并声称他将成为一个比目前我们雇佣的[Root.Dip_Advisor.GetTitle][Root.Dip_Advisor.GetName]更好的顾问。

original: No other [Root.Consort.GetTitle] is as brave as our [Root.Consort.GetName]! Military tactics and organization have always been of great interest to [Root.Consort.GetHerHim]. In addition to [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] daily sword practice, [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] spends many hours each day studying the art of war. During the last few months [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] has become better acquainted with one of our most respected commandants, and he in turn has taken our [Root.Consort.GetTitle] under his wing, teaching [Root.Consort.GetName] everything [Root.Consort.GetSheHe] wishes to know. Now [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] has asked us to make the commandant an offer, claiming that he would make a much better advisor than the [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetTitle] [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetName] we currently employ.
translation: 没有任何[Root.Consort.GetTitle]能与我们的[Root.Consort.GetName]一样勇敢！[Root.Consort.GetHerHim]一直对军事战术和组织感兴趣。除了[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]日常的剑术练习，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]每天也花费很多时间学习战争的艺术。 在过去几个月里，[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]已经与我们最受尊敬的指挥官之一熟络了起来，而指挥官把我们的[Root.Consort.GetTitle]视为他的门生，把一切[Root.Consort.GetSheHe]希望知道的事都教给[Root.Consort.GetName] 。现在[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]要求我们为这位指挥官提供一份职务，声称他将成为一个比目前雇佣的的[Root.Mil_Advisor.GetTitle][Root.Mil_Advisor.GetName]更好的顾问。

original: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] has a point! We shall invite [Root.Consort.GetHerHis] acquaintance to stay.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]说的有道理！我们应该要求[Root.Consort.GetHerHis]熟人留下。

original: [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!'s friend becomes an advisor at court.
translation: [Root.Consort.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!的朋友成为了一名宫廷顾问。

original: No, we will just ask [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle] [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] to work harder.
translation: 不，我们只会要求[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle][Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]更努力地工作。

original: The [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]§! will work even harder to earn [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis] place.
translation: [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]§!将会更加努力工作以赢取[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis]地位。

original: No, we will just ask [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetTitle] [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetName] to work harder.
translation: 不，我们只会要求[Root.Dip_Advisor.GetTitle][Root.Dip_Advisor.GetName]更努力地工作。

original: The [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Dip_Advisor.GetName]§! will work even harder to earn [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHis] place.
translation: [Root.Dip_Advisor.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Dip_Advisor.GetName]§!将会更加努力工作以赢取[Root.Dip_Advisor.GetHerHis]地位。

original: No, we will just ask [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetTitle] [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetName] to work harder.
translation: 不，我们只会要求[Root.Mil_Advisor.GetTitle][Root.Mil_Advisor.GetName]更努力地工作。

original: The [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Mil_Advisor.GetName]§! will work even harder to earn [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetHerHis] place.
translation: [Root.Mil_Advisor.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Mil_Advisor.GetName]§!将会更加努力工作以赢取[Root.Mil_Advisor.GetHerHis]地位。

original: The Miracle of Life
translation: 生命的奇迹

original: In these dark days of war and death, a reminder of new beginnings can ease the pains of our people. Our great [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] noble [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName] have been blessed with another child. The arrival of the babe has brought new hope and energy to the royal couple, and by extension, to their court and subjects. Many people dream that this child will grow up in a better, brighter future, and that all the fighting will thus be worth it in the end.
translation: 在战争和死亡的黑暗岁月里，新时代的曙光能够缓解我们人民的苦难。 我们伟大的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]和[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]高贵的[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]被赐予而诞下了一个孩子。 新生儿的到来给王室夫妇、内廷和臣民们带来了新的希望和动力。 许多人希望这个孩子将在一个更美好，更光明的未来中成长，这样所有的斗争最后将是值得的。

original: Blessed be [Root.Monarch.GetName], [Root.Consort.GetName] and their new babe!
translation: 保佑[Root.Monarch.GetName]， [Root.Consort.GetName]和他们的新生儿！

original: The birth of the new [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] babe revitalizes the people of [Root.GetName].
translation: [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]王朝新生儿的到来给予[Root.GetName]的人民新的活力。

original: Desires of the Flesh
translation: 肉欲

original: While we have successfully managed to keep the truth from the rest of the court, it is only a question of time until it gets out unless we do something. The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] recently discovered that [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] [Root.Consort.GetWifeHusband], [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName], is having an affair! Not only that, but the other guilty culprit is none other than our advisor [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]. The trust we put in [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHim] was obviously unfounded. Even worse, this also raises questions concerning the legitimacy of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s [Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon], [Root.Heir.GetName] [Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName].
translation: 虽然我们已经尽量地不使宫中的其他人得知真相，但除非采取行动，否则这事暴露只是时间问题。[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]最近发现[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis][Root.Consort.GetWifeHusband]，[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]存在奸情，而且另一个罪人毫无疑问是我们的顾问[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]，我们对[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHim]的信任显然是没有根据的。更糟糕的是，这也引发了对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的[Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon]，[Root.Heir.GetName][Root.Heir.Dynasty.GetName]的合法性的质疑。

original: While we have successfully managed to keep the truth from the rest of the court, it is only a question of time until it gets out unless we do something. The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] recently discovered that [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] [Root.Consort.GetWifeHusband], [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName], is having an affair! Not only that, but the other guilty culprit is none other than our advisor [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]. The trust we put in [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHim] was obviously unfounded.
translation: 虽然我们已经尽量地不使宫中的其他人得知真相，但除非采取行动，否则这事暴露只是时间问题。[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]最近发现[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis][Root.Consort.GetWifeHusband]，[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]存在奸情，而且另一个罪人毫无疑问是我们的顾问[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]，我们对[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHim]的信任显然是没有根据的。

original: Now we know, at least. We can take measures to keep this quiet.
translation: 至少我们现在知道了。采取措施不要声张。

original: Allow the affair between [Root.Consort.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§! and the [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]§! to continue, while doing our best to keep it from the public eye.
translation: 允许[Root.Consort.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Consort.GetName]§!和[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]§!之间的奸情，同时尽全力避免引起公众的注意。

original: This cannot continue. Find out what [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] wants for [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis] silence.
translation: 这不能再继续下去了。看看什么能封上[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]的口。

original: Bribe the [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]§! to leave court and never breathe a word of the affair to anyone.
translation: 贿赂[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]§!，要求其离开宫廷并且禁止声张此事。

original: This is high treason, and no less! We shall have [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]'s head for this!
translation: 这无疑是叛国！我们应为此取下[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]的首级！

original: The [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle] §Y[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]§! is executed. Without a sufficient explanation, this act will be seen as tyrannical and create unrest in §Y[Root.Capital.GetName]§! and the surrounding area.
translation: [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetTitle]§Y[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]§!被处死。由于没有充分的理由，这项行为将被视为暴行，并在§Y[Root.Capital.GetName]§!和周边区域中造成动乱。

original: We cannot have an adulteress for a Queen. [Root.Consort.GetName] must go.
translation: 我们的王后不能是一个淫妇，[Root.Consort.GetName]必须离开。

original: We cannot have an adulterer for a Prince-Consort. [Root.Consort.GetName] must go.
translation: 我们的亲王不能是一个奸夫，[Root.Consort.GetName]必须离开。

original: Tyrannical Ruler
translation: 暴君

original: For unclear reasons, the ruler had one of the most trusted advisors on the council executed. The people are worried about this cruel display.
translation: 由于不明原因，统治者处死了宫廷里最值得信赖的顾问之一。 人们对这个残忍的行为表示担忧。

original: A Royal Bastard
translation: 皇家私生子

original: We tried to stop the rumors, but when we were made aware of them it was already too late. Now every other man and woman at court is gossiping behind our backs. Even the commoners in the streets have the nerves to make lewd jokes about 'the friendly [Root.Consort.GetTitle] [Root.Consort.GetName]' and 'the bastard of [Root.Capital.GetName]'. They say that the Queen is an adulteress and that [Root.Heir.GetName], the heir of [Root.GetName], is not actually the [Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon] of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]. All we can do at this point is keeping up appearances as best we can and hope that the rumors will die down in time.
translation: 我们试图阻止谣言的传播，但是我们意识到这些谣言的时候已经为时已晚。 现在，宫廷上其他的男人和女人都在我们背后传播流言蜚语， 即使街上的平民也有胆量编造关于“热情的[Root.Consort.GetTitle][Root.Consort.GetName]”和“[Root.Capital.GetName]的私生子”下流的笑话。 他们说王后是个淫妇，[Root.GetName]的继承人[Root.Heir.GetName]实际上并不是[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]的[Root.Heir.GetDaughterSon]。 我们现在可以做的就是在公众面前以最好的形象出现，并寄希望于谣言会随着时间消失。

original: These lies are preposterous!
translation: 这些谣言是荒谬的！

original: Noble Consort
translation: 贵族配偶

original: Turmoil in the Army
translation: 军队动荡

original: Breaking the chains of the old regime has finally freed the top of the officer corps from the restraining links between birth and promotion. No doubt our army will soon be lead by men of merit that will outclass the old crops of aristocrats. Right now, however, the sudden lack of experienced officers at the top as well as the great influx of new recruits at the bottom has led to a somewhat volatile atmosphere in our ranks. Patriotism and revolutionary fervor is a strong motivator but without able leadership any army can find itself unable to perform to expectations.
translation: 打破旧制度的锁链终于使得顶层军官从晋升依靠血统的限制中解脱出来。毫无疑问，我们的军队很快将由旧式贵族之外的优秀人才领导。不过，顶尖的经验丰富的军官的突然减少，底层新兵的大量涌入，导致了我们队伍的气氛现在有些不稳定。爱国主义和革命热情是一个强大动力，但如果没有可靠的领导阶层，任何一个军队都无法达到人们预期的表现。

original: We could never compromise with our ideology!
translation: 我们永远不能在我们的意识形态上有所妥协！

original: Men of ambition is what we need. Let them reshape our army!
translation: 雄心勃勃的人正是我们所需要的。 让他们重塑我们的军队！

original: We must do what we can to keep the old men of quality for now.
translation: 我们现在必须尽可能地保留高素质的老军官。

original: For the lack of a cord...
translation: 失牧之群

original: The old regime was always tightly tied to the power of the clergy and the fear of the divine is one of the ways to control the people that our radicals hate the most. Therefore the confiscation of religious property and the requirement for all clergy to swear an oath of loyalty to a Civil Constitution have been high on the agenda for many in the National Assembly. Outside the radicals not everyone in the assembly agrees on the best course of action and our policy has wavered a bit over time. Atheism is not always the most popular with the masses and especially in the countryside our actions against local priests have been met with contempt.\nPerhaps it could be beneficial to scale back our radicalism a bit without abandoning the long term goal of freeing society from Religion?
translation: 旧政权总是与神权紧密相连，他们控制人民的方式之一，就是利用人民对教士的畏惧，这恰恰是激进分子们最讨厌的。 因此，没收宗教财产和要求所有神职人员对“教士的公民组织法”宣誓忠诚，一直是国民议会多数议员的议事日程。然而除了激进分子，并不是所有人都步调一致，随着时间推移，我们的政策已经发生了动摇。 无神论并不总是最受群众欢迎的，特别是在农村，我们禁止当地教士的法令被无视了。\n也许在不放弃使社会摆脱宗教的长期目标得前提下，暂时控制我们的激进主义是有利的？

original: We cannot betray our ideology!
translation: 我们不能背叛我们的意识形态！

original: The clergy can be useful to uphold order.
translation: 神职人员有助于维护秩序。

original: We can give some leeway here.
translation: 我们可以在这里留有一些余地。

original: The Favor of the Mob
translation: 民众的支持

original: The poor and destitute people of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] have in many ways been empowered by the revolution far more than other groups in our Republic. While the goal is to break the chains of the old order for all those who have been oppressed for so long the citizens of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] are close to the seat of power and can make their will known to their representatives directly. Some even fear the will of what they consider to be an unruly mob which changes its loyalty on a whim. Others stress that this 'mob' is a direct manifestation of the will of the people and that we would all do well to listen to it.
translation: 在许多方面上，[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的穷人通过革命得到了比共和国中其他阶层更多的权力。 虽然革命的目标是为所有长期以来遭受压迫的人打破旧秩序的链条，但是最终[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的公民得以靠近权力中心，且可以直接向他们的代表发表意见。因此甚至有人担心这个无秩序的“暴徒”的意志——一个被认为仅仅是因为一时兴起就会动摇自己忠诚的暴徒；而其他人强调，这个“暴徒”是人民意志的直接表现，他们都会很乐意倾听它的意志。

original: They need someone to speak for them!
translation: 他们需要有人为他们说话！

original: By empowering and flattering the common people [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] we will strengthen the popularity of our government.
translation: 通过赋权和讨好[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的平民，我们的政府支持度将得到加强。

original: To the army!
translation: 为了军队！

original: We will harness the patriotism of the people of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] by enlisting them in the ranks of our grand army. The revolution must be spread abroad!
translation: 我们将利用[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]人民的爱国情怀，将他们征募到我们的伟大军队中。 革命必须向国外传播！

original: We cannot let fear govern this great country.
translation: 我们不能让恐惧支配这个伟大的国家。

original: We will empower those that want to curtail the power of the masses in order to restore order and authority to our fair Republic.
translation: 我们将赋予权力给那些想要通过削减大众权利来恢复我们共和国的秩序和权威的人。

original: Wavering Loyalty
translation: 忠诚动摆

original: Ideological convictions can change and sometimes personal rivalries leave even high officials disillusioned with their former comrades in arms. A high ranking official of previous governments has recently gone over to those who he would formerly have considered his sworn enemies. With him he takes some of the dirtiest secrets of the $RR_GIRONDISTS$ and a fervent will to harm their influence in general and in the National Assembly in particular.
translation: 意识形态的信念可能会改变，个人之间的竞争甚至让高级官员对昔日战友的幻想破灭。前任政府的一位高级官员最近已经向过去被他认为是宿敌的人投降。他提供了大量关于$RR_GIRONDISTS$的最肮脏的秘密，并迫切的希望削弱他们在各个方面——特别是在国民议会中的影响力。

original: Ideological convictions can change and sometimes personal rivalries leave even high officials disillusioned with their former comrades in arms. A high ranking official of previous governments has recently gone over to those who he would formerly have considered his sworn enemies. With him he takes some of the dirtiest secrets of the $RR_ROYALISTS$ and a fervent will to harm their influence in general and in the National Assembly in particular.
translation: 意识形态的信念可能会改变，个人之间的竞争甚至让高级官员对昔日战友的幻想破灭。前任政府的一位高级官员最近已经向过去被他认为是宿敌的人投降。他提供了大量关于$RR_ROYALISTS$的最肮脏的秘密，并迫切的希望削弱他们在各个方面——特别是在国民议会中的影响力。

original: Ideological convictions can change and sometimes personal rivalries leave even high officials disillusioned with their former comrades in arms. A high ranking official of previous governments has recently gone over to those who he would formerly have considered his sworn enemies. With him he takes some of the dirtiest secrets of the $RR_JACOBINS$ and a fervent will to harm their influence in general and in the National Assembly in particular.
translation: 意识形态的信念可能会改变，个人之间的竞争甚至让高级官员对昔日战友的幻想破灭。前任政府的一位高级官员最近已经向过去被他认为是宿敌的人投降。他提供了大量关于$RR_JACOBINS$的最肮脏的秘密，并迫切的希望削弱他们在各个方面——特别是在国民议会中的影响力。

original: Interesting.
translation: 有趣。

original: Enemies of the Revolution
translation: 革命之敌

original: The enemies of the revolution are everywhere, even in our own midst. We cannot allow the nobles, priests and various representatives of the old order to go on as if nothing has happened. We must act swiftly and deliberately to squash any unrevolutionary behavior or suspicion of monarchism. To this end the $RR_JACOBINS$ have had the foresight to establish a court where the people can give their judgement on where we can find friends and foes. Who would be more suitable to identify the enemies of the revolution than the common citizens and citizenesses of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]?
translation: 革命之敌无处不在，甚至存在于我们中间。 我们不能允许贵族，司祭和旧秩序的代表们继续存在，就好像什么事情都没发生一样。 我们必须迅速谨慎地压制任何反革命的行为或者涉嫌支持君主制的人。为此，$RR_JACOBINS$富有远见地设立了一个法院，我们可以在那里通过人民给出的判决区分敌友。 谁能比[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的普通公民更合适去判定革命的敌人呢？

original: Equality, Liberty, Fraternity or Death!
translation: 平等、自由和博爱，或者死亡！

original: Consolidation of Power
translation: 巩固权力

original: Ever since having been elected the new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been seeking to consolidate power. Various men of ambition have been either replaced or propped up, the members of the national assembly have been circumvented, marginalized and outmaneuvered at any possible opportunity. The people on the streets of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] are somewhat apprehensive of this activity but the presence of loyal troops and the support of the countryside population is keeping [Root.GetName] an unusually quiet and orderly country. For now.
translation: 自从当选以来，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]一直力图巩固权力。 野心家们要么被取代，要么被他提拔。他利用任何可能的机会绕过国会议员，并最终边缘化、淘汰他们。 尽管[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的人民对他的行为有点感到不安，但是忠诚军队的存在和农村人口的支持使得[Root.GetName]成为一个异常平静有序的国家。至少到目前为止是这样。

original: Liberty and Public Order!
translation: 自由和公共秩序！

original: A Constitution for [Root.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]宪法

original: While they have primarily come to be seen as the proponents of spreading the revolution abroad through military actions, $RR_GIRONDISTS$ are also in many ways the voice of the establishment. Now that they have achieved considerable influence in the National Assembly they are using that power to attempt to create a formalized set of rules, a constitution for our new country. This is not the first project of its kind and likely not the last but they hope it will bring us one step closer to a new order and an age of Liberalism, Equality and Brotherhood.
translation: 虽然他们首先被认为是支持用军事行动向国外传播革命的人，但是，$RR_GIRONDISTS$在建制的许多方面也颇有建树。现在他们在国民议会上已经有了可观的影响力，他们正在使用这一权力，试图为我们新生的国家制定一套正式的规则：一部宪法。 这个计划并非首创，可能也不会是最后一个，但他们希望它能使我们向新秩序和自由、平等和博爱的时代迈出新的一步。

original: Long live the Republic!
translation: 共和国万岁！

original: Lack of Administrators
translation: 缺少行政人员

original: Crushing the old order has brought unparalleled justice and equality to the masses as well as substantial assets into the state treasury. It has, however, also meant a loss of experienced administrators, bureaucrats and clerics. $RR_GIRONDISTS$ have quickly become the faction of many of the various remaining members of the old establishment and while they claim to support the revolution in every principle they are dismayed by the direction things have taken lately. Many of these sons of lesser nobility, the old clergy and other privileged classes have withdrawn from public life and are leaving the country fearing for their lives.\nThis has left us with a state that has more to administrate but fewer people with the required experience to do so. With merit as the guiding principle of government we are certain to find new able citizens to take their place but this has still placed us in a bit of a situation for the time being.
translation: 旧秩序的崩塌给人民带来了空前的正义和平等，也为国库带来了大量资产。 但这也意味着经验丰富的行政人员，官僚和牧师的损失。$RR_GIRONDISTS$很快成为由许多旧制度机构下的残留成员组成的派别，而且尽管他们声称支持革命的一切原则，但他们对最近所采取的措施感到失望。 很多小贵族之子、旧神职人员和其他特权阶层的人已经退出了公共生活，并担心自己的生命安全而离开了国家。\n这让我们陷入了一种处境——我们拥有更多人来管理，却缺少有必要经验的人。在以政绩为政府指导原则的局面下，我们肯定会找到新的有能力的公民来取代他们，但这仍使我们暂时处于这种处境。

original: This is a small price to pay for the furtherment of Man.
translation: 这是为了人类未来付出的一个很小的代价。

original: Let us try to get at least some of them to stay.
translation: 至少让我们试试留下他们中的一些人。

original: Popular Generals
translation: 名将

original: The foremost protector of our Republic and the values of the Revolution is our army. Unlike the representatives of the old order our ranks are filled by ordinary citizens fuelled by their burning patriotism and liberal convictions. A life in the army can also bring the most disparate people together and create strong bonds between the soldiers and their officers.\nThe popularity of some of our generals have now reached somewhat frightening levels and there are fears in the National Assembly that this will spread to the general populace due to our wide recruitment policies. We could try curtailing some of the more obviously dangerous men by giving them assignments out of our way but this would likely strengthen their supporters in their conviction of our own incompetence, at least in the short run.
translation: 我们的共和国和革命的价值观的最重要的保卫者就是我们的军队。 与旧秩序的代表不同，我们的队伍是由被高度的爱国主义和自由信念所驱动的普通公民所组成的。 军队生活可以使最与众不同的人团结在一起，并在士兵和军官之间建立起牢固的联系。\n我们某些将军的人气现在达到了令人恐惧的程度，并因为我们宽泛的招募政策，国民议会担心这种人气会传播到普通民众中。 我们可以尝试给一些比较明显危险的人一些无关的任务，但是这很可能会至少在短期内让他们的支持者更坚定认为我们无能。

original: This is inevitable but harmless.
translation: 这是不可避免的，但是是无害的。

original: Attempt to curtail some of the more threatening leaders.
translation: 试图削弱一些更具威胁性的领导人。

original: [GetMonth] Massacres
translation: [GetMonth]月大屠杀

original: Fearing the influence of crypto-monarchists and anti-revolutionaries among the ruling elite the people of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] have taken to the streets to defend the spirit of the revolution. Everyone remotely associated with the old order, from [Root.Owner.Religion.GetName] priests, to members of the lesser nobility or even those already imprisoned for their crimes against the state have been targeted as radical $RR_JACOBINS$ do their best to inflame the hearts and minds of the masses.\nThis leaves the government in a somewhat precarious situation. Some of the persons being targeted are members of their own ranks, and these uncontrolled massacres are making us appear weak as it severely harms the well-being of our once beautiful city. Should we do anything to stop it, however, it will play right into the hands of the Jacobins...
translation: 由于担心秘密的君主主义者和反革命分子在执政精英中的影响，[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的人民已经走上街头，捍卫革命精神。 与旧秩序密切相关的人，从[Root.Owner.Religion.GetName]教士，到较低的贵族，甚至那些已经因为他们的叛国罪行而被监禁的人，已经被定为激进的$RR_JACOBINS$用以全力煽动群众的批斗目标 。\n这让政府处于一种有点不稳定的境地， 一些遭到批斗的人属于他们自己的阶层，并且这些不受控制的屠杀使我们看起来很虚弱，因为它严重损害了我们曾经美丽的城市的安宁。 我们应该做点什么来阻止它，但是主动权在雅各宾的手中……

original: The enemies of the revolution must die!
translation: 革命事业的敌人必须死！

original: It is time to bring in the troops.
translation: 是时候让军队进入了。

original: Controlled Clergy
translation: 控制教士阶层

original: We have allowed the clergy to retain some of their privileges, especially in the countryside as long as they're loyal to the state.
translation: 教士尤其是乡村的教士,只要忠于国家,我们就准许他们保留某些特权.

original: Supportive Clergy
translation: 支持教士阶层

original: We have allowed the clergy to retain most of their privileges as long as they are loyal to our leaders.
translation: 只要教士忠于我们的领导,我们就准许他们保留大部分的特权.

original: Persecution of the Clergy
translation: 迫害教士阶层

original: We are harshly keeping with the principle of a state entirely free of religious influence. Clerics are required to swear an oath of loyalty to a civic constitution and renounce their ties with the religious establishment and all religious property has been confiscated by the state. While fair this policy is not always the most popular with the citizens in the countryside.
translation: 为了严守国家完全不应该受宗教势力干涉的原则,我们要求教士们必须宣誓效忠公民宪法,断绝与宗教势力的联系,所有的宗教财产由国家处置.这项政策的公平性并不被乡村的所有人所称道.

original: Imperial Faction Strong in Army
translation: 军队里帝制派声势壮大

original: Popular generals have been gaining a large following among the common soldiers of our republican army. Many of them have been using this influence to gain rights and privileges that harm the integrity of the Revolutionary values that they are sworn to uphold.
translation: 在共和国的军队中,受欢迎的将领们有大量的拥护者.其中一些人已经在利用这些影响去攫夺有悖誓要保护的革命信念的的特权.

original: Massacres
translation: 大屠杀

original: The People of our great capital have taken it into their own hands to do away with the enemies of the Revolution. While this has undoubtedly freed us of many traitors it has also had a cost in human suffering for the once fair city. Until they trust the province to be safe tradesmen and merchants are steering clear of it.
translation: 我们伟大首都的人民们用他们的双手消灭了革命的敌人.这无疑帮助我们免除了叛国贼的烦恼,曾经美丽的的城市却变成了炼狱.直到他们确信这个省份局势稳定为止.商人阶层这次事件避而不谈.

original: Revolutionary Tribunals
translation: 革命法庭

original: In order to deal with the enemies of the Revolution the Jacobins have enlisted the support of the common people on the street to do away with traitors, spies and malcontents. We shall not rest until the last noble traitor is dead.
translation: 为了对付革命的敌人,雅各宾派得到了广大平民的支持,来消灭叛国贼,奸细和不满者.我们不会懈怠直到除掉最后一个贵族的叛军.

original: Constitutional Project
translation: 制定宪法

original: The Girondists are using their influence to formalize the ideas of the revolution and to cement their own ideas into a grand constitutional project for the Republic. We are approaching a future where everything will be ordered in the best possible way.
translation: 吉伦特派正在利用自己的影响力来实现革命的思想,把自己的思想写入共和国宪法里.我们正迈向一个有着完美制度的未来.

original: Consolidation of Executive Power
translation: 行政权力的巩固

original: Our council is wasting no time in power. He has been consolidating his power and getting his own people in the right positions.
translation: 我们的国民议会在执政期间期间不会浪费时间.着手于巩固着自己的权利,并使子民们拥有合适的地位.

original: Suffering Administration
translation: 不胜其任的政府部门

original: Our revolutionary fervor has secured great advances for the people. It has, however, also resulted in a certain shortage of educated men and women to man the desks of our nation...
translation: 因为民众的支持,我们革命热情获得了巨大进展,但也导致一些缺乏执政经验的男男女女到政府就职.

original: Take Loan
translation: 获取贷款

original: $SUM|Y$¤
translation: 总计$SUM|Y$¤

original: Country of Origin is $ORIGINCOUNTRY|Y$
translation: 母国是$ORIGINCOUNTRY|Y$

original: Should our Ruler die while their Heir is too young to assume power, the Consort will start a Regency with a claim determined by the greatest of our current Legitimacy, that of the Consort's origin country and the Heir's claim.
translation: 假如统治者驾崩，而继承人因年幼无法亲政时，统治者的配偶将开始垂帘听政，其正统性取决于当前正统性、配偶的原籍国和继承人的正统性。

original: This option is available due to $RULERNAME|Y$ having the Personality $TRAITNAME|Y$.
translation: 由于$RULERNAME|Y$具有$TRAITNAME|Y$的特质，该选项可用。

original: §Y$ASPECT_LONG$ Can Be Selected§!
translation: §Y可以选择$ASPECT_LONG$§!

original: You have enough §YChurch Power§! to pick a new $ASPECT_LONG|Y$.
translation: 你拥有足够的§Y教会力量§!来选择一个新的$ASPECT_LONG|Y$。

original: Continue failed!
translation: 读取失败

original:
Continuing from the latest save failed. This could be for the following reasons:
* The save is broken
* The save requires DLC that isn't active
* The save doesn't work with the current version of the game
* The save is an Ironman save, and your game is modified, preventing achievements
translation:
读取最新存档失败。可能的原因如：
* 存档损坏
* 未激活存档所要求的DLC包
* 当前游戏版本下存档无法使用
* 该存档为铁人模式下存档，而你的游戏目前使用了无法获得成就的MOD

original: New Cults can be gained by bordering Fetishist nations with Cults adopted and interactions with nations of other religions.
translation: 通过与采用了崇拜物的拜物教国家接壤或者与异教国家互动可以获得新的崇拜物。

original: Random Personality
translation: 随机特质

original: A random Personality will be chosen at game start.
translation: 开局将获得一项随机特质.

original: §YYou can intervene in wars between other Great Powers§!
translation: §Y你可以干涉列强之间的战争§!

original: You can now intervene in wars to aid the following Great Powers:\n$LIST$
translation: 你现在可以干涉战争来帮助下列列强：\n$LIST$

original: $WHO$ has Embraced $NAME$, accelerating its spread in $ADJ$ provinces.
translation: $WHO$已经接纳了$NAME$，并将向所有$ADJ$的省份传播。

original: $WHO$ has Embraced $NAME$ and it has spread to all $ADJ$ provinces.
translation: $WHO$已经接纳了$NAME$，并将向所有$ADJ$的省份传播。

original: $WHO$ is on the attacking side.
translation: $WHO$ 作为进攻方.

original: $WHO$ is on the defending side.
translation: $WHO$ 作为防御方.

original: You have to select a war.
translation: 你必须选择一场战争.

original: These are the Countries we would fight with should we Intervene.
translation: 如果我们干涉的话,这些国家将与我们并肩作战.

original: These are the Countries we would fight against should we Intervene.
translation: 如果我们干涉的话,这些国家将与我们兵戈相见.

original: We can't Intervene in this War.
translation: 我们无法干预这场战争.

original: Will have the following effect on our country if $NAME$ becomes ruler:\n
translation: 假如$NAME$成为统治者，将对我国产生以下影响：\n

original: This is the Heir to our throne.\n
translation: 这是我国的王位继承人。\n

original: This is our Ruler's Consort.\n
translation: 这是我们统治者的配偶。\n

original: Build Cost: §Y$VAL$§!¤
translation: 建造花费：§Y$VAL$§!¤

original: $NAME|Y$ monthly loyalty: $VAL$
translation: $NAME|Y$的月度忠诚度：$VAL$

original: §YHigh Naval Attrition§!
translation: §Y高程度海军损耗§!

original: Your ships are suffering high attrition:\n$NAMELIST$
translation: 你的舰队正承受着高程度损耗：\n$NAMELIST$

original: You played as $NAME|Y$.
translation: 你扮演$NAME|Y$。

original: $VAL|Y$% of players this month played as $NAME|Y$.
translation: $VAL|Y$% 的玩家本月扮演$NAME|Y$。

original: $VAL|Y$ of our wars ended in glorious victory.
translation: $VAL|Y$ 次战争以我们的辉煌胜利落幕。

original: The average player this month has claimed victory in $VAL|Y$ wars.
translation: 玩家本月平均取得 $VAL|Y$ 次战争胜利。

original: Other cowardly players this month only claimed victory in $VAL|Y$ wars.
translation: 部分胆小鬼仅仅取得 $VAL|Y$ 次战争胜利。

original: Others used underhanded tactics to claim victory in $VAL|Y$ wars.
translation: 部分战略鬼才取得了 $VAL|Y$ 次的战争胜利。

original: $VAL|Y$ wars ended in disgraceful defeat.
translation: $VAL|Y$ 次战争以可耻的战败收场。

original: Most players tasted defeat $VAL|Y$ times on average.

original: To our shame, most players tasted defeat only $VAL|Y$ times on average.

original: Less shameful than others who lost $VAL|Y$ times on average.

original: Each year about $VAL|Y$ enemy combatants fell to our fire and steel.

original: Other players slaughtered on average $VAL|Y$ per year.
translation: 其他玩家每年平均每年消灭 $VAL|Y$ 名敌人。

original: Other wimpy players slaughtered only $VAL|Y$ per year.
translation: 部分胆小鬼每年仅仅消灭 $VAL|Y$ 名敌人。

original: We need better discipline to beat the average of $VAL|Y$ per year.
translation: 我们需要更高的训练度才能超过每年平均消灭 $VAL|Y$ 人。

original: Each year about $VAL|Y$ enemy ships fell to our broadsides.

original: Other players sank on average $VAL|Y$ ships per year.

original: Beating the average of $VAL|Y$ ships per year.

original: Poor show compared to the average $VAL|Y$ ships per year.

original: Each year saw the loss of about $VAL|Y$ units.

original: Other players lost on average $VAL|Y$ units yearly.

original: Each year saw the loss of about $VAL|Y$ ships.

original: Our sailors were more dutiful than others who lost $VAL|Y$ ships yearly.

original: Our copper bottoms served us better than others who lost $VAL|Y$ ships yearly.

original: The average reign of player rulers was $VAL|Y$ years.

original: Superior genes kept us above the rest who averaged $VAL|Y$ years.

original: The average reign of player rulers was a staggering $VAL|Y$ years.

original: The average reign of player rulers was $VAL|Y$ years.

original: Ottoman Government
translation: 奥斯曼政府

original: The Ottoman Government is in many ways synonymous with the royal household. The harem ensures that there will never be a lack of heirs for the Ottoman ruler.
translation: 奥斯曼政府在很多地方等同于皇家内务部。后宫确保了永远不会缺乏奥斯曼统治者的继承人。

original: Trading City
translation: 贸易城市

original:
A governmental form where the nation is governed as a republic with a heavy reliance on trade and commerce.
Trading Cities can only be created by the leader of a Trade League.
If a Trading City grows to more than one province, the government form will change to §YMerchant Republic§!.
translation:
一种共和制的政府形式，国家极度依赖贸易和商业。
贸易城市只能由贸易联盟的领导者创建。
如果一个贸易城市发展到超过一个省份，政府形式会转变为§Y商业共和国§!。

original: The faithful Copts of this province have been liberated.
translation: 这个省份的科普特信徒们已被解放。
